src: "Yes! King Tutankhamun, sometimes referred to as ""King Tut"" or ""The Boy King"", is one of the most well known ancient Egyptian kings in modern times. Interestingly, he was not considered to be very important in ancient times and was not recorded on most ancient king lists. However, the discovery of his tomb in 1922 made him a celebrity. While many tombs of the past were robbed, this tomb was left virtually undisturbed. Most of the items buried with Tutankhamun have been well preserved, including thousands of artefacts made from precious metals and rare stones."
mt: "Iya! Raja Tutankhamun, kadang-kadang dikenal minangka ""Raja Tut"" utawa ""Raja Bocah"", salah sijining raja Mesir kuna sing paling dikenal ing wektu modern. Unik, dheweke ora dianggep minangka penting ing wektu kuna lan ora dicatat ing rong king list kuna. Nanging, penemuan makamane ing 1922 nggawe dheweke dadi bintang. Adohing makamane sing wis dirampok, makamane kasebut ditinggalakake kanthi dadi kacatet. Banyake barang sing dikubur karo Tutankhamun wis ditegakake, kalebu nganti puluhan barang sing digawe saka logam mulia lan batu langka."
ref: Yo! Raja Tutankhamun, kadang kala diarani “King Tut” utawa “Anak Raja”, iku salah sawijine raja Mesir Kuno sing isih dikenal ana mangsa moderen iki. Sing nggumunake, dheweke ora dianggep penting banget ing jaman kuno lan ora dicathet ing ameh kabeh daptar raja. Nanging, nalika nemokake kuburan iki taun 1922 gawe dheweke dadi selebriti. Nalika akeh kuburan kuna sing ditemokake dijarah, kuburan iki ditinggal tanpa diganggu. Ameh kabeh barang sing dikubur karo Tutankhamun wis diawetne kanthi becik, kalebu ewonan artefak sing digawe saka logam mulya lan watu sing arang.

src: We know many Greek politicians, scientists, and artists. Possibly the most known person of this culture is Homer, the legendary blind poet, who composed two masterpieces of Greek literature: the poems Iliad and Odyssey. Sophocles and Aristophanes are still popular playwrights and their plays are considered to be among the greatest works of world literature. Another famous Greek is a mathematician Pythagoras, mostly known for his famous theorem about relations of the sides of right triangles.
mt: Kita kenalake akèh-akèh politikus, ilmuwan, lan seniman Yunani. Mungkin wong paling dikenal saka budaya iki ya iku Homer, penyair legendaris sing buta, sing nulisaké dua karya klasik sastra Yunani: puisi Iliad lan Odyssey. Sophocles lan Aristophanes isih populer minangka penulis sandiwara lan sandiwara-sandiwara isih dianggep minangka antaraning karya-karya gedhe sastra donya. Warga Yunani liyane ya iku matematikawan Pythagoras, sing paling dikenal amarga teoremané sing ana hubungan antara sisi-sisi segi tiga kanthi sisi kanthi sisi.
ref: Kita kenal akeh politikus, ilmuwan, lan seniman. Mbok menawa wong sing paling misuwur saka budaya iki yaiku Homer, pujangga wuta legendaris, sing nyungsun rong karya gedhe sastra Yunani: Geguritan Iliad lan Odyssey. Sophocles lan Aristophanes isih dadi penulis naskah sing misuwur lan critane dianggep dadi salah sijine asil literatur donya sing paling apik. Wong Yunani misuwur liyane yaiku matematikawan Pythagoras, sing paling misuwur kanthi teori sing misuwur babagan sesambungane ing sisih maju telu siku-siku.

src: In the warm climate of the Middle East, the house was not so important. Most of the life of the Hebrew family happened in the open air. Women did the cooking in the yard; stores were just open counters looking into the street. Stone was used for building houses. There were no large forests in the land of Canaan, so wood was extremely expensive.
mt: Ing iklim panas saka Timur Tengah, omah ora kawengah. Akèh-akèhé uripé keluarga Ibrani dumadi ing luar ruang. Wadhah kanggo masak ditegakake ing latar; toko-toko ora luwih saka wadhah sing ngepung ing jalan. Batu digunakake kanggo ngrempak omah. Ana kacatheté wana gedhé ing tanah Kanaan, saéngga kayu ora luwih mahal.
ref: Ing iklim anget saka Timur Tengah, griya iku ora patia penting. Akeh kaluwarga Ibrani sing uripe ana njabane wilayahe. Wanita nindakake mangsak ing latar; warung-warung iku namung bukak meja dagangan sing nyawang dalan. Watu digunakake kanggo mbangun griya. Ora ana alas gedhe ing dharatan Canaan, mula kayu iku larang banget.

src: In the warm climate of the Middle East, the house was not so important. Most of the life of the Hebrew family happened in the open air. Women did the cooking in the yard; stores were just open counters looking into the street. Stone was used for building houses. There were no large forests in the land of Canaan, so wood was extremely expensive.
mt: Ing iklim panas saka Timur Tengah, omah ora kawengah. Akèh-akèhé uripé keluarga Ibrani dumadi ing luar ruang. Wadhah kanggo masak ditegakake ing latar; toko-toko ora luwih saka wadhah sing ngepung ing jalan. Batu digunakake kanggo ngrempak omah. Ana kacatheté wana gedhé ing tanah Kanaan, saéngga kayu ora luwih mahal.
ref: Ing iklim anget saka Timur Tengah, griya iku ora patia penting. Akeh kaluwarga Ibrani sing uripe ana njabane wilayahe. Wanita nindakake mangsak ing latar; warung-warung iku namung bukak meja dagangan sing nyawang dalan. Watu digunakake kanggo mbangun griya. Ora ana alas gedhe ing dharatan Canaan, mula kayu iku larang banget.

src: Greenland was settled sparsely. In the Norse sagas they say that Erik the Red was exiled from Iceland for murder, and when travelling further west, found Greenland and named it Greenland. But regardless of his discovery, Eskimo tribes were already living there at the time. Though each country was 'Scandinavian', there were many differences between the people, kings, customs and history of Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Iceland.
mt: Greenland wis dipadati sithik. ref: Greenland iku jarang dinggoni. Ing hikayat-hikayat Norse dheweke padha kandha menawa Erik si Abang dibuwang saka Islandia amarga mateni wong, lan nalika lelungan luwih adoh ngulon, nemokake Greenland lan njenengi iku Greenland. Nanging ora preduli kepiye temuane, suku Eskimo wis urip ing kana wektu iku. Sanadyan saben negara kuwi ‘Skandinavia’, akeh banget bedane antarane wong, raja, adat lan sejarah Denmark, Swedia, Norwegia lan Islandia.

src: While most of their food would be familiar to us, Romans did have their share of strange or unusual feast items, including wild boar, peacock, snails, and a type of rodent called a dormouse Another difference was that while the poor people and the woman ate their food while sitting in chairs, the rich men liked to have banquets together where they would lounge on their sides while they ate their meals. Ancient Roman meals couldn't have included foods that came to Europe from America or from Asia in later centuries. For instance, they didn't have corn, nor tomatoes, nor potatoes, nor cocoa, and no ancient Roman ever tasted a turkey.
mt: Kajaba wong-wong sing mangan ingkang paling akèh ingkang asring dipunmangertosi déning kita, Romawi uga duwé panganan ingkang aneh utawa kacau, kalebet babi hutan, burung merak, siput, lan saté ingkang karan dormouse. Pangecekan liya inggih punika, sementara wong-wong ingkang miskin lan wadon mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingkang mangan ingk
ref: Sanadyan ameh kabeh masakane kana bakal lumrah kanggo awake dhewehewe, wong Roma pancen duwe sawetara bahan pangan sing aneh utawa ora lumrah kalebu, babi liar, merak, keong, lan sajinis kewan pengerat sing jenenge dormouse. Bedane maneh yaiku minangka wong mlarat lan wong wadon madhang panganane karo lungguh ing kursi, wong lanang sing sugih seneng madhang bareng ing ngendi dheweke padha lungguh leyeh-leyeh nalika madhang panganane. Panganan Romawi Kuna ora bisa nyakup panganan sing teka menyang Eropa saka Amerika utawa Asia ing abad-abad sabanjure. Contone, dheweke kabeh ora duwe jagung, tomat, kenthang, coklat, lan ora ana wong Roma kuno sing tau ngrasakake kalkun.

src: A civilization is a singular culture shared by a significant large group of people who live and work co-operatively, a society. The word civilization comes from the Latin civilis, meaning civil, related to the Latin civis, meaning citizen, and civitas, meaning city or city-state, and that also somehow defines the size of the society. City-states are the precursors of nations. A civilizational culture implies the passing on of knowledge across several generations, a lingering cultural footprint and fair dissemination. Minor cultures often vanish without leaving relevant historic evidence and fail to be recognized as proper civilizations.
mt: Peradaban iku budaya sing disahingake dening grup sing gedhe banget, sing urip lan kerja saka saka, siji masyarakat. Tembung peradaban iku saka basa Latin civilis, sing artine sipil, sing kaitane karo basa Latin civis, sing artine warga, lan civitas, sing artine kutha utawa kutha negara, lan sing uga nggawe definisi saka ukuran masyarakat. Kutha-kutha negara iku prekursor saka nagara. Budaya peradaban sing ngandutake nggawe tahu saka generasi-generasi, jejak budaya sing dawa, lan penyebaran sing adil.
ref: Peradaban minangka adat tunggal sing diduweni dening klompok gedhe wong sing urip lan kerja kanthi sesarengan, yaiku masarakat. Tembung civilization asale saka basa Latin civilis, tegese sipil, hubungane karo basa Latin civis, tegese penduduk, lan civitas, tegese kuta utawa kahanan kutha, kang kepriye carane bisa uga nemtokake ukuran masyarakat. Negara bagean Kutha iku pelopore negara. Budaya peradaban nyiratake pewarisan wawasan lintas generasi, tilas budaya sing awet lan penyebaran sing adil. Kabudayan-kabudayan sing cilik kerep ilang tanpa bukti sejarah sing ana gegayutane lan gagal dikenali minangka peradaban sing samesthine.

src: The Drukgyal Dzong is a ruined fortress and Buddhist monastery in the upper part of the Paro District (in Phondey Village). It is said that in 1649, Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel created the fortress to commemorate his victory against the Tibetan-Mongol forces. In 1951, a fire caused for only some of the relics of the Drukgyal Dzong to remain, such as the image of Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal. After the fire, the fortress was preserved and protected, remaining to be one of Bhutan's most sensational attractions.
mt: Kastil lan biara Buddha Drukgyal Dzong sing ora ana ing pérangan atas Paro District (ing Pérangan Phondey). Disayur yèn ing taun 1649, Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel nggawe kastil kanggo ngomong kamenangane marang kekuwatan Tibet-Mongol. Ing taun 1951, kebakaran nggawe saka bahan-bahan sing ora ana saka Drukgyal Dzong, kaya gambar Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal. Sawise kebakaran, kastil kasebut dipertahankan lan dilindungi, tetep dadi salah sijining atraksi sing paling sensasional ing Bhutan.
ref: Drukgyal Dzong iku benteng sing rusak lan biara Buddha ning ndhuwur Kabupaten Paro (ning Desa Phondey). Dikandhakake menawa ing 1649, Zhabdrug Ngawang Namgyel gawe benteng kanggo mengeti kemenangane nglawan pasukan wong Tibet-Mongol Ing taun 1951, Kobongan nyebabake mung sawetara warisan Drukgyal Dzong isih ana, kaya gambar Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal. Sakwise kobongan, bentenge dilestarekake lan dilindhungi, tetep dadi salah siji atraksi Bhutan sing paling narik kawigaten.

src: During the 18th century Cambodia found itself squeezed between two powerful neighbors, Thailand and Vietnam. The Thais invaded Cambodia several times in the 18th century and in 1772 they destroyed Phnom Phen. In the last years of the 18th century the Vietnamese also invaded Cambodia.
mt: Ing abad kaping 18, Kamboja nemu dheweke diseret antara loro tetuwangan kuwat, Thailand lan Vietnam. Thailand nginvasi Kamboja saben wektu ing abad kaping 18 lan ing taun 1772 kira-kira, Thailand ngrusak Phnom Phen. Ing taun-taun pungkasan abad kaping 18, Vietnam uga nginvasi Kamboja.
ref: Nalika abad 18 Kamboja manggon ana tengah tanggane sing nduweni kakuwatan gedhe banget, Thailand lan Vietnam. Wong Thailand nyerang Kamboja kaping pirang-pirang ing abad kaping 18 lan ing taun 1772, dheweke ngrusak Phnom Phen. Nalika taun pungkasan abad 18 Vietnam uga njajah Kamboja.

src: Taiwan beginning start way back in 15th century where European sailors passing by record the island’s name as Ilha Formosa, or beautiful island. In 1624,Dutch East India Company establishes a base in southwestern Taiwan, initiating a transformation in aboriginal grain production practices and employing Chinese laborers to work on its rice and sugar plantations. In 1683, Qing dynasty (1644-1912) forces take control of Taiwan’s western and northern coastal areas and declared Taiwan as a province of the Qing Empire in 1885. In 1895, after defeat in the First Sino-Japanese War (1894-1895), the Qing government signs the Treaty of Shimonoseki, by which it cedes sovereignty over Taiwan to Japan, which rules the island until 1945.
mt: Taiwan mulai ngadeg ing abad kaping 15, nalika kapal-kapal Eropa sing lewat ngrekam jeneng pulo iki minangka Ilha Formosa, utawa pulo sing rupane indah. Taun 1624, Perusahaan Hindia Timur Belanda ngadegake pangkalan ing bagian kidul-kulon Taiwan, nggawe perubahan ing praktik produksi beras aborigin lan nggawe para pekerja Tionghoa kanggo kerja ing pabrik padi lan gula. Taun 1683, pasukan Dinasti Qing (1644-1912) nggawe kontrol ing bagian kidul lan lor pesisir Taiwan lan ngarani Taiwan minangka provinsi Dinasti Qing taun 1885. Taun 1895, sawise kalah ing Perang Sino-Jepang kaping 1 (1894-1895), pamarintahan Dinasti Qing nggawe Perjanjian Shimonoseki, kanthi nggawe Taiwan dadi negara jajahan Jepang, sing nggawe Taiwan nganti 1945.
ref: Taiwan miwiti ing abad 15 nalika nelayan Eropa liwat banjur njenengi pulo iki Ilha Formosa, utawa pulo sing endah.where Ing 1624, Perusahaan India Timur Belanda mbangun sawijining pangkalan ing kidul kuon Taiwan, sing miwiti transformasi ing sajroning praktik produksi wiji-wijian pribumi lan mburuhke buruh Cina kanggo kerja ing kebon pari lan gula. Nalika taun 1683, bala wangsa Qing (1644-1912) nguwasani dhaerah pesisir kulon lan lor ing Taiwan lan ngumumake Taiwan dadi propinsi Kraton Qing ing taun 1885. Taun 1895, sabubare dikalahke dening Perang Jepang-Sino Kapisan (1894-1895), pemerintah Qing nandhani Kasepakatan Shimonoseki, nalika dheweke menehake kedaulatan Taiwan menyang Jepang, sing mrintah pulo iku nganti 1945.

Nalika taun 1683, bala wangsa Qing (1644-1912) nguwasani dhaerah pesisir kulon lan lor ing Taiwan lan ngumumake Taiwan dadi propinsi Kraton Qing ing taun 1885. Taun 1895, sabubare dikalahke dening Perang Jepang-Sino Kapisan (1894-1895), pemerintah Qing nandhani Kasepakatan Shimonoseki, nalika dheweke menehake kedaulatan Taiwan menyang Jepang, sing mrintah pulo iku nganti 1945.

src: This is called a chemical's pH. You can make an indicator using red cabbage juice. The cabbage juice changes color depending on how acidic or basic (alkaline) the chemical is. The pH level is indicated by the amount of Hydrogen (the H in pH) ions in the tested chemical. Hydrogen ions are protons that had their electrons stripped off them (since Hydrogen atoms consist of one proton and one electron).
mt: Katake pH iki disebut pH kimia. Kamu bisa nggawe indikator nggunakake jus woh kembang kubis. Jus woh kembang kubis ngubah warnane menurut sejuk atawa basa (alkaline) kimia sing diuji. Tingkat pH ditandai dening jumlah ion hidrogen (H ing pH) ing kimia sing diuji. Ion hidrogen iku proton sing wis nggoleki elektron (sawise atom hidrogen terdiri saka proton lan elektron).
ref: Iki diarani pH bahan kimia. Sampeyan bisa nggawe panuduh nggunakake jus kol abang. Jus kubis malih werna gumantung ana ing sepira asem utawa basane (alkalin) senyawa kimiane. Tingkat pH iki ditandhani dening jumlah ion-ion Hidrogen (H ning pH) ning bahan kimia sing diuji. Ion hidrogen minangka proton sing elektrone diuculi (amarga atom hidrogen dumadi saka siji proton lan siji elektron).

src: Lions are the most social cats, living in large groups called prides. Prides are made up of one to three related adult males, along with as many as thirty females and cubs. The females are usually closely related to each other, being a large family of sisters and daughters. Lion prides act much like packs of wolves or dogs, animals surprisingly similar to lions (but not other big cats) in behavior, and also very deadly to their prey.
mt: Singa iku kucing sing paling sosial, sing urip ing grup gedhe sing diarani prides. Prides diwujudake saka loro nganti tiga sing lanang sing terkait, saka loro nganti tiga puluh sing wadon lan anak. Sing wadon biasane karo saka liyane, sing iku kulawarga sing gedhe saka adik-adik lan anak-anak. Prides sing singa urip kaya kaya kumpulan wolu lan kaya kaya kucing-kucing sing ora kaya singa (nanging kucing-kucing sing kaya singa) ing perilaku, lan uga kaya sing kaya singa ing kacapitane.
ref: Singa iku kucing kang paling sosial, urip ing klompok gedhe kang diarani pride. Klompok singa iki anggotane siji nganti telu singa diwasa lanang, karo sawetarane telun puluh singa wadon lan dibal. Para singa wadon biasane padha raket hubungane, dadi kulawarga sing gedhe saduluran wadon lan anak wadon. Bombonge singa tumindak kaya sekumpulan srigala utawa segawon, kewan-kewan sing anehe memper singa (nanging dudu kucing gedhe liyane) ing kelakuan, lan uga mematikan kanggo mangsane.

src: Under them are more medium sized cats that eat medium sized prey ranging from rabbits to antelopes and deer. Finally, there are many small cats (including loose pet cats) that eat the far more numerous small prey like insects, rodents, lizards, and birds. The secret to their success is the concept of the niche, a special job each cat holds that keeps it from competing with others.
mt: Ing bawah iku ana kucing gedhe sing mangan mangsa gedhe sing kalebu kelinci, antelop lan rusa. Akhire, ana kucing cilik (termasuk kucing peliharaan sing ora terikat) sing mangan mangsa cilik sing kalebu serangga, tikus, ular lan burung. Rahasane sukses iku konsep niche, pekerjaan khusus sing disangkutpautake kucing sing nggagakake kompetisi.
ref: Sangisore iku luwih ana kucing ukuran sedheng sing mangan buronan ukuran sedheng saka klinci tekan kidang lan kancil. Pungkasane, ana akeh kucing cilik (kalebu kucing ingon) kang mangan mangsa cilik kang luwih akeh kaya serangga, tikus, kadal, lan manuk. Kunci suksese yaiku konsep posisi, gawean kusus sing diduweni saben kucing sing nyegah kucing saka saingan karo liyane.

src: Ocelots like to eat small animals. They will catch monkeys, snakes, rodents and birds if they can. Almost all of the animals that the ocelot hunts are far smaller than it is. Scientists think that ocelots follow and find animals to eat (prey) by smell, sniffing for where they've been on the ground. They can see very well in the dark with night vision, and move very stealthily, too. Ocelots hunt their prey by blending in with their surroundings then pouncing on their prey.
mt: Ocelot seneng mangan hewan kecil. Mereka bakal ngejar monyet, ular, rodensia lan burung kalo bisa. Bebarengan karo hewan-hewan sing dikejar ocelot, hampir kabeh hewan sing dikejar ocelot luwih cilik saka dhewe. Ilmuwan ngira menawa ocelot nggoleki lan nemokake hewan kanggo dimangan (prey) dening bau, ngobrokke kepingan tanah sing wis ana. Mereka bisa nglihat banget ing kegelapan kanthi night vision, lan gerakake banget ngelihate, uga.
ref: Ocelot seneng mangan kewan-kewan cilik. Dheweke padha bakal nyekel munyuk, ula, tikus lan manuk yen dheweke padha bisa. Meh kabeh kewan-kewan sing diburu ocelot iku luwih cilik tinimbang awake dhewe. Ilmuwan mikir yen kucing ocelot ngetutke lan uga nemokake kewan kanggo dipangan (mangsane) kanthi ambune, ngamboni panggonane sing ana lemah. Dheweke bisa ndeleng ing peteng karo pandeleng wayah wengi, lan uga bisa obah meneng-meneng. Ocelot mburu mangsa kanthi nyampur wor karo sakcedhake banjur nrajang mangsane.

src: A well rounded athlete, the tiger can climb (though not well), swim, leap great distances and pull with five times the force of a strong human. The tiger is in the same group (Genus Panthera) as lions, leopards, and jaguars. These four cats are the only ones who can roar. The tiger's roar is not like the full-voiced roar of a lion, but more like a sentence of snarly, shouted words.
mt: Atlet kang rata, sing macan bisa njeblug (walaupun ora apik), ngejolak, ngejolak jarak jauh lan nggolek karo gaya sing lima kali saka gaya manungsa sing kuwat. Macan ing grup (Genus Panthera) sing padha karo singa, macan, lan jaguar. Katurunan sing urip kaya iki sing sajone sing bisa ngomong. Macan ngomong ora kaya singa sing ngomong, nanging kaya kalimat sing ngomong, sing ngomong, sing ngomong.
ref: Atlet sing pinter banget, macan kuwi bisa munggah (sanadyan ora apik banget), nglangi, mluncat sing adoh lan nggered kanthi kakuwatane limang manungsa. Macan iku ana ing kelompok sing padha (jenis Panthera) kaya singa, macan tutul, lan jaguar. Papat kucing kasebut yaiku siji-sijine sing isa mbaung. Nggero macan ora kaya nggerone singa sing duwe swara pepak, nanging kaya ukara sing nggegirisi lan tembung-tembung njerit.

src: A cell is the smallest structural and functional unit of a living (things) organism. Cell comes from the Latin word cella which means small room. If you look at living things under a microscope, you will see that they are made of small squares or balls. Robert Hooke, a biologist from England, saw small squares in cork with a microscope. They looked like rooms. He was the first person to observe dead cells
mt: Sel iku siji unit struktural lan fungsi paling cilik saka organisme sing urip. Sel iku saka basa Latin cella sing tegese ruang cilik. Jika kalian ngamati urang-urang sing urip karo mikroskop, kalian bakal nemu yen urang-urang iku kagawe saka siji siji ruang cilik utawa bola. Robert Hooke, biolog saka Inggris, nemu ruang cilik ing kayu cendana karo mikroskop. Ruang iku kaya ruang. Dheweke iku urang pisanan sing nemu sel mati
ref: Sel iku struktur sing paling cilik lan unit fungsional makhluk (barang) organisme. Sel asale saka tembung Latin cella sing tegese kamar cilik. Menawa sampeyan ngulati barang urip sangisore mikroskop, sampeyan bakal ndelok menawa dheweke digawe saka kothak-kothak utawa bal-bal cilik. Robert Hooke, pakar biologi saka Inggris, ndelok kothak-kothak cilik ing gabus nganggo mikroskop. Iku katon kaya kamar-kamar. Dheweke wong pisanan sing ngamatne sel mati.

src: Plants make oxygen which humans breathe, and they take in carbon-dioxide which humans exhale (that is, breathe out). Plants make their food from the sun by photosynthesis. They also provide shade. We make our houses from plants and make clothes from plants. Most foods that we eat are plants. Without plants, animals could not survive.
mt: Plants ngasilake oksigen sing bisa ditrapake manungsa, lan menehi karbondioksida sing bisa ditrapake manungsa. Plants ngasilake panganan saka sinar matahari kanthi fotosintesis. Mereka uga nyediakake naungan. Kita nggawe rumah saka tanaman lan nggawe baju saka tanaman. Panganan paling akbar sing ditrapake manungsa saka tanaman. Tanpa tanaman, hewan ora bisa urip.
ref: Tanduran ngasilake oksigen sing diserot manungsa, lan njupuk karbondioksida sing wetokake manungsa (yaiku, ambegan). Wit-witan gawe panganane saka srengenge kanthi fotosintesis. Wit-witan uga menehi eyup. Kita nggawe omah saka tanduran lan nggawe sandhangan saka tanduran. Umume panganan sing dipangan yaiku tanduran. Tanpa tanduran, kewan ora bisa urip.

src: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before. This new environment has different resources and different competitors, so the new population will need different features or adaptations to be a strong competitor than what they had needed before. The original population hasn't changed at all, they still need the same adaptations as before. Over time, as the new population begins to adapt to their new environment, they start to look less and less like the other population. Eventually, after thousands or even millions of years, the two populations will look so different that they can't be called the same species. We call this process speciation, which just means the formation of new species. Speciation is an unavoidable consequence and a very important part of evolution.
mt: Ketika grup kecil saka makluk hidup (populasi cilik) nggabungake saka populasi utama sing saka (kaya inggo nggabungake ing gunung, kali, utawa nggabungake ing pulo anyar supaya ora bisa nggabungake kembali) munggahake ing lingkungan sing beda saka sing sebelum. Lingkungan anyar iki duwe sumber daya lan kompetitor sing beda, supaya populasi anyar butuh fitur utawa adaptasi sing beda supaya bisa dadi kompetitor sing kuwat, sing ora butuh sing sebelum. Populasi asli ora beda, sing butuh adaptasi sing padha sebelum. Nalika wektu, sawise populasi anyar mulai ngadaptasi ing lingkungan anyar, awit sing padha karo populasi liyane. Akhire, sawise puluhan utawa bahkan jutaan taun, populasi iki beda sing ora bisa diarani spesies sing padha. Kita ngarani proses iki spesiasi, sing artineh pembentukan spesies anyar. Spesiasi iku konsekuensi sing ora bisa dielakake lan bagian sing penting saka evolusi.
ref: Nalika sekelompok cilik makhluk urip (populasi cilik) pisah seka populasi utama ing ngendi asale (kaya yen dheweke padha pindhah ngliwati barisan gunung utawa kali, utawa yen dheweke padha pindhah menyang pulau anyar satemah dheweke padha ora bisa pindhah meneh kanthi gampang) dheweke padha bakal kerep nemokake dheweke padha ing lingkungan sing beda tinimbang ing ngendi dheweke padha sadurunge. Lingkungan anyar iki duweni sumber sing beda lan saingan sing beda, mula populasi sing anyar bakal butuh tampilan beda utawa adaptasi kanggo dadi pesaing sing kuwat tinimbang sing dibutuhake sakdurunge. Kehe dedunung asli ora owah babar pisan, dheweke isih butuh panyocogan sing padha karo sadurunge. Suwe-suwe, nalika populasi anyar wiwit adaptasi marang lingkungan anyare dheweke padha, dheweke padha wiwit ora katon lan ora kaya populasi liyane. Pungkasane, sawise pirang ewu utawa yuta taun, rong populasi bakal katon beda banget lan ora bisa diarani spesies sing padha. Proses iki diarani spesiasi, sing ateges bentuk anyar saka spesies. Spesiasi iki kalebu urutan sing ora bisa diliwati lan bagean sing penting banget kanggo evolusi.

src: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before. This new environment has different resources and different competitors, so the new population will need different features or adaptations to be a strong competitor than what they had needed before. The original population hasn't changed at all, they still need the same adaptations as before. Over time, as the new population begins to adapt to their new environment, they start to look less and less like the other population. Eventually, after thousands or even millions of years, the two populations will look so different that they can't be called the same species. We call this process speciation, which just means the formation of new species. Speciation is an unavoidable consequence and a very important part of evolution.

src: The major organ of the circulatory system is the heart, which pumps the blood. Blood goes away from the heart in tubes called arteries and comes back to the heart in tubes called veins. The smallest tubes are called capillaries.
mt: Organ utama saka sistem peredaran darah yaiku jantung, sing nggolek darah. Darah banjur saka jantung ing pipa sing diarani arteri lan kembalake menyang jantung ing pipa sing diarani vena. Pipa paling cilik diarani kapiler.
ref: Bagean awak utama ubenging laku getih yaiku jantung, sing ngompa getih. Geteh lunga saka jantung ing pembuluh kang diarani arteri lan bali menyang jantung ing pembuluh kang diarani vena. Pembuluh kang paling ciliki diarani kapilari.

src: Insects were the first animals to take to the air. Their ability to fly helped them evade enemies more easily and find food and mates more efficiently. Most insects have the advantage of being able to fold their wings back along the body. This gives them a wider range of small places to hide from predators. Today, the only insects that cannot fold back their wings are dragon flies and mayflies.
mt: Insektane ya iku hewan sing pisanan nggoleki udara. Kekuatan kanggo terbang nggawe dheweke bisa kabur saka musuh luwih gampang lan nemokake panganan lan pasangan luwih efisien. Nanging, kebanyakan insektane duwe keuntungan saka bisa nggoleki sayap balik ing awak. Kajaba iku, sing ora bisa nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik iku nggoleki sayap balik i
ref: Kewan gregemetan kuwi kalebu kewan sing paling dhisik bisa mabur. Kakuwatane kanggo mabur bisa mbantu supaya bisa adoh saka mungsuh kanthi gampang lan golek panganan lan kawin kanthi luwih gampang. Sebagean gedhe serangga suwe kauntungan saka kemampuan nglempit swiwine ing buri bareng awake. Iki menehi dheweke let amba saka macem-macem papan cilik kanggo ndhelik saka para predator. Saiki, serangga sing ora bisa nglempit bali swiwine iku mung tokiyik lan laler tokiyik.

src: Many paleontologists today believe that one group of dinosaurs survived and is alive today. We call them birds. Many people don't think about them as dinosaurs because they have feathers and can fly. But there are a lot of things about birds that still look like a dinosaur. They have feet with scales and claws, they lay eggs, and they walk on their two back legs like a T-Rex.
mt: Paleontologis saiki umume ngiraake salah sijiné grupa dinosaurus sing bisa nggabut lan sing urip saiki. Kita sebutake manuk. Banyak wong sing ora ngertiake manuk minangka dinosaurus amarga manuk duwé bulu lan bisa terbang. Nanging ana akèh hal sing ngenani manuk sing isih ngliwati minangka dinosaurus. Manuk duwé kaki sing duwé skala lan kuku, manuk ngegawe telur, lan manuk ngrungokake ing loro siji kaki ing pungkasan sing kaya T-Rex.
ref: Akeh ahli palaeontologi saiki percaya menawa sekelompok dinosaurus slamet lan urip saiki. Kita sebut iku padha manuk. Akeh ong sing ngarani kewan iki dudu dinosaurus amarga nduwe wulu lan bisa mabur. Nanging isih akeh bagean saka manuk kang katon kaya dinosaurus. Dheweke duwe sikil kanthi sisik lan cakar, dheweke ngendhog, lan mlaku nganggo rong sikil mburi kaya T-Rex.

src: A triceratops' teeth would have been able to crush not only leaves but even very tough branches and roots. Some scientists think Triceratops ate cycads, which are a type of plant that was common in the Cretaceous. These plants look like a small palm tree with a crown of sharp, spiky leaves. A Triceratops could have used its strong beak to strip off the leaves before eating the trunk. Other scientists argue that these plants are very poisonous so it is unlikely that any dinosaur ate them, even though today the sloth and other animals like the parrot (a descendant of the dinosaurs) can eat poisonous leaves or fruit.
mt: Gigi Triceratops bisa ngrusak ora namung daun, nanging uga cabang lan akar sing kuwat. Beberapa ilmuwan ngomong Triceratops mangan cycads, sing kalebu tipe tanaman sing umum ing Cretaceous. Tanaman iki kaya palem sing gedhe sing nggawa mahkota daun sing tajam lan tajam. Triceratops bisa nggunakake bejana kuwat kanggo nggoleki daun sadurunge mangan akar. Ilmuwan liyane ngomong yen tanaman iki kuwat banget, mula ora mungkin yen Triceratops mangan, walaupun saiki sloth lan hewan liyane kaya parrot (keturunan sing mungkina saka dino) bisa mangan daun utawa buah sing kuwat.
ref: Untu triceratop bakal bisa kanggo ngremuk ora mung godhong nanging uga pang lan oyot sing atos. Sawetara ilmuwan mikir menawa Triceratops mangan pakis haji, yaiku sejenis tanduran sing lumrah ing kapur. Tanduran-tanduean iki katon kaya wit palem cilik kanthi makutha godhong sing landhep lan lancip. Triceratops bisa nggunakake cucuke sing kuwat kanggo ngilangi godhong sadurunge mangan batang. Ilmuwan liyane mbantah yen tetanduran iki nduweni racun mula ora mungkin yen dinosaurus mangan tetanduran iki, sanadyan jaman saiki kungkang lan kewan liyane kayata manuk beo (turunane dinosaurus) bisa mangan godhong utawa woh-wohan sing nduweni racun.

src: Italy's national football, along with German national football team is the second most successful team in the world and were the FIFA World Cup champions in 2006. Popular sports include football, basketball, volleyball, water-polo, fencing, rugby, cycling, ice hockey, roller hockey and F1 motor racing. Winter sports are most popular in the Northern regions, with Italians competing in international games and Olympic events.
mt: Tim nasional bal-balan Italia, saka jajanan, tim nasional bal-balan Jerman, ya iku tim nasional bal-balan kang paling sukses ing donya lan dadi juara Piala Donya FIFA ing 2006. Olahraga sing populer kalebu bal-balan, basket, voli, polo banyu, pedang, rugby, balap sepeda, hoki es, hoki rol, lan F1 bal motor. Olahraga musim dingin paling populer ing wilayah lor, karo Italia kompetitor ing permainan internasional lan acara Olimpiade.
ref: Bal-balan nasional Italia, bebarengan karo tim bal-balan nasional Jerman iku tim sing paling sukses nomer loro ing donya lan juwarane piala donya FIFA ing 2006. Olahraga sing misuwur kalebu bal-balan, basket, voli, polo-banyu, anggar, rugbi, pit-pitan, hoki es, hoki sepatu rodha lan balapan montor F1. Olahraga mangsa adhem kuwi paling misuwur ana daerah Lor, kanthi anane Italia sing melu lumba internasional lan acara Olimpiade.

src: Luxembourg has a long history but its independence dates from 1839. Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution. Luxembourg has always tried to remain a neutral country but it was occupied in both World War I and World War II by Germany. In 1957 Luxembourg became a founding member of the organization which is today known as the European Union.
mt: Kerajaan Luxembourg duwe sejarah sing dawa nanging kemerdekaan sing paling anyar yaiku 1839. Bagian-bagian saka Belgia saiki dadi bagian saka Luxembourg ing masa lampau nanging dadi bagian saka Belgia sawise Revolusi Belgia 1830-an. Luxembourg duwe sejarah sing dawa nanging kemerdekaan sing paling anyar yaiku 1839. Bagian-bagian saka Belgia saiki dadi bagian saka Luxembourg ing masa lampau nanging dadi bagian saka Belgia sawise Revolusi Belgia 1830-an. Luxembourg duwe sejarah sing dawa nanging kemerdekaan sing paling anyar yaiku 1839. Bagian-bagian saka Belgia saiki dadi bagian saka Luxembourg ing masa lampau nanging dadi bagian saka Belgia sawise Revolusi Belgia 1830-an. Luxembourg duwe sejarah sing dawa nanging kemerdekaan sing paling anyar yaiku 1839. Bagian-bagian saka Belgia saiki dadi bagian saka Luxembourg ing masa lampau nanging dadi bagian saka Belgia sawise Revolusi Belgia 1830-an. Luxembourg duwe sejarah sing dawa nanging
ref: Luksemburg duwe sejarah dawa nanging tanggal kamardikane saka 1839. Bagian Belgium saiki iku bagian saka Luksemburg ing jaman biyen nanging dadi Belgia sawise Revolusi Belgia 1830-an. Luksemburg mesthi nyoba supaya tetep dadi negara sing netral nanging negara iki dipanggoni dening Jerman nalika Perang Donya I lan Perang Donya II. Ing taun 1957, Luksemburg dadi anggota pangadeg organisasi sing saiki dikenal minangka Uni Eropa.

Luxembourg duwe sejarah sing dawa nanging kemerdekaan sing paling anyar yaiku 1839. Bagian-bagian saka Belgia saiki dadi bagian saka Luxembourg ing masa lampau nanging dadi bagian saka Belgia sawise Revolusi Belgia 1830-an. Luxembourg duwe sejarah sing dawa nanging
ref: Luksemburg duwe sejarah dawa nanging tanggal kamardikane saka 1839. Bagian Belgium saiki iku bagian saka Luksemburg ing jaman biyen nanging dadi Belgia sawise Revolusi Belgia 1830-an. Luksemburg mesthi nyoba supaya tetep dadi negara sing netral nanging negara iki dipanggoni dening Jerman nalika Perang Donya I lan Perang Donya II. Ing taun 1957, Luksemburg dadi anggota pangadeg organisasi sing saiki dikenal minangka Uni Eropa.

src: European Turkey (eastern Thrace or Rumelia in the Balkan peninsula) includes 3% of the country. The territory of Turkey is more than 1,600 kilometres (1,000 mi) long and 800 km (500 mi) wide, with a roughly rectangular shape. Turkey's area, including lakes, occupies 783,562 square kilometres (300,948 sq mi), of which 755,688 square kilometres (291,773 sq mi) are in south west Asia and 23,764 square kilometres (9,174 sq mi) in Europe. Turkey's area makes it the world's 37th-largest country, and is about the size of Metropolitan France and the United Kingdom combined. Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.
mt: Turki Eropa (Thrace Timur utawa Rumelia ing bawana Balkan) kalebu 3% saka negara. Wilayah Turki luwih saka 1,600 kilometer (1,000 mi) panjang lan 800 km (500 mi) lewih dawa, kanthi bentuk sing rata-rata. Wilayah Turki, kalebu danau, 783,562 kilometer persegi (300,948 sq mi), saka 755,688 kilometer persegi (291,773 sq mi) ing Asia kidul kulon lan 23,764 kilometer persegi (9,174 sq mi) ing Eropa. Wilayah Turki nggawe negara kaping 37 ing donya, lan kalebu Metropolitan Prancis lan Britania Raya.
ref: Turki Eropa (Jalur sisih wetan Rumelia ning semenanjung Balkan) kalebu 3% negara. Wilayah Turki kuwi luwih dawa saka 1.600 kilometer (1,000 mi) lan ambane 800 km (500 mil), kanthi wujut kira-kira persagi. Wilayah Turki, kalebu wadhuk, manggoni 783,562 kilometer persegi (300,948 mil persegi), ing ngendi 755,688 kilometer persegi (291,773 mil persegi) ana ing Asia Barat Dhaya lan 23,764 kilometer persegi (9,174 mil persegi) ing Eropa. Wilayah TUrki marakake iku negara paling amba kaping 37 ing donya, lan kira-kira ukurane padha kaya Prancis Metropolitn lan Inggris menawa digabung. Turki iku diubengi dening segara saka telung sisih: Segara Aegan ing kulon, Segara Ireng ing lor lan Segara Mediterania ing kidul.

src: Vatican City's population is around 800. It is the smallest independent country in the world and the country with the lowest population. Vatican City uses Italian in its legislation and official communications. Italian is also the everyday language used by most of those who work in the state while Latin is often used in religious ceremonies. All citizens of Vatican City are Roman Catholic.
mt: Populasi Vatikan City kira-kira 800. Iki minangka negara independen paling cilik ing donya lan negara sing populasi paling rendah. Vatikan City nggunakake basa Italia ing perundang-undangan lan komunikasi resmi. Basa Italia uga basa sehari-hari sing digunakake dening akèh-akèhé sing kerja ing negara sarta basa Latin akèh-akèhé digunakake ing upacara agama. Kabèh warga Vatikan City ya iku Katolik Roma.
ref: Populasi Kutha Vatikan watara 800. Iku negara mardika paling cilik ing donya lan negara kanthi pendhudhuk paling sethithik. Vatican City nggunakake basa Italia ing undhang-undhang lan komunikasi dhines. Basa Italia kuwi uga basa sing digunakake deing wong akeh sing nyambut gawe ning daerah iki lan basa Latin kuwi asring digunakake kanggo upacara keagamaan. Kabeh masarakat sing manggon ana ning Kutha Vatican iku Katolik Roma.

src: Computers today are used to manipulate pictures and videos. Sophisticated animations can be constructed on computers, and this kind of animation is increasingly being used in television and films. Music is often recorded using sophisticated computers to process and mix sounds together.
mt: Komputer saiki digunakake kanggo nggawe gambar lan video. Animasi sing rumit bisa dibangun ing komputer, lan tipe animasi iki saiki digunakake ing televisi lan filem. Musik bisa dicatat nganggo komputer sing rumit kanggo ngolah lan nggabungake suara.
ref: Komputer saiki dienggo ngowahi poto lan video. Animasi canggih bisa digawe ing komputer, lan animasi kaya iki saya akeh digunakake ing televisi lan film. Musik asring kacathet nggunakake komputer sing modheren kanggo ngolah lan nyampur swara.

src: The cities of Harappa and Mohenjo-daro had a flush toilet in almost every house, attached to a sophisticated sewage system. Remains of sewage systems have been found in the houses of the Minoan cities of Crete and Santorini in Greece. There were also toilets in ancient Egypt, Persia and China. In Roman civilization, toilets were sometimes part of public bath houses where men and women were together in mixed company.
mt: Kutha-kutha Harappa lan Mohenjo-daro duwe toilet sing bisa disiram ing saben rumah, sing digabungake karo sistem pembuangan sing rinci. Sisa-sisa sistem pembuangan wis ditemokake ing kutha-kutha Minoan Crete lan Santorini ing Yunani. Uga ana toilet ing peradaban Mesir, Persia lan Cina. Ing peradaban Romawi, toilet bisa dadi bagian saka papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan panggul sing kadang-kadang kalebu papan
ref: Kutha Harappa lan Mohenjo-daro duwe jamban sing rata ana ing meh saben omah, sing disambung karo tata cara pambuwangan sampah sing modheren. Sisa sistem- sistem pembuangan limbah ditemokake ing omah-omah ing kutha-kutha Minoan ing Kreta lan Santorini ing Yunani. Toilet uga ana ing Mesir, Persia, lan Tiongkok kuno. Ing peradaban Roma, toilet kala-kala dadi bagean saka omah padusan umum ing endi wong lanang lan wadon campur bareng-bareng.

src: The blade on a modern ice skate has a double edge with a concave hollow between them. The two edges allow for a better grasp of the ice, even when tilted. Because the bottom of the blade is slightly curved, as the blade tilts to one side or the other, the edge which is in contact with the ice also curves. This causes the skater to turn. If the skates tilt to the right, the skater turns right, if the skates tilt to the left, the skater turns left.
mt: Gigi ing sepatu es modern duwé gandhengan ganda karo golek antara loro. Dua gandhengan iki nyediakake pangertan sing luwih apik kanggo es, nanging mung karo gandhengan sing nggoleki. Amarga bokong gigi duwé golek sing sedikit lengkung, saéngga gandhengan sing nggoleki es uga lengkung. Kajaba iku, kajaba gandhengan nggoleki es, penunggu nggoleki es uga lengkung. Kajaba iku, kajaba gandhengan nggoleki es, penunggu nggoleki es uga lengkung. Kajaba iku, kajaba gandhengan nggoleki es, penunggu nggoleki es uga lengkung. Kajaba iku, kajaba gandhengan nggoleki es, penunggu nggoleki es uga
ref: Wilahan ing sepatu es modheren duwe rong pucukan cekung growong ing antarane. Kaloro pucuk kasebut bisa gawe luwih nggegem es luwih kuwat, sanajan dimiringake. Amarga ngisore pangot kuwi rada mlengkung, nalika pangot kuwi miring marang salah sawijine iringan utawa sisih liyane, pucuke sing nemplek karo es kuwi uga mlengkung. Iki nyebabake skater muter. Yen skate miring nganan, skater dadi menggok nengen, yen skate miring ngiwa, skater dadi menggok ngiwa.

src: "To return to their previous energy level, they must get rid of the extra energy they got from the light. They do this by emitting a tiny particle of light called a ""photon"". Scientists call this process ""stimulated emission of radiation"" because the atoms are stimulated by the bright light, causing the emission of a photon of light, and light is a type of radiation. The next picture shows the atoms emitting photons. Of course, in reality photons are a lot smaller than those in the picture. Photons are even smaller than the stuff that makes up atoms!"
mt: "Agusipan menawa supaya bisa kambal menawa energi, kudu nggoleki energi tambahan sing diterima saka cahya. Kajaba, kudu nggoleki partikel cahya cilik sing diarani ""photon"". Ilmuwan ngarani proses iki ""stimulated emission of radiation"" amarga atom-atom di-stimulasi dening cahya sing cerah, sing nggoleki emisi photon cahya, lan cahya iku tipe radiasi. Gambar berikut menunjukke atom-atom sing nggoleki photon. Tentu, ing kenyataan, photon iku luwih cilik saka bahan sing ngisi atom!
ref: Kanggo bali menyang tingkat tenagane sing sakdurunge, dhweke kudu nyingkirake tenaga tambahan sing dheweke oleh saka sorotan. Dheweke nglakokake iki kanthi ngetokne partikel cahya cilik kang diarani “foton”. Para ilmuan ngarani proses iki “stimulasi pancaran radiasi” amarga atom-atome dirangsang dening cahya terang, nyebabake pancaran foton cahya, lan cahya iku sawijining jenis radiasi. Gambar sabanjure nuduhake atom sing ngucurake foton. Samesthine, ing kasunyatan foton iku luwih cilik tinimbang sing ana ing gambar. Foton malah luwih cilik tinimbang barang sing nggaweni atom!

src: After hundreds of hours of operation the filament in the bulb eventually burns out and the light bulb no longer works. The light bulb then needs replacing. It is necessary to be careful in replacing the light bulb. First, the switch for the light fixture needs to be turned off or the cable disconnected. This is because electricity flowing into the socket where the metallic part of bulb sits can give you a severe electric shock if you touch the inside of the socket or the metal base of the bulb while it is still partly in the socket.
mt: Kanthi jamak jam operasi, filamen ing lampu kira-kira bakal njeblug lan lampu kira-kira ora bisa kerja. Lampu kira-kira butuh diganti. Butuh ati-ati ing ngganti lampu. ref: Sakwise murup atusan jam filamen ing bohlam akhire kebakar lan bohlame ora bisa murup maneh. Bohlam lampu banjur butuh diganti. Perlu ngati-ati kanggo ngganti bohlam lampune. Kang sepisan, saklar kanggo lampu kudu dipateni utawa kabele dicopot. Iki amarga listrik sing mili menyang colokan sing ana bohlam logam sing bisa nyetrum sampeyan yen sampeyan demek njerone colokan listrik utawa logam sing ana ning lampu nalika separone isih ana ning njero colokan.

src: After hundreds of hours of operation the filament in the bulb eventually burns out and the light bulb no longer works. The light bulb then needs replacing. It is necessary to be careful in replacing the light bulb. First, the switch for the light fixture needs to be turned off or the cable disconnected. This is because electricity flowing into the socket where the metallic part of bulb sits can give you a severe electric shock if you touch the inside of the socket or the metal base of the bulb while it is still partly in the socket.
mt: Kanthi jamak jam operasi, filamen ing lampu kira-kira bakal njeblug lan lampu kira-kira ora bisa kerja. Lampu kira-kira butuh diganti. Butuh ati-ati ing ngganti lampu. Saben-saben, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika, sakalika
ref: Sakwise murup atusan jam filamen ing bohlam akhire kebakar lan bohlame ora bisa murup maneh. Bohlam lampu banjur butuh diganti. Perlu ngati-ati kanggo ngganti bohlam lampune. Kang sepisan, saklar kanggo lampu kudu dipateni utawa kabele dicopot. Iki amarga listrik sing mili menyang colokan sing ana bohlam logam sing bisa nyetrum sampeyan yen sampeyan demek njerone colokan listrik utawa logam sing ana ning lampu nalika separone isih ana ning njero colokan.

src: The fission bomb works on the principle that it takes energy to put together a nucleus with many protons and neutrons. Sort of like rolling a heavy cart up a hill. Splitting the nucleus up again then releases some of that energy. Some atoms have unstable nuclei which means that they tend to break apart with little or no nudging.
mt: Senjata fisi bom karyane saka prinsip sing ngandika yen energi sing kudu dipakai kanggo nggabungake inti atom sing duwe protons lan neutron. Kaya nggolek kereta beban ing bukit. Nggabungake inti atom kasebut banjur nggolekake energi. Atom kaya-kaya duwe inti sing instabil sing artine yen inti kasebut mungkina banjur nggabungake kanthi sedikit utawa ora ana nggolekake.
ref: Bom fisi murup saka prinsip menawa dibutuhake energi kanggo nggabungake nukleus sing akeh proton lan neutrone. Mirip kaya ngglindhingke siji grobak abot munggah bukit. Misahke nukleus meneh banjur ngeculake saperangan energi iku. Saperangan atom duwe inti sing ora stabil sing tegese menawa atom-atom iku cenderung pecah kanthi sethithik utawa tanpa dhorongan.

src: When you call someone who is thousands of miles away, you are using a satellite. The satellite in space gets the call and then reflects it back down, almost instantly. The satellite was sent into space by a rocket. Scientists use telescopes in space because the Earth’s atmosphere distorts some of our light and view. It takes a giant rocket over a 100 feet high to put a satellite or telescope in space.
mt: Ketika kalian ngelepon seseorang sing jauh banget, kalian nganggo satelit. Satelit ing angkasa ngelepon lan banjur ngilangake kembali, nganti kapan. Satelit kasebut diangkasa dening roket. Ilmuwan nggunakake teleskop ing angkasa amarga atmosfer bumi ngilangake saka cahya lan pandangane. Iki butuh roket gedhe 100 kaki kanggo ngelepon satelit utawa teleskop ing angkasa.
ref: Nalika sampeyan nyelukake wong sing adohe ewunan mil, sampeyan nggunakake satelit. Satelite iku ing angkasa entuk panggilan lan banjur mantulake iki meneh medhun, meh kanthi enggal. Satelit dikirim menyang antariksa nganggo roket. Para ilmuwan gunakake teleskop ing antariksa amarga atmosfir Bumi mbelokke sawetara sorot lan pandelenge awake dhewe. Dibutuhke roket sing gedhe banget sing dhuwure 100 feet kanggo ngunggahke satelit utawa teleskop menyang langit.

src: Time is something that is all around us, and affects everything we do, yet is difficult to understand. Time has been studied by religious, philosophical, and scientific scholars for thousands of years. We experience time as a series of events passing from the future through the present to the past. Time is also how we compare the duration (length) of events. You can mark the passing of time yourself by observing the repetition of a cyclical event. A cyclical event is something that happens again and again regularly.
mt: Waktu yaiku sesuatu sing ana ing sekitar kita, lan nggawe kabeh sing kita lakuake, nanging sulit diwenehi. Waktu wis dipelajari dening para sarjana agama, filosofis, lan ilmiah kanggo puluhan taun. Kita ngalami waktu minangka sijiné acara sing lewat saka masa ing nganti ing masa. Waktu uga kaya kita bandhingake durasi (panjang) saka acara. Kita bisa nandhakake ngalami waktu dhewe dening ngamati ulangé siji acara siklus. Acara siklus yaiku sesuatu sing kerep-karep lewat lan kerep-karep.
ref: Wektu iku sawijing perkara kang ana sakubunge awake dhewe, lan ngaruh menyang apa wae sing awake dhewe lakoni, nanging uga angel dimangerteni. Wektu wis disinau dening para sarjana agama, filsafat, lan ilmiah saka ewunan taun. Awake dhewe ngalami wektu minangka rentetan kadadean liwat saka mbesuk ngliwati saiki lan kala wingi. Wektu iku uga kepiye kita mbandhingake jangka wektu(suwene) kedadean. Sampeyan bisa nengeri dhewe lakune wektu kanthi ngulati pengulangan acara rutin. Acara rutin iku perkara sing kasadean maneh lan maneh kanthi teratur.

src: Traditionally, the heir to the throne would go straight into the military after finishing school. However, Charles went to university at Trinity College, Cambridge where he studied Anthropology and Archaeology, and later History, earning a 2:2 (a lower second class degree). Charles was the first member of the British Royal Family to be awarded a degree.
mt: Tradisional, penerus sing dadi raja bakal ngelanjutake panggul militer sawise sekolah. Nanging, Charles ngelanjutake ing universitas Trinity College, Cambridge, sing ngerti Antropologi lan Arkeologi, lan nglanjutake ing sejarah, nyiptakake 2:2 (siji kelas kedua). Charles dadi anggota pertama saka Royal Family Britania sing dianugerake gelar.
ref: Tradisine, pewaris tahta bakal langsung mlebu militer sakwise rampung sekolah. Nanging, Charles sekolah menyang kampus Trinity, Cambridge panggone dheweke sinau Antropologi lan Arkeologi, lan sabanjure Sejarah, ngasilake 2:2 (tingkat kelas kaping loro sing luwih cendhek). Charles minangka anggota kapisan Kulawarga Krajan Inggris sing oleh gelar sarjana.

src: England had experienced a long period of peace after the reconquest of the Danelaw. However in 991 Ethelred was faced with a Viking fleet larger than any since Guthrum's a century earlier. This fleet was led by Olaf Trygvasson, a Norwegian with ambitions to reclaim his country from Danish domination. After initial military setbacks, Ethelred was able to agree to terms with Olaf, who returned to Norway to try to gain his kingdom with mixed success.
mt: Ing 991, Inggris wis ngalami periode panjang damai sawise kembaline Danelaw. Nanging, Ethelred dihadapake karo armada Viking sing luwih gedhe saka sing wis ana sawise abad sadurunge karo Guthrum. Armada iki diwakili dening Olaf Trygvasson, Norwegia sing duwé ambisi kanggo ngrampas negarane saka dominasi Denmark. Sawise kegagalan militèr awal, Ethelred bisa nggawe kesepakatan karo Olaf, sing kembaline Norwegia kanggo nyoba ngrampas negarane kanthi kesuksesan campur.
ref: Inggris ngalami bedhamen sing dawa sawise panjajahan Danelaw maneh. Nanging ing 991 Ethelred diadepake karo armada kapal Viking sing luwih gedhe saka apa wae awit duweke Guthrum seabad sakdurunge. Armada iki dipimpin dening Olaf Trygvasson, wong Norwegia kanthi ambisi kanggo ngrebut balik negarane saka dominasi Denmark. Sawise kemunduran militer awal, Ethelred bisa sarujuk kanggo hubungan karo Olaf, sing sapa balik menyang Norwegia kanggo njajal antuk krajan duweke dheweke kanthi kesuksesan campuran.

src: "Around the 15th century, northern Estonia was under great cultural influence of Germany. Some German monks wanted to bring God closer to the native people, so they invented the Estonian literal language. It was based on the German alphabet and one character ""Õ/õ"" was added. As time passed, many words that were borrowed from German coalesced. This was the beginning of enlightenment."
mt: “Sekitar abad ke-15, Estonia Lor dadi bawah pengaruh budaya Jerman sing gedhe. Beberapa biarawan Jerman ngarep supaya Tuhan didekati dening wong asli, jadi mereka nggawe basa literal Estonia. Iki diwujudake kanthi nggunakake alfabet Jerman lan karakter “Õ/õ” ditambahake. Saumur wektu, akibatake bebrapa kata sing diimpor saka Jerman ngremuk. Iki dadi awal pencerahan.”
ref: "Watara abad kaping 15 masehi, Estonia sisih lor iku sajroning pangaribawa budaya Jerman sing gedhe. Sawetara rahib Jerman pengin nyedhakake Pangerane karo para pribumi, mula bisa nemokake basa Estonia sing sejatine. Iki adhedhasar abjad Jerman lan siji karakter ""Õ/õ"" ditambahake. Seiring wektu kliwat, akeh tembung-tembung sing disilih saka Jerman gabung. Iki wiwitane saka pencerahan."

src: There are varying estimates for how many people speak Hindi. It is estimated to be between the second and fourth most commonly spoken language in the world. The number of native speakers varies depending on whether or not very closely related dialects are counted. Estimates range from 340 million to 500 million speakers, and as many as 800 million people can understand the language. Hindi and Urdu are similar in vocabulary but different in script; in everyday conversations, speakers of both languages can usually understand each other.
mt: Estimasi kanggo jumlah wong sing ngomong Hindi. Iki diestimasi antara basa kedua lan basa katelu sing paling umum dipakai ing donya. Angka wong sing ngomong basa asli beragam saka 340 yuta nganti 500 yuta wong, lan as many as 800 yuta wong bisa ngerti basa iki. Hindi lan Urdu mirip ing kosa kata nanging beda ing aksara; ing percakapan sehari-hari, wong sing ngomong basa iki bisa umumnya ngerti wong sing ngomong basa iki.
ref: Ana werna-werna perkiraan sepira akehe wong-wong ngomong Hindi. Iki kira-kira antarane basa kaping pindho lan kaping papat sing paling umum dipocapake ing donya. Gunggung pamicara asli beda-beda gumantung saka tetembungan sing gegandhengan banget sing diitung. Kira-kira ana 340 yuta nganti 500 yuta manungsa sing nggunakake basa iki, 800 yuta manungsa mudheng basa iki. Basa Hindi lan Urdu kuwi suku ukarane persis nanging tulisane beda, ana omongan saben dina, wong sing omongan nganggo basa-basa kuwi bakal padha-padha mangerteni.

src: "Hangeul is the only purposely invented alphabet in popular daily use. The alphabet was invented in 1444 during the reign of King Sejong (1418 – 1450). King Sejong was the fourth king of the Joseon Dynasty and is one of the most highly regarded. He originally named the Hangeul alphabet Hunmin Jeongeum, which means ""the correct sounds for the instruction of the people""."
mt: "Hangeul ya iku abjad sing isih sengaja diinventarake ing penggunaan harian populer. Abjad iki diinventarake ing taun 1444 nalika masa pemerintahan Raja Sejong (1418 – 1450). Raja Sejong ya iku raja kaping papat saka Dinasti Joseon lan salah sijining sing paling dihargai. Dheweke asale jeneng Hangeul Hunmin Jeongeum, sing artine ""suara sing benar kanggo ngetrapake rakyat""."
ref: Hangeul minangka sawijine abjad sing sengaja dicipta kanggo panggunaan umum saben dina. Abjad dicipta ing taun 1444 nalika pamrentahane Raja Sejong (1418 - 1450). Raja Sejong minangka raja kaping papat ing Wangsa Joseon lan minangka salah sawijining sing paling diurmati. Dheweke asale ngarani aksara Hangeul minangka Hunmin Jeongum, kang tegese “swara kang bener kanggo pengajarane wong-wong”.

src: There are many theories to how Sanskrit came into existence. One of them is about an Aryan migration from the west into India who brought their language with them. Sanskrit is an ancient language and is comparable to the Latin language spoken in Europe. The earliest known book in the world was written in Sanskrit. After the compilation of Upanishads, Sanskrit just faded due to hierarchy. Sanskrit is a very complex and rich language, which has served to be the source for many modern Indian languages, just like Latin is the source for European languages like French and Spanish.
mt: Ana akal-akal kanggo bagaimana Sanskerta muncul. Siji saka kerepane iku babagan migrasi Aryan saka kulon menyang India sing ngembarke basa sing padha. Sanskerta iku basa sing kuna lan bisa diumpake karo basa Latin sing diucapake ing Eropa. Buku sing paling tuwa sing diwetokake ing donya iku diwetokake ing Sanskerta. Sawise pengumpulan Upanishad, Sanskerta mung nggantung amarga hierarki. Sanskerta iku basa sing rumit lan kaya, sing wis nglakokake sumber kanggo akal-akal basa India sing modhern, sing padha karo Latin minangka sumber kanggo basa-basa Eropa kaya basa Prancis lan basa Spanyol.
ref: Ana akeh teori sing nyatakake kepiye basa Sanskerta iso ana. Salah sawijine yaiku kaum Aryan sing ngalih saka kulon menyang India lan nggawa basane. Basa sansekerta minangka basa kuna lan bisa dibandhingake karo basa Latin sing digunakake ing Eropa. Layang sing paling dhisik diweruhi ing donya ditulis ing Sansekerta. Sawise Upanoshads diklumpukake, Sansekerta saya ilang amarga hirarki. Basa sansekrerta minangka basa sing ruwet lan aji, sing wis dadi sumber kanggo pirang-pirang basa India modheren, kaya basa Latin minangka sumber kanggo basa Eropa kayata Prancis lan Spanyol.

src: How would Io's gravity pull on me? If you stood on the surface of Io, you would weigh less than you do on Earth. A person who weighs 200 pounds (90kg) on Earth would weigh about 36 pounds (16kg) on Io. So the gravity, of course, pulls less on you.
mt: Kaya apa gravitasi Io bakal nggoleki saya? Jika anda berdiri ing permukaan Io, anda bakal nggoleki kurang tinimbang anda ing Bumi. Seseorang sing nggoleki 200 pon (90kg) ing Bumi bakal nggoleki kira-kira 36 pon (16kg) ing Io. Mula gravitasi, tentu, nggoleki kurang ing anda.
ref: Kepiye gravitasi Io bakal narik kula? Yen sampeyan ngadeg ing permukaan Io, sampeyan bakal kelangan aboting awak tinimbang yen sampeyan ing Bumi. Wong sing bobote 200 kilogram (90kg) ing Bumi bakal nduwe bobot udakara 36 kilogram (16kg) ing Io. Dadi gravitasi mesthine ora narik sampeyan.

src: The surface of the Moon is made of rocks and dust. The outer layer of the Moon is called the crust. The crust is about 70 km thick on the near side and 100 km thick on the far side. It is thinner under the maria and thicker under the highlands. There may be more maria on the near side because the crust is thinner. It was easier for lava to rise up to the surface.
mt: Wulung saka Bumi iku saka batu lan abu. Lapisan paling njaba saka Bumi iku diarani kulit. Kulit iku kira-kira 70 km dhuwur ing sisi gedhe lan 100 km dhuwur ing sisi jaba. Iki dhuwur ing ngisor maria lan dhuwur ing ngisor gunung-gunung. Ana mungkin luwih maria ing sisi gedhe amarga kulit iku dhuwur. Iki luwih gampang kanggo lava kanggo ngrungu nganti wulung.
ref: Lumahing Rembulan digawe saka watu lan bledug. Lapisan njaba Rembulan diarani kerak. Kerak kasebut kandele kira-kira 70 km ing sisih cedhak lan kandele 100 km ing sisih adoh. Luwih tipis ing sangisore maria lan luwih kandel ing sangisore pagunungan. Bisa uga ana maria luwih akeh ing sisihe amarga kerake luwih tipis. Luwih gampang kanggo lava kanggo munggah menyang permukaan.

src: "Many people dream of the day when humans can travel to another star and explore other worlds, some people wonder what's out there some belive that aliens or other life may live on another plant. But, if this ever does happen probably won't happen for a very long time. The stars are so spread out that there are trillions of miles between stars that are ""neighbors"". Maybe one day, your great grandchildren will be standing atop an alien world wondering about their ancient ancestors?"
mt: "Wong-wong akèh sing ngebandhingake dina dina kapan manungsa bisa numpak ing bintang liyane lan njelajahing donya liyane, wong-wong akèh sing ngerteni apa sing ana ing bintang liyane, wong-wong akèh sing ngandhakake bintang liyane utawa donya liyane sing urip. Nanging, kalo iki nduweke, mungkin ora bakal nduweke kanggo wektu sing akèh. Bintang-bintang akèh sing dadi rada jaraké, ana trilyun mil antara bintang-bintang sing ""tetangga"". Mungkin suwene, anak-anakmu sing gedhé, bakal numpak ing donya alien sing ngerteni babagan leluhurane?"
ref: Akeh wong ngimpi nalika manungsa bisa lelungan menyang bintang liyane lan njelajah ing jagad liyane, sawetara wong takon-takon menawa ing njaba kana sing percaya yen makluk asing utawa kauripan liya bisa urip ing planet liya. Nanging, yen iki nate dumadi mungkin ora bakal dumadi kanggo wektu sing suwe. Lintang-lintang sumebar temenan iku ana triliunan mil antarane bintang sing iku “tanggane”. Mungkin sawijining dina, putu buyut sampeyan bakal ngadeg ing pucuking donya asing penasaran babagan leluhur kunane?

src: "The Sun doesn't have a crust like the Earth that you can stand on. The whole Sun is made out of gases, fire, and plasma. The gas becomes thinner as you go farther from the center of the Sun. The outer-part we see when we look at the Sun is called the photosphere, which means ""ball of light""."
mt: "Matahari ora duwe kulit kaya bumi sing bisa dipundhaki. Matahari kabeh kagawe saka gas, api, lan plasma. Gas kagawe luwih tipis sajeroning nggoleki saka pusat Matahari. Bagian paling njaba sing bisa kita lihat nalika kita ngamot Matahari karan fotosfera, sing artine ""bola cahya""."
ref: Srengengene ora duwe kerak kaya Bumi sing sampeyan isa jumenengi. Kabeh Srengenge kagawe saka gas, geni lan plasma. Gas dadi tipis nalika sampeyan lunga ngadoh saka pusat srengenge. Bageyan paling njaba nalika kita ndeleng Srengenge kuwi diarani potosper, sing tegese “bal cahya”.

src: About three thousand years later, in 1610, Italian astronomer Galileo Galilei used a telescope to observe that Venus has phases, just as the moon does. Phases happen because only the side of Venus (or of the Moon) facing the Sun is lighted. The phases of Venus supported the theory of Copernicus that the planets go around the Sun. Then, a few years later in 1639, an English astronomer named Jeremiah Horrocks observed a transit of Venus.
mt: Kira-kira tiga ribu taun kemudian, astronom Italia Galileo Galilei nggunakake teleskop kanggo ngamati yen Venus duwe fase, kaya bumi. Fase duwe yen sisi Venus (atau Bumi) sing nggoleki Matahari duwe cahya. Fase Venus ngilangi teori Copernicus yen bintang-bintang ngitari Matahari. Kemudian, sawetara taun kemudian ing 1639, astronom Inggris Jeremiah Horrocks ngamati transit Venus.
ref: Kira-kira telung ewu taun ing buri, ing 1610, astronomer Italia Galileo Galilei nggunakake teleskop kanggo ngulati minangka Venus duwe fase, kaya dene rembulan uga duwe. Mangsa iki kadadeyan amanarga mung sisihe Venus (utawa Bulan) sing ngadhep srengenge sing kena cahyane. Mangsane Venus iki ndhukung teori Kopernikus yen planet-planet kuwi ngubengi Srengenge. Banjur, sawetara taun sabanjure ing 1639, sawijining ahli falak Inggris sing jenenge Jeremiah Horrocks mirsani transisi Venus.

src: The Amazon River is the second longest and the biggest river on Earth. It carries more than 8 times as much water as the second biggest river. The Amazon is also the widest river on Earth, at times six miles wide. A full 20 percent of the water that pours out of the planet's rivers into the oceans comes from the Amazon. The main Amazon River is 6,387 km (3,980 miles). It collects water from thousands of smaller rivers.
mt: Amazon River iku siji saka rong kali lan kali gedhé dhéwé ing donya. Kali iki ngandhut luwih saka 8 kali saka kali paling gedhé. Amazon uga iku kali paling amba ing donya, ing wektu sing dawa 6 mil. src: Eighteen percent of Venezuelans are unemployed, and most of those who are employed work in the informal economy. Two thirds of Venezuelans who work do so in the service sector, nearly a quarter work in industry and a fifth work in agriculture. An important industry for Venezuelans is oil, where the country is a net exporter, even though only one percent work in the oil industry.
mt: 18 persen wong Venezuela ora dipekerjake, lan akèh saka wong-wong sing dipekerjake kerjane ing perekonomian informal. Dua pertiga wong Venezuela sing kerja kerjane ing sektor pelayanan, kira-kira 25 persen kerja ing industri lan 20 persen kerja ing pertanian. Industri penting kanggo wong Venezuela iku minyak, negara iku neto eksportir, walaupun mung 1 persen kerja ing industri minyak.
ref: Wolung puluh persen wong Venezuela nganggur, lan umume sing nyambut gawe ing ekonomi ora resmi. Rong prelu saka wong Venezuela sing kerja ing bidhang jasa, meh saprapat sing kerja ing pabrik lan kalima ing tetanen. industri sing paling penting ana ning Venezuela yaiku minyak, yaiku negara sing dodol, sanadyan mung sak persen sing makarya ana industri minyak iki.

src: Stars give off light and heat because of the energy made when hydrogen atoms are merged (or fused) together to form heavier elements. Scientists are working to create a reactor that can make energy in the same way. This, however, is a very hard problem to solve and will take many years before we see useful fusion reactors built.
mt: Kawit bintang ngasilake cahya lan panas amarga saka energi sing diasilake nalika hidrogen atom diwadahi (utawa difusi) saka nggawe elemen kang luwih gedhe. Ilmuwan bekerja kanggo nggawe reaktor sing bisa ngasilake energi ing cara sing padha. src: Elements and compounds can move from one state to another and not change. Nitrogen as a gas still has the same properties as liquid nitrogen. The liquid state is denser but the molecules are still the same. Water is another example. The compound water is made up of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom. It has the same molecular structure whether it is a gas, liquid, or solid. Although its physical state may change, its chemical state remains the same.
mt: Elemen lan senyawa bisa pindhakake saka siji keadaan dadi siji lan ora ganti. Nitrogen minangka gas isih duwe siji sifat sing padha karo nitrogen cair. Keadaan cair sing padha karo keadaan gas. Air uga conto. Senyawa air terdiri saka dua atom hidrogen lan siji atom oksigen. Isih duwe siji struktur molekul sing padha, apa wae keadaan fisik, cair, utawa padat. Walaupun keadaan fisik bisa ganti, keadaan kimia isih padha.
ref: Unsur lan senyawa bisa pindah saka kahanan siji menyang liyane lan ora ewah. Nitrogen minangka gas isih nduweni sipat sing padha karo nitrogen encer. Kahanan encer luwih ringkes nanging molekul isih padha. Banyu iku tuladha liyane. Senyawa banyu kasusun saka loro atom hidrogen lan siji atom oksigen. Struktur molekule kuwi tetep padha sanadyan wujute gas, cair, utawa padhet. Sanadyan wujude bakal malih, nanging wujud kimiane bakal tetep padha.

Struktur molekule kuwi tetep padha sanadyan wujute gas, cair, utawa padhet. Sanadyan wujude bakal malih, nanging wujud kimiane bakal tetep padha.

src: During the Revolutionary War, the thirteen states first formed a weak central government—with the Congress being its only component—under the Articles of Confederation. Congress lacked any power to impose taxes, and, because there was no national executive or judiciary, it relied on state authorities, who were often uncooperative, to enforce all its acts. It also had no authority to override tax laws and tariffs between states. The Articles required unanimous consent from all the states before they could be amended and states took the central government so lightly that their representatives were often absent.

ref: Nalika Perang Revolusi, telu welas negara bagean pisanan mbentuk pamrentah pusat sing ringkih—kanthi Kongrese dadi siji-sijine komponen—sangisore Artikel Konfederasi. Kongres ora duwe kekuatan kanggo mbebani pajek, lan, amarga ora ana pelaksana utawa peradilan nasional, ngendelake pamarentah negara, sing kerep ora kooperatif, kanggo ngleksanakake kabeh tindakane. Iki uga ora nduweni wewenang kanggo ngundhakke aturan pajek lan rega antarane negara bageyan. Kabeh anggota negara kuwi kudu sepakat marang Artikel kuwi sadurunge bisa diamandemen lan anggota negara liyane iki nganggep entheng pamerintah sing ana punjer amarga wakile asring banget ora mlebu.

src: "If you have watched the movie National Treasure, you may think a treasure map was written on the back of the Declaration of Independence. However, that is not true. Although there is something written on the back of the document, it is not a treasure map. Written on the back of the Declaration of Independence were the words ""Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776"". The text appears on the bottom of the document, upside down. While no one knows for certain who wrote it, it is known that early in its life, the large parchment document (it measures 29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was rolled up for storage. So, it is likely that the notation was added simply as a label."
mt: "Jika kalian nonton filem National Treasure, kalian bisa pikir peta peti emas ditulis ing sisi belakang Deklarasi Kemerdekaan. Nanging, iku ora benar. Walaupun ana sing ditulis ing sisi belakang Deklarasi Kemerdekaan, iku ora peta peti emas. Sing ditulis ing sisi belakang Deklarasi Kemerdekaan yaiku ""Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776"". Tulisan kasebut ana ing bawah dokumen, nganti-ari. Sementara ora diketahui kapan siapa sing nulis, iku diketahui yèn dokumen kang gedhe (sajen-sajen 29¾ inches by 24½ inches) awal-awal iku diulik kanggo disimpen. Mula, iku mungkin sing ditulis iku minangka label."
ref: Yen sampeyan wis nonton film Bandha Nasional, sampeyan bisa uga mikir peta bandha ditulis ing mburi Pranyatan Kamardikan. Nanging, iku ora bener. Sanadyan ana sing ditulis ing buri layang, iku dudu peta harta karun. Ditulis ana mburine Deklarasi Kamardikan yaiku ukara “Deklasrasi Kamardikan Asli tanggal 4 Juli 1776”. Tulisan kuwi njedhul ana ning ngisor dokumen kanthi kwalik. Sanadyan ora ana sing mangerteni kanthi pesthi sapa sing nulis, nanging dimangerteni nalika wiwitane uripe, dokumen perkamen gedhe ( ukurane 29¾ inchi ping 24½ inchi) digulung kanggo disimpen. Mula, kamungkinane gedhe menawa cathetane ditambahake mung kanggo label.

src: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City. In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.
mt: Ing awal kemerdekaan negara, keahlian Singapore Botanic Gardens bantoe ngubah pulau dadi kota tropis. Taun 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, hibrida orkid, dipilih dadi bunga nasional negara.
ref: Ing wiwitan kamardikan bangsa, bangkat Botanic Gardens Singapura mbantu ngowah pulau dadi KuthaTaman tropis. Ing taun 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, hibrida anggrek, dipilih dadi kembang nasional bangsa.

src: Although pyramid-building in stone continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, the pyramids of Giza were never surpassed in their size and the technical excellence of their construction. New Kingdom ancient Egyptians marvelled at their predecessors monuments, which were then well over a thousand year old.
mt: Walaupun piramid nggawe ing batu terus nganti akhir Kerajaan Lawas, piramid Giza ora kasil diwetokake ing ukuran lan keahlian teknis sing apik saka konstruksine. Kerajaan Baru kuna-kuna Mesir nggumulake piramid sing wis luwih saka siji abad.
ref: Sanadyan mbangun piramid nggunakake watu terus dilakoni nganti pungkasane Kraton Lawas, Piramid Giza ora tau ngliwati ukuran lan kepinteran cara mbangune. Krajan Anyar Mesir kuno nggumun marang monumen-monumen leluhure, sing nalika iku tetep apik luwih seka sewu taun.

src: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains. And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April. The Serengeti region contains the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.
mt: Kira-kira 1,5 yuta herbivora ngalami perjalanan saben taun ing Oktober nganti dataran kidul, ngelintang Mara River, saka bukit lor kanggo hujan. Nalika kembali menyang lor ing kidul, sawise hujan ing kira-kira April. Wilayah Serengeti ngandhut Serengeti National Park, Ngorongoro Conservation Area lan Maswa Game Reserve ing Tanzania lan Maasai Mara National Reserve ing Kenya.
ref: Saben taun udakara wulan Oktober, meh 1,5 yuta herbivora ngumbara menyang dataran kidul, nyabrang Kali Mara, saka bukit sisih lor nganti udan. Banjur bali ngalor saka kulon, pisan engkas ngliwati kali Mara, sakwise udan ing April. Daerah Serengeti kalebu Taman Nasional Serengeti, Daerah Lindhung Ngorongoro lan Cadhangan Nasional Maasai Mara ning Kenya.
