src: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain. Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak. But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel. However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.
mt: Ing wektu sing padha, Jerman mulai ngaturake supaya bisa nginvasi pulo Inggris. Jerman ngarani operasi iki “Operation Sealion”. Banyake senjata berat lan bahan bakar Angkatan Darat Inggris sing wis hilang nalika Angkatan Darat Inggris ngevakuasi saka Dunkirk, jadi Angkatan Darat Inggris ora kuwat. Nanging, Angkatan Laut Kerajaan (Royal Navy) isih kuwat banget tinimbang Angkatan Laut Jerman (Kriegsmarine) lan bisa ngebantin angkatan laut Jerman sing ngegabungake ing Channel. Nanging, Angkatan Laut Kerajaan ora ana ing rute sing bisa nggabungake ing Channel amarga para laksamana ngira-ngira angkatan laut Jerman bakal ngebantin.
ref: "Kanthi rampunge perang marang Perancis, Jerman wiwit siap nglurug pulau Inggris. Jerman nyebut serangan ""Operasi Sealion"". Umume gegaman lan tandhon pangan Wadyabala Inggris wis ilang nalika ngungsi saka Dunkirk, saéngga wadyabala saya ringkih. Nanging Angkatan Laut Kerajaan isih luwih kuwat saka Angkatan Laut Jerman (“Kriegsmarine”) lan bisa wae ngremukake armada laut invasi ngendi wae sing dikirim liwat Selat Inggris. Nanging, sithik banget pra-prau Royal Navy iku manggon ana ning jalur sing cedhak panggon serangan amarga laksamana kuwi wedi yen prau kuwi bakal ndelep dening serangan udara kaya saka pasukan Jerman."

src: "Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the ""little brother"" of Germany and Japan. It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war. Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa. For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else. Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain."
mt: Kita mulai karo penjelasan bab Italia. Italia dadi adhedhasar ""adik kecil"" Jerman lan Jepang. Italia duwe tentara lan angkatan laut sing lemah, walaupun Italia wis ngrangkep empat kapal anyar sadurunge perang mulai. Italia tujuan utamane Afrika. Untuk nyerang Afrika, Italia kudu nggoleki pangkalan Britania lan kapal ing Mesir. Selain aksi-aksi sing kasebut, Italia kapal perang ora diharapake kanggo ngerjani apa-apa. Sekarang kanggo Jepang. Jepang negara pulau, kaya Britania.
ref: Ayo diwiwiti saka penjelasan babagan rencanane Italia. Italia iku dhasare “adik lanang” saka Jerman lan Jepang. Iki duwe pasukan dharat sing luwih ringkih lan pasukan laut sing luwih ringkih, sanadyan dheweke lagi wae mbangun kapal anyar papat pas sadurunge wiwitane perang. Tujuan utamane Itali yaiku negara-negara ning Afrika. Kanggo nangkep negara-negara kasebut, Itali kudu nduweni landesan kanggo ngkuncurke prajurit, supaya para prajurit bisa nyebrang Laut Mediterania banjur nyerang Afrika. Kanggo iku, dheweke padha kudu nyingkirake pangkalan lan kapal Inggris ing Mesir. Saliyane tumindak iku kabeh, kapal perang Italia ora kudune nindakake apa-apa liyane. Saiki kanggo Jepang. Jepang iku negara kapuloan, padha kaya Inggris.

src: "The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free. It was ruled by the ""Vichy"" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."
mt: Kampanye D-Day lan perang sing ndhikarepke nggoleki ngisor Perancis, nanging kidul isih ora bebas. Iki diatur dening Vichy Perancis. Kita Perancis sing nggawe damel damel karo Jerman ing taun 1940 lan kerja karo penjajah alih-alih nglawan. Pada 15 Agustus 1940, Sekutu nginvasi kidul Perancis, kampanye iki diarani "Operasi Dragoon". Dalam dua minggu, Amerika Serikat lan Free Perancis sing wis bebas kidul Perancis lan ngerapakake menyang Jerman.
ref: "Pendharatan D.Day lan pertempuran sateruse wis mbebasake Perancis lor, nanging sisih kidul durung bebas. Iki dipimpin dening Perancis ""Vichy"". Dheweke yaiku wong Perancis sing nggawe bedhamen karo Jerman ing taun 1940 lan kerja kanggo penjajah tinimbang nglawan dheweke. Ing 15 Agustus 1940, Sekutu nglurug Perancis kidul, lurugan diarani “OPerasi Dragoon”. Mung sajrone rong minggu, wadyabala Amerika lan Prancis Mardika kaleksanan mbebasake Prancis sisih kidul lan nuli bali menyang Jerman."

src: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.
mt: Submarine iku kapal sing dirancang kanggo ngelintang ing bawah laut, lan tetep ana ing ngisor banyu kanggo wektu sing dawa. Submarine digunakake ing Perang Donya I lan Perang Donya II. Ing wektu iku, dheweke dadi rada lambat lan duwe jangkauan sing kurang. Nanging, ing awal perang, dheweke umume ngelintang ing ngisor banyu, nanging sawise radar mulihake lan dadi luwih akurat, submarine ditekan kanggo ngelintang ing ngisor banyu kanggo nggatangake dheweke. Submarine Jerman diarani U-Boats. Jerman dadi apik banget ing ngelintang lan ngoperasikake submarine. Amarga sukses ing ngelintang submarine, sawise perang Jerman ora diandhakake kanggo duwe akèh-akèhé.
ref: Kapal selam yaiku kapal sing digawe kanggo lelungan ing jero banyu lan tetep ing kana kanggo sawetara wektu sing luwih dawa. Kapal silem digunakake ing Perang Donya I lan Perang Dunia II. Nalika semono alon-alon banget lan adohe let nembak sing winates. Nalika wiwitane perang biyasane dheweke plesir menyang pucuke segara, nanging nalika radar wis thukul lan saya luwih pener kapal selam kuwi dipeksa supaya mlebu menyang ngisor banyu supaya ora katon. Kapal selam Jerman kuwi diarani kapal-U. Wong-wong Jerman biyen dikenal pinter banget ngarahke lan nglakokake kapal selame. Amarga kasil karo kapal selam, sabubare perang Jerman ora dipercaya nyekel kapal selam.

src: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.
mt: Submarine iku kapal sing dirancang kanggo ngelintang ing bawah laut, lan tetep ana ing ngisor banyu kanggo wektu sing dawa. Submarine digunakake ing Perang Donya I lan Perang Donya II. Ing wektu iku, dheweke dadi rada lambat lan duwe jangkauan sing kurang. Nanging, ing awal perang, dheweke umume ngelintang ing ngisor banyu, nanging sawise radar mulihake lan dadi luwih akurat, submarine ditekan kanggo ngelintang ing ngisor banyu kanggo nggatangake dheweke. Submarine Jerman diarani U-Boats. Jerman dadi apik banget ing ngelintang lan ngoperasikake submarine. Amarga sukses ing ngelintang submarine, sawise perang Jerman ora diandhakake kanggo duwe akèh-akèhé.
ref: Kapal selam yaiku kapal sing digawe kanggo lelungan ing jero banyu lan tetep ing kana kanggo sawetara wektu sing luwih dawa. Kapal silem digunakake ing Perang Donya I lan Perang Dunia II. Nalika semono alon-alon banget lan adohe let nembak sing winates. Nalika wiwitane perang biyasane dheweke plesir menyang pucuke segara, nanging nalika radar wis thukul lan saya luwih pener kapal selam kuwi dipeksa supaya mlebu menyang ngisor banyu supaya ora katon. Kapal selam Jerman kuwi diarani kapal-U. Wong-wong Jerman biyen dikenal pinter banget ngarahke lan nglakokake kapal selame. Amarga kasil karo kapal selam, sabubare perang Jerman ora dipercaya nyekel kapal selam.

src: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.
mt: Ing 17 September 1939, pertahanan Polandia wis udakara isih robah, lan harapan tunggal yaiku mundur lan reorganisasi ing jembatan Romania. Nanging, rencana iki diwatesi nganti malam, nalika 800.000 tentara saka Red Army Uni Soviet masuk lan nggawe front Belarusan lan Ukraina sawise nginvasi wilayah timur Polandia ing pelanggaran Perjanjian Riga, Perjanjian Non-Agresi Soviet-Polandia, lan perjanjian internasional liyane, bilateral lan multilateral.
ref: Tanggal 17 September, 1939, pertahanan Polandia wis rusak, lan siji-sijine pangajab yaiku kanggo mundur lan ngatur balik ing sadawane pangkalan jembatan Rumania. Nanging, rancangan iki digawe mau wengi, nalika ana luwih saka 800,000 prajurit saka Prajurit Abang Serikat Soviet mlebu lan nyiptakke prajurit Belarusia lan Ukrania sabubare nyerang wilayah sisih wetan Polandia kanthi ganas saka Perjanjian Damai Riga, Pakta Tanpa-Agresi Soviet-Polandia, lan perjanjian internasional liyane, kabeh bilateral an multilateral.

src: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.
mt: Kajaba kawruh, Italia ora sukses ing Afrika Lor saka awal. Dalam seminggu saka perang Italia ngumumake ing 10 Juni 1940, 11th Hussars Britania kagungan Fort Capuzzo ing Libya. Ing serangan timur Bardia, Britania kagungan Engineer-in-Chief Italia Tenth Army, Jenderal Lastucci. Pada 28 Juni, Marsyal Italo Balbo, Gubernur-Jendral Libya lan pewaris Mussolini, kagungan saka tembakan sahabat sementara nggabungake ing Tobruk.
ref: Sakabehe ora mlaku kanthi becik kanggo wong Italia ing Afrika Lor meh wiwit saka dhisik. Sajrone seminggu sawise nyatakake perang ing Itali tanggal 10 Juni 1940, Prajurit Inggris kaping 11 wis ngrebut Benteng Capuzzo ing Libya. Nalika diserang ana sisih wetan Bardia, Inggris nangkep Insinyur-Pimpinan Prajurit Italia Kasepuluh, Jenderal Lastucci. Tanggal 28 Juni, Marshal Italo Balbo, Jendral-Gubernur Libia lan pewaris nyata Mussolini, dipateni dening bedhil nalika mandheg ana ing Tobruk.

src: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.
mt: Agama Buddha Tibet dadi saka ajaran Buddha, nanging dadi luwih saka jalan mahayana cinta lan dening akeh teknik saka Yoga India. Dadi prinsip Buddha Tibet dadi luwih sederhana. Iki saka Yoga Kundalini, meditasi lan jalan cinta sing luwih saka. Dadi pusat meditasi Tibet dadi Yoga Dewata. Dadi dening visualisasi dekat-dekat dewata sing energi kanal sing dibersihake, chakra sing diaktifake lan konsciousness sing dadi luwih saka dadi dadi.
ref: Agama Budha Tibet iku adhedhasar ajaran Budha, nanging ngrembaka dening jalur tresna mahayana lan dening sakehing cara saka Yoga India. Prinsipe ajaran Budha wong Tibet kuwi sederhana banget. Ajaran iki kaleu Kundalini Yoga, meditasi lan dalan kanggo ngrangkul kabeh rasa tresna. Kanthi Kundalini Yoga, tenaga Kundalini (tenaga pancrahan) wungu liwat pawakan yoga, panglantih napas, mantra lan bayangan. Pusat semedi Tibet yaiku Dewa Yoga. Liwat visualisasi macem-macem dewa, susukan tenaga diresiki, chakra diuripake lan kesadaran pancrahan digawe.

src: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.
mt: Program mulai jam 8.30 esuk wektu lokal (15.00 UTC). Penyanyi terkenal saka kabeh nagara nampilake bhajans, utawa lagu devotional, nganti kaki Shri Shyam. Singer Sanju Sharma mulai malam, diikuti dening Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal ngiringi. Kemudian, Lakkha Singh ngambil punggawa ing nyanyi bhajans. 108 piring Chhappan Bhog (ing Hinduisme, 56 macem-macem bahan makanan sing bisa dimakan, kaya, panganan manis, buah-buahan, kacang-kacangan, masakan etc. sing diwenehake marang dewa) diwenehake marang Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh nampilake chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal ngiringi.
ref: Acarane diwiwiti ing 20.30 wanci lokal (15.00 UTC). Sindhen kang misuwur ing saindenging negara ngaturake bhajans, utawa lagu-lagu bakti, ing sikil Shri Shyam. Penyanyi Sanju Sharma miwiti wengi kasebut, ditutne dening Jai Shankar Choudhary uga nggawakake chhappan bhog bhajan. Penyanyi, Raju Khandelwal ndampingi dheweke. Banjur, Lakkha Singh mimpin nyanyi bhajan. 108 piring-piringe Chhappan Bhog (ing ajaran Hindu, 56 barang sing bisa dipangan, kayata, permen, woh-wohan, kacang, panganan etc. sing dienggo sajen kanggo dewa) disuguhke menyang Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh uga nyawisake chhappan bhog bhajan. Sindhen, Raju Khandelwal ngancani dheweke.

src: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."
mt: Kegembaran dimulai karo pertunjukan khusus saka grup dunia terkenal Cirque du Soleil. Iki diwengkoni dening Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, band Janissary, lan penyanyi Fatih Erkoç lan Müslüm Gürses. Kemudian Whirling Dervishes tampil. Diva Turki Sezen Aksu tampil karo tenor Italia Alessandro Safina lan penyanyi Yunani Haris Alexiou. Untuk pungkasan, grup tari Turki Fire of Anatolia tampil pertunjukan ""Troy"".
ref: Perayaane diwiwiti nganggo pagelaran kusus saka kelompok sing misuwur ing donya Cirque du Soleil. Iki uga diiringi karo Orkestra Simponi Kutha Istanbul, band Janissary, lan penyanyi Fatih Erkoç lan Müslüm Gürses. Banjur Whirling Dervishes banjur munggah ing panggung. Diva Turki Sezen Aksu tampil karo tenor Italia Alessandro Safina lan penyanyi Yunani Haris Alexiou. Kanggo panutup, kelompok tari Turki Geni Anatolia nampilake pagelaran “Troy”.

src: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""
mt: Penumpang diberi banyu nalika lagi nunggu ing 90(F)-derajat panas. Kapten geni Scott Kouns ngomong, ""Iki dina Senin ing Santa Clara kanthi temperatur ing 90-an. Waktu apapun sing ditahan ing roller coaster bakal ora nyaman, kira-kira, lan kudu sajeroning jam kanggo nyegah wong pisanan saka roller coaster."""
ref: "Panumpang diwenehi banyu nalika padha ngenteni ing suhu panas 90(F). Kapten pemadam kebakaran Scott Kouns kandha, “Iku dina kang panas ing Santa Clara kanthi suhu 90-an. Kajebak suwe ing roller coaster bakal ora kepenak, ujare paling ora, lan butuh paling ora sak jam kanggo entuk wong kapisan saka laku kasebut."""

src: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.
mt: Menurut bulletin terakhir, bacaan tinggi laut menunjukkan tsunami dihasilkan. Ada aktivitas tsunami yang pasti tercatat di dekat Pago Pago dan Niue. Tidak ada kerusakan besar atau cedera yang dilaporkan di Tonga, tetapi listrik sementara hilang, yang menurut laporan mencegah otoritas Tonga menerima peringatan tsunami yang dikeluarkan oleh PTWC. Empat belas sekolah di Hawaii yang terletak di atau dekat pantai ditutup semua Selasa walaupun peringatan ditinggalkan.
ref: Miturut koran kuwi, asile maca data saka pinggiran segara kuwi nuduhake yen tsunami kabentuk. Ana asil sing nuduhake yen kagiyatan sing ngasilake tsunami kacathet ana cedhake Pago Pago lan Niue. Ora ana karuksan utawa cilaka gedhe sing dilapurake ing Tonga, nanging listrik sawatara mangsa mati, sing dilapurake nyegah panguwasa Tonga nampa piweling tsunami sing diwetokake dening PTWC. Patbelas sekolahan ning Hawaii sing manggon ana utawa cedhak karo pinggir pantai ditutup kabeh dina Rebo wingi sanadyan wis ora ana anceman sing mbebayani.

src: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.
mt: Jonny Reid, co-driver kanggo tim A1GP Selandia Baru, kala iki nggawe sejarah kanthi ngejahe Black Beauty ing Auckland Harbour Bridge, Selandia Baru, legal. Mr Reid bisa ngejahe Black Beauty ing Selandia Baru ing kecepatan 160km/h tujuwé. Polisi Selandia Baru ngalami masalah nggunakake radar kecepatan kanggo ngerti kecepatan Mr Reid amarga Black Beauty dhuwur, lan wong loro wulan polisi bisa ngerti kecepatan Mr Reid nalika dia ngurangi kecepatan menawa 160km/h.
ref: Johny Reid, navigator kanggo tim Selandia Anyar A1GP, saiki gawe sejarah kanthi nyetir paling banter ing ndhuwur Jembatan Pelabuhan Auckland sing umure 48-taun, Selandia Anyar, kanthi legal. Mr. Reid bisa nyopir menyang Selandia Baru A1GP, Ayu.Ireng kanthi 160km/j kaping pitu ana jembatan. Polisi New Zealand kangelan nggunakake gegaman radar kecepatane kanggo ndeleng sepira cepet Pak Reid lunga amarga sepira alon Ayu Ireng, lan mung sepisan polisi bisa njupuk wektu yaiku nalika Pak Reid ngalon nganti 160km / jam.

src: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.
mt: Jonny Reid, co-driver kanggo tim A1GP Selandia Baru, kala iki nggawe sejarah kanthi ngejahe Black Beauty ing Auckland Harbour Bridge, Selandia Baru, legal. Mr Reid bisa ngejahe Black Beauty ing Selandia Baru ing kecepatan 160km/h tujuwé. Polisi Selandia Baru ngalami masalah nggunakake radar kecepatan kanggo ngerti kecepatan Mr Reid amarga Black Beauty dhuwur, lan wong loro wulan polisi bisa ngerti kecepatan Mr Reid nalika dia ngurangi kecepatan menawa 160km/h.
ref: Johny Reid, navigator kanggo tim Selandia Anyar A1GP, saiki gawe sejarah kanthi nyetir paling banter ing ndhuwur Jembatan Pelabuhan Auckland sing umure 48-taun, Selandia Anyar, kanthi legal. Mr. Reid bisa nyopir menyang Selandia Baru A1GP, Ayu.Ireng kanthi 160km/j kaping pitu ana jembatan. Polisi New Zealand kangelan nggunakake gegaman radar kecepatane kanggo ndeleng sepira cepet Pak Reid lunga amarga sepira alon Ayu Ireng, lan mung sepisan polisi bisa njupuk wektu yaiku nalika Pak Reid ngalon nganti 160km / jam.

src: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.
mt: Gempa bumi sedheng nggoyang Montana lor ing jam 10.08 wengi dina Senin. Nalika iku ora ana laporan langsung kerusakan sing diterusake marang Survei Geologis Amerika Serikat (USGS) lan Pusat Informasi Gempa Bumi Nasional. Gempa bumi iku pusatane kira-kira 20 km (15 mil) lor-lor kidul-kidul Dillon, lan kira-kira 65 km (40 mil) kidul saka Butte.
ref: Lindhu sing ora pati kenceng kuwi kadadeyan ana ning Montana sisih kulon jam 10.08 wengi dina Senen. Ora ana laporan karusakan sing ditrima dening Survei Geologi Amerika Serikat (USGS) lan Punjer Informasi Lindhu Nasional. Lindhu kuwi punjere 20 km (15 mil) lor-lor wetane Dillon, lan 65 km (40 mil) kidule Butte.

src: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.
mt: Penjara Abu Ghraib ing Irak wis diobahake nalika akeh-akeh. Penjara iki dadi terkenal sawise penjagaan tahanan ditemokake ing penjara iki sawise pasukan AS nggawe penjagaan.
ref: Kunjara Abu Ghraib Irak dibakar sajrone rerusuhan. Kunjara dadi kondhang sawise panyiksan tawanan ditemokake anana akana sawise direbut pasukan Amerika.

src: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.
mt: Bandhara nggatokake konser ing Stadium War Memorial Maui, sing diwontahke kanggo 9.000 wong, lan mendoaane wong-wong. Perusahaan manajemen bandhara, HK Management Inc., ora nggatokake alasan awal nalika nggatokake tanggal 20 September, nanging nggatokake alasan logistik nalika dina wengi.
ref: Musikan kasebut wurungake pagelaran ing Stadion Memorial Perang Maui, sing bakal dirawuhi 9,000 wong, lan njaluk ngapura marang para pangareme. Perusahaan sing ngatur klompok iki, HK Manajemen Inc., ora menehi alesan nalika dibatalke tanggal 20 September, nanging nyalahke logistik sesuke.

src: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."
mt: "Looting kanggo umum ditepungake nganti malam, sawise polisi ora ana ning dalan Bishkek. Bishkek didekake ngalami kekacauan "anarkis" dening siji pengamat, sawise gang-gang wong ngelintang dalan lan ngrebut toko-toko barang konsumen. Beberapa warga Bishkek ngelakake warga sing saka kidul kanggo kekacauan."
ref: Njarah sing saya nyebar dilapurke terus-terusan sewengi, amarga aparat panegak ukum ora ana ing dalanan Bishkek. Bishkek digambarake kaya klelep menyang kahanan “anarki” dening sawijining pengamat, nalika gerombolan-gerombolan wong-wong ngliwati dalan lan njarah toko-toko barang-barang konsumen. Sawetara penduduk Bishkek nyalahne pemrotes saka kidul kanggo pelanggaran ukume.

src: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.
mt: Sebelumne, CEO Ring, Jamie Siminoff, nyebutake perusahaan mulai nalika kunci pintu nggawe suara saka toko ing garashe. Dheweke nggawe kunci pintu WiFi, dheweke nyebutake. Siminoff nyebutake penjualan ngrembaka sawise penampilane ing episode 2013 Shark Tank, panel show ora ngefungsike pendanaan startup. Ing akir 2017, Siminoff tampil ing kanal televisi belanja QVC. Ring uga ngegawe kasus karo perusahaan keamanan kompetitif, perusahaan ADT.
ref: Sadurunge, pamimpin Ring, Jamie Siminoff, ujar manawa pakaryan iku dwiwiti nalika bel lawang ora keprungu saka toko ing garasine. Dheweke mbangun bel lawang WiFi, jarene. Siminoff ngomong penjualane mundhak sakwise tampile taun 2013 ing episode Shark Tank ing ngendi panel acara nolak mbiayani rintisane. Ing pungkasan taun 2017, Siminoff katon ing saluran TV blanja QVC. Ring uga ngrampungake gugatan karo perusahaan keamanan saingan, Perusahaan ADT.

src: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."
mt: Program PBS duwe luwih saka 26 Emmy, lan paneran sing luwih pendek kajaba Sesame Street lan Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Saben episode program iki bakal ngefokusake ing tema ing buku sing spesifik lan banjur njajalake tema mau nganti akirane. Saben program uga bakal nggawe rekomendasi buku sing anak-anak kudu cari nalika ana ing perpustakaan. John Grant, saka WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) ngomong ""Reading Rainbow ngajarake anak-anak kudu baca,... kasenengan baca — [program iki] nggawe anak-anak ngegolongake buku lan baca."" Kajaba, ana ing paham kanggo nggawe program televisi pendidikan, kalebu John Grant, sing nggawe program iki pungkasan.
ref: Pagelaran PBS nduweni luwih saka rong-lusin anugrah Emmy, lan pagelaran iki rampung luwih cepet tinimbang Dalan Sesame lan Lingkungane Pak Roger. Saben episode saka acarane bakal fokus marang tema ing buku tartamtu lan banjur njelajah tema kasebut liwat sawetara crita. Saben pagelaran uga bakal nyedhiyakake saran buku-buku sing bisa digoleki dening bocah-bocah nalika dolan menyang perpustakaan. John Grant, saka WNED Kebo (Maca stasiun omah Pelangi) ngujar “Maca Pelangi ngajari bocah cilik supaya maca,... katresnan marang maca — [pagelaran] nyemangati bocah-bocah supaya jukuk buku banjur maca.” Dipercaya dening sawetara wong, kalebu John Grant, yen gersik keuangan lan pangowahan ing filsafat program TV panggulawênthahan menehi kontribusi kanggo wusanane seri iki.

src: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.
mt: Kantor kanggo kutha Amsterdam lan Museum Anne Frank ngomong menawa pohon iki terjangkiti jamur lan nggawe ancaman kesehatan publik sajeroning ngomong menawa pohon iki ing ancaman sing seger banget jatuh. Pohon iki wis dijadwalkeke dikepung ing Senin, nanging diselamatke sawise putusan pengadilan darurat.
ref: Pejabat saka kutha Amsterdam lan Museum Anne Frank ngomong menawa wite kena jamur lan marai bebayan kanggo kasehatan umum kanthi ngusulake menawa iku nyedhaki bebaya ambruk. Iku wis dijdwalake kanggo dikethok dina Selasa, nanging dislametake sakwise putusan pengadilan darurat.

src: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""
mt: Animal Liberation lan Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) lagi ngomongke wajib nginstalake kamera CCTV ing kabeh abattoir Australia. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy ngomongke inspeksi lan pangawasan abattoir kudu umum ing Australia. ""Kamera CCTV bakal ngelembutake sinyal kuwat kanggo wong sing kerja karo hewan yèn kesehatan kudu dadi prioritas paling dhuwur."""
ref: "Pembebasan Kewan lan Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) bali ngusulake kanggo kewajiban masang CCTV ing kabeh papan jagal ing Australia. Inspektur Kepala RSPCA New South Wales David O'Shannessyngendikan menyang ABC yen pengawasan lan pemeriksaan omah jagal kuwi kudune dadi perkara sing umum ana ning Australia. ""CCTV mesthi bakal menehi tandha kuwat kanggo wong sing kerja karo kewan bilih karaharjan kasebut minangka prioritas paling dhuwur."""

src: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.
mt: Kabar menyang komunitas Red Lake kala iki sarta pemakaman kanggo Jeff Weise lan tiga saka sembilan korban diselenggarake kala iki. Ora ana informasi resmi sing dikonfirmake kala iki. Namung sumber sing duwe kabar ngenani penyelidikan ngomong menawa iku Louis Jourdain, anak 16 taun saka Ketua Red Lake Tribal Floyd Jourdain. Ora ana kabar sing bisa ditegakake kala iki ngenani apa-apa sing bakal ditegakake utawa apa sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing nggawa ombak sing
ref: Pawarta sumebar ing komunitas Tlaga Abang dina iki nalika pemakaman Jeff Weise lan telu saka sanga korban sing dumadi menawa siswa liyane ditangkap gegayutan karo penembakan sekolah ing tanggal 21 Maret. Pihak berwenang ngomong resmi sathithik luwih saka konfirmasi penangkepan dina iki. Nanging, sawijining sumber kanthi wawasan investigasi ngandhakake marang Mimbar-Bintang Minneapolis menawa iku yaiku Louis Jourdain, 16 taun putra saka Kepala Suku Tlaga Abang Floyd Jourdain. Urung dimangerteni nganti saiki tuduhan apa sing bakal diajokke utawa apa sing nyebabake pihak sing nduweni wewenang marang bocah kuwi nanging proses kanggo bocah nom kuwi wis diwiwiti ana ing pengadilan umum.

src: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.
mt: Organisator saka protes ngomong menawa kira-kira 100,000 wong nggabungake ing kutha-kutha Jerman kaya Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, lan Hanover. Ing Berlin, polisi ngestimasi 6,500 wong sing protes. Protase uga ana ing Paris, Sofia ing Bulgaria, Vilnius ing Lithuania, Valetta ing Malta, Tallinn ing Estonia, lan Edinburgh lan Glasgow ing Skotlandia. Ing London, kira-kira 200 wong protes ing luar kantor-kantor sing penting saka hak cipta. Bulan pungkasan, ana protes gedhe ing Polandhe nalika negara kasebut nggabungake ACTA, sing nggawe pamarintah Polandhe ngomong menawa ora bakal ngratifikasi perjanjian kasebut, saiki. Latvia lan Slovakia uga duweke proses nggabungake ACTA.
ref: Panitia protes ujar udakara 100.000 wong katon ing kutha-kutha Jerman kayata Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg lan Hanover. Ning Berlin, pulisi mbedek ana kira-kira 6.500 wong sing protes. Protes uga dianakake ing Paris, Sofia ing Bulgaria, Vilnius ing Lithuania, Valetta ing Malta, Tallinn ing Estonia lan Edinburgh lan Glasgow ing Skotlandia. Ing London, udakara 200 wong protes ing njaba kantor sing nduwe hak cipta utama. Pungkasan wulan, ana demo gedhe ing Polandia nalika negara iku nyetujoni ACTA, sing nyebabake pamrentah Polandia mutusake supaya ora ngesahake mupakatan, saiki. Latvia lan Slovakia loro-lorone wis nangguhke prosese gabung ACTA.

src: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.
mt: Organisator saka protes ngomong menawa kira-kira 100,000 wong nggabungake ing kutha-kutha Jerman kaya Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, lan Hanover. Ing Berlin, polisi ngestimasi 6,500 wong sing protes. Ing London, kira-kira 200 wong protes ing luar kantor-kantor sing penting saka hak cipta. Bulan pungkasan, ana protes gedhe ing Polandhe nalika negara kasebut nggabungake ACTA, sing nggawe pamarintah Polandhe ngomong menawa ora bakal ngratifikasi perjanjian kasebut, saiki. Latvia lan Slovakia uga duweke proses nggabungake ACTA.

src: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

ref: "Kira-kira ana 60 kasus iPods sing ora bisa dienggo gara-gara kepanasen wis dilaporke, nyebabke nem kobongan lan mbebayani wong papat. mentri Ekonomi, Industri lan Perdagangan (METI) Jepang ngujar yen uwis ana kurang luwih 27 kacilakan sing kadadeyan gara-gara piranti kuwi. Minggu wingi, METI ngumumne menawa Apple nuduhake 34 kacilakan tambahan merga kepanasen, sing diarani “ora serius” dening perusahaan. Kementerian kasebut mangsuli kanthi nyebut semados lapuran dening Apple ""saestu patut digetuni."""

src: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."
mt: Steve Jobs CEO Apple ngumumake piranti iki kanthi ngelakoni panggung lan ngambil iPhone saka celana jeans. Nalika 2 jam panggung iku, Steve Jobs ngomong menawa ""Dina dina Apple bakal ngrenggani telepon, Kita bakal ngrenggani sejarah dina dina iku"".
ref: "Direktur Utama Apple Steeve Jobs ngluncurake piranti kanthi mlaku menyang panggung lan ngetokake iPhone saka njero sak kathok jine. Nalika pidato 2 jam iki dheweke ngujar yen ""Saiki Apple bakal nemokake maneh telpon, Kita bakal gawe sejarah dina iki""."

src: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
mt: Senator saiki lan Ibu Negara Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner ngumumake kandidat presiden nalika wengi ing La Plata, kutha 50 kilometer (31 mil) saka Buenos Aires. Ibu Kirchner ngumumake niat menawa nggabutke presiden ing Teater Argentina, lokasi sing digunakake kanggo nggabutke kampanye 2005 kanggo Senat minangka wakil Buenos Aires.
ref: Anggota dewan lan Ibu Negara Argentina saiki Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner ngumumke yen dheweke bakal nyalon dadi presiden wingi sore ana ning La Plata, kutha sing manggon 50 kilometer (31 mil) adohe saka Buenos Aires. Ibu Kirchner ngumumake niatane arep dadi presiden ana ing Teater Argentina, panggonan sing padha sing dienggo nalika miwiti kampanye taun 2005 kanggo dadi Dewan anggota perwakilan propinsi Buenos Aires.

src: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.
mt: ACMA uga nemu menawa walaupun video iki disiarke ing Internet, Big Brother ora nglanggar hukum censur online konten minangka media ora disimpan ing situs Big Brother. Uga nggawe hukum Broadcasting Services nggawe regulasi konten Internet, nanging kanggo dianggep konten Internet, ora wajib ana ing server.
ref: ACMA uga nemokake, sanajan vidio diputer ing Internet, Big Brother ora nrajang undhang-undhang sensor konten online amarga vidio kasebut ora disimpen ing web Big Brother. Undhang-Undhang Layanan Siaran kuwi nyedhiyani regulasi isi internet, nanging supaya bisa diarani isi internet, barang kuwi kudu ana ing server.

src: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."
mt: Peter Costello, sekretaris keuangan lan wong sing paling mungkin kanggo nggantineke John Howard minangka pimpinan partai Liberal, nggabutke dukungan kanggo industri tenaga nuklir ing Australia. Mr Costello ngomong menawa nalika tenaga nuklir kanggo produksi bisa ekonomis, Australia kudu nggolongake penggunaan. ""Jika ekonomis, kita kudu nduwe. Kita ora nduwe penolakan prinsipil menawa tenaga nuklir"" Mr Costello ngomong.
ref: "Peter Costello, bendahara Australia lan wong sing kemungkinan nerusake Perdana Menteri John Howard minangka pimpinan partai Liberal wis menehi dhukungan ing industri tenaga nuklir ing Australia. Pak Costello ngomong yen nalika generasi tenaga nuklir bisa mlaku terus sake sisih ekonomi, Australia kudu ngoyak kagunakane. ""Menawa iku dadi iklan, kita kudu nduweni iku. Tegese, prinsipe ora ana kabotan marang energi nuklir kandhane Pak Castello."""

src: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.
mt: Ing dina Senin, medal sing bisa ditemuake kaping 18 saben dina, angka negara-negara sing ora bisa ngrampungake podium medal. Mereka kalebu Walanda, karo Anna Jochemsen sing ngrampungake kaping 9 ing kelas duduk ing Super-G dina Senin, lan Finland karo Katja Saarinen sing ngrampungake kaping 10 ing event sing padha. Australia's Mitchell Gourley ngrampungake kaping 11 ing Super-G kelas duduk kanggo pria. Kompetitor Ceko Oldrich Jelinek ngrampungake kaping 16 ing Super-G kelas duduk kanggo pria. Arly Velasquez saka Meksiko ngrampungake kaping 15 ing Super-G kelas duduk kanggo pria. New Zealand's Adam Hall ngrampungake kaping 9 ing Super-G kelas duduk kanggo pria. Polandia's pria sing duduk ing Super-G kelas duduk kanggo pria Maciej Krezel lan guide Anna Ogarzynska ngrampungake kaping 13. Korea Kidul Jong Seork Park ngrampungake kaping 24 ing Super-G kelas duduk kanggo pria.
ref: Mung ana wolulas medali saben dinane, akeh negara sing gagal gawe medali panggung. Dheweke padha kalebu Walanda, kanthi Anna Jochemsen finis kaping sanga ing kelas ngadeg wanita ing Super-Gwingi, lan Finlandia kanthi Katja Saarinen finis kaping sepuluh ing acara sing padha. Mitchell Gourley saka Australia rampung kasewelas ing juwara Super-G. Pasaing Czech, Oldrich Jelinek minangka nomer enem ing Super-G. Arly Valesquez saka Meksiko rampung ing posisi lima welas ing Super-G lungguh putra. Adam Hall saka New Zealand rampung ing posisi kesanga ing super-G ngadek putra. Pemain ski lanang wuta Maciej Krezel saka Polandia lan panuntun Anna Ogarzynska rampung ing telulas ing Super-G. Jong Seork Park saka Korea Kidul rampung ing rong puluh papat ing Super-G lanang.

src: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."
mt: “Pengadilan kasebut dianakake ing Pengadilan Birmingham Crown lan ditutup tanggal 3 Agustus. Presenter, sing ditangkep ing tempat, menolak serangan lan ngakuake yen dia nggunakake tiis kanggo ngamankake dirine saka botol sing dihujani ing dirine dening 30 wong. Blake uga dinyatakeke dadi terdakwa kanggo nggoda keadilan. Jaksa ngomong menawa Blake bakal diasingke.
ref: "Latihane ana ing Pengadilan Birmingham Crown lan bakal diputuske tanggal 3 Agustus. Pranatacara, sing dicekel ing adegan kasebut, mbantah serangan kasebut lan nyatakake yen dheweke nggunakake cagak kanggo nglindhungi awake saka botol sing diuncalake marang dheweke dening telung puluh wong. Blake uga dituntut amarga nyoba ngowahi dalane keadilan. Hakim kandha marang Blake yen ""meh ora bisa luput"" dheweke bakal dikirim menyang kunjara."

src: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.
mt: Subjek liyane ing agenda ing Bali kalebu ngreksa hutan sing dadi sisa donya, lan nggawe teknologi kanggo nggawe negara-negara sing lagi tumbuh ing cara sing luwih ora polusi. U.N. uga nggoleki dana kanggo nggawe negara-negara sing dadi korban pemanasan global nggoleki dampak. Uang bisa dadi rumah sing ora bisa dipisahake, pengelolaan banyu sing luwih apik, lan diversifikasi tanaman.
ref: Perkara liya ing agenda ing Bali kalebu nylametne alas kang isih ana ing donya, lan mbagi teknologi kanggo mbantu negara berkembang tuwuh kanthi cara kang polusine sathithik. PBB uga ngarepake supaya bisa nglumpukake dhuwit kanggo nulungi negara-negara sing kena pengaruhe pemanasan global kanggo ngatasi pengaruh kasebut. Dhuwite bisa kanggo omah tahan banjir, pengaturan banyu kang luwih becik, lan diversifikasi tanduran.

src: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.
mt: Subjek liyane ing agenda ing Bali kalebu ngreksa hutan sing dadi sisa donya, lan nggawe teknologi kanggo nggawe negara-negara sing lagi tumbuh ing cara sing luwih ora polusi. U.N. uga nggoleki dana kanggo nggawe negara-negara sing dadi korban pemanasan global nggoleki dampak. Uang bisa dadi rumah sing ora bisa dipisahake, pengelolaan banyu sing luwih apik, lan diversifikasi tanaman.
ref: Perkara liya ing agenda ing Bali kalebu nylametne alas kang isih ana ing donya, lan mbagi teknologi kanggo mbantu negara berkembang tuwuh kanthi cara kang polusine sathithik. PBB uga ngarepake supaya bisa nglumpukake dhuwit kanggo nulungi negara-negara sing kena pengaruhe pemanasan global kanggo ngatasi pengaruh kasebut. Dhuwite bisa kanggo omah tahan banjir, pengaturan banyu kang luwih becik, lan diversifikasi tanduran.

src: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.
mt: Kerja ing Atlanta lan dikenali minangka pendidik urban sing inovatif. Taun 2009, Hall dianugerahi gelar Superintendent Nasional Taun. Saiki sekolah Atlanta wis ngalami peningkatan sing gedhe ing skor tes. Sawise, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution nglaporke bahan sing nggawe skor tes ngalami peningkatan sing ora bisa dipercaya, lan nggawe klaim yèn sekolah nggawe masalah nanging ora nindakake panemuane. Sawise iku, bukti nggawe kertas tes wis diubah Hall, saka 34 pejabat pendidikan liyane, dituduh taun 2013.
ref: Dheweke nampa pangalem kritig sajrone jaman ing Atlanta lan dikenal kanggo panggulawenthah kutha sing inovatif. Taun 2009 dheweke dianugrahi Pimpinan Nasional Taun iki. Nalika acara pangaji-aji kasebut, sekolah Atlanta wis ngasilake skor tes kang mundhak akeh banget. Sabubare kuwi, Jurnal-Konstitusi The Atlanta nyiarake laporan sing nuduhake perkara kanthi asil ujine. Lapurane nuduhake biji ujian munggah cepet banget, lan nuduhake menawa sekolah ngerteni anane masalah ana jero nanging ora tumindak marang panemon kasebut. Bukti banjur nyiratake kertas tes diowahi karo Hall, bareng 34 petugas pendidikan liyane, didakwa ing 2013.

src: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.
mt: Satu bom meledak ing luar kantor gubernur umum. Tiga bom liyane meledak ing dekat gedung pamarintahan ing wektu loro jam. Nalika nggawe laporan resmi ngandika bahan mati resmi nganti delapan, lan laporan resmi ngandika bahan mati nganti 30; nanging angka final ora bisa diketahui.
ref: Ana bom sing njebluk ning njaba kantor jendral gubernur. Telung bom maneh mbledos ing cedhak gedhong pamrentahan sajrone rong jam. Sawetara lapuran nuduhake kurban mati sing resmi wolu, lan lapuran resmi mesthekake menawa sing cedera luwih saka 30; nanging jumlah akhire durung dingerteni.

src: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.
mt: Jesus, umur 21 taun, gabung karo Manchester City ing taun 2017 Januari saka klub Brasil Palmeiras kanthi biaya sing diwaca £27 yuta. Saka wektu iku, Brazil wis tampil ing 53 pertandingan kanggo klub ing kabeh kompetisi lan duwe 24 gol.
ref: Jesus sing umure 21 taun gabung Manchester City taun wingi ing Januari 2017 saka klub Palmeiras saka Brasil kanthi gaji sing dilapurake £27 yuta. Kawit iku, pelakon Brasil iki wis katon ing 53 pertandhingan kanggo klub ing kabeh lomba lan entuk 24 gol.

src: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.
mt: Sebuah hostel roboh ing Mekkah, kutha suci Islam ing jam 10.00 esuk wektu lokal. Bangunan iki nggadahi wong-wong kanggo nglakoni haji ing kutha suci. Penghuni hostel kasebut umume warga Uni Emirat Arab. Jumlah korban jiwa kasebut ora kurang saka 15, angka sing diharapke bakal nambah.
ref: Ana pratapan ambruk ing Mekah, kutha suci Islam udakara jam 10 esuk wektu sepanggon. Bangunane nampung saperangan jemaah sing nekani kuta suci ana malem ibadah haji. Para tamu pratapan umume pandunung Uni Emirat Arab. Korban tiwas paling ora 15, jumlah sing diduga bakal mundhak.

src: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.
mt: Satelit, kabeh sing nggawa bobot luwih saka 1,000 pon, lan ngelaju kira-kira 17,500 mil per jam, nggabung 491 mil ing atos Bumi. Ilmuwan ngomong menawa eksplosi sing diasilake saka nggabung iki gedhe. Mereka isih ngupayake ngerti luwih gedhe nggabung iki lan bagaimana Bumi bakal diarani. Kantor Strategi Komando Amerika Serikat Departemen Pertahanan ngamati sisa-sisa. Hasil analisis ngamati bakal disajekake ing situs publik.
ref: Satelit kasebut, sing loro-lorone abote luwih saka 1000 pound, lan mlaku ing kira-kira 17.500 mile se jam, tabrakan 491 mile dhuwur Bumi. Ilmuwan ngandhakake menawa bledhosan amarga tabrakan kasebut gedhe banget. Dheweke isih mutuske sepira gedhene tabrakan iku lan apa pengaruhe marang Donya iki. Komando Strategis Amerika Serikat saka kantor Departemen Pertahanan AS ngelacak puing-puinge. Asile saka ngrancang analisis bakal diunggah menyang situs web umum.

src: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.
mt: Batten ditepungi 190th ing 2008 400 Amérika Rikas list sing diestimasi dadi $2.3 miliar. Dheweke lulus saka College of Arts & Sciences saka Universitas Virginia ing taun 1950 lan dadi donatur sing penting kanggo institusi mau.
ref: Batten manggon ana urutan 190 nalika taun 2008 400 Wong Amerika sing Paling Sugih kanthi jumlah bandhane $2.3 milyar. Dheweke lulus saka Kampus Seni & Sains saka Universitas Virginia taun 1950 lan nyumbangke dhuwit sing akeh kanggo institusi kuwi.

src: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."
mt: Gubernur California Arnold Schwarzenegger nandhakake dadi undang-undang sing ngidhentifikasi permainan video kekerasan nggawe anak-anak. Undang-undang ngidhentifikasi permainan video kekerasan sing dijual ing California kudu ditandai karo label ""18"" lan nggawe penjualan ke anak-anak dadi dikenalake kanthi denda $1000 per kasus.
ref: Gubernur California Arnold Schwarzenegger nandhatangani kanggo ndadekake rancangan undang-undang sing nglarang dodol utawa nyewa vidio game kasar menyang bocah cilik. Rancangan undang-undang kasebut nyaratake video games kasar sing diadol ing negara bagian California diwenehi tandha nganggo stiker “18” lan menehi ukuman menawa ngadol menyang bocah kanthi denda $1000 saben pelanggaran.

src: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."
mt: “Perdana Menteri Stephen Harper wis setuju kirim undang-undang udara bersih pamarintah menawa karo komite partai kanggo tinjauan, sawise pertemuan 25 menit karo pemimpin NDP Jack Layton ing PMO. Layton wis ngeceke perubahan ing undang-undang lingkungan pamarintah konservatif nalika pertemuan karo PM, ngeceke perubahan penuh lan lengkap ing undang-undang partai konservatif. Saben saka pamarintah federal nggawe langkah kanggo ngecakake pamarintah Mersey ing Devonport, Tasmania, pamarintah negara lan saka anggota federal wis ngkritisi langkah iki minangka stunting ing prelude menawa pamarintah federal bakal diundangke nalika November. Nanging, Perdana Menteri John Howard wis ngomong langkah iki minangka ngamankan fasilitas saka pamarintah Mersey saka dijadahake, ing ngendi pamarintah Tasmanian nggawe tambahan AUD$45 yuta.”
ref: "Perdana menteri Stephen Harper wis setuju kanggo ngirim ‘Aksi Hawa Resik’ pamrentah menyang komite kabeh partai kanggo ditinjau, sakdurunge wacan kelorone, sakwise rapat 25 menit dina Selasa karo pemimpin NDP Jack Layton ing PMO. Layton njaluk owah-owahan ing rancangan undang-undang lingkungan konservatif nalika pertemuan karo Perdana Menteri, njaluk penulisan ulang sing tliti lan lengkap saka ""rancangan undang-undang lingkungan partai Konservatif."" Wiwit Pamrentah Federal tumindak kanggo njupuk dana kanggo rumah sakit Mersey ing Devonport, Tasmania, pamrentah negara lan sawetara ahli parlemen federal wis nggigat tumindak kasebut minangka tandang ing pambukaan pamilihan federal sing bakal diundang ing wulan Nopember. Nanging Perdana Menteri John Howard wis ngendikan yen tumindak kuwi mung dienggo njaga fasilitas sing ana ning rumah sakit supaya ora didhunke parangkate dening pemerintah Tasmania, nalika menehi dhuwit luwih AUD$45 yuta."

src: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."
mt: “Perdana Menteri Stephen Harper wis setuju kirim undang-undang udara bersih pamarintah menawa karo komite partai kanggo tinjauan, sawise pertemuan 25 menit karo pemimpin NDP Jack Layton ing PMO. Nanging, Perdana Menteri John Howard wis ngomong langkah iki minangka ngamankan fasilitas saka pamarintah Mersey saka dijadahake, ing ngendi pamarintah Tasmanian nggawe tambahan AUD$45 yuta.”

Nanging Perdana Menteri John Howard wis ngendikan yen tumindak kuwi mung dienggo njaga fasilitas sing ana ning rumah sakit supaya ora didhunke parangkate dening pemerintah Tasmania, nalika menehi dhuwit luwih AUD$45 yuta."

src: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
mt: Kedua asam sianurik lan melamin ditemukake ing sampel urin saka hewan peliharaan sing mati sawise ngonsumsi panganan hewan sing kontaminasi. Dua komponen iki reaksi karo siji lan sijine kanggo mbentuk kristal sing bisa mblokakake fungsi ginjel, panliti ing universitas kuwi ngomong. Panliti ngamati kristal sing dibentuk ing urin kucing dening tambahan melamin lan asam sianurik. Komposisi kristal iki padha karo sing ditemukake ing urin hewan sing terpengaruh nalika dibandingake dening spektroskopi inframerah (FTIR).
ref: Asam sianurat lan melamin ditemokake ing conto uyuh saka kewan ingon sing mati sawise mangan panganan kewan sing ketularan. Keloro senyawa reaksi siji lan liyane kanggo mbentuk kristal sing mungkin ngalangi fungsi ginjal, panaliti ing universitas iku kandha. Para panliti mirsani kristal sing kabentuk ing uyuh kucing kanthi tambahan melamin lan asam sianurik. Komposisi kristal iki cocok karo temuan ing turas kewan-kewan ingon-ingonan iku nalika dibandhingake kanthi spektroskopi infraabang (FTIR).

src: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""
mt: "Xinhua ngomong yen penyelidik pamarintah ngrebut rancangan penerbangan "black box" loro ing Rabu. Teman-teman olahraga jembar uga ngutipi wong Luna. Tommy Dreamer ngomong ""Luna dadi ratu pertama Extreme. Manajer pisanan. Luna tilar donya ing malam loro bulan. Cukup unik kaya dia. Wadon kuwat."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels komentar yen ""Luna dadi kaya aku...mungkin uga luwih...kowe ngasi...semangat dia lan aku ngaso...semoga dia ing tempat kang luwih apik..."""
ref: "Xinhua nglapurake menawa para penyidik pamerentah nemokake loro ‘kotak ireng’ perekam suara penerbangan ing Rebo. Para kanca gulet uga menehi pangurmatan marang Luna. Tommy Dreamer ngomong “Luna iku Ratu Ekstrim sing kepisan. Manajer pisananku. Luna seda ing malem rong rembulan. Lumayan unik kaya dheweke. Wanita kuwat.” Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels ngomentari menawa “Luna iku padha anehe kaya aku...mungkin senajan luwih...tresna lan bakal kangen dheweke (wanita)...Muga-muga dheweke ing papan sing luwih apik.”"

src: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
mt: Wong-wong sing ana ing omah nalika mobil nggolong, ora ana sing kena luka. Nanging, supir kena luka kang serius ing kepala. Jalan sing ana ing ngendi kejadian iki ora ditutup sementara sementara layanan darurat nggoleki supir saka mobil Audi merah TT. Dheweke dadi dihospitalisake ing James Paget Hospital ing Great Yarmouth. Dheweke banjur dipindahake menyang Addenbrooke's Hospital ing Cambridge.
ref: Sanadyan uwong telu ana ing njero omah nalika mobil kuwi nabrak, nanging kabeh selamet. Nanging, supir kasebut ngalami congkrah mbebayani ing sirah. Dalan nalika kacilakan kasebut ditutup sauntara nalika layanan darurat mbebasake supir kasebut saka Audi TT abang. Dheweke wiwitane dirawat ana ing Rumah Sakit James Paget ning Great Yarmouth. Banjur dheweke dipindhah menyang Rumah Sakit Addenbrooke ning Cambridge.

src: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.
mt: Permainan mulai ing jam 10:00 pagi karo cuaca sing apik lan kecuali hujan sing nggawe drizzle ing tengah-tengah pagi sing cepetan kabur, iku dadi dina sing apik kanggo rugby 7. Top seeds Afrika Kidul mulai kanthi nyenengake 26 - 00 kaping Zambia sing ke-5. Nalika nggawe permainan kaping Zambia, Afrika Kidul, sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul, dadi sing dadi adhedhasar kidul
ref: Tandhinge diwiwiti jam 10:00 esuk kanthi hawa sing penak kajaba saka grimis tengah esuk sing cepet mandheg, iku dina sing sampurna kanggo rugbi 7. Turnamen wenih unggul Afrika Kidul diwiwiti kanthi becik nalika dheweke menang 26 - 00 ngelawan wenih ke5 Zambia. Katon kanthi cetha kaku ing dolanan nglawan sedulur wadon kidul dheweke padha, Afrika Kidul sanajan kepiye terus sansaya apik nalika pertandhingan berlangsung. Pananggulang kang tumata, katrampilan nguwasani bal, lan kerja regu sing luwar biyasa ndadekake dheweke pinunjul lan mesthi manawa iki regu sing kudu dikalahake.

src: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.
mt: Ing wektu pungkasan telu dasawarsa, walaupun tetep resmi dadi negara komunis, Cina wis ngembangake ekonomi pasar. Reformasi ekonomi kapisan dilakokake ing bawah pimpinan Deng Xiaoping. Saka wektu iku, ukuran ekonomi Cina wis ngembangake 90 kali. Saben taun, Cina ngekspor mobil luwih saka Jerman lan ngalahake Amerika Serikat minangka pasar gedhe kanggo industri iki. GDP Cina bisa luwih gedhe saka Amerika Serikat ing wektu telung dasawarsa.
ref: Sajrone telung dasawarsa kepungkur, sanajan resmi tetep dadi negara komunis, Cina wis megarake ekonomi pasar. Reformasi ekonomi kaping pisan kuwi klakon nalika mangsa pemerintahane Deng Xiaoping. Wiwit semana, ekonomi Cina wis thukul tikel 90. Kanggo sing sepisan, taun kepungkur China ngekspor mobil luwih akeh tinimbang Jerman lan ngluwihi Amerika Serikat minangka pasar paling gedhe kanggo industri iki. GDP China bisa dadi luwih gedhe tinimbang Amerika Serikat kanthi wektu rong puluh taun.

src: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""
mt: Kita bakal ngusahake nyekel emisi karbon dioksida per unit GDP karo margin sing jelas saka 2005, Hu ngomong. Dheweke ora nglakokake angka kanggo nyekel, dheweke bakal dilakokake ing dasar output ekonomi Cina. Hu ngomong supaya negara-negara berkembang ""jangan mengambil jalan lama yang polusi terlebih dahulu dan membersihkan kemudian."" Dheweke ngambah yen ""mereka tidak, bagaimanapun, harus diminta untuk mengambil tanggung jawab yang melebihi tahap perkembangan, tanggung jawab, dan kemampuan mereka.""
ref: """Awake dhewe bakal ngusadani kanggo ngelongi metune karbon dioksida saben unit PDB kanthi margin kang patut digatekaki ing 2020 saka tingkat 2005, ujare Hu. "" Dheweke ora netepake angka kanggo kethokan, kandha dheweke padha bakal digawe adhedhasar asil ekonomi Cina. Hu nyengkuyung negara-negara berkembang “nyingkiri dalan tua saka polusi sepisan lan ngresiki sabanjure.” Dheweke nambahake ""dheweke ora dijaluk supaya bisa njupuk kewajiban sing ngluwihi tataran pangembangan, tanggung jawab, lan katrampilan dheweke."""

src: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."
mt: Kanggo kagiyatan medis Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres lan Organisasi Kesehatan Dunia ngomong menawa iku ya iku wabah sing paling parah sing diwetokake ing negara iku. Panliti kanggo Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman ngomong: ""Angola menyang wabah sing paling parah sing pernah diwetokake lan situasi sing tetep apik ing Angola,"" dheweke ngomong.
ref: "Mangola amal medis, Obat-obatan Sans Frontieres lan Organisasi Kasihatan Donya ngujar yen iki wabah sing paling ala sing tau kacathet dening negara iki. Juru wicara Medecines Sans Frontiere, Richard Veerman ujar: ""Angola lagi nuju wabah paling parah sing nate ana lan kahanan kasebut tetep ala banget ing Angola,"" ujare."

src: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.
mt: Kier Starmer QC, Direktur Umum Pengadilan, ngumumake penuntutan karo Huhne lan Pryce. Huhne wis mundur lan dia bakal diganti ing Kabinet karo Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP bakal nggantine wewengkon bisnis Davey sing kosong. Huhne lan Pryce bakal muncul ing Pengadilan Magistrate Westminster tanggal 16 Februari.
ref: Dhirektur Panggugat Umum, Keir Starmer QC, menehi pratelan esuk iki sing nyatakake panggugatan Huhne lan Pryce. Huhne wis pensiun lan dheweke bakal diganteni dening Kabinet Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP dikarepke supaya nglakokne pakaryan Menteri Bisnis sing dikosongke dening Davey. Huhne lan Pryce dijadwalake metu ing Pengadilan Magistrasi Wesminster ing tanggal 16 Februari.

src: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.
mt: Kier Starmer QC, Direktur Umum Pengadilan, ngumumake penuntutan karo Huhne lan Pryce. Huhne wis mundur lan dia bakal diganti ing Kabinet karo Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP bakal nggantine wewengkon bisnis Davey sing kosong. Huhne lan Pryce bakal muncul ing Pengadilan Magistrate Westminster tanggal 16 Februari.

Norman Lamb MP dikarepke supaya nglakokne pakaryan Menteri Bisnis sing dikosongke dening Davey. Huhne lan Pryce dijadwalake metu ing Pengadilan Magistrasi Wesminster ing tanggal 16 Februari.

src: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."
mt: Kisah sing disajekake ing opera Perancis, dening Camille Saint-Saens, yaiku seniman ""sing uripane diatur dening kasugihan kanggo obat-obatan lan Jepang."" Sababane, para penampil ngisep obat ganja ing panggung, lan teater sing nggawe nggawe penonton kanggo gabungake.
ref: Cerita sing ditampilke ana ing opera Perancis, dening Camille Saint-Saens, kuwi saka seniman “sing uripe didikte dening rasa tresna kanggo obat-obatan lan Jepang.” Asile, seniman ngrokok lintingan ganja ing panggung, lan teater kasebut ngajak para pamirsa kanggo melu.

src: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."
mt: Leonov, uga dikenali minangka "cosmonaut No. 11", dadi bagian saka tim Soviet Union asli cosmonaut. Pada 18 Maret 1965, dheweke nglakokake eksplorasi luar angkasa pertama (EVA), utawa "spacewalk", nglakokake kira-kira 12 menit. Dheweke dianugerahi "Hero of the Soviet Union", pangaji Soviet Union paling dhuwur, kanggo kerjane. Sepuluh taun sawise, dheweke ngedalake bagian Soviet saka misi Apollo-Soyuz sing nggambarake yen balapan angkasa ora ana.
ref: Leonov, uga dikenal minangka “cosmonaut No. 11”, iku bagean saka tim cosmonaut asli Uni Soviet. Tanggal 18 Maret, 1965, dheweke nggelar kagiyatan ekstravehikuler (EVA) nganggo manungsa kaping pisan, utawa “mlaku ning langit”, mlaku dhewekan rolas menit ning njabane pesawat. Dheweke narima “Pahlawan saka Persatuan Soviet”, anugerah paling dhuwur saka Persatuan Soviet, kanggo karyane. Sepuluh taun sabanjure, dheweke mimpin bagean Sovyet saka misi Apollo–Soyuz pratandha menawa Perlombaan Angkasa wis rampung.

src: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."
mt: “Sawise kejadian, Gibson diangkut menyang rumah sakit nanging mati saben-saben. Montor pengemudine sing umure 64 ora kena luka ing kecelakaan. Montor dheweke diangkat saka tempat kecelakaan ing sekitar 1200 GMT ing dina sing padha. Seseorang sing kerja ing garasi sing adoh saka tempat kecelakaan ngomong: “Ana anak-anak sing nunggu menyang dalan lan semuane ngomong lan nangis.” Semuane ngelak menyang tempat kecelakaan.
ref: Sabubare tabrakan iku kadadeyan, Gibson diangkut menyang rumah sakit nanging mati ora suwe sabubare kuwi. Sopir trek kuwi, sing umure 64, ora gene-gene sabubare tabrakan. Kendharaane dhewe dijupuk saka panggonan kadadeyan kacilakan kira-kira ing 1200 GMT ing dina sing padha. Wong sing nyambut gawe ana sak cedhake bengkel sing cedhak nggon kacilakan kuwi kadadeyan ngujar: “Ana bocah-bocah ngenteni nyebrang dalan kanthi nangis lan jerat-jerit.” Kabeh padha mlayu mbalik saka panggon kedadeyan kacilakan kasebut.

src: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.
mt: Kerja sing dilakokake wis akèh teori, nanging program iki ditulis kanggo nggawe simulasi observasi sing dilakokake ing galaksi Sagittarius. Efek tim iki kerepake bakal diasilake saka gaya pasang ing antarane materi gelap galaksi lan materi gelap ing galaksi Bumi. Seperti bumi nggawe gaya pasang ing bumi, kaya ta galaksi Bumi nggawe gaya pasang ing galaksi Sagittarius. Ilmuwan bisa ngeculake yèn materi gelap nggawe gaya pasang ing materi gelap sing padha kaya materi normal. Teori iki ngomong yèn materi gelap ing sekitar galaksi ana ing sekitar galaksi ing wujud halo, lan diasilake saka banyakan partikel cilik.
ref: Kerja sing rampung sebagean gedhe iku teoritis, nanging programe ditulis kanggo simulasi pengamatan sing digawe saka galaksi Sagittarius. Owah-owahan sing digoleki dening anggota tim iki yaiku diasilke dening kakuwatan pasang surut antarane materi sing ora katon saka galaksi lan materi sing ora katon saka Bima Sakti. Kaya dene rembulan nggunakake tarikan marang bumi, nyebabake pasang, semana uga Bima Sakti nggunakake kekuwatan marang galaksi Sagitarius. Para Ilmuwan wis nyimpulke yen materi sing ora katon iki nduweni pengaruh marang materi liyane kanthi cara sing padha karo materi liyane sing katon. Teori iki kandha menawa saperangan akeh bahan peteng ing sakiwa tengene sawijining galaksi iku ana ing sakiwatengene sawijining galaksi ing sejenis bunderan cahya, lan kagawe saka partikel-partikel cilik sing akeh banget.
