src: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.
mt: Kasus iki dadi kasus kaping lima ing sejarah sing wong-wong ngamati sing banjur ditegakake bahan kimia sing disimpulake bahan martian sing jatuh menyang Bumi. Dari sekitar 24.000 meteorit sing dikenal sing jatuh menyang Bumi, sajrone 34 sing disimpulake bahan martian ing asal. Bebarengan 15 batu sing disimpulake bahan meteorit sing jatuh ing Juli kemudian. Bebarengan batu-batu sing langka ing Bumi, sing dijual saka US$11,000 nganti $22,500 per ounce, sing kira-kira sepuluh kali luwih saka biaya emas.
ref: Iki dipercaya dadi sing kaping lima ing sarasilah manawa wong wis mirsani apa nyatane dat sing ana ing mars sing diantepake tiba ing Bumi. Saka watara 24.000 watu lintang sing tiba ing Bumi, kira-kira namung 34 sing wis dibuktekake asale saka Mars. Limolas watu iki dadi cirine udan lintang sasi Juli kapungkur. Sawetara watu, sing arang banget ana ing jagad donya, diadol saka US$11.000 nganti $22.500 saben ons, yaiku kaping sepuluhe rega emas.

src: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.
mt: Sampeyan, AOL bisa nggawe lan ngembangake pasar IM ing papan sendiri, amarga penggunaan luas ing Amerika Serikat. Dengan perjanjian iki, kebebasan iki bisa berakhir. Jumlah pengguna layanan Yahoo! lan Microsoft bisa nggawe saingan kanggé AOL.
ref: Nganti saiki, AOL wis bisa ngalih lan ngembangke pasar IM kanthi carane dhewe, amarga digunakake dening akeh wong ning Amerika Serikat. Kanthi paugeran ing papan, kebebasan iki isa uga tamat. Akehe pangguna layanan Yahoo! lan Microsoft sing digabungake bakal nandhingi akehe pangguna AOL.

src: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.
mt: Serangan bom mobil ing kantor polisi ing Gaziantep, Turki dina wengi kemaren nggawa kabeh polisi lan nggawa punggawa 20 wong liyane. Kantor gubernur ngomongake kabeh wong sing nggawa punggawa 19 wong polisi. Polisi ngomongake kabeh wong sing nggawa punggawa 19 wong polisi.
ref: Montor sing dipasangi bom ana ning kantor punjer kantor polisi ning Gaziantep, Turki wingi esuk mateni pulisi loro lan nglarani luwih saka 20 wong. Kantor gubernur ngendikan yen songolas wong sing lara kuwi kabeh pulisi. Pulisi ujar manawa dheweke sujana marang militan Daesh (ISIL) sing tanggungjawab marang serangan kasebut.

src: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.
mt: Gubernur Massachusetts mantan Mitt Romney menang pilihan umum partai Republik Florida ing Senin karo 46 persen suara. Mantan Ketua DPR Amerika Serikat Newt Gingrich dadi nomer 2 karo 32 persen. Sebagai negara pemenang semuanya, Florida ngawurake semuwan 50 delegasi menyang Romney, ngejar menyang depan sebagai calon partai Republik.
ref: Mantan gubernur Massachusetts menangke Partai Republik Florida pilihan utama presiden dina Selasa kanthi etungan swara 46 persen saka total swara. Mantan Juru Wicara Gedhung Newt Gingrich Amerika Serikat manggon urutan kaping loro kanthi swara 32 persen. Minangka negara bagian ing ngendi pemenang entuk kabeh, Florida menehake kabeh wakile kanggo Romney, ngajokake dheweke minangka juara utama kanggo nominasi Partai Republikan.

src: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.
mt: Gubernur Massachusetts mantan Mitt Romney menang pilihan umum partai Republik Florida ing Senin karo 46 persen suara. Mantan Ketua DPR Amerika Serikat Newt Gingrich dadi nomer 2 karo 32 persen. Sebagai negara pemenang semuanya, Florida ngawurake semuwan 50 delegasi menyang Romney, ngejar menyang depan sebagai calon partai Republik.
ref: Mantan gubernur Massachusetts menangke Partai Republik Florida pilihan utama presiden dina Selasa kanthi etungan swara 46 persen saka total swara. Mantan Juru Wicara Gedhung Newt Gingrich Amerika Serikat manggon urutan kaping loro kanthi swara 32 persen. Minangka negara bagian ing ngendi pemenang entuk kabeh, Florida menehake kabeh wakile kanggo Romney, ngajokake dheweke minangka juara utama kanggo nominasi Partai Republikan.

src: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."
mt: "Pimpinan Dewan Umum Newt Gingrich, Gubernur Texas Rick Perry, lan Kongreswati Michele Bachmann dadi urut ke-4, ke-5, lan ke-6, masing-mising. Sawise hasil wis ditekani, Gingrich ngomong Santorum, nanging duwee katrangan sing apik kanggo Romney, sing nggawe iklan kampanye negatif ing Iowa kaping Newt. Perry ngomong yen dheweke bakal "kembali menyang Texas kanggo nganalisa hasil saka caucus kaping, ngerti apakah ana jalur kanggo dheweke ing balo iki", nanging nglakokake yen dheweke bakal nglanjutake balo iki lan kompetisi ing primary South Carolina tanggal 21 Januari.
ref: Mantan Juru Wicara Newt Gingrich, gubernus Texas Rick Perry, lan anggota Kongres wanita Michele Bachmann rapung urutan kaping papat, kaping lima, lan kaping nem, urut-urutan. Sawise asile teka, Gingrich ngalem Santorum, nanging duwe tembung sing kasar kanggo Romney, sing duwe kepentingan iklan kampanye negatif ditayangake ing Iowa nglawan Gingrich. Perry ngendikan yen dheweke bakal “bali menyang Texas kanggo ngira-ngira asil saka pemilihan, nemtokake yen ana dalan maju kanggo awakku dhewe ana pemilihan iki”, nanging dheweke uga ngendikan yen bakal tetep melu pemilihan lan tandhing tanggal 21 Januari ning South Carolina sing utamane. Bachmann, sing menangke Pilihan Ames Straw sasi Agustus, mutuske ora kampanye maneh.

src: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."
mt: “Situs stasiun web nggambarake acara minangka “radio teater kuna sekolah karo spin anyar lan gegayuhan! ” Dina dina-dina awal, acara kuwi diwenehi ing situs radio internet sing dadi TogiNet Radio, situs sing dadi fokus ing radio baku. Dina akir 2015, TogiNet ngadegake AstroNet Radio minangka stasiun anak. Acara awalane nggunakake aktor suara amatir, lokal ing East Texas.
ref: Situs jaringan stasiun iku nggambarake pertunjukan iku minangka “teater radio sekolah tua kanthi sawijining puteran anyar lan kaku sing ngisin-isini!” Ing wiwitan dina, pagelaran iku namung mligi ing situs radio internet Radio TogiNet sing wis suwe lumaku, sawijining situs sing mligi bab radio pacelathon. Ana akhir taun 2015, TogiNet ngedegake Radio AstroNet dadi anak stasiun. Pagelaran kuwi mulane nampilne aktor swara amatir, saka Texas wetan.

src: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.
mt: Penyerang Mumbai tiba nganggo perahu ing 26 November 2008, ngemot granat, senjata otomatis lan ngancam target kaya Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus stasiun kereta api lan hotel Taj Mahal sing terkenal. David Headley ngumpulake informasi lan ngumpulake informasi sing bisa nggawe operasi karo 10 penyerang saka grup militan Pakistan Laskhar-e-Taiba. Serangan iki nggawa tekanan gedhe ing hubungan antara India lan Pakistan.
ref: Sing nyerang kutha Mumbai tekan numpak prau tanggal 26 November 2008, gawa granat, bedhil otomatis lan ngenani target sing akeh banget kalebu Terminal Stasiun sepur Chhatrapati Shivaji sing rame lan Hotel Taj Maahal sing misuwur. Cara mimpin lan uga cara golek informasi David Headley kasil nulung operasi iki supaya bisa dilakokne dening 10 tukang mbedhil saka klompok militan Laskhar-e-Taiba Pakistan. Serangan kasebut nyebabake tekanan gedhe ing hubungan India lan Pakistan.

src: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""
mt: “Rekor kaping Nadal kaping rata-rata kaping lawan warga Kanada iku 7-2. Dheweke kalah kaping pungkasan kaping Raonic ing Brisbane Open. Nadal ngegoleki 88% poin net ing pertandingan menang 76 poin kaping pungkasan. Sawise pertandingan, Raja Tanah Lempung ngomong, “”Aku seneng banget kaping balik ing ronde final saka acara sing paling penting. Aku ana kaping ngegoleki iki.””
ref: Cathethan adhep-adhepan Nadal nglawan Kanada yaiku 7-2. Dheweke urung suwe kalah ngelawan Raonic ing Brisbane Open. Nadal njaluk 88% poin resik ing sajrone pertandhingan sing menangke 76 poin ing giliran sepisan. Sawise pertandhingan, Raja Clay kandha, “Aku mung seneng mbalik ing ronde pungkasan pertandhingan paling penting. Aku saiki ing kene kanggo nyoba menangke iki.”

src: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.
mt: Minggu sadurunge, Naked News ngumumake yen bakal nambahake mandat internasional kanggo ngabdi ing ngadhepi, kanthi tiga ngabdi anyar. Uga ngabdi ing basa Inggris lan Jepang, organisasi global iki nggawe program basa Spanyol, Italia, lan Koréa, kanggo televisi, web, lan piranti mobile.
ref: Minggu wingi, Warta Uda ngumumake menawa warta kasebut bakal kanthi dramatis ngundhakake mandat basa internasionale kanggo laporan warta, nganggo telung siaran anyar. Wis dilapurake ing basa Inggris lan Jepang, organisasi sak jagad iki metokake program ing Spanyol, Italia lan Korea, kanggo TV, web, lan piranti gesit.

src: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.
mt: Kajaba dina acara Senin, Carpanedo kompetisi ing telu balapan individu ing Kejuaraan. Balapan pisanane yaiku Slalom, sing dadi Did Not Finish ing rune pisanane. 36 saka 116 kompetitor sing dadi hasil sing padha ing balapan iku. Balapan liyane, Giant Slalom, dadi finish ing sepuluh ing grup sing dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi dadi
ref: Saliyane acara dina Rebu, Carpanedo melu kompetisi ing rong balapan individu ing Kejuaraan. Sing sepisan yaiku Slalom, ing ngendi dheweke antuk Ora Ngrampungake ing mlayune sing sepisan. 36 saka 116 pesaing duwe hasil sing padha ing balapan iku. Balapane dheweke sing liyane, Slalom Gedhe, ndelok dheweke rampung ing posisi kesepuluh ing klompok lungguh wanita kanthi kombinasi wektu 4:41.30, 2:11.60 menit luwih alon tinimbang sing rampung nomer siji Claudia Loesch saka Austria lan 1:09.02 luwih alon tinimbang sing rampung nomer sanga Gyöngyi Dani saka Hungaria. Papat pemain ski ing klompok lungguh wanita gagal ngrampungake balapane, lan 45 saka 117 gunggung pemain ski ing Giant Slalom mrucut entuk rangking balapan.

src: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.
mt: Ing Rabu, National Basketball Association (NBA) Amerika Serikat nggagalkan musim profesional basketnya amarga kekhawatiran terhadap COVID-19. Keputusan NBA diikuti pemain Utah Jazz yang positif terhadap virus COVID-19.
ref: Dina Rebo kasebut, Pakumpulan Basket Nasional Amerika Serikat (NBA) nundha musim basket profesional amarga kuwatir babagan COVID-19. Putusane NBA ngetutne pemain Utah Jazz sing dites positip ing virus COVID-19.

src: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

ref: Dina Rebo kasebut, Pakumpulan Basket Nasional Amerika Serikat (NBA) nundha musim basket profesional amarga kuwatir babagan COVID-19. Putusane NBA ngetutne pemain Utah Jazz sing dites positip ing virus COVID-19.

src: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.
mt: Kepala Pemain Dina Pungkasan iki Alex Ovechkin saka Washington Capitals. Dheweke ngraih 2 gol lan 2 asist ing kamenangan Washington 5-3 ing Atlanta Thrashers. Asist Ovechkin ing pungkasan iki ing gol menangke dadi asist kaping pisanan dheweke ngraih nalika Nicklas Backstrom, pemain anyar, ngraih gol. Gol kaping pungkasan Ovechkin ing pungkasan iki gol kaping 60 dheweke ngraih ing musim iki, dadi pemain pisanan sing ngraih 60 gol utawa luwih ing musim, saka 1995-96, nalika Jaromir Jagr lan Mario Lemieux uga ngraih gol kaping 60.
ref: Pemain paling apik dina iki yaiku Alex Ovechkin saka Ibu Kutha Washington. Dheweke duwe 2 gol lan 2 umpan gol ing kamenangan Washington 5-3 nglawan Atlanta Thrashers. Pitulungan Ovechkin sing kaping pisan wengi iki yaiku gol sing menangke-tandhing iki dening rookie Nicklas Backstrom; Gule sing kaping pindho wengi kuwi iku gule sing ke 60 mangsa iki, dadi pemain pisanan sing ngegulake 60 utawa luwih ing sak mangsa awit 1995-96, nalika Jaromir Jagr lan Mario Lemieux saben-saben nekani titik pencapaian kuwi.

src: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.
mt: Bank Northern Rock wis di nasionalisake ing 2008 sawise panemuan yen perusahaan iki wis nampa dukungan saka Pamarintahan Inggris. Northern Rock kudu dukungan sawise eksposur ing krisis hipotek subprime ing 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group wis ditolak tawaran kanggo bank iki sadurunge bank nasionalisasi. Ing 2010, sadurunge nasionalisasi, bank kutha sekarang Northern Rock plc dipecah saka perusahaan asset management, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin wis nurunake bank 'baik', ora perusahaan asset management.
ref: Bank Northern Rock wis dinasionalisasi ing 2008 sawise penerangan menawa perusahaane wis nampa panyengkuyung darurat saka Pamarentah Inggris. Bank Northern Rock mbutuhake dhukungan amarga paparan sing kadadeyan sasuwene krisis finansial taun 2007. Kasepakatane Klompok Prawan Pak Richard Branson ditolak dening bank sadurunge bank kuwi digawe nasional. Ing taun 2010, nalika wis didadekake duweke negara, bank dalan gedhe Northern Rock Plc saiki dipisah saka 'bank ala', Northern Rock (Pangurusan Modal). Virgin mung tuku ‘good bank’ saka Northern Rock, dudu perusahaan manajemen aset.

src: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.
mt: Keputusan Mr. Rudd kanggo nandhakake perjanjian iklim Kyoto ngisolasi Amerika Serikat, sing saiki bakal dadi negara maju sing paling ora kanggo nandhakake perjanjian iki. Pamarintahan konservatif Australia sing dulu ngendika yen perjanjian iki bakal ngegatot ekonomi karo andhakake bahan bakar batu bara, sementara negara kaya India lan Cina ora bakal dibatasi dening target emisi.
ref: Kaputusane Pak Rudd kanggo nandhatangani kasepakatan iklim Kyoto gawe misahke Amerika Serikat, sing saiki bakal dadi siji-sijine negara maju sing ora bakal ngadopsi kasepakatan kasebut. Mantan pamrentah konservatif Australia nolak kanggo ngesahne Kyoto, ngomong manawa iku bakal ngrusak ekonomi kanthi ngandhalake banget marang ekspor batu bara, dene negara-negara kaya India lan China ora dijiret dening target emisi.

src: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.
mt: Penembak ing ujian tambahan kanggo kontrol hama sing diwengkoni nggoleki rangers, amarga ujian iki diawasi lan efektivitas sing diukur. src: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."
mt: “Berdasar fosil iki, iki artarane sing nggawe singkapan sing luwih awal tinimbang sing diharapake dening bukti molekuler. Iki artarane kabeh sing kudu diulang,” ujar panliti ing Layanan Penelitian Dataran Rift Valley ing Ethiopia lan penulis sing kagungan, Berhane Asfaw.
ref: """Miturut fosil iki, tegese anggone misahke iki kadadeyan luwih awal tinimbang sing dikarepke dening bukti molekul. "" Iku tegese kabeh kudu dibalekake,” ujar panliti ing Layanan Panlitian Lembah Rift ing Ethiopia lan rekan penulis saka panlitiane, Berhane Asfaw."

src: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.
mt: Ing pameran kunci Kamis Tokyo Game Show, presiden Nintendo Satoru Iwata ngumumake desain controller kanggo konsol anyar Nintendo Revolution. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.
ref: Nalika presentasi inti dina Kemis saka Pagelaran Game Tokyo, presidene Nintendo Satoru Iwata ngluncurake desain controller kanggo konsol anyar Nintendo Revolution saka perusahaane. Persis karo remot TV, pangatur nggunakake rong sensor sing dipasang ing cedhak TV pangguna kanggo nggawe triangulasi posisi ing lowahan telung dimensi. Iki bakal gawe pemain kuwi supaya bisa ngendhalekake polahe lan obahe ning dolanan pideo kuwi kanthi ngobahke piranti kuwi liwat hawa ing sakiwa tengene.

src: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.
mt: Kabeh kabar China Xinhua ngomongake pesawat sing dihijakake. Kabar-kabar sing banjur ngomongake pesawat sing ditekani bom lan diarahake menyang Afghanistan, mendarat ing Kandahar. Kabar-kabar awal ngomongake pesawat sing diarahake menyang Afghanistan sawise ditolak pendaratan darurat ing Ürümqi.
ref: Sadurunge kantor pawarta Xinhua Cina nglapurake ana montor mabur bakal dibajag. Laporan kuwi banjur ngumumke yen montor mabur kuwi nrima anceman bom banjur dialihke bali menyang Afganistan, mandheg ana ning Kandahar. Lapuran awal ujar montor mabur kasebut dielih balik menyang Afghanistan sawise ditolak ngener ing dharatan kanthi darurat ing Ürümqi.

src: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""
mt: Ing Senin, Sara Danius, sekretaris permanen kanggo Komite Nobel kanggo sastra ing Akademi Swedia, umumake publik ing program radio Sveriges Radio ing Swedia komite, ora bisa nyerat Bob Dylan langsung ngenai menangke Nobel Prize in Literature 2016, wis ngabandonake usahane kanggo nyerat. Danius ngomong, ""Kamangka, saiki kita ora nggawe apa-apa. Saya nggumulake lan nulis email menawa saka paling dekat karo karyawan lan nampa jawaban sing ramah banget. Saiki, ya, tentu cukup."""
ref: Ing dina Senin, Sara Danius, sekretaris tetep saka Komite Nobel kanggo Sastra ing Akademi Swedia, ngumumake nalika acara radio ing Radio Sveriges ing Swedia, menawa komite kasebut ora bisa ngontak langsung Bob Dylan menawa dheweke menangake Hadiah Nobel Sastra 2016, wis nyerah marang upayane kanggo ngontak dheweke. Danius ngomong, “Saiki kita ora nindakake apa-apa. Aku wis nelpon lan ngirim email menyang kolaboratore sing paling cerak lan nampa wangsulan sing ramah banget. Kanggo saiki, iku wis cukup.”

src: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""
mt: “Presiden Amerika Serikat George W. Bush menyambut pengumuman ini. Pimpinan Bush Gordon Johndroe menyebut janji Korea Utara “”sebuah langkah besar menuju tujuan untuk mencapai verifikasi denuclearisasi Semenanjung Korea.”””
ref: Presiden AS, George W. Bush nampani wara-wara kasebut. Juru bicarane Bush, Gordon Johndroe ngomong menawa sumpahe Korea Lor “jangkah maju sing gedhe tumrap tujuan kanggo nggegayuh denuklirisasi semenanjung Korea sing bisa dibuktekake.”

src: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."
mt: Ing taun 1956 Słania pindhah menyang Swedia, ing taun 1959 dhèwèke mulai kerja kanggo Swedia Pos lan dadi pengerajin utama. Dhèwèke ngasilake luwih saka 1,000 stempel kanggo Swedia lan 28 negara liyane. Karya dhèwèke sing kualitasé kaya déné rinci lan dikenalé, dhèwèke dadi salah sijiné saka wong-wong sing akèh sing "nama rumahé" antuké filatelist. Ana sing spesialis ing kumpulane karya dhèwèke. Stempelé dhèwèke kaping 1,000 yaiku "Great Deeds by Swedish Kings" (Kerja Agung déning Raja-raja Swedia) déning David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl ing taun 2000, sing dikenal ing Guinness Book of World Records. Dhèwèke uga nggawé banknote kanggo negara-negara liyane, contone portreté Prime Minister ing depan uang kanada $5 lan $100.
ref: "Ing 1956 Slania pindah menyang Swedia, ing ngendi telung taun sabanjure dheweke (lanang) wiwit kerja kanggo Kantor Pos Swedia lan dadi kepala pemahate. Dheweke ngasilake luwih saka 1.000 perangko kanggo Swedia lan 28 negara liyane. Karyane duweni kwalitas lan detail sing diakoni ndadekake dheweke minangka salah siji saka sawetara “jeneng misuwur” ing antarane filatelis. Sawetara wong ngususake kanggo ngoleksi karyane thok. Perangkone dheweke sing kaping 1;.000 yaiku ""Amal Gedhe dening Raja Swedia"" dening David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl ning 2000, sing ditulis ana ning Rekor Donya Buku Guinness. Dheweke uga melu ngukir dhuwit kertas kanggo pirang-pirang negara, conto paling anyar saka karyane kalebi poto perdana menteri ana ngarep dolar Kanada $5 lan $100."

src: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.
mt: 800 mil Trans-Alaska Pipeline System ditutup sasuweneke kecelakaan ngemot rong belas ribu barel minyak mentah kidul saka Fairbanks, Alaska. Kejatuhan daya sing disebabake saka tes sistem komando kebakaran rutin nggawe katup pemberian tekanan buka lan minyak mentah ngalir ning padhing ning stasiun pump Fort Greely 9. Katup buka nggawe tekanan rilis kanggo sistem lan minyak ngalir ning padhing ning tank sing bisa ngemot 55,000 barel (2.3 yuta galon). Saben wengi sore, katup tank nggawe kebocoran mungkin saka pambangunan panas ing dalam tank. Area kontaminasi sekunder ing bawah tank sing bisa ngemot 104,500 barel ora yekat penuh.
ref: 800 mil saka Sistem Pipa Trans-Alaska ditutup sakwise wutahe ewonan tong minyak mentah ing kidule Fairbanks, Alaska. Gagal listrik sawise tes sistem komando kebakaran rutin nyebabake katup sing kanggo nguculke mbukak lan gawe minyak mentah kuwi amber ana cedhak stasiun pompa 9 Fort Greely. Mbukake katup ngidini ucule tekanan kanggo sistem lan minyak mili liwat bantalan menyang tangki sing bisa amot 55.000 barel (2,3 juta galon). Nganthi Rebo sore, bolongan tangki isih bocor bisa wae amarga ekspansi panas sajerone tangki. Kurungan nomer loro liyane ning ngisore tengki bisa ngadhahi 104,500 barel durung diiseni kanthi kebak.

Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.
mt: 800 mil Trans-Alaska Pipeline System ditutup sasuweneke kecelakaan ngemot rong belas ribu barel minyak mentah kidul saka Fairbanks, Alaska. Kejatuhan daya sing disebabake saka tes sistem komando kebakaran rutin nggawe katup pemberian tekanan buka lan minyak mentah ngalir ning padhing ning stasiun pump Fort Greely 9. Katup buka nggawe tekanan rilis kanggo sistem lan minyak ngalir ning padhing ning tank sing bisa ngemot 55,000 barel (2.3 yuta galon). Saben wengi sore, katup tank nggawe kebocoran mungkin saka pambangunan panas ing dalam tank. Area kontaminasi sekunder ing bawah tank sing bisa ngemot 104,500 barel ora yekat penuh.
ref: 800 mil saka Sistem Pipa Trans-Alaska ditutup sakwise wutahe ewonan tong minyak mentah ing kidule Fairbanks, Alaska. Gagal listrik sawise tes sistem komando kebakaran rutin nyebabake katup sing kanggo nguculke mbukak lan gawe minyak mentah kuwi amber ana cedhak stasiun pompa 9 Fort Greely. Mbukake katup ngidini ucule tekanan kanggo sistem lan minyak mili liwat bantalan menyang tangki sing bisa amot 55.000 barel (2,3 juta galon). Nganthi Rebo sore, bolongan tangki isih bocor bisa wae amarga ekspansi panas sajerone tangki. Kurungan nomer loro liyane ning ngisore tengki bisa ngadhahi 104,500 barel durung diiseni kanthi kebak.

src: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.
mt: Korps Insinyur AS ngestimasi yen 6 inci hujan bisa nggoyangke dinding sing wis rusak. The Ninth Ward, sing ngalami banjir nganti 20 kaki nalika Hurricane Katrina, saiki ana ing banget dhuwur banyu amarga dinding sing cedhak wis nggoyangke. Banyu ngalir saka dinding sing 100 kaki amba.
ref: Korps Insinyur AS ngira manawa udan 6 inci bisa nembus tanggul sing rusak sadurunge. Bangsal nomer Sanga, sing kena banjir sing dhuwure 20 feet nalika Lesus Katrina, saiki kena banyu sing dhuwure sak-boyok amarga tanggul sing cedhak kono luwih dhuwur. Banyu iku mbludagi tanggul ing bagean 100 sikil ambane.

src: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.
mt: Hamilton ngonfirmasi Howard University Hospital ngasiling pasien ing kondisi stabil. Pasien wis ngemong Nigeria, ing ngendi kasus saka virus Ebola wis terjadi. Rumah sakit wis ngikuti protokol kanggo kontrol infeksi, kalebu ngisolasi pasien saka wong liyane kanggo ngilangake kemungkinan infeksi wong liyane.
ref: Hamilton mesthekake Rumah sakit Universitas Howard ngakoni pasien kasebut ana ing kahanan sing apik. Pasien kuwi wis tau tekan Nigeria, panggonan ditemokake kasus virus Ebola. Rumah sakit wis patuh marang protokol kanggo kontrol infeksi, kalebu misah pasien saka liyane kanggo nyegah kemungkinan nginfeksi liyane.

src: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.
mt: Komet bisa mungkin dadi sumber banyu kanggo ngirimake banyu menyang bumi saka bahan organik sing bisa nggawe protein lan ngemudha kehidupan. Ilmuwan ngandhutake ngerti bagaimana jagad nggawe, khususnya bagaimana bumi nggawe, amarga komet nggabutake bumi dina jaman dina.
ref: Komet bisa dadi sumber pangiriman banyu menyang bumi bebarengan karo bahan organik sing bisa mbentuk protein lan nyangga kauripan. Para ilmuan ngajab kanggo mangerteni kepiye planet-planet kabentuk, utamane kepiye bumi dibentuk, amarga jaman biyen komet tabrakan karo Bumi.

src: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.
mt: Ketutuhan saka ancaman iku ora bisa dipercaya, Maryland Transportaion Authority nggawe penutupan karo nggadahi FBI. Dump trucks digunakake kanggo ngeblokake jalan masuk lan bantuan saka 80 polisi ana ing tangan kanggo ngarani mobilis nganti detour. Ana ora nganti lalu lintas berat nggawe penundaan nggawe jalan lingkar, rute alternatif kutha.
ref: Senajan pihak berwenang ora yakin marang kredibilitas ancaman iku, Otoritas Transportaion Maryland nganakake penutupan kanthi pandhesuk saka FBI. Truk sampah digunakake kanggo ngedhangi lawang mlebu lan bantuan 80 polisi siap kanggo ngarahake pengendara motor menyang dalan liya. Ora ana lalu lintas padhet dilapurake ing dalan sabuk, dalan alternatif kutha.

src: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."
mt: "Fotografere dadi dipindahake menyang Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, sing nglakuke mati. Dheweke diarani umur ing 20-an. Dalam pernyataan, Bieber ngomong "Sedangkan saya tidak hadir maupun secara langsung terlibat dengan kecelakaan tragis ini, pikiran dan doa saya dengan keluarga korban." Situs berita hiburan TMZ mengerti fotografer berhenti mobilnya di sisi lain Sepulveda Boulevard dan berusaha untuk mengambil gambar polisi berhenti sebelum menyeberangi jalan dan terus, memaksa California Highway Patrol polisi yang melakukan penindakan lalu lintas untuk memerintahnya kembali ke sisi lain, dua kali. Menurut polisi, pengemudi mobil yang menabrak fotografer tidak mungkin akan dihadapkan dengan tuntutan pidana."
ref: Tukang foto iku diangkut menyang Pusat Pengobatan Ronald Reagen UCLA, ing ngendi dheweke mati sawise iku. Dheweke dikabarke umur 20 taun. Ing salah sawijine pranyatan, Bieber ngujar “[n]alika aku ora ana kono utawa ora langsung ana kaitane karo kacilakan iki, pikiran lan dongaku kanggo kaluwarga para korban iki.” Situs web pawarta lelipur TMZ mangerteni yen tukang poto kuwi mandheg ana ning pinggir Dalan Sepulveda lan nyoba moto pos pulisi sadurune nyebrang dalan lan neruske, agawe pulisi Patroli Dalan Raya Kalifornia ngendhegke lalu lintas mung kanggo mrintahke dhewekw supaya nyebrang, kaping pindho. Miturut polisi, pengendhara kendharaan sing nabrak fotografer iku ora mungkin ngadhepi tuntutan pidana.

src: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."
mt: "Arias nggawe tes positif kanggo kasus lemah saka virus, Menteri Presidhèn Rodrigo Arias ngomong. Keadaan presidhèn stabil, nanging dia bakal diisolasi ing omah kanggo saben-saben dina. ""Selain demam lan sakit tenggorokan, saya merasa baik lan dadi bentuk kanggo nggawe kerja kuwi nggawe telekomunikasi. Saya ngandhut supaya kembali nggawe kabeh tugas ing Senin,"" Arias ngomong ing pernyataan."
ref: "Arias dinyatakake positif nandang virus entheng, ujar Menteri Presiden Rodrigo Arias. Kahanan presiden stabil, senajan dheweke bakal diisolasi ing omah kanggo sawetara dina. ""Pisah saka mriyang lan lara tenggorokan, Kula ngrasa apik lan ing wujud apik kanggo nindakake gaweanku kanthi telekomunikasi Aku ngarepake bali menyang tugasku ing dina Senin,” ujare Aria ing pernyataane."

src: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.
mt: Gonu, jeneng sing diambil saka kantung daun kelapa ing basa Maladewa, nggawa angin kenceng 240 kilometer per jam (149 mil per jam). Nalika dini, angin wis 83 km/h, lan diharapake bakal lemah.
ref: Pungkasane, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, dijenengi kanggo tas godhong sawit ing basa Maladewa, nggayuh angin terus-terusan udakara 240 kilometer saben jam (149 mil saben jam). Ing awal dina iki, angin udakara 83 km/jam, lan iki diajab saya lemah.

src: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.
mt: Red tide diasilake amarga konsentrasi Karenia brevis sing luwih sithik tinimbang normal, organisme sel tunggal sing alami. Faktor alami bisa ngintersepe kanggo ngasilake kondisi sing ideal, nggawa iki alga ngambah dadi angka sing gedhe. Alga ngasilake neurotoxin sing bisa ngeblok saraf ing keduane wong lan iwak. Iwak kerap mati amarga konsentrasi sing dhuwur saka toxin ing banyu. Warga bisa dienggo amarga ngepang banyu sing dienggo amarga angin lan gelombang.
ref: Ombak abang kuwi disebabke dening konsentrasi Karenia brevis sing dhuwur, organisme sel-tunggal sing njedhul dhewe kanthi alami. Faktor alami bisa nyenggol kanggo gawe kahanan sing pas, agawe algae iki thukul kanthi cepet banget. Alga ngasilake sawijining neorotoxin sing isa nglumpuhake saraf ing menungsa lan iwak. Iwak kerep mati amarga kadar racun kang dhuwur ing banyu. Menungsa bisa kena pengaruh nalika nyedot banyu sing kena sing ana ing hawa kegawa dening angin lan ombak.

src: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."
mt: “Felicia, siji kategori 4 ing skala Saffir-Simpson, lemah dadi depresi tropis sadurunge ngilangake Senin. Sisa-sisa sing ngasilake hujan ing saben pulo, nanging nggawe laporan nggawe kerusakan utawa banjir. Hujan sing nggawe 6,34 inci ing alat ukur ing Oahu, diarani “”bermanfaat””. Sajeneng hujan sing diiringi kembang api lan sinar petir.”
ref: Felicia, sing sadurunge dadi badai Golongan 4 ing tataran Prahara Saffir-Simpson, nyusut dadi depresi tropis sadurunge sirna ing dina Selasa. Turahane ngasilake udan ing saindenging pulo, sanajan nganti saiki, ora ana keruksan utawa banjir sing dilapurake. Curah udan iki, kaitung nganti 6,34 inci ana ing Oahu digambarake dadi “nguntungake”. Sawetara udan dibarengi prahara gedhe lan asring ngaton bledhek.

src: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
mt: Piquet Jr. tiba ing 2008 Singapore Grand Prix sawise pit stop awal kanggo Fernando Alonso, nggawe mobil keamanan. Saamaneh mobil ing ngendi Alonso ngelintang nganti pit stop kanggo bahan bakar. Piquet Jr. dipecat sawise 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
ref: Piquet Jr. tiba ana ing Grand Prix Singapura 2008 sabubare mandheg kanggo Fernando Alonso, nggawa montor sing luwih aman. Nalika mobil-mobil ing sangarepe Alonso mlebu kanggo bahan bakar sangisore keslametan mobil, dheweke (lanang) pindhah munggah kanggo menang. Piquet Jr. dipecat sabubare taun 2009 Grand Prix Hungaria.

src: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
mt: Ing Senin, studi sing diterbitake ing jurnal Science ngenalake penemuan spesies burung anyar ing pulo Galápagos Ekuador. Panliti saka Universitas Princeton ing Amerika Serikat lan Universitas Uppsala ing Swedia ngumumake spesies anyar sing evolusi ing sadurungne dua generasi, walaupun proses iki wis dianggep bisa dadi luwih lama, amarga perkawinan antaranya burung Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, lan burung cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
ref: Panliten sing diwetokake dina Kamis ing jurnal Ilmu nglapurake pambentukan jinis manuk anyar ing Kapuloan Galapagos Ekuador. Panliten saka Universitas Princeton ing Amerika Serikat lan Universitas Uppsala ing Swedia nglapurake manawa jinis anyar megar mung rong generasi, sanajan cara iki dipercaya luwih suwe, amarga ana ing antarane finch endemik Darwin, beteng Geospiza, lan kaktus finch boyongan, Geospiza conirostris.

src: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.
mt: Acara seni uga bagian saka kampanye kantor wali kutha Bucharest sing ngrembaka gambaran kutha-kutha Rumania minangka metropolis kreatif lan warna-warni. Kutha iki bakal dadi kutha pisan ing Eropa Kidul-Wetan sing nggoleki CowParade, acara seni publik paling gedhe ing donya, antara Juni lan Agustus taun iki.
ref: Acara keseniane uga bagean saka kampanyene Balai Kutha Bucharest kang pengin nguripake maneh gambaran kuta Roma minangka kutha metropolis kang kreatif lan werna-werni. Kutha iki bakal dadi sing kapisan ing sisih wetan-kidul Eropa sing dadi tuwan omah CowParade, acara kagunan umum sing paling gedhe ing donya, antara wulan Juni lan Agustus taun iki.

src: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.
mt: Pesawat wis diarahake menyang Irkutsk lan dioperasike dening pasukan dalem. Siji penyelidikan diadakake kanggo ngrungokake. Il-76 wis dadi komponen penting saka tentara Ruslan lan Uni Soviet wiwit taun 1970-an, lan wis ngrasakake siji kecelakaan serius ing Ruslan ing bulan Oktober. Pada 7 Oktober, mesin sing padha dipisahake nalika nggegat, tanpa luka. Ruslan sing ndhikarake Il-76s sawise kecelakaan iki.
ref: Montor mabur kuwi wis mabur menyang Irkutsk lan dilakokne dening prajurit njero. Penyelidikan wis dianakake kanggo nyelidhiki. II-76 wis dadi komponen utama militer Rusia lan Soviet wiwit taun 1970, lan wis weruh alangan wigati ing Rusia sasi kepungkur. Tanggal 7 Oktober ana mesin sing dipisahke nalika mabur, tanpa kacilakan. Rusia langsung ngendhegke II-76s.

src: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.
mt: Sebelum The Simpsons Simon kerja ing acara-acara kaya Taxi, Cheers, lan The Tracy Ullman Show. Ing taun 1989 dia bantu ngrangkep The Simpsons karo Brooks lan Groening, lan bertanggung jawab nggawe tim nulis pisanan. Walaupun dia ngelepaske acara iku ing 1993 dia tetep nggawe judhul produser eksekutif, lan terus menerima ratusan juta dolar saben musim ing royalti.
ref: Sadurunge The Simpsons Simon wis nggarap sawetara acara ing macem-macem posisi. Nalika taun 1980 an dheweke nyambut gawe ing pagelaran kaya Taxi, Cheers, lan The Tracy Ullman Show. Ing taun 1989, dheweke mbantu nggawe The Simpsons karo Brooks lan Groening, lan nduwe tanggung jawab kanggo njangkepi regu panulis kapisan ing acara kasebut. Sanajan ninggalake tontonan iku ing taun 1993, dheweke ajeg dadi produser eksekutif, lan terus nampa dasan yuta dolar bayaran ing saben ungsum.

src: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.
mt: Fluke tulis menawa upaya saka saben wong kanggo nggoyangake wong-wong saka ngomong menawa babagan kesehatan wong-wong iku ora sukses. Dheweke ngerti kajabaan saka komentar lan pengaruh sing positif sing ditepake menawa obat kontrasepsi kudu dianggepake minangka kebutuhan medis.
ref: Fluke nulis menawa upaya-upaya dening sawetara wong kanggo ngilangke wanita saka nyuarakake babagan kasarasan wanita iku ora kasil. Dheweke tekan pepuntoning iki amarga ana akeh ujaran lan semangat positif sing dikirim menyang dheweke dening individu wanita lan pria sing meksa obat kontrasepsi dianggep minangka kabutuhan pangobatan.

src: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."
mt: “Iki bakal ngelakuke kaya banyu. Iki transparan kaya banyu. Jadi, kalo kalian ngegoleki pinggir pantai, kalian bakal bisa ngecek nganti bintik-bintik utawa gunk sing ana ing bawah. Kaya sing kita ketahui, ana sajine planit sing ngelakuke kaya bumi, lan jenenge Bumi.”
ref: """Bakal tumindak kaya banyu. Tembus cahya minangka banyu"" Dadi yen sampeyan ngadeg ing pinggiring pesisir, sampeyan bakal isa weruh ngisor marang krikil utawa regedan apa wae sing ana ing ngisor. Sakngertine awake dhewe, mung ana siji awak planet kang nuduhake dinamisme kang luwih tinimbang Titan, lan arane yaiku Bumi,” tambahe Stofan."

src: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
mt: Kasus iki ora namung ngukuhake yèn setidaknya dinosaurus wis duwé bulu, teori sing wis umum, nanging nyediakake rincian fosil umume ora bisa, kaya warna lan aranem tiga dimensi.. Ilmuwan ngomong yèn bulu iki abang ing pucuk lan putih utawa warna carotenoid ing bawah. Temuan uga nyediakake wawasan menawa evolusi bulu ing burung. Amarga bulu iki ora duwé rachis sing dadi pambangun, nanging duwé fitur liyane saka bulu — barbs lan barbules — panliti nggolongake yèn rachis iki mungkin dadi pambangun sing dadi evolusi sing dadi nulak iki. Struktur bulu iki nggolongake yèn bulu iki ora digunakake kanggo ngunjugi nanging kanggo regulasi suhu utawa pameran. Panliti nggolongake yèn, walaupun iki yaiku ekor saka dinosaurus cilik, sampel iki nyediakake bulu sing dadi dewasa lan ora bulu anak sing dadi down.
ref: Iki ora mung negeske yen ana dinosaurus sing nduweni wulu, teori sing wis kasebar, nanging umume durung ana fosil sing bisa dienggo bukti, umpamane warna lan wujut telung-dimensi. . Ilmuwan ngujar yen rupane wulu kewan iki coklat-kacang ana ndhuwur lan pucet utawa warna karoten ana sisih ngisor. Panemuan kasebut uga njamin wawasan kanggo evolusi saka wulu ing manuk. Amarga wulu dinosaurus ora duwe watang sing berkembang apik, disebut rachis, nanging duwe ciri-ciri wulu-wulu liyane — eri-eri lan barbule-barbule — panaliti nyimpulake rachis iku kemungkinan sawijining perkembangan evolusioner sabanjure sing iku ciri-ciri liyane. Struktur wulune nuduhake menawa iku ora digunakake kanggo mabur nanging malah kanggo ngatur suhu utawa rupa. Panliti menehi pitunjuk sanadyan iki buntute dinosaurus enom, sampel nuduhake wulu diwasa lan dudu piyik. Panliti menehi pitunjuk sanadyan iki buntute dinosaurus enom, sampel nuduhake bulu diwasa lan dudu piyik.

src: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.
mt: Ing nganti saiki, ora ana obat sing bisa ditunjukake sing bisa nyingkiri kematian Ebola. Satu obat antarabot, ZMapp, awalé ngilangake harapan ing lapangan, nanging studi formal ngilangake manawa obat iki kurang manfaat tinimbang sing diharapake kanggo ngilangake kematian. Ing PALM trial, ZMapp dadi kontrol, artine ilmuwan nggunakake obat iki minangka basis lan bandingake tiga obat liyane karo obat iki.
ref: Nalika ana siji vaksin pacoban katon bisa nyuda kematian Ebola, nganti saiki, ora ana obat sing kabukten jelas kanggo ngobati infeksi sing ana. Siji koktil antibodi, ZMapp, pisanane nuduhake pangarep-arep ing lapangan, nanging panaliten dhines nuduhake manawa kurang migunani tinimbang digoleki kanggo ngupaya nyegah pati. Nalika pacoban PALM, ZMapp nduweni fungsi dadi kontrol, tegese ilmuwan nggunakake iku dadi garis dhasar lan mbandhingake perawatan telu liyane karo kuwi.

src: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.
mt: Ing Senin, para ilmuwan saka Sekolah Dokter Universitas Stanford ngenalake piranti diagnostik anyar sing bisa nggolongaké sel: piranti cilik sing bisa diprodhuksi nganggo printer standar inkjet kanggo mungkin 1 sen U.S. saben. Para peneliti sing ngemong nglaporke kaya iki bisa nggawa deteksi dini kanker, tuberkulosis, HIV lan malaria menyang pasien ing negara sing nduweni pendapatan rendhing, sing bisa nggawa angka kematian kanggé kanker payudara bisa setengah saka negara sing duwé pendapatan luwih dhuwur.
ref: Ing dina Senin, ilmuwan saka Fakultas Kedokteran Universitas Stanford ngumumake penemuan piranti diagnosa sing isa misah-misahake sel adhedhasar jenis: kepingan cilik sing isa dicetak sing isa diasilake kanthi nggunakake printer inkjet standar kanggo mungkin saben-saben watara saji sen AS. Panliti kang mimpin ngomong menawa iki bisa nyebabake deteksi awal kanggo kanker, tuberkulosis, HIV lan malaria kanggo pasien ing negara pendapatan sithik, ing ngendi tingkat kaslametan kanggo penyakit kaya kanker payudara bisa separone saka negara kang luwih sugih.

src: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.
mt: Ilmuwan wis nemokake landform sing ditemokake ing permukaan bulan sing dikenal minangka lobate scarps sing wis dadi saka bulan sing mungkur kanthi lambat. Scarps iki ditemokake ing kabeh bulan lan munculake minangka minimal weathered, ngindikasake yen geologic event sing nggawe iku isih cedhak. Teori iki nggoyor klaim yen bulan ora duwe aktivitas geologis.
ref: Para ahli elmu nemokake macem-macem wujud lemah sing ana ing pasuryan rembulan sing diarani perenging godhoh sing menawa asil saka sudane rembulan sing alon banget. Bambing-bambing jero iku kabeh ditemokake ing bulan lan katon sethithik kena udan, nandhakake yen kedadean geologis sing dumadi iku nembe wae kanthi wajar. Teori iki ora mbantah pratelan yen mbulan kuwi kurang kagiyatan geologis.

src: "Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son. She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes ""journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."" Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment."
mt: "Adekoya wis di Edinburgh Sheriff Court dikenali dadi pembunuh anak. Iki di tahanan nganti diindikasi lan diadili, nanging sijinipun saksi bisa dicemari amarga gambar iku wis diterbitake. Kajaba iku, praktik iku umum ing UK, nanging keadilan Skotlandia kagunaane beda lan pengadilan nglihat publikasi gambar iku bisa nggawe prejudis. Profesor Pamela Ferguson saka Universitas Dundee ngomong ""jurnalis kagunaane nggawe garis-garis sing aman nggawe publikasi gambar-gambar lan sebagainya."" Crown Office, sing nggawa keadilan, ngindikasike marang jurnalis yèn ora bakal ngomong sijinipun nganti diindikasi."
ref: Adekoya awit kuwi ana ing Pengadilan Sheriff Edinburgh kanthi tuduhan mateni anak lanange. Dheweke ditahan kanthi ngenteni dakwaan lan sidhang, nanging bukti saksi kuwi uga bisa ora cetho amarga gambare wis disebarke. Bab iki kalebu praktek umum ning Inggris nanging anngone nibakake pepancasan kuwi beda ana ning Skotlandia lan praneangadilan wis nyekseni poto-poto sing bisa ngrugekake. Guru Pamela Ferguson saka Universitas Dundee nyathet “nerbitke potone tersangka kuwi bakal mbebayani banget kanggo para wartawan.” Kantor Mahkota, sing ing sakabehaning bea penuntutan, wis nuduhake marang jurnalis menawa ora ana komentar meneh sing bakal digawe paling ora tekan dakwaan

src: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.
mt: Ing tambahan karo es sing kacang, kondisi cuaca sing ekstrem wis nggawangi upaya-upaya penyelamatan. Pittman ngomong menawa kondisi ora bakal nggawe perubahan nganti wektu nalika seminggu. Jumlah lan ketebalan es sing kacang, menurut Pittman, yaiku sing paling apik ing 15 taun pungkasan.
ref: Sak liyane es sing ajur, kondisi hawa sing ora umum iki gawe usaha kanggo nyelametake dadi suwe. Pittman menehi kesan menawa kondisine ora bakal maju nganthi minggu ngarep. Gunggung lan kandele bungkus es, miturut Pittman, paling awon kanggo grema asu laut sing paling suwene 15 taun kepungkur.

src: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."
mt: Roberts ngutukake tegas menawa iku kapan ia percaya sing nggawe kehidupan, pertanyaan penting nalika ngomong menawa etika sing nggawe aborsi, ngomong menawa iku bakal ora etis ngomong menawa spesifik kasus sing mungkin. Ia, nanging, ngulangi pernyataan sing wis ana menawa Roe v. Wade iku ""hukum sing wis ditegakake ing tanah"", ngemukakake pentingnya putusan Mahkamah Agung sing konsisten. Ia uga ngonfirmasi menawa ia percaya hak sing diimplikasike sing nggawe privasi sing Roe ngandharake.
ref: Roberts nolak kanggo ngomong kapan dheweke percaya uripe diwiwiti, pitakonan penting nalika nimbang etis saka aborsi, ngomong menawa iki bakalan ora etis kanggo ngomong detail saka kasus sing bisa kedadean. Dheweke nindakake, nanging, mbaleni pitakonane dheweke sadurunge menawa Roe.v Wade iku “hukum lemah sing pesthi”, negasake pentinge putusan Mahkamah Agung sing konsisten. Dheweke uga negesake yen dheweke percaya marang hak sing kesirat kanggo hak pribadhi sing dadi dhasar keputusane Roe.

src: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target. Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight. Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.
mt: Jam 8:46 esuk, hening ngalami kota, nandhakake momen sing pisanan jet nggolongke sasaran. Dua sambungan lampu wis dirigake kanggo ngepung langit. Konstruksi isih berlangsung kanggo lima gedung tinggi anyar ing situs, karo pusat transportasi lan taman ing tengah.
ref: Pas jam 8:46 esuk, ana ening tiba ngliwati kutha iku, nandhani wektu persis jet sing sepisan nyerang sasarane. Rong sorot cahya wis dipasang kanggo ngarahake ing langit sawengi. Lima bangunan anyar dhuwur-dwuhur saiki lagi dibangun ana ing panggonan iki, kalebu punjer kendharaan lan taman pengeling-eling ana ing tengah.

src: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."
mt: “Semua pintu masuk gua, sing diarani “The Seven Sisters”, minangka paling ora 100-250 meter (328-820 kaki) ing diameter. Gambar inframerah ngilangake variasi suhu saka malam lan dina menunjukake yen iku mungkin gua. “Mereka lebih dingin daripada permukaan sekitarnya di siang hari dan lebih hangat di malam hari. Perilaku termal mereka tidak seimbang seperti gua-gua besar di Bumi yang sering mempertahankan suhu yang cukup konstan, tetapi konsisten dengan ini adalah lubang-lubang dalam tanah yang dalam,” kata Glen Cushing dari United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team dan dari Northern Arizona University yang terletak di Flagstaff, Arizona.
ref: "Kabeh dalan mlebu menyang guwa, sing dijenengi “Sedulur Wadon Pitu”, kurang luwih 100 nganti 250 meter (328 nganti 820 feet) garis tengahe. Gambar inframerah nuduhake yen variasi suhu saka awan lan wengi nuduhake manawa iku cenderung guwa. ""Iki luwih apik tinimbang sekitarane nalika awan lan luwih anget nalika wengi"" Tumindak panas kuwi ora kuat kaya sing ana ing guwa sing gedhe ing Donya sing biyasane bisa njaga suhu iki kanthi tetep, nanging uga selaras karo bolongan ing njero,” ujare Glen Cushing saka Survei Geologi Amerika Serikat (USGS) Tim Astrogeologi lan saka Universitas Arizona Lor sing manggon ana ing Flagstaff, Arizona."

src: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.
mt: Mane kuwi diduga nglakoni mobil tiga roda sing dilengkapi karo bahan peledak menyang adolane. Manungsa sing diduga nggawa bom iki ditahan, sawise ngerasa sakit saka ledakan. Jenenge isih ora diketahui dening otoritas, nanging ora isih tau yen iku anggota etnik Uighur.
ref: Wong iku dinuga nyetir kendharaan rodha-telu disenjatani kanthi bahan ledhak menyang wong akeh. Wong sing diduga mbledhoske bom kuwi ditangkep, sabubare tatu saka kadadeyan kuwi. Jenenge iku isih ora dingerteni marang panguasa sanajan dheweke padha ngerti dheweke iku anggota kelompok etnis Uigur.

src: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.
mt: Afrika Kidul wis ngalahake All Blacks (Selandia Baru) ing pertandingan rugby union Tri Nations ing Royal Bafokeng Stadium ing Rustenburg, Afrika Kidul. Skor akhir yaiku kamenangan siji poin, 21-20, nglumpakake kemenangan 15 pertandingan All Blacks. Kamenangan iki nyebabake Springboks nggantungke kemenangan lima pertandingan. Pertandingan pungkasan yaiku ing Ellis Park ing Johannesburg minggu depan, nalika Springboks main karo Australia.
ref: Afrika Kidul ngalahake All Blacks (New Zealand) nalika adu-adu ragbi pakumpulan Tri Nations ing Stadion Bafokeng Royal ing Rustenburg, Afrika Kidul. Skor pungkasan iku siji poin menang, 21 tekan 20, mungkasi dolanan 15 Kabeh Negro menang urut-urutan. Kanggo Springboks, wis kalah ping lima urut-urutan. Iki iku pertandhingan pungkasan kanggo All Blacks, sing uwis menangake piala rong minggu kepungkur. Tarung sing keri dhewe seri iki bakal dilangsungke ana ing Taman Ellis ning Johannesburg minggu ngarep, nalika Springboks main ana ing Australia.

src: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.
mt: Stasiun ngendahake siklininge, walaupun kehilangan gyroscope ing misi stasiun angkasa, nganti akir tugas angkasa. Chiao lan Sharipov ngomong yen jarak sing aman saka thruster siklininge. Kontrol tanah Rusia aktifake jet lan siklininge normal stasiun dadi diwenehi.
ref: Stasiun iku njaga adate, sanajan sadurunge kelangan siji giroskop ing misi stasiun ruang angkasa, nganti pungkasaning lelungan ruang angkasa. Chiao lan Sharipov nglapurake jarak sing aman saka panyurung sikap sing bener. Kendhali lemah Rusia nguripake jet lan laku normal setasiyun kasebut bali.

src: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla. Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.
mt: Vidal, umur 28 taun, nggabungake Barça tiga musim pungkasan, saka Sevilla. Saka nggabungake ing ibukota Katalan, Vidal duweke main 49 pertandingan kanggo klub.
ref: Vidal sing umure 28 taun gabung karo Barça telung mangsa kapungkur, saka Sevilla. Wiwit pindhah menyang ibu kutha Catalan, Vidal wis main 49 pertandhingan kanggo tim kasebut.

ref: Jarque latihan sasuwene latihan pra-musim ing Coverciano ing Italia ing wiwitaning dina. Dheweke nginep ing hotel tim ngarepe pertandhingan sing direncanakake kanggo Minggu lawan Bolonia. Dheweke tetep ning hotel tim nyedhaki wektu sing direncanakake dina Minggu nglawan Bolonia.

src: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement. Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.
mt: Ora ana peringatan tsunami sing diumumake, lan menurut badan geofisika Jakarta, ora ana peringatan tsunami sing diumumake amarga gempa ora nganti ukuran 6.5. Walaupun ora ana ancaman tsunami, warga mulihake panik lan mulihake bisnis lan rumah.
ref: Ora ana pengeling-eling perkara tsunami sing diumumke,lan miturut badan geofisika Jakarta, ora ana pengeling-eling tsunami amarga lindhu sing kadadeyan kuwi ora nganti luwih saka 6.5 ukurane. Sanadyan ora ana ancaman tsunami, penduduk wiwit panik lan ninggalake bisnis lan omahe.

src: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else. The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.
mt: Kanggo nggawe, Bumi ngoperasike ing prinsip-prinsip sing padha karo bintang-bintang liyane: Aktivitas bintang-bintang ing sistem kuwi ditemokake dadi ditekan dening luminositas, rotasi, lan ora kawatiran. Luminositas lan rotasi digunakake saka bintang-bintang kanggo nggawe Rossby nomer, sing kaitane karo aliran plasma. Angka Rossby sing luwih cilik, bintang-bintang karo nggawe kawatiran karo reversi magnetis.
ref: Dheweke kabeh nemokake menawa srengenge mlaku nganggo prinsip dhasar sing padha kaya bintang-bintang liyane: Ditemokake menawa kagiyatan kabeh bintang-bintang ing sistem dilakokne dening sorotane, puterane, lan ora ana liyane.‘ Padhange cahya lan puteran digunakake bebarengan kanggo nemtokake nomer bintang Rossby, sing ana gandhengane karo ilen-ilen plasma. Sansaya cilik angka Rossby, sansaya kurang aktif lintang kasebut disebabke dening kuwalikan magnetik.

src: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.
mt: Kasus 1,400 wong sing dipilih sadurunge pemilu federal 2010, sing ora ngertemake Australia dadi republik tumbuh kana 8 persen saka 2008. Pimpinan sementara Julia Gillard ngklaim nalika kampanye pemilu federal 2010 yèn dhèwèke ngandhakake Australia dadi republik nalika akhiré pemerintahan Ratu Elizabeth II. 34 persen saka sing dipilih ngandhakake Australia dadi republik nalika akhiré pemerintahan Ratu Elizabeth II. Ing pérangan paling akèh saka pol, 29 persen saka sing disurvei ngandhakake Australia dadi republik saumuré, sementara 31 persen ngandhakake Australia ora dadi republik saumuré.
ref: Saka total 1.400 wong sing milih pemilu federal taun 2010, kabeh sing ora sepakat yen Australia dadi republik mundhak 8 persen wiwit 2008. Perdana Menteri sementara Julia Gillard ngakoni sasuwene kampanye pemilihan federal 2010 sing dheweke percaya Australia bakal dadi republik ing pungkasan masa pamrintahaning Ratu Elizabeth. 34 per sen sing menehi swara sesawangane ngene, kepengin Ratu Elizabeth II dadi raja sing keri dhewe ana ning Australia. Ing pungkasan seteman, 29 persen sing dipriksa percaya Australia kudu dadi republik sanalika bisa, dene 31 persen percaya Australia ora kudu dadi republik.

src: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.
mt: Leslie Aun, wakil Komen Foundation, ngomong yèn organisasi mau nggawe aturan anyar sing ora ngalangi grant utawa dana kanggo organisasi sing ana ing pemeriksaan hukum. Komen nggawe aturan sing nggawe Planned Parenthood ora bisa dianugerahi dana amarga pemeriksaan sing lagi dilakokake dening Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns nggawe pemeriksaan yèn pajak digunakake kanggo ngrasakake aborsi ing Planned Parenthood ing peran sing dadi ketua Subkomite Pengawasan lan Pemeriksaan, sing ana ing bawah payonan Komite Energi lan Perdagangan.
ref: Leslie Aun, juru wicara Yayasan Komen, ujar manawa pakumpulane nganakake aturan anyar sing ora ngidini paweweh utawa dana diwenehake menyang pakumpulan sing dititipriksa kanthi sah. Kawicaksanan Komen ndiskualifikasi Wong tua Direncana adhedhasar investigasi sing ditangguhke babagan kepiye Wong Tua Direncana ngentekake lan nglaporake dhuite sing dipimpin dening Anggota Majelis Ngisor Cliff Stearns. Stearns nyelidhiki apa pajek dienggo mbiayai aborsi liwat Keluarga Berencana ing lakone minangka ketua Subkomite Pengawasan lan, sing ana sangisore Komite Perdagangan lan Energi Omah.

src: "The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, ""We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop"". The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces."
mt: Polisi Madhya Pradesh ngrebut laptop lan telepon seluler sing dicuri. Wakil Inspektur Jenderal D K Arya ngomong, ""Kami wis ngrebut lima wong sing ngeksekusi wong wanita Swiss lan ngrebut telepon seluler lan laptop"". Warga sing dicurike kasebut diarani Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar lan Vishnu Kanjar. Wakil Inspektur Jenderal Chandra Shekhar Solanki ngomong warga sing dicurike kasebut muncul ing pengadilan karo wajah sing diubengi.
ref: Polisi Madhya Pradesh ngamanake laptop lan tilpun selular sing dicolong. Wakil Inspektur Jenderal D K Arya ngandharake, “Kita wis nyekel lima wong sing ngruda peksa wanita Swiss lan mbalekake ponsel lan laptope”. Para tersangkane jenenge Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar, lan Vishnu Kanjat. Polisi pengawas Chandra Shekhar Solanki ngujar yen wong sing didakwa kuwi mara menyang pangadilan nutupi raine.

src: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month. But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.
mt: ASUS Eee PC, sing wis diluncurake ing donya kanggo faktor-faktor pambangunan lan fungsi, dadi topik panas ing 2007 Taipei IT Month. Nanging pasar konsumen ing komputer laptop bakal beda lan diganti setelah ASUS dianugerake ing 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award dening Executive Yuan saka Republik Tiongkok.
ref: Perangkat komputer pribadi ASUS Eee, luwih gasik diluncurake ing saindeging donya kanggo pengiritan lan faktor fungsional dadi topik anget ing Wulan IT Taipei 2007. Nanging pasar konsumen komputer laptop bakal werna-werna banget lan ewah sawise ASUS dianugrahi penghargaan ing Penghargaan Berkelanjutan Taiwan 2007 dening Eksekutif Yuan saka Republik Cina.

src: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards. Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.
mt: Masalah mulai ing 1 Januari nalika puluhan warga lokal nggugah Obanazawa Post Office bawa ora dadi surat-surat tradisional lan reguler Tahun Baru sing wis dadi. Kemaren, kantor pos ngumumake penjagaan marang warga lan media sawise nggolongke yen anak laki-laki wis ngubengakake luwih saka 600 dokumen pos, kalebu 429 surat Tahun Baru, sing ora dadi marang penerima sing diharapake.
ref: Masalah iki diwiwiti tanggal 1 Januari nalika puluhan warga lokal mulai sambat menyang Kantor Pos Obanazawa bilih dheweke durung nampa kertu Taun Anyar tradisional lan sing biyasa. Wingi, kantor pos ngetokake panjalukan apurane marang warga lan media sawise nemokake menawa bocah iku wis ndhelikake punjul saka 600 dokumen pos, kalebu 429 kartu pos Warsa Anyar, sing ora dikirimake menyang penampa sing dikarepake.

src: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set. Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.
mt: Murray kalahakane set pisanan ing tie break sawise kabeh pria nggawe seteke set. Del Potro duwe awal keunggulan ing set kaping 2, nanging iki uga butuh tie break sawise nganti 6-6. Potro dadi perawatan ing pundhukane ing titik iki nanging bisa ngembaliakane main.
ref: Murray kalah ing set pisanan ing pamedhot skor seri sakwise wong lanang loro kasebut nyekel masing-masing lan saben servis ing set. Del Potro duwe miwiti kabegjan ing set kapindho, nanging iki uga butuh leren sawise nggayuh 6-6. Potro nampa perawatan kanggo pundhake saiki nanging bisa bali menyang pertandhingane.
