src: "Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically said, ""There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."" The governor also stated, ""Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."" He went on to say, ""This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."""
mt: “Dikomandhani karo para pejabat, dheweke ngasih jaminan warga Texas menawa langkah-langkah sing diselenggarake kanggo ngamankan keamanan publik. Perry khusus ngomong, ““Kanthi sing ora ana wektu ing donya sing luwih apik dadi persiapan sing diwajibake ing kasus iki.”” Gubernur uga ngomong, ““Dina wektu iki, kita ketahuan yen anak-anak sekolah wis diidentifikasi yen wis ngalami kontak karo pasien.”” Dheweke ngomong, ““Kasus iki serius. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should.””
ref: "Dikancani dening pejabat kuwi, dheweke njamin yen masarakat Texas kabeh iki dilakoni kanggo nglindhungi kaamanane warga umum. Perry kanthi tegas ngujar, “Ana panggonan sing ndonya iki sing luwih siyap kanggo tantangan sing dijokne ning kasus iki.” Gubernur uga nyatakake, ""Dina iki, kita ngerti menawa sawetara bocah umur sekolah uwis dikenali minangka uwis sesambungan karo pasien."" Dheweke banjur ngomong, “Kasus iki serius. Sampeyan yakin wae menawa sisteme dhewe mlaku seapik sing semesthine.”"

src: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.
mt: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson nggawe publikasi sing nggawe parodi ngadhepi kala iku nalika mahasiswa ing UW ing 1988. Saka awalane, The Onion wis dadi kekaisaran parodi ngadhepi sing nggawe, karo edisi cetak, situs sing nggawe 5,000,000 unik pengunjung ing bulan Oktober, iklan pribadi, jaringan ngadhepi 24 jam, podcast, lan atlas donya sing anyar Our Dumb World. Al Gore lan General Tommy Franks nggawe parodi ngadhepi kaya-kaya (Gore's was when The Onion ngadhepi iku lan Tipper wis nduwe seks sing paling apik saka urip iku sawise kamenangan pilihan umum 2000). Akèh-akèhé penulisé wis nggawe pengaruh gedhé ing Jon Stewart lan Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.
ref: Suwe sadurunge Tontonan Saben Dina lan Laporan Colbert, Heck lan Johnson wis nduweni impen siaran sing bakal nerokake berita—lan laporan berita—nalika dheweke isih dadi siswa ana UW taun 1988. Awit awale, The Onion wis dadi kerajaan parodi warta sing sakbenere, kanthi edisi cithak, situs web sing nggeret 5.000.000 pengunjung unik ing sasi Oktober, iklan kusus, jaringan warta 24 jam, podcast, lan lagi wae nerbitake atlas donya sing diarani Donya Bodhone Dhewe. Al Gore lan Jenderal Tommy Franks kanthi kalem ngujarke judul kasenengane (Gore kuwi nalika The Onion nglaporke dheweke lan Tipper bebarengan sabubare kalah Pemilu Kampus 2000). Akeh penulis-penulise kang banjur menehi pengaruh gedhe ana acara parodi warta Jon Stewart lan Stephen Colbert.

src: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.
mt: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson nggawe publikasi sing nggawe parodi ngadhepi kala iku nalika mahasiswa ing UW ing 1988. Saka awalane, The Onion wis dadi kekaisaran parodi ngadhepi sing nggawe, karo edisi cetak, situs sing nggawe 5,000,000 unik pengunjung ing bulan Oktober, iklan pribadi, jaringan ngadhepi 24 jam, podcast, lan atlas donya sing anyar Our Dumb World. Al Gore lan General Tommy Franks nggawe parodi ngadhepi kaya-kaya (Gore's was when The Onion ngadhepi iku lan Tipper wis nduwe seks sing paling apik saka urip iku sawise kamenangan pilihan umum 2000). Akèh-akèhé penulisé wis nggawe pengaruh gedhé ing Jon Stewart lan Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.
ref: Suwe sadurunge Tontonan Saben Dina lan Laporan Colbert, Heck lan Johnson wis nduweni impen siaran sing bakal nerokake berita—lan laporan berita—nalika dheweke isih dadi siswa ana UW taun 1988. Awit awale, The Onion wis dadi kerajaan parodi warta sing sakbenere, kanthi edisi cithak, situs web sing nggeret 5.000.000 pengunjung unik ing sasi Oktober, iklan kusus, jaringan warta 24 jam, podcast, lan lagi wae nerbitake atlas donya sing diarani Donya Bodhone Dhewe. Al Gore lan Jenderal Tommy Franks kanthi kalem ngujarke judul kasenengane (Gore kuwi nalika The Onion nglaporke dheweke lan Tipper bebarengan sabubare kalah Pemilu Kampus 2000). Akeh penulis-penulise kang banjur menehi pengaruh gedhe ana acara parodi warta Jon Stewart lan Stephen Colbert.

src: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence. Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall. At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up. Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.

ref: Protes kasebut diwiwiti udakara jam 11.00 wektu lokal (UTC+1) ing Whitehall sebrang penjagaan polisi mlebu menyang Dalan Downing, papan manggon resmi Perdana Menteri. Sawise jam 11.00, para demonstran ngalangi lalu lintas ing gerbong sing nuju sisih lor ing Whitehall. Ing 11.20, polisi njaluk protestan supaya mundur menyang trotoar, ngomong yen polisi kudu ngimbangi hak kanggo protes lan lalu lintas sing numpuk. Sekitaran jam 11.29, wong sing protes mlaku menyang Whitehall, ngliwati Alun-alun Trafalgar, sadawane Strand, ngliwati Aldwych lan menyang Kingsway nuju Holborn nalika Partai Konservatif nduweni Forum Mangsa Semi ana ing hotel Kamar Grand Connaught.

src: """We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic,"" he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes."
mt: “Saka sekarang, kucing-kucing sing umur 4 bulan sing ora diabetes sing dulu diabetes,” ujare. Dr. Ehud Ur, profesor kedokteran ing Dalhousie University ing Halifax, Nova Scotia lan ketua divisi klinis lan ilmiah saka Asosiasi Diabetes Kanada ngomong menawa penelitian iki masih ing awal-awal. Kaya karo para ahli liyane, dheweke skeptis ngenani apakah diabetes bisa diobati, nglaporke menawa temuan iki ora duwe relevansi marang wong sing wis duwe diabetes Tipe 1.
ref: """Saiki kita nduweni tikus umur-4-sasi sing ora-nduweni-diabetes sing sadurunge nduweni diabetes, ujare. "" Dr. Ehud Ur, profesor ilmu kedokteran ing Universitas Dalhousie ing Halifax, Nova Scotia lan ketua divisi klinis lan ilmiah saka Asosiasi Diabetes Kanada ngengetake menawa panaliten iku isih ing tahap wiwitan. Kaya sawetara ahli liyane, dheweke ora yakin apa diabetes bisa ditambani, nimbang yen panemuan kasebut ora duwe hubungane karo uwong sing uwis ngalami diabetes Jinis 1."

src: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already. About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared. The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors. The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.
mt: Twin Otter wis ngobati nggabungake ing Kokoda kemaren minangka Airlines PNG Penerbangan CG4684, nanging wis diwatesi sekali. ref: Kembar Otter wis njajal ndharat ing Kokoda wingi nalika Maskapai Penerbangan PNG CG4684, nanging wis batal sepisan. Kurang luwih sepuluh menit sadurunge ndharat saka percobaan medhun kapindo pesawate banjur ilang. Panggonan tabrakan kuwi ditemokake dina iki lan ora bisa ditekani mula ana polisi loro diudhunake ning alas supaya munggah menyang panggonan kadadeyan kuwi lan nggoleki uwong sing isih urip. Panlusuran kasebut diadhang dening kahanan langit sing padha sing nyebabake montor mabur wurung ndharat.

src: """Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out. People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable. One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window,"" said survivor Franciszek Kowal."
mt: “Sangat beruntung, ora kena apa-apa, nanging saya lihat adegan mengerikan, sawise wong-wong ngelakoni upaya kanggo ngebuk jendhela supaya bisa keluar. Warga nggoleki jendhela karo kursi, nanging jendhela ora bisa dibobok. Salah siji jendhela akirne bisa dibobok, lan wong-wong mulane bisa keluar saka jendhela,” ujar korban Franciszek Kowal.
ref: """Untunge ora ana sing kedadean marang aku"" Wong-wong kuwi mecahi kaca cendhela nganggo kursi, nanging kacane ora pecah. Salah sawijining kaca cendhela pungkasane rusak, lan dheweke wiwit metu liwat cendhela,"" ujare Franciszek Kowal sing slamet."

src: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday. As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.
mt: Angin tropis Danielle, angin tropis kaping papat saka musim angin tropis Atlantik 2010, wis ngilang ing Samodra Atlantik wétan. Angin sing ana ing watara 3,000 mil ing sisih wétan Miami, Florida, duwé angin angin paling dhuwur 40 mph (64 kph). ref: Badai Tropis Danielle, badai kepapat sing dijenengi saka mangsa topan Atlantik 2010, wis kebentuk ing sisih wetan Samudra Atlantik. Badai kasebut, panggonane kira-kira 3.000 mil saka Miami, Florida duwe angin maksimal sing terus-terusan ing 40 mpj (64 kpj). Para Ilmuwan ing Pusat Topan Nasional prédhiksi menawa Danielle bakal nguwatake angin topan nalika dina Rebo. Amarga lesus iki adoh saka panggonan mandheg iki, isih angel kanggo nengeri dampak potensial kanggo Amerika Serikat utawa Karibia.

src: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill. Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted. There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.
mt: Dr. Lee uga ngomongake pangangunane ngenani laporan sing ngandharake anak-anak ing Turki saiki wis terjangkit virus influenza A(H5N1) sing ora ngilangake tanpa ngilangake. Ana studi sing ngandharake yèn penyakit kudu kurang fatal sadurunge bisa nyebabake epidemik global, dheweke ngamati. Ana pangangunane yèn pasien bisa terus ngilangake wong liyane kanthi nggolongake rutin dina sadurunge flu ngilangake ngilangake.
ref: Dr. Lee uga ngungkapake kaprihatinane babagan lapuran menawa bocah-bocah ing Turki saiki kena infeksi virus flu burung A(H5N1) tanpa dadi lara. Sawetara panaliten ngusulake menawa penyakit iku kudu dadi kurang mematikan sadurunge iku bisa nyebabake wabah global, cathete dheweke. Ana rasa sumelang menawa para pasien mbokmenawa terus nginfeksi wong luwih akeh kanthi nindakake rutinitas padinane yen gejala flune tetep entheng.

src: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian. The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.
mt: Ing malam tanggal 9 Agustus, mata Morakot kira-kira 70 km saka provinsi Cina Fujian. Typhoon iki diestimasi ngelakoni arah Cina kira-kira 11 kph.
ref: Nalika wengi tanggal 9 Agustus, matane Morakot adohe kira-kira pitung puluh kilometer saka propinsi Fujian China. Topane diduga pindhah menyang China ing sewelas kph.

src: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.
mt: Presiden Amerika Serikat George W. Bush tiba ing Singapura dina wengi tanggal 16 November, ngawali tur Asia saben wulan. Dheweke ditekani dening Wakil Perdana Menteri Wong Kan Seng lan nglakokake diskusi perdagangan lan masalah terorisme karo Perdana Menteri Lee Hsien Loong. Sawise wengi-wengi kekalahan ing pemilu tengah, Bush nglakokake diskusi karo wong-wong ngenani ekspansi perdagangan ing Asia.
ref: Presiden Amerika George W. Bush tekan ing Singapura 16 November esuk, miwiti tur seminggu ing Asia. Dheweke disambut dening Wakil Perdana Menteri Won Kan Seng lan ngrembug perkara dedagangan lan terorisme karo Perdana Menteri Singapura Lee Hsien Loong. Sawise seminggu kalah ing pamilihan jangka samadya, Bush ngandhani pamirsa babagan megarake dedagangan ing Asia.

src: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.
mt: Kampanye iki uga nambah komitmen pamarintahan sing diwetokake ing Maret taun iki kanggo ngasih tambahan gerbong. Gerbong tambahan 300 nggawe total 1,300 gerbong sing diakuisisi kanggo ngilangake kepadatan.
ref: Pengumuman dina iki uga ndawakne komitmen pemerintah sing digawe sasi Maret taun iki kanggo mbayari gerbong tambahan. Tambahan 300 ndadekake jumlah 1,300 gerbong kanggo nyuda suk-sukan.

src: "She said, ""There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently. However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."""
mt: “Ia ngomong, ““Ana ora intelijen kanggo ngomong yen serangan sing diharapake ora diwatesi. Nanging, reduksi tingkat ancaman dadi serius ora ngandhut yen ancaman umumane wis lewih.”
ref: Dheweke ngomong, “Ora ana intelejen sing nuduhake menawa serangan bakal diarepake ing wektu cedhak. Nanging, pengurangan tingkat ancaman menyang parah dudu ateges kabeh ancaman wis ilang.”

src: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.
mt: Martelly ngadhepi CEP siji saka sembilan anggota kemarin. Iki menawa Martelly CEP kaping limo ing telung taun. Bulan kaping pindho, komisi presiden ngomongke resignasi CEP sadurunge, minangka bagian saka paket ukum kanggo nggerakake negara menawa nglakokake pesta rakyat. Komisi iku Martelly siji jawaban marang protes anti-regime sing kadang-kadang kekerasan sing diwiwiti ing Oktober. Protese kadang-kadang kekerasan iku diwiwiti amarga gagal nglakokake pesta rakyat, siji saka sembilan saka 2011.
ref: Martelly menehi sumpah ing Dewan Pemilihan Sementara (CEP) anyar sing anggotane sanga kala wingi. Iki CEP kelimane Martelly ing patang taun. Sasi wingi komisi presidensial nyaranake pengunduran diri CEP sakdurunge minangka bagean saka paket tumindakan kanggo nyedhakake negara menyang pemilihan sing anyar. Kumisi kasebut minangka wangsulan Martelly babagan protes anti-rezim sing nyebar sing diwiwiti wulan Oktober. Protes sing kala-kala kasar dipicu dening kegagalan kanggo nganakake pemilihan, sawetara jatuh tempo awit 2011.

src: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.
mt: USA Gymnastics ngeyuda ngenalake surat saka Komite Olimpiade Amerika lan ngakoni yen yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yenakeh yen
ref: Senam AS. nyengkuyung surat Komite Olimpiade Amerika Serikat lan nampa kebutuhan mutlak saka keluarga Olimpiade kanggo promosi sawijining lingkungan kang aman kita kabeh atlet. Kita mathuk karo katrangan USOC yen kapentingan para atlit lan klub, lan olahraga, bisa uga luwih apik disedhiyakake kanthi maju kanthi owah-owahan sing migunani ing organisasi, tinimbang ora disertifikasi. Senam Amerika nyengkuyung pamariksan independen sing mungkin nyoroti marang kepiye penyalahgunaan proporsi sing diandharake kanthi kendel banget dening para penyintas Larry Nassar bisa ora konangan sasuwene iki lan ngrangkul saben ewah-ewahan sing dibutuhake lan gayut. Olahraga senam Amerika lan USOC duwe tujuan sing padha — nggawe olahraga senam, lan liyane, seaman-amane kanggo atlit sing ngoyak mimpine ing lingkungan sing aman, positip lan menehi kakuwatan.

src: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."
mt: “Angkatan Laut AS uga ngomongake menawa iku diwaca. Uga ngomongake ing pernyataan, “Kru saiki bekerja kanggo nggawe metode paling apik kanggo aman ngeluarake kapal”. Kapal kelas Avenger countermeasures mine, kapal iku ing ngendi menyang Puerto Princesa ing Palawan. ref: Angkatan Laut Amerika Serikat uga kandha dheweke padha nembe mriksa kedadean iku. Kapal panyegah ranjau kelas Avenger, kapal kasebut lagi ing tengah dalan menyang Puerto Princesa ing Palawan. src: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.
mt: Ing akir Senin, Presiden Amerika Serikat Donald Trump, ing pernyataan sing disampaake dening sekretaris pers, ngumumake tentang tentara AS sing bakal meninggalkan Suriah. Umumane ngumumake sawise Trump duwe telepon karo Presiden Turki Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turki uga bakal nglakokake pemeliharaan tahanan ISIS sing, pernyataan sing diwaca, negara-negara Eropa wis ngendahake.
ref: Minggu wengi, Presiden AS Donald Trump, ing katrangan sing dikirim liwat sekretaris wartawan, ngumumake bala AS bakal ninggalake Suriah. Wara-wara kasebut digawe sawise Trump ngobrol liwat tilpun karo Presiden Turki Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turki uga bakal ngurus dhewe pangawalan petarung ISIS sing dijupuk, lapuran kasebut ujar, negara-negara Eropa ora gelem mbalekake.

src: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire. Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.
mt: Korps koalisi lan Afghanistan ngelakoni wilayah iki kanggo nyegah situs lan pesawat koalisi liyane wis diwatesi kanggo nggayuh. Kecelakaan kasebut ana ing dhuwur ing gunung-gunung, lan dianggep minangka hasil tembakan musuh. Upaya kanggo ngegawe pencarian situs kecelakaan kasebut dihadapi dening cuaca sing apik lan gunung-gunung sing apik.
ref: Koalisi lan prajurit Afghanistan ngalih menyang daerah kanggo ngamanke panggonan kuwi lan montor mabur koalisi liyane wis dikirim kanggo nulungi. Tabrakan kasebut kadadeyan ana ing daerah gunung, lan dipercaya disebabke dening geni sing gedhe banget. Upaya kanggo nggoleki lokasi kacilakan iku ditemokake kanthi cuaca elek lan lapangan gundhul.

src: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.
mt: Sawise dam wis dibangun ing 1963, banjir musim semi sing bakal ngaburake sedimen ing sambungan kali dihentike. Sedimen iki diperlukan kanggo ngrusak sandbar lan pasir, sing nglakoni habitat hewan. Sababé, loro spesies iwak wis pupus, lan loro liyane wis ngancam, kalebu iwak chub. Walaupun tingkat banyu bakal mung nambah 
ref: Sawise bendungan dibangun ing taun 1963, banjir usuman sing bakal nyebar endhepan ing saindenging kali bakal mandheg. Iki endhepan dibutuhake kanggo nggawe gumuk pasir lan pasisir, sing dadi panggon asli kewan. Asile, loro spesies iwak dadi punah, lan loro liyane dadi arang, kalebu iwak chub bungkuk. Sanajan dhuwuring banyu mung bakal munggah pirang sikil sawise banjir, para pejabat ngajab iku bakal cukup kanggo mbalikake gundhukan pasir sing kakikis menyang hilir.

src: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.
mt: Sawise dam wis dibangun ing 1963, banjir musim semi sing bakal ngaburake sedimen ing sambungan kali dihentike. Sedimen iki diperlukan kanggo ngrusak sandbar lan pasir, sing nglakoni habitat hewan. Sababé, loro spesies iwak wis pupus, lan loro liyane wis ngancam, kalebu iwak chub. Walaupun tingkat banyu bakal mung nambah 
ref: Sawise bendungan dibangun ing taun 1963, banjir usuman sing bakal nyebar endhepan ing saindenging kali bakal mandheg. Iki endhepan dibutuhake kanggo nggawe gumuk pasir lan pasisir, sing dadi panggon asli kewan. Asile, loro spesies iwak dadi punah, lan loro liyane dadi arang, kalebu iwak chub bungkuk. Sanajan dhuwuring banyu mung bakal munggah pirang sikil sawise banjir, para pejabat ngajab iku bakal cukup kanggo mbalikake gundhukan pasir sing kakikis menyang hilir.

src: "The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that ""extremists from Somalia"" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up ""prominent landmarks"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."
mt: Konsulat Amerika Serikat sing ana ing Nairobi, Kenya ngumumake yèn ""ekstremis saka Somalia"" ngreksa nglakokake bom bunuh diri ing Kenya lan Ethiopia. Amerika Serikat ngomong yèn dheweke nampa informasi saka sumber sing ora disebut yèn khusus ngomong ngenani penggunaan bom bunuh diri kanggo bakal meledakake ""prominent landmarks"" ing Ethiopia lan Kenya."
ref: Kedutaan Amerika Serikat ing Nairobi, Kenya wis ngetokaki peringatan menawa “ekstrimis saka Somalia” duwe rencana kanggo ngluncurake serangan bom bunuh diri ing Kenya lan Ethiopia. Amerika Serikat ngandharake yen pihake wis nampa informasi saka sumber rahasya sing kanthi mligi nyebutake panganggone pelaku bom bunuh dhiri kanggo njeblukake “prastawa nyolok mata” ing Ethiopia lan Kenya.

src: "The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption. As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years. A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show ""Zoungla"" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour."
mt: "Pakar hukum Yunani sing terkenal, Sakis Kechagioglou lan George Nikolakopoulos wis dienggo ing penjara Korydallus ing Athena, sawise dianggep bersalah ing korupsi lan korupsi. Sebagai hasil saka iki, skandal gedhe ing komunitas hukum Yunani wis dianggep sawise eksposur tindakan ilegal sing dilakokake dening hakim, pakar hukum, pengacara lan pengacara ing taun-taun sadurunge iki. Bebarengan karo informasi sing diterbitake dening jurnalis Makis Triantafylopoulos ing acara televisi populer ""Zoungla"" ing Alpha TV, anggota Parlemen lan pengacara, Petros Mantouvalos diabdikake minangka anggota kantorne sing wis terlibat ing korupsi lan korupsi ilegal. Nanging, hakim paling dhuwur Evangelos Kalousis dienggo sawise dianggep bersalah ing korupsi lan perilaku degeneratif."
ref: Pangacara Yunani sing misuwur, Sakis Kechagioglou lan George Nikolakopoulos wis diukum ning penjara Athena Korydallus, amarga ditetepke salah gara-gara korupsi. Minangka akibat saka iki, skandal gedhe ing sajroning komunitas hukum Yunani wis diangkat kanthi pembongkaran tumindak ilegal sing wis ditindakake dening hakim, pengacara, pengacara agung, lan pengacara sasuwene pirang-pirang taun sadurunge. Pirang minggu kepungkur, sawise informasi diterbitake dening Makis Triantafylopoulos ing pagelaran Televisine sing kawentar “Zoungla” ing TV Alpha, anggota Parlemen lan pengacara, Petros Mantouvalos dilengserake nalika anggota kantore melu nyogok lan korupsi ilegal. Apa maneh, hakim sing paling dhuwur Evangelous Kalousis diukum amarga dheweke dianggep salah gara-gara korupsi lan tumindak sing saya ala.

src: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership. But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.
mt: Robin Uthappa nggawe skor paling dhuwur, 70 run ning 41 bola nganti 11 empat lan 2 geni. Batsman tengah, Sachin Tendulkar lan Rahul Dravid, ngerusak dhasar 100 run. Nanging, sawise kalah wakil kapten, India mung nggawe 36 run nggoleki 7 wicket kanggo nggawe akhir permainan.
ref: Robin Uthappa gawe skor paling dhuwur ing babak, 70 mlayu namung sajroning 41 bal kanthi nuthuk 11 mapat lan 2 neneman. Batsmen urutan tengah, Sachin Tendulkar lan Rahul Dravid, tampil kanthi apik banget lan gawe mitra mlayu-atusan. Nanging, sakwise kalah kapten India mung nggawe 36 playon kalah 7 gawang ing sapungkasane babak.

src: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. ""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."" The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."
mt: "Administrator Commons Adam Cuerden ngomongake frustrasine dhewe nalika dheweke ngobrol karo Wikinews bulan iki. ""Olehane dhewe [Wales] nggawangake kita saka awal. src: "Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks. 2004 Olympic silver medallist Amir Khan said, ""Deep down I think women shouldn’t fight. That’s my opinion."" Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London."
mt: “Ora kabeh sing nyebutake pungkasan ingklusi rong wong. Medali perak Olimpiade 2004 Amir Khan ngomong, “Dalam hatiku aku ketahuan wong ora kudu nglawan. Opini kuwe.” Nanging dheweke ngomong dheweke bakal nglayani kompetitor Britania ing Olimpiade 2012 sing diadakan ing London.”
ref: "Ora kabeh gelem ndhukung urutan wanita sing dicantumke kuwi. Sing oleh medhali perak Olimpiade 2004, Amir Khan ujar, ""Saka jero ati aku mikir wanita ora entuk tarung. Iku miturutku."" Sanadyan pernyataane dheweke ngomong bakal ndukung kompetitor Inggris ing Olimpiade 2012 sing dianakake ing London."

src: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was unhurt in the accident.
mt: Peter Lenz, seorang pembalap sepeda motor berusia 13 tahun, telah meninggal dunia setelah terlibat dalam kecelakaan di Indianapolis Motor Speedway. Sementara di lap panasnya, Lenz jatuh dari sepeda motornya, dan kemudian terkena Xavier Zayat. Dia segera ditangani oleh staf medis di trek dan diangkut ke rumah sakit lokal di mana kemudian dia meninggal. Zayat tidak terluka dalam kecelakaan.
ref: Peter Lenz, pembalap montor umur 13 taun, tiwas sawise ngalami kacilakan ing Glanggang Balapan Motor Indianapolis. Nalika ana ing puteran pamanasane, Lenz ambruk saka sepedhahe, lan banjur ditabrak dening kanca pembalap Xavier Zayat. Dheweke enggal dirawat dening staf medis ing dalan lan diangkut menyang sawijining griya sakit daerah ing ngendi dheweke banjur mati. Zayat ora gene-gene sabubare kacilakan kuwi.

src: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have. For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.
mt: Ngelmuke karo pesawat bisa jadi pengalaman sing apik kanggo wong saka segala umur lan latar belakang, khusus ingkang ora ngalami sebelumipun utawa ingkang ngalami kejadian traumatis. Iki ora kudu dipamerke: iku ora bedha saka kekhawatiran pribadi lan keengganan liyane sing duwe wong-wong sing akèh. Ingkang siji, ngerti sesawat ngenani apa sing terjadi ing pesawat lan apa sing terjadi ing penerbangan bisa ngilangake kekhawatiran sing kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang kasebut ingkang k
ref: Lelungan nganggo pesawat bisa dadi pengalaman sing medeni kanggo wong saka macem-macem umur lan asal usul, kususe menawa dheweke ora pernah mabur utawa nduwe pengalaman sing marakake trauma. Ora usah isin: iki ora ana bedane karo rasa wedi lan rasa ora seneng pribadhi marang perkara liya sing dinduweni dening wong akeh. Kanggo sawetara, pangerten sawijining bab ngenani kepiye cara kerjane pesawat lan apa sing kedadean sasuwene penerbangan mungkin nulungi nguasani rasa wedi sing adhedhasar sing ora dingerteni utawa ora terkendhali.

src: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.
mt: Saiki panerbangan udara ora kerepane dibukake langsung saka penerbangan tanpa sadurunge nemu lan nggabungake harga. Kadang-kadang penerbangan sing padha bisa duwe harga sing beda-beda ing agregator lan kudu dibandingake hasil pencarian lan uga ngliwati situs penerbangan dhewe sadurunge dibukake.
ref: Saiki perjalanan udara jarang dipesen langsung liwat maskapai tanpa pencarian pisanan lan rega pembanding. Kadhangkala panerbangan sing padha bisa duwe rega beda ing macem-macem pangumpul lan mbayar kanggo mbandhingake asil telusuran lan uga ndeleng situs web maskape sadurunge menehi pesenan.

src: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair. On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem. If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs. The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.
mt: Perusahaan kurir dianakake kanggo nglayani barang kanthi cepet. Kadang-kadang, wektu sing penting karo dokumen bisnis, barang dagang utawa bagian pambangunan sing urgen. Ing rute-rute sing luwih gedhe, perusahaan gedhe duwe pesawat sing khusus kanggo nglayani barang, nanging ing rute-rute sing luwih cilik lan perusahaan sing luwih cilik ana masalah. Jika barang dikirimake kanthi udara, ing rute-rute sing luwih gedhe, mung bisa dadi dina-dina kanggo nggoleki lan bea cukai. Cara sing paling cepet kanggo nggoleki iku yaiku nglayani barang minangka barang cek. Regulasi penerbangan ora ngijabutake supaya barang dikirimake tanpa penumpang, sing mung bisa dadi yaiku kudu nggunakake.
ref: Pakaryan pangeter dibayar kanthi bener kanggo ngirim barang kanthi cepet. Asring, wektu penting banget karo dokumen pagweyan, barang dagangan, utawa onderdil kanggo ndandani kanthi ndhesek. Ana sawetara jalur, kantor sing luwih gedhe nduweni montor mabure dhewe, nanging kanggo jalur liyane lan kantor sing luwih cilik nduweni perkara. Yen piranti kuwi dikirim nggunakake angkutan udara, ana jalur-jalur sing bakal mbutuhake wektu sing lumayan suwe ana bageyan bongkar muat lan cukai. Carane supaya cepet kanggo ngliwati iki yaiku kanthi dikirimke dadi bagasi sing didaptarke. Aturan bandara ora bakal ngidini sampeyan ngirimkr bagasi tanpa wong sing uga numpak montor mabur.

src: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.
mt: Kamu kudu pilih bandhara penerbanganmu ing aliansi karo cara sing apik. Walaupun kamu bisa ngira-ngira yen itu sing nggampang, kamu kudu sadar yen hak-hak sing disediakake ora mung beda, tetepi poin penerbangan sing sering bisa luwih leluasa ing bandhara sing beda ing aliansi sing padha.
ref: Sampeyan kudu milih maskape Frequent Flyer sampeyan ing aliansi kanthi ati-ati. Sanajan sampeyan isa uga mikir iku adhedhasar intuisi kanggo gabung maskapai sing paling kerep sampeyan mabur, sampeyan kudune sadar menawa hak-hak istimewa sing ditawakake kerep beda lan frekuensi poin pilot isa uga luwih akeh ing sangisore maskapai sing beda ing perserikatan sing pada.

src: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.
mt: Minum minuman beralkohol kanthi moderasi. Alkohol ngaruhake kabeh, lan ngerti batas kawula dadi penting banget. Kejadian kesehatan jangka panjang saka 
ref: Aja ngombe alkohol kanthi jumlah sing akeh. Alkohol nduweni pengaruh sing beda-beda kanggo manungsa, lan mangerteni watesanmu kuwi penting banget. Kedadean kasarasan jangka panjang sing mungkin saka ngombe kakean bisa kalebu kerusakan ati lan senajan wuta lan mati. Potensi bebayane mundhak nalika nganggo produk alkohol ilegal. Alkohol kesit bisa ngemot macem-macem regedan sing mbebayani kalebu métanol, sing bisa nyebabake buta utawa pati sanajan dosis cilik.

src: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.
mt: Kawasan Canal District (Basa Walanda: Grachtengordel) yaiku kawasan terkenal sing nggawe 17th-century sing nggawe kawasan Binnenstad saka Amsterdam. Kabeh kawasan iki dianggep minangka Situs Warisan Donya UNESCO amarga nilai budaya lan sejarah unik, lan nilai properti ing antarané saka nagara.
ref: Kabupaten Kanal (Basa Belanda: Grachtengordel) kuwi kabupaten sing misuwur banget nalika abad pitulas diubengi dening Binnenstad Amsterdam. Sak wilayah didadekake minangka Situs Warisan Donya UNESCO amarga ajine saka budhaya lan sejarah sing unik, lan rega propertine kalebu antarane sing paling dhuwur ing negarane.

src: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake. The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.
mt: Phnom Krom, 12 km kidul-kulon saka Siem Reap. Tembok dhuwur iki dibangun ing pungkasan abad kaping 9, nalika jaman Raja Yasovarman. Atmosfer mencekam saka tembok lan pandang saka Tonle Sap lake nggawe perjalanan menyang bukit iki patut. Kunjungan menyang situs iki bisa diintegrasike karo perjalanan nganggo perahu menyang Tonle Sap. Angkor Pass diperlukan kanggo masuk menyang tembok iki, jagan lupa ngembarkekan paspormu nalika ngelakoni perjalanan menyang Tonle Sap.
ref: Phnom Krom, 12 km kidul kulon Siem Reap. Candi puncak bukit iki dibangun ing pungkasan abad kaping 9, nalika pamarentahan Raja Yasovarman. Swasana kang peteng saka candhi lan pemandangan menyang wadhuk Tonle Sap agawe munggah bukite sepadan. Kesah menyang panggonan kuwi bisa dicampur kanthi gampang nggunakake prau menyang tlaga. Kertu Liwat Angkor kuwi dibutuhke kanggo mlebu menyang candhi mula aja lali nggawa kertu paspormu yennuju menyang Tonle Sap.

src: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice. Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.
mt: Antartika yaiku tempat sing paling adhem ing bumi, lan ngubungake Kutub Kidul. Kunjungan wisata wong-wong bisa mahal, nggemu fisik, bisa nganti sasi Nov-Feb, lan ora bisa luwih saka Penjuru, Pulau-pulau lan Laut Ross. Pasukan saka 2.000 wong sing urip ing sasi musim semi ing saben-saben empat puluh basis sing umume ing area-area mau; angka kecil sing urip ing sasi musim dingin. Antartika ngubungake Kutub Kidul yaiku dataran sing adhem sing dhuwur 2-3 km. Nalika kadang-kadang wisata udara spesialis ngubungake dataran mau, kanggo pendakian gunung utawa kanggo ngubungake Kutub Kidul, sing duwe basis gedhe.
ref: Antartika minangka papan sing paling adhem ing Bumi, lan ngubengi Kutub Kidul. Layatan turis iku larang, sing butuh kasarasan, mung bisa ditindakake ing wulan Nopémber-Februari, lan angsring diwatesi ing Semenanjung, Kapulaoan lan Segara Ross. Pirang-pirang ewu staf urip ing kene ing mangsa panas ing watara patang lusin pangkalan sing paling akeh ing wewengkon kana; sagunggung cilik nginep sasuwene mangsa adhem. Punjere Antartika kuwi palemahan sing katutup dening es sing ambane 2-3 km. Wisata udhara ahli kala-kala mlebu kampung, munggah gunung utawa tekan kutub, sing nduwe pangkalan gedhe.

src: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education. As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.
mt: Observatorium pre-modern umume obsolek saiki, lan tetep dadi museum, utawa situs pendidikan. Saumuré cahya polusi ing wektu iki ora kaya masalahé saiki, kudu lokasi ing kutha utawa ing kampus, sing luwih gampang dicapai tinimbang sing dibangun ing wektu modhern. Teleskop penelitian modhern paling akèh yaiku fasilitas gedhé ing wewengkon sing luwih apik kondisi atmosfer.
ref: Observatorium pra-modheren biyasane kuna saiki, lan tetep dadi musium, utawa situs panggulawenthah. Amarga polusi ringan ing mangsa jayane dheweke padha iku udu jenis perkara kaya saiki iki, dhewehe padha biasane ana ing kutha utawa kampus, luwih gampang digayuh tinimbang bangunan-bangunan ing jaman modern iku. Asil penliten sing paling anyar saka teleskop yaiku kalonggaran sing gedhe banget ana ning daerah sing adoh saka kutha kanthi kahanan hawa sing nyenengke.

src: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.
mt: Beach-beach akèh, amarga Auckland ngegabungaké telu teluk. Beach-beach paling populer ing telu wilayah. Beach-beach ing North Shore (ing North Harbour district) ing Samodra Pasifik lan ngegabungaké Long Bay ing lor tekan Devonport ing kidul. Beach-beach kasebut akèh sing dadi beach-beach pasir sing aman kanggo ngejuk, lan akèh sing dadi sing nduwèni tedhakane sing diwènèhaké déning pohutukawa. Beach-beach Tamaki Drive ing Teluk Waitemata, ing kutha-kutha mewah Mission Bay lan St Heliers ing Central Auckland. Beach-beach kasebut akèh sing dadi beach-beach kanggo keluarga sing aman lan akèh sing dadi sing nduwèni toko-toko sing ngegabungaké pinggiré. Ngejuk aman.
ref: Ana akeh pasisir, amarga Auckland duwe loro pelabuhan. Sing paling populer yaiku ing telung dhaerah. Pantai Shore Lor (ing daefrah Harbour Lor) ana ing Samodra Pasifik lan wiwit saka Long Bay ing sisih lor nganti Devonport ing sisih kidul. Iku meh kabeh pasisir pasir kanthi aman kanggo nglangi, lan umume eyub sing diwenehake dening wit pohutukawa. Pasisir ing Tamaki Drive ana ing Pelabuhan Waitemata, pinggiran kutha mewah Mission Bay lan St Heliers ing Auckland. Iki minangka pasisir kulawarga sing asring sesak karo akeh toko sing jejer-jejer ing pasisir. Nglangi kanthi aman.

src: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike. Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.
mt: Harap kalian ingat yèn kalian nggawe kunjungan ing situs makam masal, sarta situs sing duwe arti sing akeh kanggo sawetara bagian saka populasi donya. Ana tetep akèh wong lan wong kang urip sing ngalami wektu iki, lan akèh kang duwé wong sing kagolong utawa kerja nganti mati ing situs iki, Yahudi lan non-Yahudi. Tugas kalian ya iku ngatur situs karo saka saka kehormatan, keseriusan lan hormat sing duwé. Jangan ngomong omongan babagan Holocaust utawa Nazi. Jangan nggawe situs kudu karo nggawe tanda-tanda utawa nggolek grafiti ing struktur.
ref: Tulung dieling-eling sampeyan biyasane ngunjungi panggon kuburan umum, uga panggon sing nduweni teges meh ora kaetung kanggo umume dedunung donya. Isih akeh wong lanang lan wanita sing isih urip ing kene, lan akeh liyane sing seneng karo wong sing dipateni utawa nyambut gawe nganti mati ning kana, mbuh iku Yahudi utawa uga dudu wong Yahudi. Mangga nganggep situs iki kanthi sakabehe martabat, khidmat lan ngurmati sing patut kanggone. Aja guyon babagan Holocaust utawa Nazi. Ojo mbusak panggonan iki kanthi nandhani utawa gawe grafiti marang bangunan.

src: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.
mt: Jawaan saka basa bantu iku basa sing diasilake kanthi tujuan nggawe komunikasi antarane wong-wong sing liyane nggawa kesulitan komunikasi. Iki saka basa-basa lingua franca, sing iku basa alamiah utawa organik sing dadi dominan kanggo siji alasan utawa liyane minangka sarana komunikasi antarane wong-wong sing nggawa basa liyane.
ref: Basa sing mbiyantu yaiku basa gawean utawa basa sing digawe kanthi tujuan nggampangake komunikasi ing antarane wong-wong sing bakal angel komunikasi. Dheweke padha iku pisah saka basa pergaulan sing minangka basa alami utawa organik sing dadi dominan amarga siji alasan utawa liyane minangka sarana komunikasi antarane penutur basa liyane.

src: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).
mt: Jika melintasi Laut Baltik Lor ing musim dingin, cek lokasi kabin, karena melewati es menyebabkan suara yang sangat mengerikan bagi mereka yang paling terpengaruh. Kruis ke Saint Petersburg termasuk waktu di kota. Penumpang kruis bebas dari persyaratan visa (cek syarat-syaratnya).
ref: Yen nyebrang Baltik Sisih Lor nalika mangsa udan, priksanen panggonan kabin, amarga yen ngliwati es nyebabke swara sing ora nyenengke kanggo panggonan sing kena. Pelayaran Saint Petersburg kalebu wayah ing kutha. Penumpang kapal dibebasake saka syarat visa (priksa syarat lan kahanan).

src: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
mt: Barcelona resmi nggunakake basa Catalan lan Spanyol. Nalika kira-kira setengah wong nggunakake Catalan, akeh wong ngerti, lan hampir kabeh wong ngerti Spanyol. Nanging, tanda-tanda sing paling akbar diberi ing Catalan amarga Catalan didefinisake minangka basa resmi. Nanging, Spanyol uga digunakake ing transportasi publik lan fasilitas liyane. Pengumuman reguler ing Metro diberi minangka Catalan, nanging gangguan sing ora terencana diberi dening sistem otomatis ing sawetara basa, kalebu Spanyol, Inggris, Prancis, Arab lan Jepang.
ref: Basa resmi Barcelona yaiku Katalan lan Spanyol. Udakara setengah luwih seneng ngomong Katalan, Umume padha ngerti, lan meh kabeh wong ngerti basa Spanyol. Nanging, akeh tandha kang dituduhake mung ing basa Catalan amarga iki ditetepake dening ukum minangka basa resmi sing utama. Nanging, basa Spanyol uga akeh digunakake ing transportasi umum lan fasilitas liyane. Pengumuman sing kaya biyasane ana ning Metro mung digawe ning Catalan, nanging gangguan sing njedhul diumumke dening sistem otomatis kanthi basa sing beda-beda kalebu Basa Spanyol, Basa Inggris, Basa Perancis, Basa Arab lan Basa Jepang.

src: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form. At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast. Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish. The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.
mt: Ing negara-negara kang duwé pangembangan saiki, nyediakake tempat tidur lan sarapan sing luwih apik wis ditinggake dadi bentuk seni. Ing paling palingan, B&Bs tentu nggabutakake ing loro panggonan utama: tempat tidur lan sarapan. Akibaté, ing tempat-tempat sing paling apik kaya iki, seseorang bisa nemokake tempat tidur sing paling mewah, mungkin sebuah selimut tangan atau tempat tidur sing antik. Sarapan bisa kalebu kejadian musim sing disesuaikan karo wilayah utawa hidangan khusus tuan rumah. Panggonan bisa kalebu bangunan sing sejarah kuna sing antik, taman sing dirawat lan kolam renang.
ref: Ning negara maju saiki, nyedhiyakake kasur sing apik lan sarapan wis dianggep dadi wujud-seni. Ana pucuke, B&Bs cetho banget yen tarung utamane ana rong perkara: amben lan sarapan. Mula amarga iku, ana papan sing paling apik kaya iku uwong gampang kanggo nemokake amben paling mewah, mungkin slimut kapas gawenan tangan utawa sawijining tempat turu antik. Sarapan bisa nyakup panganan khas dhaerah sing usum utawa pampadan khas saka tuwan umah. Latare bisa uga bangunan tuwa bersejarah kanthi perabot kuno, latar sing dirawat lan kolam renang.

src: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.
mt: Kutha Beijing ing Cina bakal dadi kutha tuan rumah Olimpiade Musim Dingin ing 2022, sing bakal nggawe kutha kasebut dadi kutha pisanan sing tuan rumah Olimpiade musim panas lan musim dingin. Beijing bakal tuan rumah upacara buka lan tutup lan acara es ing dalem. Acara ski liyane bakal ing Taizicheng ski area ing Zhangjiakou, kira-kira 220 km (140 mil) saka Beijing.
ref: Kutha Beijing ing China bakal dadi kutha penyelenggara Olimpiade Musim Adhem Olimpiade ing 2022, sing bakal ndadekake iki kutha sepisan sing dadi tuan rumah Olimpiade musim panas lan musim adhem. Beijing bakal dadi tuwan omah upacara wiwitaning lan panutupan lan acara es ing njero ruangan. Acara ski liyane bakal ditindakake ing dhaerah ski Taizicheng ing Zhangjiakou, udakara 220 km (140 mil) saka Beijing.

src: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.
mt: Flu burung, utawa formal avian influenza, bisa nginfeksi burung lan mamalia. Kurang saka 1000 kasus wis diwaca ing manungsa, nanging saka kasebut wis fatal. Kebanyakan kasebut nglibatake wong sing kerja karo ayam, nanging ana risiko kanggo burung.
ref: Flu burung, utawa kanthi formal avian infuensa, bisa nulari manuk lan mamalia. Ora luwih saka ewonan kasus wis tau disiarke marang manungsa, nanging sawetarane parah banget. Umume nglibatake wong-wong sing makarya karo unggas, nanging uga ana risiko kanggo pamerhatos manuk.

src: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get. The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.
mt: Viking nggunakake jalur banyu Rusia kanggo ngelakake Samudra Hitam lan Samudra Kaspiy. Bagian saka rute-rute iki bisa dienggo. Cek kabeh kabutuhan khusus sing bisa dadi sulit kanggo diperolehi. Kanal Laut Putih-Baltik nggabungake Samudra Arktik karo Samudra Baltik, lewat Danau Onega, Danau Ladoga lan Sankt Peterburg, umume lewat banyu lan danau. Danau Onega uga nggabungake karo Volga, so ngelakake saka Samudra Kaspiy lewat Rusia isih bisa.
ref: Viking migunakake dalan banyu Russia kanggo menyang Segara Ireng lan Segara Caspian. Sebagean saka dalan iki isih digunakake. Periksanen apa sing dibutuhake kanggo idin kusus, sing bisa wae angel olehe. Laut Putih—Kanal Baltik sing nyambungke Segara Arktik menyang Segara Baltik, liwat Tlaga Onega, Tlaga Ladoga lan Saint Petersburg, kanthi kali lan tlaga. Danau Onega uga dihubungake menyang Volga, saengga teka saka Laut Caspian liwat Rusia isih bisa.

src: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle. In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains. On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.
mt: Kontrol imigrasi umume dadi titik awal nalika turun saka pesawat, kapal, utawa kendaraan liyane. Ing saben-saben kereta lintas perbatasan, pemeriksaan bisa dilakokake ing kereta sing lagi berjalan lan kudu duwe ID sing valid nalika naik kereta iku. Ing kereta malam, paspor bisa dikumpulake dening konduktor supaya kalian ora kena ngalami gangguan tidur.
ref: Titik priksa imigrasi kuwi biyasane dadi panggonan wiwitan nalika medhun saka montor mabur, kapal, utawa kendharaan liyane. Ing pira-pira sepur lintas batas inspeksi ditindakake ing sepur sing nembe mlaku lan sampeyan kudune duwe identitas sing bener karo sampeyan nalika numpak salah siji saka sepur-sepur iku. Kreta turu wengi, paspor diklumpukke dening kondektur supaya ora kaganggu nalika sampeyan turu.

src: "Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving. But being placed in the ""high tropics"" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely)."
mt: Singapura umume dadi tempat sing aman banget lan gampang diarani, lan kowe bisa beli kabeh sawise tiba. Nanging, dadi dikelilingi karo tropis sing ""tinggi"" kira-kira 3 derajat lor saka ekuator, kowe kudu ngrusakake panas (sawise saben) lan sinar matahari (sawise langit yen jernih, kira-kira),"
ref: Umume ing Singapura minangka papan sing aman banget lan gampang ing ngener, lan sampeyan bisa tuku apa wae sawise tekan. Lan dipanggonake ing “tropis dhuwur” mung sawetara drajat lore ekuator sampeyan bakal kudu ngadhepi panas (tansah) lan srengenge kang kuwat (nalika langite padhang, luwih arang).

src: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer. Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee. If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.
mt: Kue Jerman ora kalah sajeng, lan ing Bavaria, ora kalah sajeng lan bervariasi, sing padha karo tetangga lor kidul, Ostenrik. Kue buah umum, karo apel sing dimasak dadi kue saben wulan, lan ceri lan plum nggawe penampilan ing musim panas. Banyak kue Jerman uga ngemot almon, hazelnut, lan nut saka pohon liyane. Kue populer akhire padha sajeng karo cangkir kopi kuwat. Jika kowe mbutuhake kue cilik nanging sajeng, coba apa sing tergantung wilayah disebut Berliner, Pfannkuchen utawa Krapfen.
ref: Roti-roti Jerman iku cukup enak, lan ing Batavia cukup sugih lan werna-werna, mirip karo iku tangga sisih kidule, Austria. Kue buah iku lumrah, kanthi apel dimasak kanggo kue setaun utuh, lan ceri lan prem ngetokne awake nalika mangsa panas. Akeh panganan panggang Jerman uga nampilake kacang almond, hazelnut, lan kacang-kacangan wit liyane. Kue kawentar kerep dipasangke utamane kanthi apik karo secangkir kopi kenthel. Menawa sampeyan kepengin kue-kue sing cilik nanging enak, cobanen sing gumantung saka daerahe bisa diarani Berliner, Pfannkuchen utawa Krapfen.

src: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that. Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter. For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel. The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.
mt: Jika kalian pengin ngliwati donya kanthi murah, kanggo keperluan, gaya hidup utawa tantangan, ana cara kanggo ngilangake. Umume, kalian bisa nggolongake dadi loro kategori: entuk gaji sementara kalian nglakoni perjalanan utawa nyengkuyung kalian nglakoni biaya. Tulisan iki fokus ing kategori pungkasan. Karena kalian pengin nggolongake biaya nganti nol, kalian bisa nggolongake kalian nglakoni komfort, wektu lan prediktabilitas kanggo nggolongake biaya nganti nol, lihat perjalanan biaya minimum. Nasehat kasebut ngasumsi yakuwi para pelancong ora nggolongake, nggolongake, nglakoni pasar ilegal, ngegolongake, utawa nglakoni keuntungan liyane kanggo kepentingan kalian.
ref: Yen sampeyan pengin ndeleng donya kanthi murah, kanggo kabutuhan, pacak urip utawa tantangan, ana sawetara cara kanggo nindakake. Sejatine, dheweke dibagi dadi rong pepanthan: Bisa nyambut gawe nalika sampeyan lelungan utawa watesi becer. Artikel iki dklumpukake ing babagan wusana. Kanggo sapa wae sing kepengin ngrelakake kasenengan iki, wanci lan ramalan supaya saya murah, deleng anggaran plesir sing paling murah. Saran kasebut nganggep menawa para turis ora nyolong, mlebu tanpa ijin, melu ing pasar ilegal, ngemis, utawa ngeksploitasi wong liya kanggo untunge dhewe.

src: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain. If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate. Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise. Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.
mt: Kahanan ngemudhe ing antarane Point Marion lan Fairmont nyebabake kondisi paling nggawis ing jalan Buffalo-Pittsburgh, ngalami kahanan sing isoleh ing hutan sing ora ana wong. Wates cepete dikirim ketara luwih ngisor tinimbang ing seksi sadurunge lan sabanjure — umume 35-40 meter per jam (56-64.km/jam) — lan kudu manut temenan marang dheweke padha iku bahkan luwih penting tinimbang liyane. Aneh, sakjane, sanajan layanan ponsel ing kene luwih kuwat banget tinimbang ing sadawane akeh rentang rute liyane, upamane Pennsylvania Wilds.

src: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain. If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate. Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise. Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.

src: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water. Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).
mt: Kanyoning (utawa: kanyoneering) yaiku babagan ngelintang ing bawah kanyon, sing bisa kering utawa penuh banyu. Kanyoning ngemot elemen saka renang, panjat tebing lan nggolek--nanging butuh latihan sing relatif sithik utawa bentuk fisik sing luwih sithik kanggo mulai (bandingake karo panjat tebing, scuba diving utawa alpine skiing, misal).
ref: Canyoning (utawa: canyoneering) iku babagan lunga ing dhasar canyon, sing garing utawa kebak banyu. Canyoning nggabungake unsur-unsur saka nglangi, menek lan mlumpat--nanging mbutuhake panglantih utawa bekukan jasmani sethithik kanggo miwiti (dibandhingake karo menek bambing, nyilem scuba utawa ski alpin, contone).

src: "Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to ""camp"". Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down."
mt: "Nggoleki ing mobil sendiri lan ngelakake ing jalan jangkep duwe daya tarik sing asli. Bedane karo mobil gedhe, kalian mungkin wis ngerti ngemudikake mobil kalian lan kenalake batas-batas kalian. Nggoleki tenda ing properti privat utawa ing kutha saka ukuran apapun bisa gampang nggoleki perhatian sing ora dikehendaki. Sing sederhana, ngemudikake mobil bisa jadi cara sing apik kanggo ngelakake jalan, nanging asring ora ing dhewe jadi cara kanggo ""camping"". Car camping bisa dilakokake kalo kalian duwe minivan gedhe, SUV, Sedan utawa Station Wagon karo kursi sing bisa ditutup."
ref: Mlebu menyang njero montormu lan mlaku menyang plesiran sing adoh nduweni daya tarik sing alami lan sederhana nanging nyenengke. Ora kaya kendharaan sing luwih gedhe, sampeyan paling wis kenal karo carane nyopir montormu lan mangerteni watesan-watesane. Ngedekake tendha ing lemah duweke dhewe pribadi utawa ing kutha kanthi ukuran pira wae bisa narik kawigaten sing ora dipengini. Mula amarga iku, ana papan sing paling apik kaya iku uwong gampang kanggo nemokake amben paling mewah, mungkin slimut kapas gawenan tangan utawa sawijining tempat turu antik. Kemah mobil iku mungkin yen sampeyan duwe minivan gedhe, SUV, Sedan utawa Gerbong Stasiun kanthi kursi-kursi sing diglethakake.

src: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco. Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.
mt: Kutha modern Casablanca didirikan dening nelayan Berber ing abad kaping 10 SM, lan digunakake dening Phoenicia, Romawi, lan Merenid minangka pelabuhan strategis sing diarani Anfa. Portugis ngancani lan ngrenggengi kutha kasebut kanthi jeneng Casa Branca, nanging banjur ngrungokake sawise gempa bumi ing taun 1755. Sultan Maroko ngrenggengi kutha kasebut minangka Daru l-Badya lan diarani Casablanca dening pedagang Spanyol sing ngadegake basis dagang ing kutha kasebut. Casablanca salah sijining kutha sing paling ora menarik kanggo ngrungokake ing kabeh Maroko. Ing kutha kuna Medinah, gampang nggoleki tempat sing nyediakake barang-barang tradisional Maroko, kaya tagine, keramik, barang-barang kulit, hookah, lan spektrum gegegak, nanging iku kabeh kanggo turis.
ref: Kutha modheren ing Casablanca diadegake para nelayan Berber ing abad kaping 10SM, lan digunakake dening Phoenician, Roma lan Merenids minangka pelabuhan strategis sing diarani Anfa. Wong Portugal ngrusak bangunan kuwi banjur dibangun maneh nganggo jeneng Casa Branca, mung kanggo ditinggalke maneh sabubare lindhu taun 1755. Sultan Moroko mbangun maneh kuthane kanthi aran Daru l-Badya lan iku diwenehi jeneng Casablanca dening pedagang Spanyol sing bisa mbangun basis perdagangan ing kana. Casablanca iku salah siji panggonan paling ora menarik kanggo blanja ing sak Maroko. Ing sakubenge Madinah lawas, sampeyan bisa nemokake papan sing adol barang tradisional Maghribi, kayata tagine, porselin, barang kulit, pipa, lan gambaran geegaw kabeh, nanging iku mung kanggo wisatawan.

src: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron. Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca. Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.
mt: Kulon lan sing gampang dicapai yaiku kutha romantis lan menarik Sintra sing dikenalake marang wong asing sawise akun terang saka kejantanan sing diwaca dening Lord Byron. Bus Scotturb 403 mbiyasa nglakoni perjalanan menyang Sintra, sing ngalami ing Cabo da Roca. Uga menyang lor, nampa keagungan saka Sang Dalem Bunda Maria Fatima (Shrine), tempat apparition Marian sing dikenalake ing donya.
ref: Menyang sisih lor lan sajrone gampang dicedhaki iku kutha Sintra sing romantis lan narik lan sing kawentar kanggo wong manca sawise sawijining cerita anget saka kemegahane direkam dening Lord Byron. Bis Scotturb 403 biyasane mlaku menyang Sintra, mandheg ana Cabo da Roca. Uga ing sisih lor tekanana tempat suci Fatima (Kuil), panggonan sing misuwur ing donya amarga penampakan Maria.

src: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris. With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it. Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
mt: Ing taun 1994, wilayah Nagorno-Karabakh sing etnis Armenia saka Azerbaijan nglawan perang karo Azeri. Dengan bantuan Armenia, republik anyar diasilake. Namun, negara sing wis diakui - ora bahkan Armenia - ora ngakoni. Diplomatic argumentasi ngenani wilayah iki tetep nggoyang hubungan antara Armenia lan Azerbaijan.
ref: Taun 1994, daerah etnis Suku Armenia Nagorno-Karabakh saka Azerbijan perang nglawan Azeris. Kanthi dhukungane uwong Armenia, republik sing anyar diciptakake. Nanging, ora ana bangsa sing mapan - uga dudu Armenia - kanthi resmi ngakoni republik iki. Alesan diplomatis perkara kawasan kuwi gawe hubungan Armenia lan Azerbaijan dadi ora rukun.

src: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families. Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around. In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially. Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances. There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.
mt: Salah siji saka titik-titik kuwat saka Charlotte, Carolina Lor, yaiku yen dia duwe abondanan pilihan kanggo keluarga. Penduduk saka wilayah liyane akhire nglaporke keluarga-keluarga kaya yen sumber utama kanggo pindah menyang wilayah iku, lan wisitane akhire nemu kutha iku gampang diakoni kanthi anak-anak ing sekitar. Nanging, taksi ora umume digunakake dening keluarga ing Charlotte, nanging bisa nggunakake ing siji siji sirkumstanse. Ana surcharge kanggo duwe luwih saka 2 penumpang, mula pilihan iki bisa luwih mahal tinimbang yen diperlukan.
ref: Salah sawijine bab sing kuwat saka Charlotte, North Carolina, yaiku kutha iki nduweni akeh pilihan kanthi kualitas-apik kanggo kaluwarga. Warga saka wilayah liya asring ngujarake ramah kaluwarga minangka alesan utama kanggo pindhah rana, lan para tamu asring nemokake kuthane gampang nyenengake karo anane bocah-bocah cilik. Saka 20 taun kepungkur, jumlah pilihan sing ramah anak ing Uptown Charlotte wis mundhak kanthi cepet. Umume taksi ora digunakake dening kaluwarga ning Charlotte, sanadyan bisa digunakake kanggo kahanan tartamtu. Ana tarif tambahan kanggo duwe luwih saka 2 penumpang, mula pilian iki bisa luwih larang saka sing dibutuhake.

src: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.
mt: Sebelum Spanyol tiba ing abad ke-16, utara Chile di bawah peraturan Inca sementara suku Araucanians (Mapuche) sing nggawe utara lan selatan Chile. Mapuche uga salah sijining saka grup suku Amerika sing paling akhir, sing ora sepenuhnya diserap dadi peraturan Spanyol sing berbicara sampai setelah kemerdekaan Chile. Walaupun Chile mengumumkan kemerdekaan ing 1810 (amid perang Napoleon sing meninggalkan Spanyol tanpa pemerintah pusat sing berfungsi selama beberapa tahun), kemenangan yang menentukan atas Spanyol ora dicapai sampai 1818.
ref: Sadurunge wong Spanyol tekan nalika abad 16, Chili daerah Lor dipimpin dening aturan Suku Inca lan suku pribumi Araucanian (Mapuche) manggon ana ning Chili daerah kidul lan tengah. Suku Mapuche uga dadi suku pribumi Amerika keri dhewe, sing ora kudu nganggo aturan nganggo basa Spanyol nganti sabubare kamardikan Chili. Sanajan Chili ngumumake kamardikan ing 1810 (ing tengah perang Napoleon sing ninggalake Spanyol tanpa sawijining pamerentah pusat sing berfungsi kanggo sawetara taun), kemenangan sing nemtokake marang Spanyol iku ora kagayuh nganti 1818.

src: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.
mt: Sebelum Spanyol tiba ing abad ke-16, utara Chile di bawah peraturan Inca sementara suku Araucanians (Mapuche) sing nggawe utara lan selatan Chile. Mapuche uga salah sijining saka grup suku Amerika sing paling akhir, sing ora sepenuhnya diserap dadi peraturan Spanyol sing berbicara sampai setelah kemerdekaan Chile. Walaupun Chile mengumumkan kemerdekaan ing 1810 (amid perang Napoleon sing meninggalkan Spanyol tanpa pemerintah pusat sing berfungsi selama beberapa tahun), kemenangan yang menentukan atas Spanyol ora dicapai sampai 1818.
ref: Sadurunge wong Spanyol tekan nalika abad 16, Chili daerah Lor dipimpin dening aturan Suku Inca lan suku pribumi Araucanian (Mapuche) manggon ana ning Chili daerah kidul lan tengah. Suku Mapuche uga dadi suku pribumi Amerika keri dhewe, sing ora kudu nganggo aturan nganggo basa Spanyol nganti sabubare kamardikan Chili. Sanajan Chili ngumumake kamardikan ing 1810 (ing tengah perang Napoleon sing ninggalake Spanyol tanpa sawijining pamerentah pusat sing berfungsi kanggo sawetara taun), kemenangan sing nemtokake marang Spanyol iku ora kagayuh nganti 1818.

src: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria. They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea. Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.
mt: Cinque Terre, sing artiné Lima Tanah, ngandhut lima desa kecil sing berada ing pesisir Italia wilayah Liguria. Mereka dinyatake minangka Situs Warisan Dunia UNESCO. Nalika abad-abad, wong-wong nggawe teras-teras ing pemandangan alam sing kakuatirkan banget ing tepi-tepi tebing sing ngliwati sagara. Sajenise saka ciri-ciriné yaiku kurangé tumbuhan korporasi sing bisa dilihat. Jalur, kereta api lan perahu nggabungake desa-desa, lan mobil ora bisa nggabungake saka luar.
ref: Cinque Terre, sing artine Lima Dharatan, dumadi saka limang desa cilik ing desa Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza lan Monterosso sing dumunung ing wilayah Italia Liguria. Iku didaptar ing daptar Warisan Donya UNESCO. Atusan taun, manungsa mbangun latar ana ndhuwur tembok kanthi ngati-ati, sesawangan sing ndhuwur tur medeni ngadhep segara. Salah siji pesonane yaiku kurange pembangunan korporat sing katon. Dalan-dalan, kereta lan prau nyambungake desa-desa, lan mobil ora bisa mlebu kana saka njaba.
