src: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps. At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient. The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures. Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole. Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.
mt: Kasus kang paling umum kanggo kecelakaan ing musim dingin yaiku jalan sing bengkak, jalan (sidewalk) lan khususnya tangga. Adhedhasar minimal, kudu dipakake sandal sing duwé sole sing cocok. Sandal musim panas umume banget bengkak ing es lan salju, nanging sandal musim dingin uga kurang. Sandal duwé stik lan ana tambahan sing bisa ditambahake kanggo kondisi sing bengkak, cocok kanggo sandal lan sandal musim dingin, kanggo ujung-ujunging lan sole. Ujung-ujunging kudu dhuwur lan lebar. Gula, batu, utawa garam (klorida kalsium) umume disebarkan ing jalan utawa jalan kanggo nambah daya genggaman.
ref: penyebab paling umum kacilakan ing mangsa adhem yaiku dalan lunyu, troroar (trotoar) lan mligine langkah-langkah. Paling ora sampeyan butuh ales sikil kanthi sol sing patut. Sepatu mangsa panas biasane lunyu banget ing es lan salju, malah sawetara sepatu but mangsa adhem ya kurang. Pola iki kudune jero, 5 mm (1/5 inci) utawa luwih, lan materi iki cukup alus nalika hawane adem. Pira-pira sepatu bot duwe tatahan lan ana piranti tambahan sing semebar kanggo kahanan lunyu, pas kanggo akeh-akeh sepatu lan sepatu bot, kanggo tungkak utawa tungkak lan sol. Tungkak kudu cendhek lan jembar. Pasir, krakal utawa uyah (kalsium klorida) asring mecer-mecer ana ratan utawa dalan kanggo nambahi gesekan.

src: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."
mt: Kepulauan Cook ya iku negara pulau sing ana hubungan bebas karo Selandia Baru, sing ana ing Polinesia, ing tengah Samudra Pasifik Kidul. Iki iku arkipelago sing ana 15 pulau sing disebarake ing 2.2 juta km2 saka sagara. Dengan zona wektu sing padha karo Hawaii, pulau-pulau iki kadang-kadang dipikirake minangka ""Hawaii ing bawah tanah"". Walaupun luwih cilik, iku ngingetake sawetara wong tuwa sing Hawaii sadurunge status negara tanpa kabeh hotel wisata gedhe lan pengembangan liyane. Kepulauan Cook ora duwe kutha nanging disusun saka 15 pulau utama. Yang paling penting ya iku Rarotonga lan Aitutaki.
ref: "Kapuloan Cook iku negara pulo ing asosiasi bebas karo Selandia Baru, panggonane ing Polinesia, ing tengah-tengah Samudra Pasifik Kidul. Iki kepuloan kanthi 15 pulo nyebar ngliwati 2,2 yuta km2 segara. Kanthi tlatah wektu sing padha karo Hawaii, pulo-pulo mau uga dianggep minangka ""Hawaii ing ngisor"". Sanajan luwih cilik, iku ngengetake sawetara dhayoh tua saka Hawaii sadurunge dadi negara bagean tanpa kabeh hotel-hotel plancong sing gedhe lan kemajuan liane. Kepuloan Cook ora duwe kutha nanging kasusun saka 15 pulau sing beda. Sing utama yaiku Rarotonga lan Aitutaki."

src: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service. It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.
mt: Permit wajib disiapake ing nganti. Kamu wajib nduwe permit kanggo nglambo nalika malam ing Sirena. Sirena yaiku satunggal stasiun ranger sing ngawontunakake dormitory lan panganan panas ing sampingan camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, lan Los Patos ngawontunakake camping tanpa panganan. Iki bisa dadi park permit langsung saka Stasiun Ranger ing Puerto Jiménez, nanging ora ngerti kartu kredit Park Service (MINAE) ora ngawontunakake park permit luwih saka siji bulan ing nganti kedadean tiba. CafeNet El Sol ngawontunakake layanan reservasi kanggo biaya US$30, utawa $10 kanggo pass siji dina; detail ing Corcovado page.
ref: Idin kudu dipesen luwih dhisik. Sampeyan kudu duwe idin kanggo nginep ing Sirena. Sirena iku siji- sijine penjaga stasiun sing nawani penginapan asrama lan panganan panas saliyane kanggo kemah. La Leona, San Pedrillo, lan Los Patos namung nawakake kemah tanpa layanan panganan. Dimungkinake kanggo oleh idin taman langsung saka Pos Penjaga ing Puerto Jiménez, nanging dheweke ora nampa kertu kredit. Layanan Taman (MINAE) ora ngetokake idin taman luwih saka sewulan sadurunge, saka karawuhan sing diarepake. CafeNet El Sol nawakake layanan pesenan kanthi rega 30 dolar, utawa 10 dolar kanggo tiket sedina; rincian ing halaman Corcovadone.

src: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking. It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots. Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route. In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.
mt: Kuliah ing gunung: Aktivitas iki uga dikenali minangka ski backcountry, ski touring utawa ski hiking. Iki kaitane karo nanging ora ngrembaka alpine style ski touring utawa pendakian, sing kaping pungkasan kudu nggunakake ski lan sepatu sing luwih kaku. Pikirake rute ski minangka rute hiking sing padha. Ing kondisi sing apik kalian bisa ngecakake jarak sing luwih gedhe tinimbang ngecakake – nanging mung sajeroning kondisi sing jarang kalian bisa ngecakake kecepatan sing padha karo ski lintas alam tanpa tas sing gedhe ing rute sing diatur.
ref: Lelungan karo ski: Kamempengan iki uga diarani ski pedalaman, misata ski utawa mlaku nanjak karo ski. Iki ana hubungane nanging biyasane ora nggawa gaya ski gunung utawa cara munggah gunung, sing keri iki dilakoni ana ning daerah sing jejeg lan mbutuhake alat ski lan sepatu sing luwih kaku. Pikirake jalur ski minangka jalur munggah sing padha. Ing kahanan sing apik sampeyan bakal bisa lelungan sing luwih adoh tinimbang mlaku - nanging arang banget sampeyan bakal entuk kacepetan dolanan ski lintas negara tanpa tas sing abot ing dalan sing dijaga kanthi apik.

src: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe. Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture. When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture. When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt. People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.
mt: Kesurupan kembali nggawe kenaan sing dateng kajaba kenaan budaya (kabehan fase honeymoon), tahan luwih lama, lan bisa luwih parah. Pendaki sing gampang nggawe adaptasi karo budaya anyar kadang-kadang duwe kesurupan kembaline sing luwih parah. Nalika kembaline menyang rumah sakit, kalian wis nggawe adaptasi karo budaya anyar lan kalian kalahke kabehan kebiasaan saka budaya rumah sakit. Nalika kalian ngalami budaya anyar ing dina awal, wong-wong mungkin ngerteni lan ngerteni, ngerti yen pendaki ing negara anyar kudu nggawe adaptasi. Wong-wong mungkin ora ngerti yen ngerteni lan ngerteni uga diperlukan kanggo pendaki kembaline menyang rumah sakit.
ref: Goncangan mlebu meneh teka luwih cepet tinimbang goncangan budaya (ana luwih sethithik saka fase bulan madu), pungkasan luwih suwe, lan bisa luwih parah. Wisatawan sing gampang nyocogake karo budaya anyar kadhang-kadhang angel nyocogake maneh karo budaya asline. Nalika mulih omah sawise urip ing luar negri, sampeyan kudu adaptasi marang kabudayan anyar lan kelangan pira-pira pakulinane sampeyan saka budaya omah sampeyan. Nalika sampeyan plesiran kaping pisanan, wong-wong bakal sabar lan mangerteni, ngerteni yen wong sing plesir menyang negara sing beda kuwi kudu adaptasi. Wong-wong mungkin ora ngira menawa kesadaran lan pangerten uga dibutuhake kanggo wong lelungan sing bali mulih.

src: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.
mt: Kambing (uga dikenal minangka elk) ora alami agresif, nanging bakal ngadegi dadi diri ing ngendi wong ora ngerti kambing minangka potensial berbahaya, mungkin nggoleki terlalu dekat lan nggoleki diri ing risiko.
ref: Kidang Gedhe (uga diarani kidang) ora seneng nyerang dhewe-dhewe, nanging bakal mbela awake yen ana anceman. Nalika manungsa ora nganggep kidang kuwi mbebayani, si kidang bisa nyedhak cedhak banget lan justru mbebayani awake dhewe.

ref: Kidang Gedhe (uga diarani kidang) ora seneng nyerang dhewe-dhewe, nanging bakal mbela awake yen ana anceman. Nalika manungsa ora nganggep kidang kuwi mbebayani, si kidang bisa nyedhak cedhak banget lan justru mbebayani awake dhewe.

src: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water. Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.
mt: Ing panas dina dina, panumpang bisa ngalami miraj sing nggawe ilusi banyu (utawa barang-barang liyane). Kekarane iki bisa nggawani bengi sing nggawe panumpang nggawe keputusan sing salah, nggawani energi sing langka lan banyu sing langka. Walaupun padang pasir paling panas bisa dadi paling adhem ing malam, hipotermia bisa dadi risiko tanpa pakaian panas.
ref: Nalika panas awan-awan, wong mlaku kuwi bisa nemoni khayalan sing gawe ayang-ayang banyu (utawa barang liyane). Iku kabeh bisa dadi mbebayani menawa plancong iku ngoyak lamunan, mbuang tenaga sing aji lan banyu sisa. Padang pasir sing paling panas wae bisa dadi anyep banget nalika wengi. Hipotermia kuwi perkara sing mbebayani tanpa klambi sing anget.

src: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE. Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.
mt: Républik Dominika (Basa Spanyol: República Dominicana) ya iku nagara Karibia sing nggabungaké wétan pérangan pulo Hispaniola, sing dadi wewengkon saka Haiti. Selain pasir putih lan lanskap gunung, nagara iki uga nggabungaké kutha Eropa paling tuwa ing Amérika, saiki dadi Santo Domingo. Pulo iki awalé dipadati déning bangsa Taínos lan Caribes. Caribes iku bangsa Arawakan sing wis tiba ing taun 10.000 SM. Dalam sasuwéné saka 1492 nganti 1498, populasi Taínos wis ditekan déning para penakluk Spanyol. Nanging, menurut Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias), para penakluk Spanyol nggabutakaké 100.000 wong Taínos.
ref: Republik Dominika (Basa Spanyol; Republica Dominicana) yaiku negara ing wilayah Karibia sing manggon ana separo daerah wetanan saka pulo Hispaniola, sing diandum karo Haiti Ora mung pasir putih lan sesawangan gunung, negara iki uga omahe kutha Eropa sing paling tuwa ning Amerika, saiki dadi bageyane Santo Domingo. Wiwitane pulo iku dipanggoni dening Tainos lan Caribes. Suku Caribes yaiku wong-wong sing omong Arawakan sing tekan antarane taun 10.000 BCE. Ing sawetara taun sakwise tekane penjelajah Eropa, populasi ing Tainos wis suda kanthi signifikan dening penjajah Spanyol. Miturut Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) antarane 1492 lan 1498 penjajah Spanyol mateni kira-kira 100.000 Taínos.

src: "Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet. Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as ""ski bums,"" planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location. The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC! Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia."
mt: "Snowsports ngelintang, sing kalebu olahraga ski lan snowboard, kalebu aktivitas ngelintang ing dharatan sing ditutupi salju kanthi ski utawa snowboard sing nempel ing kaki. Skiing minangka aktivitas perjalanan sing akèh sing kadang-kadang dikenal minangka ""ski bums,"" ngrembaka ing papan sing wis diwetokake kanggo ski ing papan sing khusus. Ide ski sing kuno banget — lukisan gua sing nggambarake skiwer sing kuna banget nganti 5000 SM! Skiing minangka olahraga sing kawentar ing abad kaping 17, lan ing 1861 klub ski rekreatif kapisan dibukak dening Norwegia ing Australia."
ref: Ulahraga salju downhill, sing kalebu ski lan prosotan salju, minangka ulahraga misuwur sing kalebu mrosot ing ngisor lemah sing ketutup salju kanthi piranti ski utawa papan prosotan ing sikilmu. Ski iku sawijining aktivitas lelungan utama kanthi akeh penggemar, kadhang-kadhang dikenal minangka “gelandhangan ski,” ngrencanakake kabeh preinan watara ski ing lokasi-lokasi tertentu. Gagasan saka dolanan ski iku tua banget — lukisan gua sing nggambarake pemain ski wiwit adoh 5000 SM! Ski ing lereng minangka olahraga diwiwiti paling ora ing abad kaping 17, lan ing 1861 klub ski rekreasi sing pisanan dibukak dening wong Norwegia ing Australia.

src: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.
mt: Kepulauan Afrika Timur ing Samudra Hindia saka pesisir wétan Afrika. Madagaskar yaiku sing paling gedhé, lan benua dhewe karo wong-wongan nalika ngapitakake wong-wongan. Kepulauan cilik sing paling akèh yaiku negara mandiri, utawa sing kaitane karo Prancis, lan dikenal minangka resor pantai sing luwih sugih. Arab uga ngimpor Islam ing wewengkung, lan ngerti ing cara sing gedhé ing Komoro lan Mayotte. Pengaruh Eropa lan kolonialisme wiwit ing abad kaping 15, sajeroning ekspedisi Portugis Vasco da Gama nggolongake rute Cape saka Eropa menyang India.
ref: Pulo-pulo ing Afrika Wetan iku ana ing Samudra Hindia saka pesisir wetan Afrika. Madagaskar kuwi pulo sing paling gedhe, lan benua sing khas perkara kewan sing ana njerone. Ameh kabeh pulo-pulo kang luwih cilik iku negara-negara mardhika, utawa gegandhengan karo Prancis, lan diweruhi minangka pasanggrahan pasisir kang mewah. Wong Arab uga gawa Islam menyang pulo iki, lan dalane gedhe kanggo Komoro lan Mayotte. Pengaruh lan kolonialisme Eropa diwiwiti nalika abad 15, nalika tukang jelajah saka Portugal Vasco da Gama nemokake Jalur Tanjung saka Eropa menyang India.

src: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise. There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual. More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.
mt: Ana tradisi kanggo ngalami malam Paskah awake ing titik sing ora katon kanggo nonton matahari terbit. Ana tentu penjelasan teologis Kristen kanggo tradisi iki, nanging mungkin uga ritual musim semi lan Kejantanan sing wis ana sadurunge Kristen. Gereja tradisional kerap ngadakan Paskah Vigil ing malam Sabtu nalika akhir pekan Paskah, karo kongregasi sing kerap ngalami kegembiraan nalika jam tengah malam kanggo ngucapake kembaline Kristus.
ref: Ana tradisi melek sewengi nalika Paskah ning njaba kanggo ndeleng srengenge njedhul. Sak mesthine ana penjelasan teologi Kristen kanggo tradisi iki, nanging iki sisan wae dadi ritual mangsa semi lan kesuburan pra-Kristen. Luwih akeh greja tradisional sing asring nindakake Bengi Paskah ing Setu wengi nalika akhir minggu Paskah, kanthi penganut asring nindakake pahargyan ing tengah wengi kanggo ngagungake wungune Kristus.

src: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.
mt: Kolombia ngutamake warga negara Kuba ngerti surat undangan sebelum masuk Kolombia ing bandhara internasional utawa titik masuk wates. Surat iki kudu diresmike dening Departemen Luar Negeri Kolombia, lan nggabungake kriteria-kriteria sing disiapake kanggo nyediakake aliran migrasi sing teratur antarane kabeh negara. Warga negara Kuba sing duwe kartu hijau AS kudu nglakokake konsulat Kolombia kanggo nyepakake eksim saka kriteria iki. Paspor kudu valid kanggo paling ora 6 wulan sawise tanggal perjalananmu. Tiket perjalanan balik/lanjutan kudu disediakake kanggo nyebutake dawa perjalananmu.
ref: Ékuador menehi wewaton kanggo warga Kuba menawa nampa layang undhangan sadurunge mlebu Ékuador liwat bandara internasional utawa titik mlebu. Layang iki kudu dilegalake dening Kementrian Luar Negeri Ekuador, lan nyaguhi marang syarat tartamtu. Persyaratan iki dirancang kanggo nyawisake sawijining aliran migrasi sing tumata antarane keloro negara. Warga Kuba sing nyekel kertu ijo Amerika kudu marani Konsulat Ekuador supaya entuk pengecualian marang sarat iki. Paspormu kudu sah kurang luwih 6 sasi sak njabane tanggal plesiranmu. Tiket kanggo sak ubengan/ plesir sabubare uga dibutuhke kanggo mbuktekake sepira suwene sampeyan bakal nginep.

src: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower. Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere. High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.
mt: Kacamata bisa luwih murah ing negara asing, khusus ing negara pendapatan sithik ing ngendi biaya kerja luwih rendah. Munggahke panilaan kacamata ing rumah, khusus ing ngendi asuransi ngendahake, lan nggawa resep menyang negara liyane. Frame-branding sing luwih tinggi sing disediakake ing area-area kaya iki bisa duwe loro masalah; siji bisa jadi tiruan, lan siji sing asli sing diimpor bisa luwih mahal tinimbang ing rumah.
ref: Kacamata bisa dadi luwih murah ing negara asing, apa maneh ing negara-negara pendapatan cendhak ing ngendi rega tenaga buruh luwih murah. Pertimbangke mriksakake mripat ing omah, mligine yen ditanggung asuransi, lan nggawa resepe terus diajokake ing panggon liyane. Wengku jeneng merek modheren sing kasedhiya ing dhaerah kasebut bisa uga duwe rong masalah; sawetara bisa uga tiron, lan sing diimpur bisa uga luwih larang tinimbang sing ning omah.

src: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted. On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method. It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.
mt: Uang resmi Falkland yaiku Falkland pound (FKP) sing nilai yenya ditetepake saka yen British pound (GBP). Uang bisa diobralake ing bank sing wujud satunggal-satunggal ing pulo-pulo sing ana ing Stanley saka FIC West toko. Pound British bakal umumnya diakui ing pulo-pulo lan ing Stanley kartu kredit lan dollar Amerika Serikat uga kadang-kadang diakui; cek karo pemilik ing nganti yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen
ref: Mata uang Falkland sing resmi iku pound Falkland (PFK) sing ajine ditetepake padha karo siji pound Inggris (GBP) iku. Dhuwit bisa diijolne ing siji-sijine bank ing pulo sing panggonane ana ing Stanley sebrange toko FIC West. Pound Inggris bakal diterima dening umum ana ngendi wae ana pulo iki lan ana njero kertu kredit Stanley lan dolar Amerika Serikat uga asring diterima. Ing pulo-pulo adoh kertu kredit. mungkin bakal ora ditampa, sanajan mata uang Inggris lan Amerika mungkin ditampa; takokake marang sing duwe dhisik kanggo nemtokake metode pembayaran apa sing ditampa. Ameh ora mungkin kanggo ngijolake dhuwit Falklands sajobone pulo, mula sampeyan kudu ngijolake dhuwit sakdurunge ninggalake pulone.

src: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted. On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method. It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.
mt: Uang resmi Falkland yaiku Falkland pound (FKP) sing nilai yenya ditetepake saka yen British pound (GBP). Uang bisa diobralake ing bank sing wujud satunggal-satunggal ing pulo-pulo sing ana ing Stanley saka FIC West toko. Pound British bakal umumnya diakui ing pulo-pulo lan ing Stanley kartu kredit lan dollar Amerika Serikat uga kadang-kadang diakui; cek karo pemilik ing nganti yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen yen

src: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar. Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple. Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.
mt: Temple-temple paling akèh duwé festival taunan sing wiwit akir November nganti tengah Mei, sing beda-beda menurut kalènder taunan saka tiapé temple. Festival taunan paling akèh tempe duwé dipèngeti minangka bagéan saka anniversary utawa presiding deity's birthday utawa event liyane sing kaitane karo tempe. Festival taunan Kerala akèh sing menarik dadi ditonton, karo prosesi kanggo gajah-gajah sing dihias, orchestra tempe lan kegiatan liyane.
ref: Akeh candhi sing nduweni pagelaran Taunan wiwit ana sasi Nopember pungkasane ana Tengah Mei, beda-beda gumantung marang tanggalan taunan candhi. Akeh pagelaran ana candhi kuwi dirayakne dadi bageyan ambal warsane candhi utawa dadi pangeling-eling dina kelairane dewa utawa pagelaran gedhe liyane sing ana hubungan ekaro candhi. Pagelaran ana ning candhi Kerala iki endah banget, kanthi urut-urutan umum nggunakake gajah sing dirias, karawitan candhi lan pagelaran-pagelaran liyane.

src: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you). However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class! Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.
mt: Carane sing jelas ngubeng ing kelas pertama utawa bisnis yaiku nggoleki wadah dhuwur saka uang kanggo hak (utawa, sing apik, nyithak perusahaan kanggo ngilangake), nanging iki ora murah: minangka aturan-aturan kasar, kalian bisa ngerteni kanggo bayar nganti papat kaline normal fare kanggo bisnis, lan telu belas kaline kanggo kelas pertama! Umume, ora ana guna ing ngilangake diskon kanggo kursi bisnis utawa kelas pertama saka penerbangan langsung saka A menyang B. Penerbangan ngerti yen ana grup kunci sing bisa nggoleki dhuwur saka uang kanggo hak ngubeng ing kenyamanan, lan ngecasake sesuai.
ref: Cara sing jelas kanggo mabur ing kelas siji utawa kelas bisnis yaiku kanthi mbayar setumpuk duit kandel supaya entuk hak istimewa (utawa, luwih apik meneh, nyuwun perusahaan sampeyan kanggo nindakake iki kanggo sampeyan). Nanging, iki ora teka murah: amarga paugeran kaku sing kasar, sampeyan bisa ngajab kanggo bayar nganti kaping papat ongkos lelungan ekonomi normal kanggo bisnis, lan bahkan kaping sewelas kanggo kelas siji! Umume, ora ana gunane sanadyan goleki diskon kanggo kursi bisnis utawa eksekutif ing penerbangan langsung saka A menyang B. Maskapai ngerteni banget menawa ana klompok inti tartamtu sing gelem mbayar larang kanggo hak kusus ing lelungan ngendi wae kanthi cepet lan kepenak, lan regane pantes.

src: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines. Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014. If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare. Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.
mt: Maskapai kaya Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines wis ngrembaka layanan ing Afrika, lan tawari koneksion menyang kutha-kutha Afrika sing gedhe ing 30 negara Afrika nalika kudu nggunggah biaya sing kompetitif tinimbang maskapai Eropa liyane. Turkish Airlines nglintang menyang 39 destinasi ing 30 negara Afrika nalika 2014. Nanging, kalau kowe duwe wektu perjalanan tambahan, cek menawa total biaya kowe nggunggah menyang Afrika kaya kowe nggunggah biaya perjalanan donya. Jangan lupa nggunggah biaya tambahan visa, pajak penerbangan, transportasi darat, etc. kanggo kabeh tempat sing luwih saka Afrika.
ref: Maskapai kayata Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Maskapai Turkish wis ngembangake layanane tekan Afrika, lan nyuguhake sambungan menyang pirang-pirang kutha gedhe ing Afrika kanthi tarip sing luwih murah tinimbang maskapai Eropa. Turkish Airlines mabur menyang 39 jujugan saka 30 negara Afrika awit taun 2014. Menawa sampeyan duwe wektu lelungan tambahan, periksanen kanggo ndelok kepriye arahan tarip total menyang Afrika dibandingake karo tarip ngubengi donya. Aja lali kanggo nambahke bea tambahan visa tambahan, pajek menyang, angkutan dharat, lan liya-liyane. kanggo kabeh papan ing sanjabaning Afrika iku.

src: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food. Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food. In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.
mt: Ngelakoni pembelian pangan ing supermarket biasane cara paling murah kanggo dihidangake. Tanpa kesempatan kanggo masak, pilihan sing ora bisa ditegakake ing panganan siap sajene. Supermarket sing duwé pilihan sing luwih bervariasi panganan siap sajene. Nanging, ing siji negara utawa tipe toko ana paling ora siji restoran sing ana ing lokasi, biasane sawijining sing ora resmi kanthi harga sing murah.
ref: Tuku panganan ing supermarket iku biasane cara paling murah kanggo mangan. Tanpa kasempatan masak, pilihane amung diwatesi karo panganan siap saji. Saya akeh supermarket sing duwe bagean macem-macem saka panganan cepak saji. Sawetara malah uga nyedhiyakake oven microwave utawa piranti liyane kanggo manasne panganan. Ing sawetara negara utawa tipe toko paling ora ana restoran ing panggonane, kerepe sing ora formal kanthi rega murah.

src: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible. In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different. Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
mt: Variasi-variasi Prancis sing disimak ing Belgia lan Switserlan beda sedikit saka Prancis sing disimak ing Prancis, nanging padha padha bisa dimengerti. Nanging, sistem angka ing Prancis sing disimak ing Belgia lan Switserlan duwe sedikit kekhasan sing beda saka Prancis sing disimak ing Prancis, lan pengucapan saka tembung-tembung sing sedikit beda. Nanging, kabeh Prancis sing disimak ing Belgia lan Switserlan bakal ngetahake Prancis standar ing sekolah, supaya bisa dimengerti kowe nanging kowe nggunakake sistem angka standar Prancis.
ref: Varietas basa Perancis sing dipocapake ing Belgia lan Swiss rada beda saka basa perancis sing dipocaake ing perancis, sanajan iku padha cukup mirip kanggo isa dipahami bebarengan. Kususe, sistem angka ing Belgia lan Swiss sing basane Prancis duweni keanehan sathithik sing beda saka basa Prancis sing dienggo ing Prancis, lan pangucapan sawetara tembung uga rada beda. Senajan mengkono kabeh wong perancis sing omongan ngango basa Belgia lan Swiss bakal sinau Basa perancis standar ing sekolah, satemah dheweke padha bakal isa mangerteni sampeyan mbok senajan sampeyan nggunakake sistem penomeran standar basa perancis.

src: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel. Ing kabeh kahanan, sampeyan kudu mesen langsung menyang maskape.

src: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country. It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company. If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.
mt: Nggunakake GPS navigasi apps ing smartphone bisa dadi cara sing paling gampang lan paling nyaman kanggo ngegawe peta nalika saka negara rumah. Iki bisa ngurangi biaya saka nggoleki peta anyar kanggo GPS, utawa piranti GPS standar utawa sewa saka perusahaan sewa mobil. Jika kalian ora duwe koneksi data kanggo smartphone, utawa nalika saka jangkauan, performa kalian bisa terbatas utawa ora bisa.
ref: Nggunakake aplikasi nasvigasi GPS ing ponsel pinter sampeyan bisa dadi cara sing paling gampang lan paling pas kanggo navigasi nalika metu saka negara asal sampeyan. Tuku peta anyar kanggo GPS kuwi bisa ngirit dhuwit, utawa GPS sing mandiri utawa nyewa saka perusahaan sing nyewakake montor. Yen sampeyan ora duwe sambungan dhata kanggo tilpunmu, utawa yen sampeyan ora ana ing ranggehan, asil bisa uga diwatesi utawa ora kasedhiya.

src: Seeing the sites and wildlife of the Galapagos is best done by boat, just as Charles Darwin did it in 1835. Over 60 cruise ships ply the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers. Most people book their place well in advance (as the boats are usually full during the high season). Be sure the agent through whom you book is a Galapagos specialist with a good knowledge of a wide variety of ships. This will ensure that your particular interests and/or constraints are matched with the ship most suitable to them.
mt: Ngliwati lan ngliwati alam Galapagos paling apik dilakokake kanthi nggunakake kapal, kaya Charles Darwin ing taun 1835. Nalika 60 kapal ngliwati perairan Galapagos - saka 8 nganti 100 penumpang. Akèh-akèhé wong nggabungake ing kapal ing wektu musim tinggi. Pasti agèn sing nggabungake wong-wong iki duwé pangertan sing apik ngenani kapal-kapal sing apik. Iki bakal ngamukakake yèn kawruh wong-wong iki lan/utawa kakuwatan wong-wong iki bisa diwatesi kanthi kapal sing paling apik.
ref: Ndelok panggonan lan alam liar Galapagos iku paling apik nganggo prau, kaya sing dilakoni Charles Darwin ing 1835. Luwih saka 60 kapal besiar ngebaki laut Galapagos - wiwit saka ukuran 8 nganti 100 panumpang. Akeh wong sing wis mesen kursi sadurunge mangkat rono (amarga akeh prau sing biyasane wis kebak nalika mangsane wis rame). Mesthekna agen sing ing ngendi sampeyan pesen iku ahline Galapagos kanthi wawasan sing apik babagan pirang-pirang macem kapal. Iki bakal njamin menawa minat lan/utawa alangan tartamtu sampeyan cocok karo kapal sing paling pas kanggo kuwi kabeh.

src: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find. They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise. Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.
mt: Kasino umume nggawe upaya-upaya kanggo nambah wektu lan dana sing dipunggina dening tamu. Jendela lan jam biasane ora ana, lan pintu keluar bisa dadi nggawis. Mereka biasane duwe panganan, minuman lan tawaran hiburan khusus, kanggo nggawe tamu ing suwung suwung, lan nggawe dheweke ing properti. Bebarengan karo venue, duwe minuman beralkohol ing rumah. Nanging, mabuk nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe dheweke nggawe
ref: Kasino adate gawe usaha kanggo nggedhekke wektu lan dhuwit sing dibayar dening tamu-tamu. Cendhela lan jam umume ora ana, lan dalan metu biyasane angel ditemokake. Biyasane dheweke duwe panganan khusus, omben-omben lan hiburan, supaya swasan ati tamu tetep apik, lan nggawe dheweke betah. Sawetara panggonan nawakake ombenan alkohol gratis. Nanging, mendem mblawurne akal, lan kabeh penjudi sing apik ngerti pentinge tetep sadhar.

src: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects. It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.
mt: Semua kata benda, saka tembung Sie kanggo kalian, selalu awali karo huruf kapital, bahkan ing tengah kalimat. Kajaba kajenengan, iki bisa nyebabake perbedaan antara beberapa kata kerja lan objek. Iki uga mungkin nggawe bacaan luwih gampang, nanging tulisan bisa sedikit rumit amarga perlu ngerti apakah kata kerja utawa adjektiva digunakake ing bentuk substantivized.
ref: Kabeh tembung aran, sajejere tembung Sie kanggo sampeyan, tansah diwiwiti kanthi aksara gedhe, uga sanadyan ing tengah ukara. Iki cara sing penting kanggo mbedakake antarane sawetara tembung kriya lan lesan. Iki uga bisa disebut agawe maca luwih gampang, sanadyan nulis dadi ruwet amarga butuh nggoleki menawa tembung kriya utawa tembung sipat digunakake ing bentuk sing tenan anane apa ora.

src: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating ""hello."" However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."
mt: Ing akèh-akèhé donya, nggolek bisa dadi tanda kasenengan, nuduhake ""hallo"". Nanging, ing Malaysia, ing paling ora, ing wong Melayu ing désa-désa, isih nuduhake ""mari,"" sing padha karo jempol sing bentuk menyang awak, tanda sing digunakake ing siji wong-wong ing donya Barat, lan bisa digunakake mung kanggo tujuan iku. Saliyané, wong Britania sing numpul ing Spanyol bisa ngertèni nggolek kabèhé nalika nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggolek kabèhé nggole
ref: Ana akeh bageyan ndonya, ngobahke tangan, kuwi nandhakake “halo.” Nanging, ning Malaysia, paling ora, kanggo wong sing uri ing ndesa, tegese “mampir,” persis kaya driji sing nekuk, polah sing dituduhke dening negara sisih Kulon tartamtu, lan kudune dienggo kanggo tujuan kuwi. Mangkono uga, wong lelungan saka Inggris ing Spanyol bisa uga salah negesake tangan dadah-dadah sing nyangkut tapak tangan ndadahi (dudu wong sing didadahi) minangka sasmita kanggo bali.

src: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges. The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed. At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.
mt: Gletser ora stabil, nanging aliran menyang gunung. Kajaba kabeh, iki bakal nyebabake retakan, crevasses, sing bisa ditutupi dening jembatan salju. Dinding lan atap gudang es bisa runtuh lan retakan bisa ditutupi. Ing pinggir gletser blok-blok gedhe banget sing runtuh, jatuh lan mungkin nggolek utawa nggolek saka pinggir.
ref: Gletser kuwi ora stabil, nanging mili medhun saka gunung. Iki bakal nyebabke retakan, celah-celah, sing uga bisa dialangi dening jembatan salju. Tembok lan langit-langit gua es bisa ambruk lan retak bisa ketutup. Ana pinggiran glasier blok sing gedhe banget pecah, ceblok lan kira-kira mluncat utawa ngglindhing saya adoh saka pinggiran.

src: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of Congo in the extreme east near Rwanda. In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre. While Goma is reasonably safe, any visits outside of Goma should be researched to understand the state of the fighting that persists in the North Kivu province. The city is also the base to climb the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest Mountain Gorilla tracking in Africa. You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.
mt: Goma iku kutha pariwisata DRC ing paling wétan ing dekat Rwanda. Taun 2002 Goma dihancurake dening lava saka gunung Nyiragongo sing nguburake rong-rong kutha, khususe kutha pusat. Goma iku aman, nanging kunjungan saka luar Goma kudu diwaca supaya ngerti keadaan perang sing ana ing provinsi Kivu Lor. Kutha iki uga panggonan kanggo naik gunung Nyiragongo lan gorila gunung ing Afrika sing paling murah. Kamangka bisa nggunakake boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) kanggo ngelangi Goma. Harga normal (lokal) yaiku ~500 Franc Kongo kanggo perjalanan sing pendek.
ref: Goma iku kutha turis Republik Demokratik Kongo ana pinggiran sisih wetan cedhak Rwanda. Taun 2002 Goma ajur gara-gara lava saka gunung Nyiragongo sing ngubur akeh kutha lan dalan-dalan, utamane punjere kutha. Sanadyan Goma iku sejatine aman, ketekan apa wae sak njabane Goma kudu disinau kanggo mangerteni kahanan perang sing ajeg ana ing Provinsi Kivu Lor. Kutha iki uga dadi dhasar kanggo menek gunung geni Nyiragongo bebarengan karo mlaku nututi dalan kanggo golek Gunung Gorila sing paling murah ing Afrika. Sampeyan bisa nggunakake boda-boda (taksi sepeda) supaya bisa menyang Goma. Regane (lokal) biyasane ~500 Congolese Francs kanggo jarak cedhak.

The city is also the base to climb the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest Mountain Gorilla tracking in Africa. You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.
mt: Goma iku kutha pariwisata DRC ing paling wétan ing dekat Rwanda. Taun 2002 Goma dihancurake dening lava saka gunung Nyiragongo sing nguburake rong-rong kutha, khususe kutha pusat. Goma iku aman, nanging kunjungan saka luar Goma kudu diwaca supaya ngerti keadaan perang sing ana ing provinsi Kivu Lor. Kutha iki uga panggonan kanggo naik gunung Nyiragongo lan gorila gunung ing Afrika sing paling murah. Kamangka bisa nggunakake boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) kanggo ngelangi Goma. Harga normal (lokal) yaiku ~500 Franc Kongo kanggo perjalanan sing pendek.
ref: Goma iku kutha turis Republik Demokratik Kongo ana pinggiran sisih wetan cedhak Rwanda. Taun 2002 Goma ajur gara-gara lava saka gunung Nyiragongo sing ngubur akeh kutha lan dalan-dalan, utamane punjere kutha. Sanadyan Goma iku sejatine aman, ketekan apa wae sak njabane Goma kudu disinau kanggo mangerteni kahanan perang sing ajeg ana ing Provinsi Kivu Lor. Kutha iki uga dadi dhasar kanggo menek gunung geni Nyiragongo bebarengan karo mlaku nututi dalan kanggo golek Gunung Gorila sing paling murah ing Afrika. Sampeyan bisa nggunakake boda-boda (taksi sepeda) supaya bisa menyang Goma. Regane (lokal) biyasane ~500 Congolese Francs kanggo jarak cedhak.

src: Any camping below the rim in Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit. Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month. Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan. Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations. There are a limited number permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first come, first served basis.
mt: Kanggo ngadhepi ing Grand Canyon, perlu ijin kawasan sing ora ana. Ijin kawasan sing ora ana terbatas kanggo ngurangi Grand Canyon, lan dadi disediakake ing 1 dina sasi, telung sasi sadurunge sasi start. Mula, ijin kawasan sing ora ana kanggo start tanggal ing Mèi disediakake ing 1 Jan. Space kanggo area sing paling populer, kaya Bright Angel Campground sing cedhak Phantom Ranch, umume penuh nalika request sing diterima ing dina pisanan sing disediakake kanggo reservasi. Ana angka ijin kawasan sing ora ana sing terbatas kanggo request sing ora ana disediakake ing dina pisanan, dadi pisanan.
ref: Sembarang perkemahan ing ngisor pinggir Ngarai Gedhe butuh ijin daerah njero. Idin sing diwenehke ana wateane kanggo nglindhungi jurang iki, lan bakla kasedhiyan wiwit sasi ngarep, patang sasi sadurunge wiwitan sasi iki. Mula, idin pedhaleman kanggo tanggal wiwitan kapan wae ing Mei dadi kasadhiya ing 1 Jan. Ruang kanggo wewengkon sing paling misuwur, kayata Lapang Kemah Malekat Cahya, ing jejere Pangingon Phantom, umume diisi dening panyuwunan sing ditampa ing tanggal kapisan dibukak kanggo leladen. Ana saperangan ijin sing diwatesi kanggo panjalukan teka langsung kasedhiya kanthi sistem teka pisanan, dilayani pisanan.

src: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries. These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife. The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character. While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries. A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.
mt: Beberapa hotel duwé warisan saka jaman emas rel kereta uap lan kapal laut; sadurung Perang Donya II, ing abad kaping 19 utawa awal abad kaping 20. Hotel iki dadi tempat sing diwènèhi kanggo wong kaya lan wong sing misuwur ing jaman iku, lan kadang-kadang duwé panganan lan kehidupan malam sing apik. Fitting sing kuno, kurang saka amanahan sing paling anyar, lan siji karakter sing kaguman lan kaguman uga dadi bagéane karakteré. Sementara kaya-kaya, mungkinkah nggolongake penerbangan donya sing rata, sing dipecah dadi nginap ing akèh-akèhé hotel iki.
ref: Sawetara hotel duweni warisan saka mangsa keemasan kereta uap lan kapal laut; sakdurunge Perang Donya keloro, ing abad ke 19 utawa awal abad ke 20. Hotel-hotel iki jaman dhisike ana ngendi wong-wong sugih lan terkenal ing masane bakal nginep, lan asring mangan wengi lan kegiatan wengi. Prabot mode kuna, kurange fasilitas paling anyar, lan umur sing anggun iku uga perangan karaktere dheweke padha. Sanajan biasane duweke pribadi, nanging dheweke asring ngladheni pamimpin negara lan pejabat liyane. Wong lelungan karo tumpukan dhuwit bisa uga nimbang lelungan muter-muter donya, bubar kanthi nginep ing lusmen-lusmen kasebut.

src: "Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access. Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi. As mentioned above, though the word ""Eskimo"" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners. The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland. Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no ""rough areas."" Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing. The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues. During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating."
mt: “Kanggo wong asing, Greenland ora ngerti basa Inggris. Ing Greenland, basa resmi yaiku basa Greenland, sing uga dikenal minangka basa Kalaallisut. Basa Greenland yaiku basa Inuit, sing uga dikenal minangka basa Eskimo. Basa Greenland uga dikenal minangka basa Kalaallisut, sing artine basa Kalaallit (plural). Basa Greenland uga dikenal minangka basa Inuktitut, sing artine basa Inuk (plural). Basa Greenland uga dikenal minangka basa Inuktitut, sing artine basa Inuk (plural). Basa Greenland uga dikenal minangka basa Inuktitut, sing artine basa Inuk (plural). Basa Greenland uga dikenal minangka basa Inuktitut, sing artine basa Inuk (plural). Basa Greenland uga dikenal minangka basa Inuktitut, sing
ref: Awit saka sambungan kabel serat optik ngisor laut menyang Eropa lan broadband satelit, Greenland bisa nyambung apik kanthi 93% pedunung sing duwe akses internet. Hotel utawa lusmen sampeyan (yen sampeyan manggon ing omah tamu utawa omah pribadi) bakal duwe wifi utawa PC sing ana sambungan internet, lan kabeh panggonan duwe kafe internet utawa lokasi kanthi wifi umum. Kaya sing diumumke ning ndhuwur, sanadyan ukara “Eskimo” tetep ditrima ana ning Amerika Serikat, nanging tetep dianggep ngremehke dening akeh woong Arktik dudu-Amerika Serikat, utamane ning Kanada. Sanajan sampeyan bisa ngrungokake tembung sing digunakake dening Pribumi Greenland, panggunaan kasebut kudu diluputake saka wong asing. Pribumi Greenland nyebut awake dhewe Inuit ing Kanada lan Kalaalleq (jamak Kalaallit), yaiku wong Greenlander, ing Greenland. Kejahatan, lan niatan ala marang wong asing umume, saktenane ora diweruhi ing Greenland. Semono uga ing kutha, ora ana “wilayah bahaya.” Cuaca adhem iku mungkin siji-sijine bebaya nyata sing ora siap bakal diadhepi. Menawa sampeyan ngunjungi Greenland sasuwene mangsa adhem (eling menawa luwih adoh sampeyan menyang lor, iki bakal dadi sansaya adhem), penting kanggo nggawa klambi anget sacukupe. Dina-dina sing suwe banget ing mangsa panas bisa njalari perkara-perkara turu sing cukup lan gegayutan perkara kasarasan. Nalika mangsa ketiga, ati-ati marang nyamuk Nordik. Sanadyan nyamuk-nyamuk iki ora nularke penyakit, nanging nyamuk iki ngganggu banget.

src: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for a 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the sole surviving building. It now functions as the central plaza, and always has a lot of things going on, day and night. There are a number of restaurants surrounding the garden, and in the afternoons and evening there free concerts are often given from the central gazebo. Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is home of an old love legend. For a few pennies some children will tell you the story.
mt: Jardín de la Unión. Wewengkon iki dibangun minangka atrium kanggo konvent abad kaping 17, sing saka sing nggawe Templo de San Diego yaiku bangunan sing isih urip. Saiki fungsi minangka plaza pusat, lan saben dina lan malam ana aktivitas, saben dina lan malam ana konser gratis sing umume dianakake saka gazebo pusat. Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Dua balkon sing dipisahake kanthi 69 sentimeter yaiku rumah saka legenda cinta sing kuno. Saben dina lan malam ana anak-anak sing bakal ngomongake kisah iki.
ref: Jardín de la Unión. Ruang iki dibangun minangka atrium kanggo konvensi abad kaping-17, ing ngendi Templo de San Diego iku bangunan siji-sijine sing isih ana. Iki saiki fungsine minangka alun-alun pusat, lan tansah duwe akeh hal kedadean, awan lan bengi. Ana akeh warung ana ing saubengan taman kuwi, lan nalika awan lan sore uga ana konser gratis sing saka njero gazebo punjer. Callejon del Beso (Gang Ambungan). Rong balkon sing kapisah mung 69 sentimeter yaiku omah saka legenda katresnan lawas. Kanggo sawetara sen, bocah-bocah bakal nyritakake crita kasebut marang sampeyan.

src: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails. Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day. For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them. Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.
mt: Jalan-jalan ing alam sing ngandhut aktivitas sing ngandhut langkah ing lingkungan alam, umume ing jalan-jalan. Jalan-jalan ing esuk ngandhut jarak sing kurang saka mil ing nganti jarak sing bisa ditutup ing siji dina. Jalan-jalan ing esuk ing jalan-jalan sing gampang ngandhut jarak sing kurang, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti, lan apik kanggo ngerti
ref: Mlaku munggah gunung kuwi kagiyatan ana njaba omah sing kalebu mlaku ana ning lingkungan alam, asring ana jalur munggah gunung. Munggah gunung wayah awan kalebu sing adohe luwih sithik saka sak mile nganti sing luwih adoh maneh sing bisa dirampungne sedina. Kanggo munggah gunung sedina sadawane dalan sing gampang persiapan sing dibutuhake iku sathithik, lan wong sing kabugarane sedhengan bisa melu. Kulawarga kanthi bocah cilik-cilik bisa uga butuh persiapan luwih, nanging sedina ing njaba iku bisa gampang kelakon sanadyan karo bayi lan bocah durung sekolah.

src: "Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau. These plateaus are often referred to as ""vidde"" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse. In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called ""hei"" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather."
mt: Khas Norwegia yaiku fjord sing nggolek lan lembah sing tiba-tiba nggolek dadi plateau sing dhuwur, sing ora katon, sing ora katon. Plateau iki umume diarani ""vidde"" sing artine wewengkon sing luwih gedhe, terbuka, sing ora katon, ruang sing ora katon. Ing Rogaland lan Agder, umume diarani ""hei"" sing artine moorland sing ora katon sing umume ditebaki karo heather.
ref: "Ciri khase Norwegia kuwi teluk sempit lan dawa sing tajem lan lembah sing ujug-ujug munggah, kurang utawa luwih plato sing rata. Dataran iki asring diarani ""vidde"" sing tegese papan sing bukakan tanpa wates sing amba, gumelar tanpa wates. Ing Rogaland lan Agder dheweke asring diarani ""hei"" sing tegese lemah tanpa wit sing asring ditutupi heather."

src: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer. However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.
mt: Musim wisata kanggo stasiun gunung umume ngremuk nalika musim panas India. Nanging, kaya gunung kasebut duwe macem-macem kecantikan lan kelebihan nalika musim dingin, karo stasiun gunung sing menerima jumlah salju sing sehat lan ngawontun aktivitas kaya ski lan snowboard.
ref: Mangsa turis stasiun bukit umume muncak sasuwene mangsa panas Indian. Nanging, dheweke nduwe jinis kaendahan lan tenung beda-beda nalika mangsa atis, kanthi akeh setasiyun bukit nampa gunggung salju sing waras lan nawakake kamempengan kayata ski lan prosotan salju.

src: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you. Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.
mt: Jagami yen kalian ngegolongke marina, kabeh bakal jelas. Kalian bakal temu karo wong-wong sing ngegolongke kapal lan bakal ngegolongke informasi karo kalian. Sing mung bakal kalian ngegolongke karo kalian ya iku ngegolongke ngegolongke kalian, ngegolongke wong sing ngegolongke kapal, ngegolongke wong sing ngegolongke kapal, ngegolongke wong sing ngegolongke kapal, ngegolongke wong sing ngegolongke kapal, ngegolongke wong sing ngegolongke kapal, ngegolongke wong sing ngegolongke kapal, ngegolongke wong sing ngegolongke kapal, ngegolongke wong sing ngegolongke kapal, ngegolongke wong sing ngegolongke kapal, ngegolongke wong sing ngegolongke kapal, ngegolongke wong sing ngegolongke kapal, ngegolongke wong sing ngegolongke kapal, ngegolongke wong sing ngegolongke kapal, ngegolongke wong sing ngegolongke kapal, ngegolongke wong sing ngegolongke kapal, ngegolongke wong sing ngegolongke kapal, ngegolongke wong sing ngegolongke kapal, ngegolongke wong sing ngegolongke kapal, ngegolongke wong sing ngegolongke kapal, ngegolongke wong sing ngegolongke kapal, ngegolongke wong sing ngegolongke kapal, ngegolongke wong sing ngegolongke kapal, ngegolongke wong sing ngegolongke kapal, ngegol
ref: Sampeyan kudu yakin nalikane tekan pelabuhan kabeh bakal dadi jelas. Sampeyan bakal nemoni wong liya kang nunut prau lan dheweke bakal mbagekake informasine marang sampeyan. Dhasare sampeyan bakal masang wara-wara nawarne pitulungan sampeyan, wira-wiri ing dermaga, nyedaki wong kang ngresiki kapal pesiare, nyoba kenalan karo pelaut ana ing bar, lsp. Cobanen ngomong karo wong saakeh-akehe. Sakwise sawetara wektu kabeh wong bakal kenal sampeyan lan bakal menehi sampeyan petunjuk prau endi sing nggoleki wong.

src: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus. The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite. The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.
mt: Hong Kong Island nyebabake Hong Kong dadi jeneng wilayah Hong Kong lan iku sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis dadi panggonan sing wis
ref: Pulo Hong Kong menehi wilayah Hongkong jenenge lan iku papan sing dianggep akeh plancong minangka pusat utamane. Arak-arakan bangunan kang ndadekake pencakar langite Hong Kong dibandhingne karo bagan batangan sing murup sing digawe cetha kanthi anane banyu saka Pelabuhan Victoria. Kanggo oleh pasawangan sing paling apik ing Hong Kong, lunga saka pulo kasebut lan tumuju menyang pinggir laut Kowloon sing sabrangan. Sebagean gedhe pulo Kong Kong perkembangan urban padhet banget ing lemah sing direklamasi ing pesisir lor. Iki minangka papan sing diarani para panjajah Inggris dadi duweke lan yen sampeyan nggoleki bukti daerah kolonial sing kepungkur, iki minangka papan sing apik kanggo diwiwiti.

src: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them. If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole. Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.
mt: Stirrup yaiku soket kanggo kaki penunggang sing nglengkung ing sisi-sisine saka sadel. Panunggang bisa luwih stabil amarga stirrup, nanging bisa ngemot risiko keamanan amarga kaki penunggang bisa nggatutake stirrup. Jika penunggang ditendang saka kuda, nanging kaki penunggang nggatutake stirrup, bisa ditarikake karo kuda sing berlari. Untuk meminimalkan risiko iki, sawetara tindakan keamanan bisa diwènèhake. Sawijining, akèh penunggang nggunakake botol ngeblengkakake kanthi ujung lan jembaran, kaya sing luwih cemar, kanthi sole sing cukup sempit. Sabanjuré, sawetara sadel, khususé sadel Inggris, duwé bar keamanan sing bisa nglengkungake lengkungan sadel sing bisa ditarik saka sadel jika ditarik ngliwet saka penunggang sing jatuh.
ref: Sanggurdi kasebut minangka anggan kanggo sikil panunggang sing nggandul ing loro-lorone lapak. Dheweke nyedhiyakake stabilitas sing luwih gedhe kanggo sing nunggangi nanging bisa uga kuwatir amarga sikil wong sing nunggang isih bisa kajebak ana kana. Menawa penunggang tiba saka jaran nanging duwe siji sikil sing kejiret ing sanggurdi, dheweke padha bisa digeret menawa jarane mlayu. Kanggo nyilikake resiko iki, sawetara tindakan pencegahan kanggo keamanan bisa ditindakake. Sing sepisan, ameh kabeh penunggang nganggo sepatu but kanggo nunggang sing ana hake lan sole alus tur sempit. Sabanjure, sawetara lapak, kususe lapak Inggris, duwe palang pengaman sing ngidini kulit sanggur tiba saka lapak yen ditarik mundur dening pangendara sing tiba.

src: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit. Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification. A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay. He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.
mt: Jaringan tukar tamu sing ramah iku organisasi sing nggabungake para pelancong karo warga lokal ing kutha-kutha sing wis ditindakakake. Nglakoni jaringan kaya iki biasane nggabutake formulir online; walaupun jaringan-jaringan kaya iki nggabutake verifikasi tambahan. Daftar tukang sing disediakake bisa disediakake ing cetakan lan/utawa online, kadang-kadang karo referensi lan ulasan saka para pelancong liyane. Couchsurfing didegake ing Januari 2004 sawise Casey Fenton nemokake penerbangan murah menyang Islandia nanging ora duwe tempat sing bisa ditindakakake. Dheweke nulis email marang siswa ing universitas lokal lan nemokake jumlah sing dhuwur saka tawaran gratis akomodasi.
ref: Jaringan pertukaran mertamu iku organisasi sing ngubungake pelancong karo wong lokal ing kutha-kutha sing dheweke ameh tekani. Kanggo melu jaringan biyasane mung kudu ngisi formulir daring; sanajan sawetara jaringan nawakake utawa mbutuhake pambukten tambahan. Urutan wong sing bisa nyedhiyani omah kanggo nginep banjur disedhiyakake kanthi dicethak utawa onlen, kadang kala kanthi acuan lan ulasan sing digawe dening wong sing nginep. Couchsurfing didegake ing Januari 2004 sawise programer komputer Casey Fenton nemokake penerbangan murah menyang Islandia nanging ora duwe papan kanggo nginep. Dheweke ngirimke surat elektronik marang siswane ana universitas lokal lan nrima akeh banget tawaran akomodasi gratis.

ref: Jaringan pertukaran mertamu iku organisasi sing ngubungake pelancong karo wong lokal ing kutha-kutha sing dheweke ameh tekani. Kanggo melu jaringan biyasane mung kudu ngisi formulir daring; sanajan sawetara jaringan nawakake utawa mbutuhake pambukten tambahan. Urutan wong sing bisa nyedhiyani omah kanggo nginep banjur disedhiyakake kanthi dicethak utawa onlen, kadang kala kanthi acuan lan ulasan sing digawe dening wong sing nginep. Couchsurfing didegake ing Januari 2004 sawise programer komputer Casey Fenton nemokake penerbangan murah menyang Islandia nanging ora duwe papan kanggo nginep. Dheweke ngirimke surat elektronik marang siswane ana universitas lokal lan nrima akeh banget tawaran akomodasi gratis.

src: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too. Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels do allow them in private rooms.
mt: Kanggo umur, hostels ngecat utamane marang wong muda – tamengan kanggo tamengan umur 20-an – nanging kowe bisa ditemokake wong-wong sing luwih tuwa ing hostels uga. Keluarga karo anak-anak isih langka, nanging hostels saka hostels sing ngijabake karo ruang privat.
ref: Asrama mung ngladheni wong enom – tamu khusus sing umur rong puluhan – nanging sampeyan uga asring bisa nemokake plancong sing luwih tuwa. Keluwarga kanthi anak-anak iku sawijining sawangan jarang, nanging sawetara pondhokan ngidini dheweke padha ing kamar pribadi.

src: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire. If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning. Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy
mt: Boomerang nggolek iku ketrampilan sing populer sing akèh turis ingkang maringi. Jika kalian maringi nglakoni nggolek boomerang sing kembali menyang tangan kalian, pasti kalian duwe boomerang sing cocok. Boomerang sing umum ing Australia iku ora kembali. Iki paling cocok kanggo pemula ora nggolek ing angin.
ref: Nguncalake boomerang iku ketrampilan populer sing pengin dirambah akeh wisatawan. Yen sampeyan kepingin sinau nyawatake bumerang sing bisa bali maneh menyang tanganmu, pestekno sampeyan nduwe bumerang sing cocog lan bisa bali. Akeh-akeh bumerang sing sumedya ing Australia sejatine ora bisa dibalekake. Iki sing paling apik kanggo pemula kanggo ora njajal nguncalke ing angin.

src: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation. But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java. Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.
mt: Ing 17.000 pulo kanggo dipilih, panganan Indonesia minangka istilah payu sing ngamot jajanan regional sing ditemokake ing kabeh pulo. Nanging, kala digunakake tanpa kualifikasi, istilah iki nuduhake panganan asale saka bagian tengah lan wétan pulo Jawa. Saiki umum dipasarakake ing kabeh pulo, panganan Jawa ngamot jajanan sing ora ana sengaran, favoritane Javanese yaiku kacang, cabai, gula (khusus gula Jawa) lan bahan rempah sing beragam.
ref: Kanthi 17,000 pulo-pulo sing bisa dipilih, panganan Indonesia iku tembung umum sing nyakup pirang-pirang jinis masakan daerah sing ditemokake ing sak negara. Nanging, yen digunakake tanpa kualifikasi luwih adoh, istilah iki bakal diartekne yen panganan iki asline saka jawa sisih wetan lan tengah. Saiki wis kasedhiya ana kabeh daerah ning nuswantara, masakan Jawa sing nyedhiyakake akeh jinis hidangan sederhana, rasa tambahan sing disenengi dening wong Jawa yaiku kacang, lombok, gula (kususe gula klapa Jawa) lan empon-empon wangi liyane.

src: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings. An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases. These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.
mt: Kanggo wong sing asing saka jargon kedokteran, tembung infektif lan kontagius duwe arti sing beda. Penyakit infektif yaiku penyakit sing disebabake dening patogen, kaya virus, bakteri, jamur utawa parasit liyane. Penyakit kontagius yaiku penyakit sing bisa disebarkan kanthi gampang dening ana ing dekat wong sing nggawa infeksi. Banyake pamarintahan ngutamake wong sing masuk, utawa warga sing ngeculake, negara-negara kasebut kanggo diimunisasi kanggo jinis penyakit. Kebijakan kasebut bisa akibatke saka negara-negara sing wis ditampa utawa wis ditampa wong sing wis ngeculake.
ref: Kanggo sapa kang awam karo jargon medis, tembung infeksi lan nular duwe teges kang beda. Lelaran sing nular yaiku lelaran sing disebabake dening patogen, kayata virus, bakteri, jamur utawa parasit liyane. Penyakit nular yaiku penyakit sing gampang pindhah kanthi ana ing sekitare wong sing kena. Akeh pemerintah majibake dhayoh mlebu, utawa penduduk lunga, negarane divaksinasi kanggo maneka warna penyakit. Syarat-syarat iki biyasane gumantung marang negara sing kepingin ditekani dening wisatawan.

src: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering. They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http. They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.
mt: VPN (virtual private network) pribadi ya iku cara sing apik kanggo ngelintang kawedanan politik lan geofiltering IP komersial. Iki luwih apik tinimbang proxy web kanggo sawetara alasan: Iki ngganti seluruh lalu lintas internet, ora mung http. Iki biasane ngandhut bandwidth lan kualitas layanan sing luwih apik. Iki biasane enkripsi lan karenan luwih sulit diintip.
ref: Panyedhiya VPN pribadi (jaringan pribadi virtual) yaiku cara paling apik kanggo mbukak panyensuran politik lan IP-geofilter komersial. Dheweke luwih unggul tinimbang proksi jaringan kanthi alesan: dheweke ngelih jalur lalu lintas internet, ora mung http. Biyasane dheweke nawakke bandwith sing luwih dhuwur lan kualitas layanan sing luwih apik. Tur uga dienkripsi saingga angel dideleng.

src: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel. There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona. Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.
mt: Karena panggilan dijalankan ing Internet, kalian ora kudu nggunakake perusahaan telepon sing ana ing tempat kalian tinggal utawa ing tempat kalian bejajar. Uga ora kudu kalian ngecakake nomer lokal saka komunitas ing tempat kalian tinggal; kalian bisa ngecakake nomer satelit Internet ing padang pasir Chicken, Alaska lan nggawe nomer sing ngklaim kalian ing Arizona sing cerah. Umume, kalian kudu beli nomer global sing bisa nggawe telepon PSTN bisa ngobrol kalian. Nomer sing saka maneh ngaruh kanggo wong sing ngobrol kalian.
ref: Amarga panggilan disalurake liwat Internet, sampeyan ora perlu nggunakake telpon perusahaan sing ana ing ngendi sampeyan manggon utawa ing ngendi sampeyan lelungan. Uga ora ana sarat supaya sampeyan entuk nomer lokal saka komunitas ing panggon sampeyan; Sampeyan bisa entuk sambungan Internet satelit ing alas gedhe Pitik, Alaska lan milih nomer sing nyatakake sampeyan ing Arizona sing crah. Asring, sampeyan kudu tuku nomer global kanthi kapisah sing ngidini tilpun PSTN ngubungi sampeyan. Nomer kasebut ndadekake prabéda kanggo wong sing nilpun sampeyan.
