src: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel. Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.
mt: Pranatake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake rongakake
ref: Pangucapan kasebut cukup gampang ing basa Itali amarga umume tembung diwaca persis karo carane nulis Aksara utama sing kudu diawasi yaiku c lan g, awit cara nembunge beda-beda gumantung saka aksara swara sing ngetutne. Uga priksa manawa ngucapake r lan rr kanthi beda: caro tegese sayang, dene carro tegese sepur.

src: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub. Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains. The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.
mt: İzmir yaiku kutha kang tiga gedhé ing Turki kanthi populasi watara 3,7 yuta, bandhara kang paling gedhé sawise Istanbul, lan hub transportasi sing apik. Ing wektu kuna, kutha iki dikenal minangka Smyrna, saiki dadi kutha komersial sing modern, perkembangan, lan padha, sing dikelilingi karo gunung-gunung. Jalan-jalan sing lebar, gedhung-gedhung sing kaca, lan pusat-pusat perbelanjaan sing modern, ditemokake karo atap-atap tradisional sing rada abang, pasar ing abad kaping 18, lan masjid-masjid lan gereja-gereja sing kuna, nanging kutha iki duwe atmosfer sing luwih saka Eropa Mediterania tinimbang Turki tradisional.
ref: Izmir iku kutha paling gedhe nomer telu ing Turki kanthi populasi kira-kira 3,7 yuta, pelabuhan paling gedhe nomer loro sakwise Istanbul, lan pusat transportasi sing apik banget. Dhisik Smyrna minangka kutha kuna, sing saiki dadi pusat padagangan modheren, megar lan sibuk, dumunung ing sakubenge teluk gedhe lan dikubengi gunung. Dalan raya sing gedhe, gedhung tembok-kaca lan pasar moderen dirias kanthi gendheng tradisional keramik-abang, pasar abad 18, lan mejid lan gereja tuwa, sanadyan kutha iki nduweni hawa Eropa Mediterania tinimbang tradisional Turki.

src: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice. In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.
mt: Ngamati bunga ceri, sing dikenal minangka hanami, wis dadi bagian budaya Jepang wiwit abad kaping 8. Konsep iku saka Cina, bunga ceri sing dadi pilihan. Ing Jepang, acara ceri kapisan dipimpin dening kaisar, sing dipimpin dening diri lan anggota aristokrasi liyane ing Istana Kekaisaran.
ref: Sesawangan kembang sakura, dikenal dadi hanami, wis dadi kabudayane wong Jepang wiwit abad 8. Gagasan kasebut saka China ing ngendi kembang plum yaiku kembang sing dadi pilihan. Ing Jepang, pista kembang sakura kang kapisan sing dianakake Kaisar mung kanggo awake dhewe lan anggota liya aristokrasi ing sakubenge Pangadilan Imperial.

src: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.
mt: Jerusalem iku kutha krajan lan kutha gedhé dhéwé Israèl, walaupun negara liyane lan PBB ora ngakoni Jerusalem minangka kutha krajan Israèl. Kutha kuna ing bukit Yudea duwé sejarah sing apik banget sing ngrembaka saka abad-abad. Kutha iki kudhah kanggo tiga agama monotheistic - Yahudi, Kristen lan Islam, lan njabat minangka pusat spiritual, agama, lan budaya. Akibatke pentingé agama kutha iki, lan khususé situs-situs kuna ing kutha kuna, Jerusalem iku salah sijining destinasi wisata utama ing Israèl. Jerusalem duwé situs-situs sejarah, arkeologi lan budaya, sarta pusat-pusat belanja, kafé, lan restoran sing padha.
ref: Yerusalem kuwi ibukota lan kutha sing paling gedhe ning Israel, sanadyan akeh banget negara lan uga PBB ora ngaoni kutha iki dadi ibukota Israel. Kutha kuno ing Bukit Yudea duwe sejarah sing narik kawigaten rentang ewunan taun. Kutha kasebut iku suci kanggo telu agama monoteis - Yahudi, Kristen, lan Islam, lan minangka pusat spiritual, agama lan budhaya. Amarga kapentingan agama ana ning kutha, lan utamane akeh panggonan saka daerah Kutha Lawas, Yerusalem kuwi salah sawijine tujuan utama turis ana ning Israel. Jerusalem duwe akeh panggonan bersejarah, arkeologis lan budaya, kanthi pusat blanja sing werna-werni lan rame, cafe, lan restoran.

ref: Yerusalem kuwi ibukota lan kutha sing paling gedhe ning Israel, sanadyan akeh banget negara lan uga PBB ora ngaoni kutha iki dadi ibukota Israel. Kutha kuno ing Bukit Yudea duwe sejarah sing narik kawigaten rentang ewunan taun. Kutha kasebut iku suci kanggo telu agama monoteis - Yahudi, Kristen, lan Islam, lan minangka pusat spiritual, agama lan budhaya. Amarga kapentingan agama ana ning kutha, lan utamane akeh panggonan saka daerah Kutha Lawas, Yerusalem kuwi salah sawijine tujuan utama turis ana ning Israel. Jerusalem duwe akeh panggonan bersejarah, arkeologis lan budaya, kanthi pusat blanja sing werna-werni lan rame, cafe, lan restoran.

src: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park. It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.
mt: Kruger National Park (KNP) ana ing lor-wetan Afrika Kidul lan ngalir ing perbatasan Mozambik ing lor, Zimbabwe ing lor, lan perbatasan kidul yaiku Sungai Krokodil. Park iki nggulung 19,500 km² lan dibagi dadi 14 zona ekologi, masing-mising ngemot hewan liar sing beda. Iki salah sijining atraksi utama Afrika Kidul lan dianggep panji-panji South African National Parks (SANParks). Kaya karo kabeh South African National Parks, ana biaya konservasi lan masuk kanggo park iki. Uga bisa bermanfaat kanggo siji kanggo ngrangkep Wild Card, sing nyediakake masuk dadi pilihan park ing Afrika Kidul utawa kabeh South African National Parks.
ref: Taman Nasional Kruger (KNP) manggon ana lor-wetan Afrika Kidul lan sadawane watesanMozambiq ana sisih wetan, Zimbabwe ana sisih lor, lan wates sisih kidul iku Kali Boyo. Taman iki ambane 19.500 km² lan didum dadi 14 zona lingkungan sing beda-beda, kabeh cocog kanggo kewan. Iki salah sawijine hiburan utama sing ana ing Afrika Kidul lan diarani dadi andalan Taman Nasional Afrika Kidul (SANParks). Lan kanggo kabeh Taman Nasional Afrika Kidul, ana konservasi dinan lan tarip mlebu kanggo taman. Iki uga bisa nguntungake kanggo wong sing tuku Kertu Liar, sing nyedhiyani dalan mlebu menyang panggonan sing dipilih ning Afrika Kidul utawa ning Taman Nasional Afrika Kidul.

src: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins. It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes. Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail. That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly. There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.
mt: Kanggo wong sing nggoleki saka sisi lor Machu Picchu, gunung iki sing nggoleki nganti 45 menit. Gunung iki sing nggoleki nganti 45 menit. Gunung iki sing nggoleki nganti 45 menit. Gunung iki sing nggoleki nganti 45 menit. Gunung iki sing nggoleki nganti 45
ref: Munggul ning ndhuwur pucuk sisih lor Machu Picchu yaiku gunung sing ndronjong, asring dadi latar mburi foto sing rumuntuh. Katone rada medeni saka ngisor, lan munggah gunung kuwi bakal angel lan dhuwur banget, nanging wong sing paling sehat kudune bisa munggah 45 menit tekan ndhuwur. Watu pijekan dideleh sadawane dalan kuwi, lan ana panggonan sing luwih curam dipasangi kabel baja kanggo nguwatke cekelane. Sing ngandika, ngarepake kentekan ambegan, lan ati-ati ing bagean sing luwih njuleg, utamane nalika udan, amarga bisa mbebayani kanthi cepet. Ana guwa sing cilik banget cedhak pucuke sing kudu diliwati, rada cendhek lan rada nyepit.

src: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout. A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.
mt: Kuliner Majorca, kaya sing padha ing zona sing padha ing Sagara Mediterania, dienggo beras, sayuran lan daging (khususnya babi), lan nggunakake minyak zaitun ing sakabehinge. Panganan sederhana sing populer, khusus ing musim panas, yaiku Pa amb Oli: roti karo minyak zaitun, tomat, lan bahan tambahan sing disediakake kaya keju, tuna, etc.
ref: Masakan Majorcan, kayata tlatah sing padha ing Mediterania, adhedhasar roti, sayur lan daging (khususe daging babi), lan nggunakake lenga zaitun ing saindenging. Nedha bengi sing biasa lan misuwur, utamane ing mangsa panas, yaiku Pa amb Oli: Roti nganggo lenga zaitun, tomat, lan bumbu-bumbu sing kasedhiya kayata keju, iwak tuna, lsp.

src: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground. The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot. The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.
mt: Hangi panganan yaiku masak ing lubang panas ing bumi. Lubang iku bisa dipanasi karo batu panas saka geni, utawa ing sumber geothermal alami ing sawetara tempat. Hangi biasane digunakake kanggo masak panganan tradisional roast gaya. Sawetara tempat ing Rotorua nyediakake geothermal hangi, sementara hangi liyane bisa disimpen ing Christchurch, Wellington lan liyane.
ref: Masakan Hangi iku dimasak ing bolongan panas ing jero lemah. Bolongan kuwi dipanaske nggunakake watu panas saka geni, utawa ana panggonan tartamtu nggunakake panass bumi sing gawe panas kanthi alami. Hangi kerep digunakake kanggo masak masakan jenis bakaran tradisional. Ana pirang-pirang panggonan ning Rotorua sing nawakke hangi panas bumi, lan hangi liyane bisa dijukuk ning Christchurch, Wellington lan panggonan liyane.

src: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too. Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees. This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!
mt: Ketika ngunjungi biara, wong-wong wajib nggunakake rok sing ngubengi lutut lan bahu ditutupi, uga. Banyak biara ngasilake bungkus kanggo wong-wong sing ora siap, nanging kalo kalian nggunakake bungkus kalian sendiri, khusus kanggo warna-warna, kalian bakal dadi seneng saka biarawan utawa biarawati ing pintu. Saka garis sing padha, wong-wong wajib nggunakake celana sing ngubengi lutut. Kajaba kalian bisa nggunakake bungkus saka stok ing pintu, nanging bungkus iki ora dicuci sawise penggunaan saben wong, mula kalian mungkin ora ngerteni nyaman nggunakake bungkus iki!
ref: Nalika ngunjungi biara-biara, para wanita diwajibake kanggo nganggo rok nutupi dhengkul lan nutupi pundhake dheweke padha, uga. Saperangan akeh biara nyawisake slendhang kanggo wanita sing teka tanpa persiapan, nanging menawa sampeyan nggawa nggone sampeyan dhewe, utamane sing wernane cerah, sampeyan bakal entuk eseman saka biarawan utawa biarawati ing dalan mlebu. Sadawane garis sing padha, pria kudu nganggo clana dawa sing nutupi dhengkul. Iki uga bisa disilih saka simpenan ing pintu mlebu nanging klambi kasebut ora dikumbah saben-saben bar dienggo dadi sampeyan bisa uga ngrasa ora nyaman nganggo saya iki. Sak ukuran kanggo kabeh wong lanang!

src: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon. This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock. As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.
mt: Jika kalian mampir ing area Artik utawa Antartik ing musim dingin kalian bakal ngalami malam kutub, sing artine sune ora ningkatan ing ati. Kajaba kalian bisa nonton Aurora borealis, amarga langit bakal gelap saben-saben wektu. Karena area iki ora padat penduduk, lan polusi cahya ora umum, kalian bakal bisa nonton bintang-bintang.
ref: Menawa sampeyan ngunjungi daerah Arktik utawa Antartika ing musim adhem sampeyan bakal ngalami bengi kutub, sing tegese menawa srengenge ora munggah ing ndhuwur cakrawala. Iki menehi wewengan sing apik kanggo ndeleng Aurora borealis, amarga langit bakal dadi luwih peteng utawa kurang ing sakubenge jam. Amarga wilayah kasebut populasine arang, lan polusine sithik mila kuwi dudu masalah, sampeyan uga bakal bisa nyawang lintang-lintang.

src: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call. The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs. Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.
mt: Ing lokasi sing jauh, tanpa layanan seluler, telepon satelit bisa jadi opsi muin. Telepon satelit ora umume digunakake minangka pengganti telepon seluler, amarga kowe kudu nganti luar ruang kanthi garis pandang sing jelas menyang satelit kanggo ngebandhingake telepon. Layanan kasebut umume digunakake dening kapal, kalebu kapal plesir, sarta ekspedisi sing duwe kebutuhan data lan suara sing jauh. Pemberi layanan telepon lokal kowe bisa ngerti ngenani nggabungake marang layanan kasebut.
ref: Ing lokasi sing asing, tanpa jangkoan ponsel, tilpon satelit bisa uga dadi pilihan sampeyan siji-sijine. Telpon satelit kuwi dudu kanggo ngowahi telpon, amarga sampeyan kudu menyang njaba kanthi jalur sing cetha menyang satelit yen kepingin telpon. Layanan iki umume digunakake dening pangiriman, kalebu kapal pribadhi, uga ekspedisi sing nduweni data jarak adoh lan mbutuhake swara. Panyedhiya layanan tilpun lokal sampeyan kudune bisa menehi informasi luwih babagan nyambungake marang layanan iki.

src: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country. Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations. The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.
mt: Kutha ibu negara Moldova iku Chişinău. Basa lokal iku Romanian, nanging Rusia umum. Moldova iku negara republik multi-etnis sing wis ngalami konflik etnis. Ing 1994, konflik iki nggawe Transnistria Republik sing ora diakoni dening negara anggota UN. Hubungan ekonomi wis diadegake antara pérangan-pérangan iki saka Moldova walaupun negosiasi politik ora sukses. Agama utama ing Moldova iku Kristen Ortodoks.
ref: Ibukota Moldova yaiku Chişinău. Basa lokaleyaiku Basa Romania, nanging basa Rusia sing paling akeh digunakake. Moldova minangka republik aneka-suku sing nandhang pasulayan suku. Taun 1994, perkara iki nyiptakake proklamasi sing dilakoni dening Republik Transnistria ning Moldova wetan, sing nduweni pamerintahe dhewe lan dhuwite dhewe nanging durung diakoni dening anggota PBB. Sambungan ekonomi wis dibangun maneh antarane rong bagean saka Moldova iki sanajan mrucut rerembug politik. Agama paling gedhe ing Moldova yaiku Kristen Ortodoks.

src: "Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common. The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says. There are no particular ""rainy"" and ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year."

src: "Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti. While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint. However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and ""legal"" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags."
mt: "Mural sing ora dikehendaki utawa tulisan sing ora dikehendaki dikenal minangka graffiti. Sadengah ora saka fenomena sing modern, akèh wong sing mungkin ngasokake karo vandalisme wong muda sing nggunakake cat semprot. Nanging, saiki ana seniman graffiti sing wis diresmike, acara graffiti lan dinding sing ""legal"". Gambar-gambar graffiti ing konteks iki akhire mirip karo karya seni ketimbang tanda sing ora bisa dibaca."
ref: "Mural utawa orek-orekan sing ora dikepengini iku arane grafiti. Sanajan adoh saka pristiwa modheren, umume wong bisa nggandhengake dheweke karo wong enom sing ngrusak prabot umum lan pribadi nggunakake cet semprot. Nanging, saiki ana seniwan grafiti mapan, acara grafiti lan tembok ""rasmi"". Gegambaran grafiti ing kahanan iki asring meh padha karo karya seni tinimbang tandha sing ora bisa diwaca."

src: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music. Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.
mt: Ing festival-festival sing padha, ronggane paling gedhe saka panonton musik festival ngendahake kemping ing situs, lan ronggane paling gedhe panonton ngertake menawa iki dadi bagian vital saka pengalaman. Jika kalian kepengin nggoleki aksi kalian kudu nggoleki dini kanggo nyepakake situs kemping sing adoh saka musik. Ingkang ngertake menawa musik ing panggung utama wis selesai, ana bagian saka festival sing bakal nggoleki musik nganti dhuwur ing nganti malam. Ana festival sing duwe kemping khusus kanggo keluarga sing anak cilik.
ref: Kanggo sawetara pista, umume hadlirin pista musik mancasi kemah ing panggon kasebut, lan umume hadlirin nganggep iku minangka bagean penting saka pangalaman. Yen sampeyan pengin cedhak sampeyan kudu luwih gasik kanggo njupuk papan pakemahan sing cedhak karo musik. Elinga yen sanadyan musik sing ana panggung utama wis mandheg, bisa uga ana bab saka pameran iki sing bakal tetep nyuwarakke musik iki nganti tengah wengi. Sawetara festival duweni panggonan kemah kang kusus kanggo kaluwarga kang duweni bocah cilik.

src: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.
mt: Kanggo ngerti, kabeh pueblos sing jembar, kudu nggawe nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki nggoleki ngg
ref: Kelingan akehe jumlah wong pueblos, sampeyan ora bakal bisa nemokake urip nalika wengi tanpa dolan menyang Albuquerque utawa Santa Fe. Nanging, ameh kabeh kasino sing kasebut ing dhuwur nyediyani ombenan, lan sawetarane nyediyani hiburan berkelas (utamane sing gedhe-gedhe sing ana cedhake Albuquerque lan Santa Fe). Ati-ati: bar-bar ing kutha cilik kene ora mesthi papan sing apik kanggo dolan dhayoh luar negri. Kanggo sakperkara, New Meksiko Lor duwe masalah penting karo nyetir nalika mendem, lan konsentrasi saka sopir sing mendem cedhak karo bar ing kutha cilik.

src: "The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called ""Manta"". There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better. The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful. For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk. The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent."
mt: "Bira lokal utama yaiku 'Number One', ora bira kompleks, nanging seneng lan ngresep. Bira lokal liyane yaiku diarani ""Manta"". Ana akèh anggur Prancis sing bisa ditindakake, nanging anggur Selandia Baru lan Ostrali mung bisa nglakoni. Banyu bandhara lokal aman diombe, nanging banyu botol gampang diwenehake kalo kowe takut. Kalo kanggo warga Australia, ide 'flat white' kopi asing. Short black yaiku 'espresso', cappuccino disajekake karo krim (ora karo krim), lan teh disajekake tanpa susu. Hot chocolate ana ing standar Belanda. Jus buah mahal nanging apik."
ref: Bir lokal sing utama yaiku 'Number One', iki dudu bir sing kompleks, nanging enak lan nyegerake. Bir lokal sing liya jenenge “Manta”. Ana akeh anggur Prancis sing bisa diduweni, nanging anggur Selandia Baru lan Australia kemungkinan luwih apik kanggo digawa lelungan. Banyu kran lokal aman banget kanggo diombe, nanging banyu botol bisa ditemokake yen sampeyan wedi. Kanggo wong Australia, gagasan kopi kang 'putih rata' iku asing. Kopi cekak ireng iku 'espresso', cappuccino duwe tumpukan krim kang dhuwur (dudu unthuk), lan teh iku diladenake tanpa susu. Coklat panase madani standar Belgia. Jus buahe larang tapi enak tenan.

src: "The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called ""The Giant Province of the Indies"", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups. The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries. Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity."
mt: Guaraní ya iku kumpulan paling wigati sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay, sing nggabungake ing Paraguay
ref: Guarani minangka klompok pribumi paling penting sing saiki manggon ing dhaerah sing saiki arane Paraguay Wétan, urip minangka dadi grema semi-nomaden sing uga nganakake tetanen panguripan. Daerah Chaco kuwi omah kanggo klompok-klompok suku pribumi liyane kayata Guaycuru lan Payagua, sing urip kanthi mburu kewan, tani lan mancing. Ing abad kaping 16 Paraguay, sadurunge disebut “Provinsi raseksa ing Hindia”, iku lair minangka asil saka paprangan penakhluk Spanyol karo kelompok-kelompok penduduk pribumi. Wong-wong Spanyol miwiti mangsa panjajahan sing suwene telung abad. Awit pembentukan Asuncion ing 1537, Paraguay bisa njaga pirang-pirang saka identitas lan watak pribumine.

src: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier. Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies."
mt: Parisian wis dikenal minangka egosentris, kasar lan angkuh. Sementara iki mung stereotipe sing ora akurat, cara paling apik kanggo ngrusak ing Paris tetepi yaiku nggawe diri kaya seseorang sing ""bien élevé"" (bawaan sing apik). Iki bakal nggawe ngelola sing luwih mudhah. Eksterior Parisian sing kasar bakal cepetan kaburake manawa kalian nggawe kawruh sing dasar.
ref: "Wong Paris duwe sipat ngawigateni awak dhewe, kasar lan sumengah. Biyasane iki asring dadi kapercayan sing ora pener, cara sing paling apik supaya bisa rukun ana ning Paris yaiku tetep nggunakake kabiyasanmu, macak kayata ana wong sing ""bien élevé"" (diajari kanthi apik). Dadine bakal luwih gampang. Tumindake wong Paris bakal cepet ilang yen sampeyan nuduhake sopan-santun."

Sementara iki mung stereotipe sing ora akurat, cara paling apik kanggo ngrusak ing Paris tetepi yaiku nggawe diri kaya seseorang sing ""bien élevé"" (bawaan sing apik). Iki bakal nggawe ngelola sing luwih mudhah. Eksterior Parisian sing kasar bakal cepetan kaburake manawa kalian nggawe kawruh sing dasar.
ref: "Wong Paris duwe sipat ngawigateni awak dhewe, kasar lan sumengah. Biyasane iki asring dadi kapercayan sing ora pener, cara sing paling apik supaya bisa rukun ana ning Paris yaiku tetep nggunakake kabiyasanmu, macak kayata ana wong sing ""bien élevé"" (diajari kanthi apik). Dadine bakal luwih gampang. Tumindake wong Paris bakal cepet ilang yen sampeyan nuduhake sopan-santun."

src: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe. Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.
mt: MetroRail duwe klas ing kereta komuter ing lan ing Cape Town: MetroPlus (uga diarani Kelas Pertama) lan Metro (diarani Kelas Ketiga). MetroPlus luwih nyaman lan kurang padat, nanging sedikit luwih mahal, nanging isih luwih murah tinimbang tiket metro normal ing Eropa. Saben kereta duwe MetroPlus lan Metro; MetroPlus selalu ing ujung kereta paling cedhak Cape Town.
ref: RelMetro nduwe kelas loro ana sepur komuter ana njero lan ana sekitare Cape Town: MetroPlus (uga diarani Kelas Utama) lan Metro (diarani Kelas Katelu). MetroPlus iku luwih kepenak lan ora pati rame nanging rada larang sathithik, sandyan isih luwih murah katimbang tiket metro sing lumrah ing Eropa. Saben sepur nduweni MetroPlus lan uga gerbong Metro; gerbong MetroPlus mesthi ana mburine sepur sing paling cedhak menyang Cape Town.

src: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions. Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections. Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.
mt: Penumpang bisa nemu hama sing ora asring ana ing wilayah rumah. Hama bisa nggoyang bahan pangan, nyebabake iritasi, utawa ing kasus paling becik nyebabake reaksi alergi, nggoyang racun, utawa ngegandhengake infeksi. Penyakit infeksi dhewe, utawa hewan sing bisa nyerang utawa matiake manungsa kanthi kekuwatan, ora biasane kualifikasi minangka hama.
ref: Plancong bisa mlebu menyang sarang kewan sing ora dikenal ning daerah sing beda. Ama bisa ngrusak panganan, nyebabake iritasi, utawa ing kasus sing paling parah nyebabake reaksi alergi, nyebar racun, utawa ngirim infeksi. Penyakit nular dhewe, utawa kewan mbebayani sing bisa nglarani utawa mateni wong kanthi kakuwatane, biasane ora diarani omo.

src: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones. While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries. Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.
mt: Kantor kopi sing padha-padha ngisi karcis pre-paid sing bisa digunakake saka pay phone utawa telepon biasa. Adhedhasar karcis-karcis sing bisa digunakake kanggo ngelepon kawasan-kawasan sing luwih apik, nanging ana uga sing khusus kanggo ngelepon kawasan-kawasan sing luwih apik. Akses menawa iki biasane nganggo nomer telepon bebas biaya sing bisa dihubungi saka telepon biasa tanpa biaya.
ref: Saben pojokan toko diisi karo jejeran kertu telepon prabayar sing mbingungake sing bisa digunakake saka telepon umum utawa telepon sing biyasa. Nalika umume kertu apik kanggo nilpun ing ngendi wae, sawetara khusus nyedhiyakake beya tilpun sing nguntungake kanggo klompok negara tartamtu. Akses menyang layanan iku kerep liwat nomor telepon bebas pulsa sing bisa ditelpon saka saperangan akeh talpon tanpa bea.

src: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude. The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species. Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species
mt: Bandhara nasional Plitvice Lakes dikuasake karo hutan sing padha, karo beech, spruce, lan fir, lan duwe campuran saka vegetasi Alpine lan Mediterania. Iki duwe variasi sing padha saka komunitas tumbuhan, amarga saka jembarane mikroklima, bahan sing beda-beda lan tingkat-tingkat sing beda-beda. Wilayah iki uga dadi rumah kanggo variasi sing padha saka spesies hewan lan burung. Hewan sing langka kaya brown bear Eropa, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat lan capercaillie bisa ditemokake ana, sarta spesies sing luwih umum
ref: Taman nasional Tlaga Plitvice iku alase kandel, utamane kanthi wit beech, spruce, lan cemara, lan nonjolake campuran vegetasi Alpen lan Mediterania. Iki nduweni jinis komunitas tetanduran sing akeh banget, amarga jangka mangsa mikro, mbedakake lemah lan akeh tingkatan dhuwur. Wilayahe iku uga omah kanggo maneka warna spesies kewan lan manuk.sing werna-werna banget. Fauna langka kayata beruang coklat, asu, manuk gagak, manuk dares, lynx, kucing liar lan manuk belibis bisa ditemokake ana kono, uga akeh jinis kewan liyane.

src: "The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to ""prevent piracy"". In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will. The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning."
mt: Media perusahaan nggawe klaim rutin ngenani tujuan iki, nggawe klaim menawa iki minangka ""menghalangi pirati"". Nanging, kode wilayah ora ngaruh marang ngeplok ilegal; salinane bit-bit bitane disk bakal mainake kagokan sing asli. Tujuan asli menawa iki minangka nggawe perusahaan sing luwih akurat; iku kabeh ngenani uang nggoleki.
ref: "Perusahaan-perusahaan media kanthi ajeg ngapusi babagan ancas iki, ngaku menawa iki iku kanggo ""nyegah pembajakan"". Ing nyatane kode wilayah ora duwe pengaruh temenan marang salinan sing ora sah; sethithik baka sethithik disk bakal diputer kanthi apik ing piranti ngendi wae sing asli. Ancas sing satemene yaiku kanggo menehi perusahaan-perusahaan iku kontrol sing luwih marang pemasarane; iki iku kabeh babagan puteraning dhuwit."

src: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.
mt: Ketika cek imigrasi biasanya ora ana utawa formalitas nalika kalian tiba ing tanah air kalian, kontrol kawedanan bisa jadi masalah. Pastikan kalian ketahuan apa sing bisa lan ora bisa kalian bawa lan ngarangake apa-wa-apa sing lebi saka batas hukum.
ref: Sanadyan pamriksaan imigrasi biasane ora ana utawa mung formalitas nalika sampeyan tekan ing negara asal, bea cukai bisa ngrepoti. Priksa manawa sampeyan ngerti apa sing bisa lan ora bisa nggawa lan nyatakake apa wae ing wewaton.

src: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags. Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.
mt: Valley Cochamó - Bandara paling utama kanggo pendakian, dikenal minangka Yosemite saka Amerika Kidul, karo variasi dinding granit gedhe lan crags. Puncak-puncak iki duwé pemandangan sing apik, lan pendaki saka kabeh papan ing donya nggoleki rute-rute anyar antukane potensial sing ora ana akhire dinding-dinding.
ref: Lembah Cochamó - jujugan menek gunung sing utama ing Chili, dikenal minangka Yosemite saka Amerika Kidul, kanthi macem-macem tembok gedhe granit lan karang. Puncake kalebu pemandhangan kang nengsemake sak pucuk. Para pendaki saka kabeh bagean donya terus gawe dalan anyar ing antarane potensi pinggirane sing tanpa akhir.

src: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)
mt: Jika kalian mungga nglintang donya sepenuhnya ing Hemisfer Selatan, pilihan penerbangan lan tujuan sing terbatas amarga kurangnya rute transoceanik. Saka Alliance penerbangan ora ngerti saka tiga perjalanan samodra ing Hemisfer Selatan (lan SkyTeam ora ngerti saka perjalanan). Star Alliance ngerti kabeh kecuali Samodra Pasifik Timur saka Santiago de Chile nganti Tahiti, sing penerbangan iki ora siji-sijine pilihan kalo kalian mungga nglintang Samodra Pasifik lan pesisir kulon Amerika Kidul. (lihat bawah)
ref: Yen sampeyan kepingin mabur ana Sisih Kidul donya, pilihan tujuan lan jalur mabure sithik banget amarga jalur lintas segara kuwi sithik banget. Ora ana aliansi maskapai sing nyakup penyebrangan kabeh telung segara ing laut sisih kidul (lan SkyTeam ora nyakup salah sijining penyebrangan). Nanging, Aliansi Bintang nanggung kabeh biayane kajaba Pasifik Kidul bageyan wetan saka Santiago de Chili menyang Tahiti, sing diarani LATAM mabur Sakdonya. Penerbangan iki dudu pilihan siji-sijine menawa sampeyan pengin ora liwat Pasifik Kidul lan pesisir wetan Amerika Kidul. (delok ngisor iki)

src: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently. The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents. With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.
mt: Internasional, ana kurang lewat 200 organisasi panjalan. Akèhé saka kasebut operasi mandiri. Global Running Tours pambarengan, Go Running Tours nggabungaké ratusan penyedia panjalan sing dadi siji ing papat bawana. Dengan akar ing Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona lan Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, dadi ditekani déning Running Tours Prague sing ana ing Prague lan liya-liyane.
ref: Miturut cathetan internasional, ana 200 organisasi sing ngurusi perkara plesiran. Akeh banget sing mlaku kanthi mandiri. Pengganti Perjalanan Mlayu Sajagad, Perjalanan Mlayu Lunga jaringan lusinan panyadhiya penglihatan ing papat benua. Wiwit saka Barcelona's Running Tours ing Barcelona lan Copenhagen's Running ing Copenhagen, kegiyatan kuwi enggal ditututi karo Running Tours Prague sing pusate ing Praha lan kegiyatan liyane.

src: "Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors. The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called a ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", or going ""footing"") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days."
mt: "Safari mungkin pangaruh wisata ing Afrika lan puncak kanggo wong-wong sing nglakoni. Istilah safari ing penggunaan populer nyatake perjalanan darat kanggo nglihat hewan Afrika sing apik, khusus ing savana. Beberapa hewan, kaya gajah lan gajah, cedhak nggoleki mobil lan peralatan standar bakal nggoleki nglihat apik. Sing ora gampil, kaya singa, cheetah lan singa, ora gampil lan kalian bakal nglihat luwih apik kanthi bintang. Safari kaki (uga dikenal minangka ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", utawa nggoleki ""footing"") nggoleki hiking, kaya kanggo jam-jam utawa sithik dina.
ref: "Safari bisa uga minangka daya tarik wisata sing paling gedhe ing Afrika lan dadi pucak kanggo para pangunjung. Tembung safari ing panganggonan sing populer iku ngerujuk lelungan lewat dharatan kanggo nyawang urip liar Afrika sing nggumunake, utamane ing sabana. Ana kewan, kayata gajah lan jerapah, kala-kala nyedhaki montor lan piranti-piranti standar sing bisa menehi sesawangan sing endah. Singa, cheetah lan macan tutul kadang isin lan sampeyan bakal ndeleng luwih apik nganggo tropong. Safari kanthi mlaku (uga disebut ""walk bush"", ""hikari safari"", utawa ""footing"") kalebu hiking, bisa pirang-pirang jam utawa sawetara dina."

src: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.
mt: Wisata bisa luwih murah kanggo grup sing luwih gedhe, mula kalo kowe sendiri utawa karo siji teman, coba karo wong liya lan bentuk grup saka papat nganti enem kanggo tarif per-orang sing luwih apik. Nanging, iki ora kudu dadi pertimbanganmu, amarga umume turis diatur-aturake kanggo ngisi mobil. Nanging, dadi cara kanggo ngaplikake wong-wong supaya bayar luwih.
ref: Wisata luwih murah kanggo grup sing luwih gedhe, yen sampeyan mung ijen utawa karo kanca siji, coba golek wong liya lan gawe klompok papat nganti enem wong kanggo tarip sing luwih apik saben wong. Nanging, iki ora kudu dadi perhatianmu temenan, amarga para plancong asring dirubung kanggo ngisi mobil. Iki kayane luwih kaya cara kanggo ngapusi wong-wong kanggo percaya menawa dheweke kudu mbayar luwih.

src: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.
mt: Wisata bisa luwih murah kanggo grup sing luwih gedhe, mula kalo kowe sendiri utawa karo siji teman, coba karo wong liya lan bentuk grup saka papat nganti enem kanggo tarif per-orang sing luwih apik. Nanging, iki ora kudu dadi pertimbanganmu, amarga umume turis diatur-aturake kanggo ngisi mobil. Nanging, dadi cara kanggo ngaplikake wong-wong supaya bayar luwih.
ref: Wisata luwih murah kanggo grup sing luwih gedhe, yen sampeyan mung ijen utawa karo kanca siji, coba golek wong liya lan gawe klompok papat nganti enem wong kanggo tarip sing luwih apik saben wong. Nanging, iki ora kudu dadi perhatianmu temenan, amarga para plancong asring dirubung kanggo ngisi mobil. Iki kayane luwih kaya cara kanggo ngapusi wong-wong kanggo percaya menawa dheweke kudu mbayar luwih.

src: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified. The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism. Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.
mt: Ekonomi San Francisco ora kaitane karo panggonan wisata dunia kelas, nanging ekonomine ora duwé diversifikasi. Sektor kang paling akèh nglakoni kerja yaiku jasa profesional, pamarintahan, keuangan, perdagangan, lan pariwisata. Panggambarane sing akèh ing musik, filem, sastra lan budaya populer duwé bantuan kanggo nggawe kutha lan simbol-simbol sing dikenal ing donya. San Francisco duwé infrastruktur pariwisata sing gedhé: akèh hotel, restoran, lan fasilitas konvensi sing paling apik. San Francisco uga salah sijining panggonan paling apik ing nagara kanggo masakan Asia liyane: Koréa, Thai, India, lan Jepang.
ref: Nalika ekonomi San Fransisko dihubungke marang iki dadi daya tarik pariwisata kelas donya, ekonomine maneka-warna. Bidhang kerja paling gedhe yaiku layanan ahli, pamrentah, keuangan, dedagangan, lan pariwisata. Gegambaran asring kawujud musik, film, sastra lan adat kang misuwur mbantu ndadekake kutha lan landmark kasebut dikenal ing saindenging jagad. San Fransisko wis kasil ngembangke sarana turis sing gedhe kanthi akeh banget hotel, restoran, lan fasilitas kanggo rapat sing apik banget. San Francisco uga minangka salah sawijining papan sing paling apik ing negara kasebut kanggo masakan Asia liyane: Korea, Thai, India lan Jepang.

src: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination. Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.
mt: Ngabokake ing nganti nggihake ketenangan kanggo wong sing wis nggawe perjalanan yen wis nggawe tempat sing bisa ditumpahake nalika wis nggawe tujuan. Biro perjalanan biasane duwe paket sing kalebu sarapan, aransemen transportasi nganti/ing bandhara utawa bahkan paket penerbangan lan hotel. Mereka bisa nggawe reservasi kanggo kalian yen kalian butuh wektu kanggo ngomong menawa paket iki, utawa nggawe dokumen liyane kanggo tujuan (e.g. visa). Amang-amang utawa tuntutan sing padha bisa diwengkhi nganti biro perjalanan pisan lan ora langsung nganti hotel.
ref: Pesen sakdurunge marakake wong kang lelungan ayem pikirane amarga dheweke bakal duwe panggonan kanggo turu sakwise tekan ung jujugane. Agen-agen lelungan kerep duwe kesepakatan karo hotel-hotel tertentu, sanajan sampeyan bisa uga mesen penginapan jenis liyane, kaya papan kemah, liwat agen lelungan. Agen travel biasane nawakake pak-pakan sing kalebu sarapan, pangaturan transportasi menyang/saka bendara utawa malah gabungan pak-pakan tiket montor mabur lan hotel. Dheweke uga bisa nahan pesenan kanggo sampeyan yen sampeyan butuh wektu kanggo mikirake panawaran utawa golek berkas liyane kanggo tujuan sampeyan (conto visa). Tambahan utawa panjalukan apa wae kudu ngliwati agen lelungane dhisik lan ora langsung karo hotel.

src: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.
mt: Real-time text translator apps – aplikasi sing bisa nggawe terjemahan otomatis saka teks saka basa siji dadi basa liyane. Bebarengan aplikasi ing kategori iki bisa nggawe terjemahan saka teks ing basa asing ing tanda-tanda utawa objek ing donya nyata nalika pengguna ngepung smartphone menyang objek-objek mau. Mesin terjemahan wis ditingkatake, lan kini umume nyebabake terjemahan sing kurang-kurang benar (lan kadang-kadang nggawe teks sing ora jelas), nanging kudu ngerti, amarga mungkina wis salah. Salah sawijining aplikasi sing paling misuwur ing kategori iki yaiku Google Translate, sing bisa nggawe terjemahan offline sawise ngundhuh data basa sing diwenehi.
ref: Aplikasi penerjemah teks wektu nyata – aplikasi sing bisa otomatis nerjemahake kabeh perangan teks saka siji bahasa dadi basa liyane. Sawetara aplikasi ing kategori iki uga malah bisa nerjemahne tulisan ing basa asing ing tandha utawa barang liya ing kasunyatan nalika panganggone ngarahne smartphone tumrap barang-barang kasebut. Mesin terjemahan kuwi wis dadi saya apik, lan saiki asring menehi kurang luwih asil terjemahan sing luwih pener (lan luwih arang omong kosong), nanging tetp kudu digatekake, amarga isih ana sing kleru. Salah sawijine aplikasi sing paling katon ana pilihan iki yaiku Google Terjemahan, sing bisa mbantu ngartekke ukara tanpa perlu kaubung internet sabubare ngundhuh data basa sing dipengini.

src: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest. Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.

ref: Lemah longsor iku dudu barang sing ora lumrah; dronjongan mung bisa nahen alon-alon sautara, lan isi sing luber bakal mudhun dadi longsor. Perkarane yaiku menawa salju iku lengket, dadi iki butuh pemicu kanggo medhun, lan sawetara salju medhun bisa dadi kedadean pemicu kanggo sisane. Kadhangkala pristiwa sing miwiti yaiku srengenge sing ngangeti salju, kadhang salju mudhun luwih akeh, kadhang kedadeyan pristiwa alam liyane, asringe manungsa.

src: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. A curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."
mt: "Kari ya sajian sing diarani saka bumbu lan rempah, saka daging utawa sayuran. Kari bisa dadi ""kering"" utawa ""banyak cairan"" miturut jumlah cairan. Ing wilayah pedalangan ing India Lor lan Pakistan, yoghurt umume digunakake ing kari; ing India Kidul lan wilayah pesisir liyane ing subbenua, santan umume digunakake.
ref: "Kare iku masakan sing didhasari jamu lan rempah, bebarengan karo daging utawa sayur. Kari bisa dadi ""garing"" utawa ""teles"" gumantung karo gunggunge banyu. Ing wilayah jero saka India lor lan Pakistan, yogurt biasa digunakake ing kari; ing India kidul lan sawetara daerah pesisir liya saka anak benua kasebut, santen biasa digunakake."

src: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.
mt: South Pole Traverse (atau Highway) yaiku 1600 km jalan saka McMurdo Station ing Laut Ross menyang Kutub. Iki yaiku salju sing padha karo jalan sing wis dipepet lan ditandai kanthi bendera. Iki bisa ditumpangi kanthi traktor sing khusus, ngangkut sled sing ngangkut bahan bakar lan barang-barang. Traktor iki ora rada lincah supaya jalan iki kudu nggolekake swirane jauh saka Pegunungan Transantarctic supaya bisa ngeculake plateau.
ref: Jalur Kutub Kidul (utawa dalan Tol) kuwi dalan sing dawane 1600km saka Stasiun McMurdo saka Laut Ross menyang Kutub. Iki salju sing dipadhetke kanthi tembelan lan ditandhani dening gendera. Mung bisa diliwati dening traktor khusus, kreta mluncur karo bensin lan sangu. Iku ora pati cepet dadi tipake kudu dijupuk sadawane penggokan sakiwa tengene Pegunungan Transacctic kanggo menyang ing dataran tinggi.

src: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.
mt: Ngelintang Afrika Kidul nganggo mobil bisa jadi cara sing apik kanggo ngrasakake kecantikan saka kabeh wilayah kasebut, uga kanggo ngeraihake tempat sing ora ana ing rute turis normal. Iki bisa dilakokake nganggo mobil normal kanthi perencanaan sing apik, nanging mobil 4x4 dianjurake lan akèh lokasi sing bisa diakses kanthi 4x4 kanthi ban sing dhuwur. Ing ngendi perencanaan, ing ngendi wong-wong ing Afrika Kidul stabil ora kabeh negara tetangga. Kebijakan visa lan biaya bervariasi saka negara siji menyang negara liyane lan diarani dening negara saka wong-wong sing nggawe. Saka negara siji uga nduweni hukum unik sing nggawe apa sing perlu diwènèhake ing mobil.
ref: Mlebu Afrika Kidul numpak mobil minangka cara sing sangar kanggo ndeleng kabeh kaendahan derah uga kanggo nekani papan-papan ing njaba jalur misata sing biyasa. Iki bisa dilakoni ing mobil biasa kanthi perencanaan sing ngati-ati nanging 4x4 iku disaranake banget lan akeh panggonan sing amung bisa diliwati nganggo basis roda dhuwur 4x4. Prelu dieling nalika nganggit bilih sanajan Afrika Kidul ajeg, ora kabeh negara minangka tanggan. Sarat lan beya visa beda-beda saka siji negara menyang negara liya lan dipangaruhi negara sing sampeyan tekani Negara-negara uga nduweni aturan ukum sing khas sing mbutuhake piranti penting apa wae sing kudu ana ning njero montor.

Kebijakan visa lan biaya bervariasi saka negara siji menyang negara liyane lan diarani dening negara saka wong-wong sing nggawe. Saka negara siji uga nduweni hukum unik sing nggawe apa sing perlu diwènèhake ing mobil.
ref: Mlebu Afrika Kidul numpak mobil minangka cara sing sangar kanggo ndeleng kabeh kaendahan derah uga kanggo nekani papan-papan ing njaba jalur misata sing biyasa. Iki bisa dilakoni ing mobil biasa kanthi perencanaan sing ngati-ati nanging 4x4 iku disaranake banget lan akeh panggonan sing amung bisa diliwati nganggo basis roda dhuwur 4x4. Prelu dieling nalika nganggit bilih sanajan Afrika Kidul ajeg, ora kabeh negara minangka tanggan. Sarat lan beya visa beda-beda saka siji negara menyang negara liya lan dipangaruhi negara sing sampeyan tekani Negara-negara uga nduweni aturan ukum sing khas sing mbutuhake piranti penting apa wae sing kudu ana ning njero montor.

src: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders. You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble. This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice. Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death. Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.
mt: Ngelakoni kanggo wong liya - Jangan nggoleki barang-barangmu saka pandanganmu, khusus ing wektu kau melintasi perbatasan internasional. Kamu bisa nemu dirimu dadi pengangkut obat tanpa sadar, sing bakal nggawa dirimu ing masalah sing gedhe. Iki kalebu nunggu ing baris, saben-saben anjing penggembala obat bisa digunakake kapan-kapan tanpa peringatan. Negara-negara kaya-kaya nggawe hukuman sing sangat keras bahkan kanggo pelanggaran pisanan; iki bisa kalebu hukuman penjara sing luwih saka 10 taun utawa kematian. Barang-barang sing ora diawasi bisa dadi sasaran kanggo pencurian lan uga bisa nggawa perhatian saka otoritas sing waspada karo ancaman bom.
ref: Nggawa kanggo liyane - Aja nganti lali karo tasmu, kususe nalika sampeyan nyebrang watesan internasional. Sampeyan bisa nemokake awake sampeyan dhewe digunakake minangka penyebar racun tanpa sampeyan mangerteni, sing bakal gawe sampeyan ngalami masalah. Iki kalebu antri, kaya segawon tukang ngambu-narkoba bisa digunakake kapan wae tanpa nggatekake. Sawetara negara duwe ukuman sing cukat banget sanajan kanggo kaluputan sing pisanan; iki bisa kalebu ukara kunjara luwih saka 10 taun utawa mati. Tas sing ora dijaga menawa pangincengan maling lan uga bisa narik perhatosan para petugas sing waspaos marang anceman bom.

src: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night. When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special. If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.
mt: Ngisi omah kalian karo kopi rancak ing wengi lan teh kamomil sing rilaksasi ing malam. Saiki kalian duwe wektu kanggo ngobati diri lan ngecakake wektu tambahan kanggo nggawe sesuatu sing istimewa. Saiki kalian wis ngerti, ngecakake minangka nggawe jus utawa nggawe smoothies: mungkin kalian bakal nemu minuman sederhana sing kalian bisa nggawe kanggo sarapan nalika kalian kembali marang rutin harian. Saiki kalian urip ing kutha sing duwe budaya minum sing beragam, munggah ing bar utawa pub ing kutha-kutha sing kalian ora kerep.
ref: Isi omahe sampeyan kanthi kopi kenthel ing wayah esuk lan sawetara teh chamomile sing marai santai ing wayah bengi. Nalika sampeyan ana ing staycation, sampeyan duwe wektu kanggo ngrawat sampeyan dhewe lan njupuk sawetara menit tambahan kanggo masak sesuatu khusus. Menawa sampeyan rumangsa luwih kendel, jupuk kesempatan kanggo gawe sari wuh-wuhan utawa nyampur sawetara smoothie. bisa wae sampeyan nemokake ombenan sing sederhana sing bisa sampeyan gawe kanggo sarapan nalika wis bali kaya adate. Yen sampeyan manggon ing kutha sing duwe budaya ngombe macem-macem, pindhah menyang bar utawa omah kusus omben ing dhaerah sakubengmu ora kerep kok tekani.

src: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs. It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.
mt: Desa Haldarsvík tawari pandang ning pulo Eysturoy sing adoh lan duwe gereja sing ora biasa. Ing pekarangan, ana skulptur marmer sing unik saka kolibri ing ati saka makam. Iki patut dipungkiri saben 30 menit kanggo maburake ning desa sing unik.
ref: Desa Haldarsvík nawakake sesawangan pulau Eysturoy ing cerake lan duwe siji gereja segi wolu sing ora biasa. Ing latar greja, ana patung neker sing apik saka manuk dara sak dhuwure sarean. Iki senilai setengah jam mlaku-mlaku ing sakiwa tengen desa sing narik minat.

src: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist. In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.
mt: Kamungkinan ora kudu visa kanggo kunjungan pendek ing negara bebarengan minangka turis utawa kanggo bisnis, nanging munggoe ing negara bebarengan minangka siswa internasional umume kudu nunggu visa kanggo nglakokake. Visa siswa umume duwe persyaratan lan prosedur penerimane sing beda saka visa turis utawa bisnis normal. Ing umume, nunggu ing negara bebarengan kanggo wektu sing luwih dawa kudu nglakokake visa sadurunge. Visa siswa umume duwe persyaratan lan prosedur penerimane sing beda saka visa turis utawa bisnis normal. Ing umume, nunggu ing negara bebarengan kanggo wektu sing luwih dawa kudu nglakokake visa sadurunge. Visa siswa umume duwe persyaratan lan prosedur penerimane sing beda saka visa turis utawa bisnis normal. Ing umume, nunggu ing negara bebarengan kanggo wektu sing luwih dawa kudu nglakokake visa sadurunge. Visa siswa umume duwe persyaratan lan prosedur penerimane sing beda saka visa turis utawa bisnis normal. Ing umume, nunggu ing negara bebarengan kanggo wektu sing luwih dawa kudu nglakokake visa sadurunge. Visa siswa umume duwe persyaratan lan prosedur penerimane sing beda saka visa turis utawa bisnis normal. Ing umume, nunggu ing negara bebarengan kanggo wektu sing luwih dawa kudu nglakokake visa sadurunge. Visa siswa umume duwe persyaratan lan prosedur penerimane sing beda saka visa turis utawa bisnis normal. Ing umume, nunggu ing negara bebarengan kanggo wektu sing luwih dawa kudu nglakokake visa sadurunge. Visa siswa umume duwe persyaratan lan prosedur penerimane sing beda saka visa turis ut
ref: Sanadyan sampeyan ora mbutuhake visa nalika dolan menyang negara tartamtu dadi turis utawa kanggo nyambut gawe, mara menyang nagara kasebut dadi siswa internasional biyasane bakal mbutuhake wektu sing suwe tinimbang nalika dolan mrana mung dadi turis. Umume, manggon ing negara luar negri ngendi wae kanggo wektu sing suwe bakal meksa sampeyan kanggo entuk visa luwih dhisik. Visa pelajar umume duwe persyaratan lan prosedur aplikasi sing beda saka visa turis utawa bisnis. Kanggo sebagean gedhe negara, sampeyan bakal mbutuhake layang tawaran saka institusi ing ngendi sampeyan pengin sinau, lan uga bukti dana kanggo ngopeni sampeyan paling ora taun sepisan kuliah sampeyan. Priksa karo pakulitan, uga bagean imigrasi kanggo negara sing pengin sampeyan tuju kanggo sinau kanggo ngerti wewaon sing kumplit.

src: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest. Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.
mt: Ing musim panas, khususé, kudu ngertiake nganti nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamarake nyamar
ref: Apa maneh ing mangsa panas, sampeyan kudu ngati-ati tumrap nyamuk menawa sampeyan pengin munggah gunung ngliwati alas tropis. Sanajan sampeyan nyetir liwat alas udan subtropis, sawetara detik kanthi lawang mbukak nalika sampeyan mlebu tetunggangan wis cukup wektu kanggo nyamuk-nyamuk mlebu tetungganganmu.

src: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas. Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.
mt: Kabehan Sundarbans yaiku mangrove paling gedhé ing pasisir ing donya, ngegandhengi 80 km (50 mi) ing dharatan Bangladeshi lan India saka pasisir. Kabehan Sundarbans wis diarani Situs Warisan Dunia UNESCO. Bagianing kabehan ing dharatan India karan Kabehan Sundarbans Nasional. Kabehan ora mung mangrove banget — kabehan kalebu siji-sijine stande sing akhire saka hutan sing nduweni kekuwatan sing nggawe Gangetic dataran. Kabehan Sundarbans nggandhengi wewengkon 3,850 km², saka sing kira-kira sepertiga dadi wewengkon banyu/areal rawa. Saka 1966 kabehan Sundarbans dadi taman hewan, lan diperkirake ana saiki 400 Royal Bengal tigers lan kira-kira 30,000 rusa sing ditemokake ing wewengkon iki.
ref: Sundarban kuwi sabuk alas bakau pesisir paling gedhe ning donya, nyebar 80 km (50 mil) menyang Bangladesh lan pedalaman India saka pesisir. Sundarbans wis diumumne minangka Situs Warisan Donya UNESCO. Bagean saka alas sajerone wilayah India diarani Taman Nasional Sundarbans. Nanging alase ora mung rawa bakau — iku uga kalebu sawetara sisa-sisa pungkasan saka alas-alas magrong sing tau nutupi dataran Gangga. Sundarbans iki nutupi daerah sing ambane 3.850 km², sing setelone katutup dening banyu/rawa. Wiwit taun 1966 Sundarban wis dadi cagar alam, lan diduga ana kira-kira 400 macan Kerajaan Bengal lan kira-kira 30.000 kidang sing katon ana ning daerah kuwi.

src: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.
mt: Donya duwe 5.000 basa kanggo, kalebu luwih saka telu puluh sing duwe 50 yuta utawa luwih wong sing ngomong. Kalimat tulis umume luwih gampang dimengerti tinimbang kalimat kanggo, uga. Iki khusus nyatake ing alamat, sing umume nggampang dimengerti. Banyakan negara kabeh ngerti basa Inggris, lan ing luwih saka wong-wong sing ngerti basa Inggris, khususnya antara wong-wong sing luwih muda. Imajinasikake, kalau kalian bakal, Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican lan Sydneysider duduk ing meja sing ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong kabeh ngomong
ref: Donya iki duwe luwih saka 5.000 basa sing beda, kalebu luwih saka rong puluh kanthi 50 yuta utawa luwih wong sing bisa ngomong. Tembung-tembung sing ditulis kerep luwih gampang dipahami tinimbang tembung-tembung sing dipocapake, uga. Iki utamane bener kanggo alamat, sing kerep angel dieja kanthi gampang dimangerteni. Akeh negara-negara sing lancar banget nggunakke basa Inggris, lan uga sampeyan bisa ngarepake ilmu sing ana watese - utamane kanggo nom-noman. Bayangno, yen sampeyan gelem, wong Mancunia, Boston, Jamaika lan Sydney lungguh ana ing saubengane meja mangan bareng nalika wengi ana ing restoran ning Toronto. Wong-wong kuwi nglipur wong liyane kanthi nyritakake crita saka desane, dicritakake kanthi logat sing beda lan penemu lokal.

src: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

src: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30. As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).
mt: Bus ngliwati stasiun bus antar-kabupaten (sangisori kali) sithik dina, nanging akèh, khusus kanggo kabupaten wétan lan Jakar/Bumthang, ngluwati antara jam 06:30 lan 07:30. Sawise inter-district bus ora bisa penuh, wis disarankan kanggo ngrangkakake tiket sithik sadurunge. Kabupaten kabeh diwènèhake kanthi bus Jepang Coaster sing alus lan kuwat. Taksi bareng-bareng bisa dadi cara sing cepet lan nyaman kanggo nglintangi tempat sing cedhak, kaya Paro (Nu 150) lan Punakha (Nu 200).
ref: Bis kuwi mangkat saka stasiun bis antar-kabupaten (sebrange kali) sedina utuh, sanadyan meh kabeh, kususe sing arep mlaku menyang wetan lan Jakar/Bumthang mangkat antarane jam 06.30 lan 07.30. Amarga bis saka kabupaten menyang kabupaten liyane asring kebak, bisa tak kandani yen luwih becik pesen tiket pirang-pirang dina sadurunge mangkat. Akeh kabupaten sing dilayani dening Bis Kapal Pantai Jepang, sing kokoh lan nyenengke. Numpak taksi bebarengan iku cara sing cepet lan penak kanggo lelugan menyang panggonan sing cedhak, kayata Paro (Nu 150) lan Punakha (Nu 200).

src: "Combined with its relative inaccessibility, ""Timbuktu"" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands. It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."
mt: "Kombinasi karo aksesibilitas sing ora bisa ditangkap, ""Timbuktu"" wis dadi metafora kanggo tanah jauh. Saiki, Timbuktu iku kutha sing miskin, walaupun reputasine nggawe kutha iki dadi tujuan pariwisata, lan kutha iki duwe bandhara. Ing 1990, kutha iki ditambahake ing daftar situs warisan donya sing kekancangan, amarga ancaman pasir gurun. Kutha iki salah sijining saka papan sing paling akbar ing Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. Kutha iki ing kontras karo kutha-kutha liyane ing negara, amarga kutha iki duwe gaya Arab sing luwih akbar tinimbang gaya Afrika."
ref: "Gabung karo kahanan ora kalebu sesambungan, ""Timbuktu"" wis digunakake minangka sanepa kanggo tlatah sing endah lan adoh. Saiki, Timbuktu kuwi kutha sing mlarat, sanadyan misuwur dadi tujuan plesir turis, lan uga nduweni bandhara. Taun 1990, dhaptar situs warisan donya sing kudu dijaga mundhak, amarga anane anceman ska pasir sing ana ning padhang pasir. Iki salah sawijine wektu nalika dheweke mandheg nalika Henry Louis Gates' PBS kusus Keajaiban Donya Afrika. Kutha iki beda banget karo kutha liyane ing negara kasebut, amarga duwe bangkat Arab luwih akeh tinimbang wong Afrika."
