src: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964. If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation. Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled. It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.
mt: Paralimpik bakal dianakake saka 24 Agustus nganti 5 September 2021. Beberapa acara bakal dianakake ing lokasi liyane ing Jepang. Tokyo bakal dadi kutha Asia sing kaping pisanan kang wis nganakake dua Olimpiade musim panas, wis nganakake acara ing 1964. Jika kalian wis ngebandhingake penerbangan lan akomodasi kalian kanggo 2020 sadurunge pengumuman penundaan dianakake, kalian mungkin nduwe situasi sing sulit. Kebijakan pembatalan bervariasi, nanging sawise akhir Maret, kebijakan pembatalan korona sing ora ngrembaka nganti Juli 2020, nalika Olimpiade wis dijadwalkan. Diharapkan bilih kebanyakan tiket acara bakal ngeluarake antara ¥2,500 lan ¥130,000, bilih tiket standar bakal ngeluarake kira-kira ¥7,000.
ref: Paralimpiade bakal diwiwiti saka tanggal 24 Agustus tekan 5 September 2021. Ana kagiyatan liyane sing bakal dilaksanakake ning panggonan liyane ana ning Jepang. Tokyo bakal dadi siji-sijiné kutha ing Asia sing dadi rong Olimpiade musim panas, sawise dadi tuwan omah pertandhingan ing taun 1964. Menawa sampeyan mesen penerbangan lan penginapan sampeyan kanggo 2020 sadurunge penangguhan diumumake, sampeyan mungkin duwe sawijining situasi rumit. Kabijakan kanggo mbatalake kuwi akeh jinise, nanging nganti pungkasan Maret akeh banget kabijakan kanggo mbatalke gara-gara-virus korona sing ora diteruske tekan sasi Juli 2020, nalika jadwal Olimpiade wis ditemtokake. Diduga menawa ameh kabeh tiket acara bakal diregani antarane ¥2.500 lan ¥130.000, kanthi tiket biasa diregani ¥7.000.

src: "A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward. They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."
mt: "Tornado iku kolom puteran sing tekan tekanan sing dhuwur, sing nggolekake angin sing adhedhasar lan ngalir menyang atas. Mereka ngasilake angin sing dhuwur (sawise 100-200 mil per jam) lan bisa ngangkat benda-benda sing gedhe menyang udara, ngangkutake benda-benda iku nalika tornado ngambangake. Mereka awal-awalane minangka funnels sing nglengkung saka awan, lan dadi ""tornadoes"" nalika ngambangake ing bumi."
ref: Topan minangka puteran kokem sing duwe tekanan hawa cendhek banget, sing nyedhot hawa ing saubenging mlebu lan munggah. Dheweke ngasilake angin sing kuwat (asring 100-200 mil/jam) lan bisa ngangkat barang-barang abot menyang udhara, nggawa dheweke nalika angin topan obah. Wiwitane bakal maujud kayata corong saka mendhung sing peteng, banjur dadi “lesus” nalika tekan ngisor.

src: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.
mt: Jika negara sing kalian bakal numpak dadi subjek saka petunjuk perjalanan, asuransi kesehatan perjalanan kalian utawa asuransi pembatalan perjalanan kalian bisa dipengaruhi. Kamu mungkin uga kudu ngobati saran saka pamarintahan liyane kajaba pamarintahan kalian. Sana saran kasebut iseng-iseng nggambarke situasi politik ing siji negara. Pandangan sing disajekake umume cekak, umum lan oversimplified banget dibandingakake karo informasi sing luwih rinci sing bisa ditemokake ing tempat liyane.
ref: Menawa negara sing bakal sampeyan kunjungi manut marang pituduh lelungan, asuransi kasarasan lelungan sampeyan utawa asuransi pembatalan lelungan sampeyan isa uga kepengaruh. Sampeyan bisa uga njaluk rembugan saran saka pamrentah tinimbang saka sampeyan dhewe, nanging sarane pamrentah digawe kanggo kawulane dhewe. Minangka siji tuladha, wong Amerika ing Timur Tengah isa uga ngadhepi kahanan sing beda saka wong Eropa lan wong Arab. Laporan iku amung ringkesan cekak saka kahanan politik ing sawijining negara. Tampilan sing asring dituduhke kuwi asring ora cetho, umum lan sedherhana banget yen dibandhingke karo informasi sing luwih rinci sing bisa ditemokake ana ing panggonan liyane.

src: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations. It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours. Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.
mt: Agensi perjalanan wis ana saka abad kaping 19. Seorang agen perjalanan biasane pilihan apik kanggo perjalanan sing nggoleki luwih saka pengalaman sebelumnya saka alam, budaya, basa utawa negara pendapatan sithik. Walaupun agen-agene biasane siap nggoleki booking biasa, nanging akèh agen sing spesialis ing tipe perjalanan sing padha, angka anggaran utawa tujuan. Iki bisa luwih apik nggunakake agen sing akèh nggoleki perjalanan sing padha. Bener-bener dadi perjalanan sing agen nggoleki, apakah ing situs web utawa ing jendhela toko.
ref: Agen wisata wis ana wiwit abad 19. Agen wisata iku biasane pilihan sing apik kanggo lelungan sing ngluwihi pengalaman pelancong sadurunge kanthi alam, budhaya, basa utawa negara-negara sing pendapatane sithik. Sanadyan sebagean gedhe agensi gelem njupuk sebagean gedhe pemesanan biasa, akeh agen sing ngususake ing lelungan jinis tartamtu, gedhene anggaran utawa jujugan. Iki bisa dadi luwih apik kanggo nggunakake sawijining agen sing kerep mesen perjalanan padha karo sampeyan. Coba delengen wisata apa sing dipromosikke dening agen iki, ana ning situs web utawa ana cendhela kaca toko.

src: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."
mt: “Ana akèh hal sing kudu dipikirke menawa lan nalika kalian numpak ing sijiné. Numpak, kalian kudu ngerti menawa hal-hal sing ora kaya ing “kampong” kalian. Manners, hukum, panganan, lalu lintas, pambangunan, standar, basa lan sajeroning hal-hal liyane bakal nganti sithik béda saka sing kalian urip. Iki ya iku sawijining hal sing kalian kudu ngerti, supaya kalian ora ngalami kecewa utawa mungkin kecewa ing cara-cara sing khas saka wong-wong sing urip ing sijiné.”
ref: Akeh banget sing kudu dipikirke sadurunge lan nalika sampeyan kepingin plesir. Nalika sampeyan lelungan, kudu siap menawa apa-apa ora padha nalikane “ana omah”. Tata krama, ukum, panganan, lalu lintas, penginepan, standar, basa, lan liyane bakal rada beda karo papan asal sampeyan. Iki minangka perkara sing kudu sampeyan eling, supaya ora kuciwa utawa uga ora seneng karo cara lokal kanggo nindakake prekara.

src: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.
mt: Jika bepergian ing negara berkembang kanggo wektu pisanan – utawa ing bagian anyar saka donya – ora ngertemake potensial saka kultura shock. Banyake wong sing stabil lan mampu bepergian wis dihancurake dening anyar saka bepergian ing donya berkembang, ing endi kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kabeh kab
ref: Menawa lelungan menyang negara berkembang kanggo sing sepisan - utawa ing sisih anyar saka donya - aja ngremehake kemungkinan kaget babagan budhaya. Akeh wisatawan sing mampu lan stabil wis diatasi dening pangrembakaning donya perjalanan kang anyar, ing ngendi akeh penyesuaian kabudayan cilik bisa tambah kanthi cepet. Kususe ning dina-dina wiwitanmu, aja lali mikirne kemungkinan kanggo belanja kanggo gaya-Kulonanmu lan -hotel sing larang, panganan, lan layanan kanggo mbantu ngepaske awak. Aja turu ana matras utawa bantalan ning lemah ana daerah sing ora sampeyan mangerteni kewan-kewan lokale. Yen sampeyan bakal kemah, ojo lali nggawa kranjang kemah utawa amben gantung supaya adoh saka ula, kalajengking utawa kewan liyane.

src: "Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you. They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims. Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the ""cloud""). If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet). Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help."
mt: "Nggawe lan nggawa salinan saka kebijakan lan kontak detail singgahakane. Mereka kudu ngilu e-mail alamat singgahakane lan nomer telepon internasional kanggo nasehati/otorisasi lan nggawe klaim. Nggawe salinan liyane ing tas lan online (e-mail menyang diri kalian kanthi lampiran, utawa disimpen ing ""cloud""). Jika bepergian karo laptop utawa tablet, simpan salinan ing ingatane utawa disk (aksesible tanpa internet). Uga berikan salinan kebijakan/kontak kepadangan teman bepergian lan keluarga atau kawan-kawan ing rumah menyang wong sing siap nggawe bantuan."
ref: Gawe lan gawa pertalan polis lan princian kontak pakaryan asuransimu. Dheweke padha butuh kanggo nuduhake alamat e-mail penjamin asuransi lan nomer telpon internasional kanggo pitutur/otorisasi lan gawe tuntutan. Duweni salinan liya ing gawan sampeyan lan online (kirim e-mail menyang sampeyan dhewe nganggo lampiran, utawa disimpen ing “cloud”). Menawa lelungan karo nggawa laptop utawa tablet, simpenen salinan ing memori utawa piringane (bisa diakses tanpa internet). Uga wenehi pertalan kawicaksanan/kontak karo kanca lan sedulur sing lelungan utawa kanca ing omah sing gelem mbantu.

src: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).
mt: Ana film format sing beda-beda sing wis dienggo ing taun-taun sing wis lewat. Film standar 35 mm (36 x 24 mm negative) yaiku sing paling umum. Biasane bisa diisi maneh kanthi gampang menawa sampeyan kentekan, lan menehi resolusi kang kira-kira bisa disandhingne karo DSLR saiki. src: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.
mt: Carane paling gampang kanggo mulai ing bisnis nulis perjalanan yaiku ngutamake ketrampilanmu ing blog perjalanan sing wis ana. Sawise kowe nyaman karo format lan editing ing web, banjur, kowe bisa ngetokake situs web kowe sendiri.
ref: Cara paling gampang kanggo miwiti bisnis nulis lelungan yaiku kanthi ngasah ketrampilan sampeyan ing situs web lelungan sing wis mapan. Sabubare sampeyan rumangsa kepenak karo format lan edit ana ning web, sabubare, sampeyan bakal gawe situs web mu dhewe.

src: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.
mt: Carane paling gampang kanggo mulai ing bisnis nulis perjalanan yaiku ngutamake ketrampilanmu ing blog perjalanan sing wis ana. Sawise kowe nyaman karo format lan editing ing web, banjur, kowe bisa ngetokake situs web kowe sendiri.

src: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems. Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body. Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.
mt: Ing rumah, amarga adhedhasar paparan konstan marang jasad lokal, peluang sing dhuwur banget ya iku kudu ora ana imun marang jasad-jasad iku. Nanging ing bagian liyane saka donya, amarga jasad bakteriologis sing ora ana ing donya iku, peluangmu kanggo ketemu masalah iku dhuwur. Uga, ing iklim sing adhem, bakteri keduwe nggawe cepet lan urip luwih lama saka ing awak. Mula penyakit Delhi Belly, Penyakit Pharaoh, Montezuma's Revenge, lan teman-teman sing akèh. Kaya karo masalah pernapasan ing iklim adhem, masalah usus ing iklim panas iku umum lan ing kasus-kasus sing akèh ora aman.
ref: Ning omah, amarga paparan kuman lokal sing terus-terusan iki, ana kasempatan yen sampeyan kebal marang barang iki. Nanging ing bagean liya ing donya, ing ngendi bangsa kewan bakteri anyar kanggo sampeyan, sampeyan bisa uga bakal kena masalah. Uga, ing mangsa sing luwih anget, bakteri tuwuh luwih cepet lan tahan luwih suwe ing njaba awak. Mangkono iku momok Weteng Delhi, Sepatane Firaun, Piwalesan Dhendham Montezuma, lan akeh kancane dheweke padha. Kaya masalah ambegan ing iklim adhem, masalah usus ing iklim panas iku cukup biasa lan ing sebagean gedhe kasus iku nganyelake banget nanging ora pati mbebayani.

src: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times. The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect. As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again. Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.
mt: Éropa iku benua sing relatif cilik nanging karo banyakan negara sing mandiri. Nalika kondisi normal, nglintang melalui banyakan negara bakal ngartopake visa aplikasi lan kontrol paspor banyakan. Zona Schengen, awité, karya sing padha karo siji negara ing babagan iki. Nalika kowe ngemong ing zona iki, kowe bisa umumé nglintang sasaran kontrol paspor tanpa ngartopake kontrol paspor sasaran maning. Sama karo duwé visa Schengen, kowe ora kudu ngaplikake visa kanggo siji saka negara-negara anggota Schengen maning, mungkina ngartopake wektu, uang lan kertas kerja.
ref: Eropa iku benua sing relatif cilik nanging kanthi akeh negara mardika. Sajroning kahanan normal, lelungan ngliwati akeh negara bakal ateges kudu lunga liwat aplikasi visa lan kontrol paspor bola-bali. Daerah Schengen, nanging, mlaku kayata negara ana bab iki. Yen sampeyan tetep manggon ana wilayah iki, sampeyan bisa nyebrang watesan tanpa perlu ngliwati pos priksa paspor maneh. Kajaba iku, kanthi duwe visa Schengen, sampeyan ora kudu njaluk visa menyang saben negara anggota Schengen, saéngga ngirit wektu, dhuwit, lan dokumen.

src: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king. Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration. Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.
mt: Kubur Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 bisa dadi paling terkenal saka makam-makam ing Dataran, panggonan Howard Carter 1922 penemuan hampir utuh perabut raja saka raja muda. Banjur karo paling saka makam-makam raja liyane, makam Tutankhamun ora kena nonton, sing luwih cilik lan karo dekorasi terbatas. Sapa sing kawentar ngerti ing ngliwati bukti kerusakan ing mayat punggawa nalika usaha kanggo nggoleki saka kubur bakal ngecewakake amarga mung kepala lan bahu sing bisa ditemokake. Kejantanan saka makam iki ora ana ing kubur, nanging wis dipindahake menyang Museum Mesir ing Kairo. Pengunjung kanthi wektu terbatas bakal paling baik nggunakake wektu liyane.
ref: Makam Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 menawa kuburan paling misuwur ing Lembah, panggon panemuan Howard Carter ing taun 1922 babagan penguburan raja enom sing meh wutuh. Nanging dibandhingake karo makam-makam ningrat liyane, makam Tutankhamun ora patut ditekani, amarga luwih cilik lan rerenggan sing ora sepirane. Sapa wae sing kepingin ndeleng bukti-bukti saka mumi sing rusak nalika nyoba mindhahke pethi kuwi bakal kuciwa amarga mung sirah lan pundhak sing katon. Kasugihan kuburan sing luwar biyasa kasebut ora ana maneh, nanging wis dipindhah menyang Musium Mesir ing Kairo. Wong mara kanthi wektu sing kewatesan luwih becik ngentekake wektune ing panggonan liyane.

src: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.
mt: Pulau Bowen isa panerbangan populer utawa weekend sing nggawe kayak, hiking, toko, restoran, lan luwih. Komunitas asli iki ana ing Howe Sound sing adoh saka Vancouver, lan bisa diakses kanthi nggunakake water taxi sing disedhiakake ing Granville Island ing downtown Vancouver. Kanggo sing suka ngerjani ing luar, trek nganti Sea to Sky corridor isa esensial. Whistler (1.5 jam mabuk saka Vancouver) isa mahal nanging dikenal amarga 2010 Winter Olympics. Ing musim dingin, ngerasukakake ing salah sijining paling apik ski ing Amerika Lor, lan ing musim panas coba kayak sing asli mountain biking.
ref: Pulo Bowen iku wisata sedina utawa akhir minggu sing didhemeni nawarake kayak, munggah gunung, toko-toko, restoran, lan liyane. Pakumpulan asli iki dumunung ing Howe Sound adoh saka Vancouver, lan gampang dagayuh liwat becak banyu sing wis dijadwal sing budhal saka Pulo Granville ing pusat kutha Vancouver. Kanggo sing seneng kamempengan ing njaba omah, mlaku turut ing pinggiring gang Laut menyang Langit penting banget. Whistler (1,5 jam nyupir saka Vancouver) larang nanging misuwur ing Olimpiade Mangsa Panas 2010. Ing mangsa adhem, seneng-senenga liwat sawetara panggonan ski paling apik ing Amerika Lor, lan ing mangsa panas nyobaa pit-pitan liwat gunung sing asli.

src: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls. On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!
mt: Victoria Falls iku kutha ing porselen kidul Zimbabwe, saka sisi kidul Livingstone, Zambia, lan nggadhang Botswana. Kutha iki ana langsung nggadhang saka jaran, lan karan inggih punika atraksi utama, nanging kutha popular wisata iki tawis panyerbu lan wisatawan sithik ingkang saged nggabungake lama. Ing musim hujan (November nganti Maret), volume banyu bakal luwih lan jaran bakal luwih dramatis. Kamu bakal saged kena banyu ingkang nggadhang saka jaran utawa kagungan ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang nggadhang ingkang
ref: Victoria Falls iku kuta ing bagean kulon Zimbabwe, ngliwati wates saka Livingstone, Zambia, lan cedhak Botswana. Kutha kasebut langsung ana ing jejere grojogan, lan iku dadi daya tarik utama, nanging tujuan turis sing populer iki nawakake petualang lan pelancong loro-lorone kesempatan sing akeh kanggo nginep luwih suwe. Ing mangsa udan (November tekan Maret), akehe banyu bakal luwih gedhe lan grojogane bakal luwih dramatis. Sampeyan mesthi teles menawa sampeyan nyebrang jembatan utawa mlaku sadawane dalan cilik menggok cerak Grojogan. Ing sisih liya, kapinujon amarga isi banyu dhuwur banget mula yen sampeyan ndeleng Banyu terjun sing nyata bakal katon digedhahake—dening kabeh banyu!

src: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.
mt: Kanggo fotografi biasa uga ngaplikake kanggo rekaman video, mungkin uga luwih. Jika ngambekake foto siji sing ora diijinkake, munggah rekaman video siji sing ora diijinkake. Jika nggunakake drone, cek dadi ing nganti nengkene apa sing diijinkake kanggo ngambekake lan apa sing diijinkake utawa lisensi tambahan sing kudu. Ngebangke drone ning bandhara utawa ing antaraning kumpulan sing ora biasa dadi ide sing ora baik, nanging munggah sing ora diijinkake ing wilayahmu.
ref: Paugeran babagan pemotretan biasa uga berlaku kanggo rekaman video, bahkan mungkin luwih. Yen mung moto wae ora diidini, sampeyan kudune ora malah kepikiran ngrekam videone iku. Menawa nggunakake sawijining pesawat tanpa awak, priksa kanthi apik kayata apa sing sampeyan oleh filmke lan ijin utawa surat ijin tambahan apa sing dibutuhake. Ngaburne drone cedhak bandara utawa kerumunan iku tansah dadi gagasan sing ala, sanadyan iku ora ilegal ing wilayah sampeyan.

src: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities. This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask). In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.
mt: Registrasi minangka persyaratan tambahan kanggo proses visa. ref: Pancathetan minangka wewaton tambahan kanggo nyawisake visa. Ing sawetara negara, sampeyan kudu nyathet karawuhan lan tetenger karo panguwasa ing kana. Iki bisa uga mbutuhake ngisi formulir karo polisi lokal utawa nekani kantor imigrasi. Ing pirang-pirang negara sing duwe angger-angger kasebut, hotel-hotel lokal bakal nangani pancathetan (mesthekake sampeyan takon). Ing kasus liya, mung wong sing nginep sak njabane akomodasi turis sing kudu ndaftar. Nanging, iki ndadekake aturane luwih ketutup, mula sampeyan temokake sakdurunge.

src: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.
mt: Ngabdi sementara bejana njaluk nggawe perbedaan, nanging ora mung ngenani nggawe. Ngalami lan ngabdi ing negara asing njaluk nggawe kabudayan sing beda, ketemu wong-wong anyar, ngerti babagan diri, ngerti babagan perspektif, lan mungkin ngerti kawruh anyar. Uga bisa njaluk nggawe angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka
ref: Dadi relawan nalika plesir kuwi cara sing apik banget kanggo gawe pambeda nanging ora mung perkara menehi. Urip lan dadi sukarelawan ning negara asing kuwi dadi cara sing apik kanggo ngenal kabudayan liyane, ketemu wong anyar, ngenali awakmu dhewe, nduweni sudhut sesawangan lan uga nduweni kemampuan anyar. Iki uga bisa dadi cara sing apik kanggo ngrenggangake anggaran supaya netep luwih suwe ing sawijining panggon amarga akeh pakaryan sukarela nyedhiyakake kamar lan dhaharan lan sawetara ngupahi sithik.

Uga bisa njaluk nggawe angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka angka
ref: Dadi relawan nalika plesir kuwi cara sing apik banget kanggo gawe pambeda nanging ora mung perkara menehi. Urip lan dadi sukarelawan ning negara asing kuwi dadi cara sing apik kanggo ngenal kabudayan liyane, ketemu wong anyar, ngenali awakmu dhewe, nduweni sudhut sesawangan lan uga nduweni kemampuan anyar. Iki uga bisa dadi cara sing apik kanggo ngrenggangake anggaran supaya netep luwih suwe ing sawijining panggon amarga akeh pakaryan sukarela nyedhiyakake kamar lan dhaharan lan sawetara ngupahi sithik.

src: "Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families. The ""typical"" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home. There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of ""going to Disney World"". Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets. While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable."
mt: "Ninggalake Walt Disney World nggawe perjalanan kanggo keluarga Amerika sing gedhe. Kegiatan sing "typical" nggawe nggoleki ing Orlando International Airport, busing menyang hotel Disney sing ana ing situs, ngecakakake saben wektu tanpa ninggalake situs Disney, lan kambali menyang rumah. Ana variasi sing takon, nanging iki tetep sing diwaca nalika wong-wong ngomong menawa "ngelakake Disney World". Banyak tiket sing dijual online ing situs lelang kaya eBay utawa Craigslist yaiku tiket park-hopper multi-hari sing wis dipakai. Nanging, iki dilarang dening Disney: tiket iku ora bisa dipindahake."
ref: "Plesiran menyang Donya Walt Disney kuwi dadi jiarah utama kanggo akeh kaluwarga ana ning Amerika. Kunjungan ""khas"" iki kalebu mabur menyang Bendara Internasional Orlando, njupuk bis menyang lusmen Disney ing dhaerah kasebut, ngentekake sajrone seminggu tanpa ninggalake piranti babagan Disney, banjur mulih. Ana akeh macem pilihan sing ora terbatas, nanging iki isih bisa diarani nalika uwong umume ngomong babagan ""arep menyang ing Disney World"". Akeh tiket sing payu kanthi cara onlen liwat situs web lelang kayata eBay utawa Craigslist separo dienggo tiket taman-hopper pirang-pirang dina. Sanajan iki minangka kamempengan sing umum, dilarang dening Disney: tiket ora bisa ditransfer."

src: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training. A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company. A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.

ref: Sapa wae kang duwe rencana nekani negara kang bisa dianggep zona perang kudu golek pelatihan profesional. Panaliten Internet kanggo ‘Kursus lingkungan memungsuhan’ isa uga bakal nyawisake alamat perusahaan lokal. Kursus iku biyasane bakal ngrembug perkara sing dirembug ning kene kanthi luwih rinci, umume kanthi pengalaman praktik. Siji kursus umume bakal seka 2-5 dina lan bakal nglibatake dolanan peran, akeh pitulungan sepisan lan kadhang kala latian senjata. Buku lan majalah sing mbahas babagan kelangsungan urip ing alam liar iku lumrah, nanging penerbitan sing mbahas zona perang iku sathithik.

src: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats. In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed. Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.
mt: Ana cara-cara kanggo nggawe banyu jernih, saka sing paling efektif ngalangi ancaman sing beda. Ing wilayah-wilayah sing beda, nggawe banyu panas kanggo sawetara menit bisa cukup, ing wilayah-wilayah liyane sawetara menit sing diperlukan. Filter beda-beda ing efektivitas, lan kalo kalian duwe kekhawatiran, kalian bisa ngerti karo nggawe banyu ing botol sing disegel saka perusahaan sing dipercaya.
ref: Ana cara-cara sing beda kanggo ngresiki banyu, sepira antarane luwih efektif kanggo nglawan anceman sing spesifik. Ing sawetara derah nggodhok banyu mung menit cukup, ing derah liyane mbutuhake sawetara menit. Saringan iku macem-macem ing asile, lan menawa sampeyan duweni kekuwatiran, mula sampeyan kudu mikir kanggo tuku banyu sampeyan ing botol sing disegel saka pabrik sing diweruhi.

src: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there. Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible. As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally. Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.
mt: Gelombang balik yaiku aliran bali saka gelombang sing njeblug saka pasir, kadang-kadang ing karang utawa sing padha. Amarga topologi bawah laut sing padha, aliran bali konsentrasine ing sawetara seksi sing dhuwur, lan arus cepat menyang bawah laut bisa mbentuk ing papan-papan sing padha. Kematian sing paling akèh terjadi minangka hasil saka kelelahan nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut nggabut
ref: Arus kuwat saka laut sing mili bali menyang tengah nalika ombak pecah ning pinggiran pantai, asring pecah ning karang utawa watu liyane. Mergo topologi sangisore banyu, bali miline kepusat ing sawetara bagean-bagean sing luwih jero, lan arus sing cepet menyang banyu jero bisa kebentuk ing kana. Akeh wong mati gara-gara kekeselen nalika nyoba nglangi nglawan arus kuwi, lan ora mungkin. Sanalika sampeyan metu saka ilen-ilen, nglangi mbalik ora luwih angel tinimbang biasane. Cobanen ngarahake ing endi sampeyan ora ketangkep maneh utawa, gumantung marang keterampilan sampeyan lan sampeyan tau dingerteni apa ora, sampeyan bisa uga pengin nunggu kanggo pitulungan.

src: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around. For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal. They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.
mt: Kabeh banyu sing ana ing daratan bisa dadi tema kanggo ngebaseake liburan. Misalne, ngeunjuk kastil ing Dataran Loire, Dataran Rhine, utawa ngecruise menyang kutha sing apik ing Dataran Danube utawa ngeboati ing Erie Canal. Uga nggawe rute kanggo hiking lan cycling sing populer.
ref: Dalan banyu kampung bisa dadi gagasan sing apik kanggo liburan. Umpamane plesir menyang kraton-kraton ning Lembar Loire, Lembah Rhine utawa numpak kapal pesiar menyang kutha-kutha sing nyenengke ana Danube utawa numpak prau ning Terusan Erie. Dheweke kabeh uga namtokake dalan kanggo munggah sing misuwur lan dalan pit-pitan.

src: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status. It is helpful to also wear a ring (just not one that looks too expensive. Women should realize that cultural differences may result in what they would consider harassment and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).
mt: Ing lor wilayah iki dibatasi dening Sahel, lan ing kidul lan kulon dening Samodra Atlantik. Wanita:Disarankan supaya setiap perempuan wisatawan ngomong yen dia wis menikah, tanpa ngerteni status perkawinan aktual. Iki bisa bermanfaat supaya dia nggunakake cincin (saja ora cincin sing terlalu mahal. Wanita kudu ngerti yen perbedaan budaya bisa nyebabake apa yang mereka anggep penganiayaan lan ora asing kanggo ditindakake, ditangkepi, lan sebagainya. Jangan takut supaya nggoleki pangertene (perbedaan budaya utawa ora, ora ngerti yen ora ngerti).
ref: Ing sisih lor wilayah iku diwatesi kanthi Sahel, lan ing sisih kidul lan kulun dening Samudra Atlantik. Wong wadon: dianjurne kanggo marang wadon sing lelungan kanggo ngomong menawa dheweke uwis nikah, ora peduli apa status nikahe sing saktemene. Iki mbiyantu kanggo uga nganggo ali-ali (namung wae udu sing katon larang. Wanita kudu ngerteni manawa beda budaya bisa nyebabake reribed lan dheweke ora biyasa ditututi, dicekel ing lengene, lsp. Sing teges anggone nolak wong lanang, lan aja wedi njejer jejeg ing panggonmu (beda budaya utawa ora, ora bisa gawe becik!).

src: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses. Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes. Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.
mt: Kanggo fotografer, hewan alam bisa dadi motif kang paling nggawetake, lan butuh kombinasi saka keberuntungan, sabar, pengalaman, lan peralatan sing apik. Fotografi hewan alam umume butuh lensa telephoto sing panjang, nanging bagean-bagean kaya suwara burung utawa hewan cilik butuh lensa liyane. Hewan eksotis bisa dadi sulit ditemokake, lan taman kadang-kadang duwe aturan ngenai ngambil foto kanggo tujuan komersial. Hewan alam bisa ora sabar utawa agresif. Lingkungan bisa adhem, panas, utawa ora ramah.
ref: Margasatwa liar minangka salah sawijining modhel sing paling nantang kanggo fotografer, lan mbutuhake gabungan kabegjan, sabar, pangalaman lan piranti kang apik. Pemotretan margasatwa iku kerep dianggep remeh, nanging kaya pemotretan umume, foto iku aji ewunan tembung. Fotografi satwa liar asring mbutuhake lensa telepoto sing dawa, sanadyan kewan-kewan kayata klompok manuk utawa kewan sing cilik mbutuhake lensa liyane Akeh kewan-kewan eksotik iku angel ditemokake, lan taman-taman kadhang kala duwe aturan-aturan bab njupuk foto-foto kanggo kaperluan komersial. Kewan liar bisa wae isin utawa galak. Lingkungane bisa wae adhem, panas, utawa suwalike satru.

src: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses. Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes. Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.

src: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures. On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt. During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time. Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows. On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.
mt: Ora kudu ngerti menawa sing bakal nglintang ing lintang dhuwur utawa ing lemah gunung bakal ngerti kabarane salju, es, utawa suhu sing adhem. Ing jalan sing katon es utawa salju, gesekan dhuwur lan kudu ngerti menawa kudu nglintang kaya sing katon ing aspal sing ora katon es. Saiki salju sing bisa nggawetake kalian bisa jupuk wektu sing dhuwur. Kekuasan mungkin uga dibatasi dening salju sing jatuh utawa sing nggolek utawa es ing jendhela mobil. Saka sisi liyane, kondisi es lan salju normal ing akèh negara, lan lalu lintas mungkina nganti akèh taun.
ref: Sapa wae sing arep nyopir ana panggonan sing dhuwur utawa daerah gunung kudu nggatekke anane salju, es, utawa hawa sing anyep. Ing dalan sing lunyu amarga es lan kebak salju, gesekane sethithik lan sampeyan ora isa nyetir kaya menawa sampeyan ing aspal kosong. Nalika lesus, salju sing teko ora suwe kuwi cukup kanggo gawe sampeyan kajebak. Pandelok sampeyan uga bisa diwatesi dening salju sing tiba utawa mabur utawa dening kondensasi utawa es ing cendhela kendaraan. Nanging, kahanan nalika ana es lan salju kuwi normal ana ing akeh negara, lan lalu lintas tetep mlaku lan ora keganggu kaya adate

src: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.
mt: Kecuali kowe diplomat, kerja ing luar negeri umume ngandhutake kowe bakal wajib ngisi pajak pendapatan ing negara kowe berbasis. Pajak pendapatan diatur beda-beda ing negara beda, lan tingkat lan bracket beda-beda saka negara siji menyang negara liyane. Ing negara federal, kaya Amerika Serikat lan Kanada, pajak pendapatan diwajibake ing tingkat federal lan tingkat lokal, jadi tingkat lan bracket bisa beda-beda saka wilayah menyang wilayah.
ref: Kajaba sampeyan diplomat, kerja ing luar negeri umume iku tegese sampeyan kudu ngajokake pajek penghasilan ing negara sampeyan kerja. Pajeg pangasilan disungsun kanthi beda ing masing-masing negara, lan rega pajeg lan kurung pajeg akeh maceme saka negara siji marang liyane. Ing sawetara negara federal, kayata Amerika Serikat lan Kanada, pajek penghasilan iku ditarik ing tingkat pamarentah pusat lan ing tingkat daerah, satemah tarip lan golongan bisa beda saka daerah siji lan daerah liyane.

src: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences. Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history. International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants. Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not. These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.
mt: World's Fair (biasane disebut World Exposition, utawa Expo) yaiku festival internasional gedhe saka seni lan ilmu. Negara-negara sing berpartisipasi nggawe pameran seni lan pendidikan ing pavilhun nasional kanggo nggawe tampilan donya isu utawa budaya lan sejarah negarane. International Horticultural Expositions yaiku acara spesialis sing nggawe tampilan bunga, taman botani lan apa waé sing kaitane karo tanaman. Walaupun teori, bisa dianakake saben taun (sawise mung ing negara berbeda), ing praktek, ora. Acara-acara iki biasane dianakake antara telung lan nem wulan, lan diadakan ing situs sing ora katon 50 hektar.
ref: Pameran Donya (umume diarani Pameran Donya, utawa Expo) yaiku pestipal seni lan sains internasional sing gedhe banget. Negara-negara sing melu acara iki nuduhake pagelaran sing nyeni lan uga bisa disinau ning paviliun nasional kanggo nuduhke perkara donya utawa kabudayan negarane lan uga sejarah. Eksposisi Hortikultura Internasional yaiku acara kusus sing mamerake kembang-kembang, kebon botani, lan masalah sing ana hubungane karo tanduran. Sanadyan teorine iku bisa dianakake saben taun (angger ana ing beda negara), ing praktike ora bisa. Acara iki biasane nganti tekan antarane telu lan enem sasi, lan dianakake ing panggonan sing ora luwih cilik saka 50 hektar.

src: Though many of the animals in the park are used to seeing humans, the wildlife is nonetheless wild and should not be fed or disturbed. According to park authorities, stay at least 100 yards/meters away from bears and wolves and 25 yards/meters from all other wild animals! No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack. Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space. In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
mt: Wong-wong sing nggawa anak-anak, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang peliharaan, sing nggawa binatang pel
ref: Sanajan akeh kewan ing taman iku biasa kanggo weruh menungsa-menungsa, margasatwa iku sanajan mengkono liar lan kudune ora dipakani utawa diganggu. Minurut saka pengawas taman, ngadoha paling ora 100 yard/meter saka beruang lan asu ajag lan 25 yard/meter saka kabeh kewan liar! Sanadyan katon jinak, bison, elk, kidang gedhe, kidang, beruang, lan kabeh kewan sing gedhe bisa nyerang. Saben taun, lusinan plancong tiba lan tatu amarga nyedhaki kewan iki. Kewan iki gedhe banget, liar, lan mbebayani, mula aja cedhak-cedhak. Kanggo tamabahan, kudu ngati-ati amarga wewangenan iki bisa narik beruang lan kewan liar liyane, mula aja gawa utawa masak panganan sing ambune kuwat lan jaganen supaya lingkunganmu tetep resik.
